[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde za bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D243}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sad d+harma rA dza ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas shing sA la gnyis kyi bar na 
[\[1b.2\]]bzhugs te/_mya ngan las 'das par gshegs kar sems can thams cad brgya stong khri 'bum phal mang po kun shing gi drung na sangs rgyas 'khor bar bskor te 'khod nas mig ni yar 
[\[1b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ste/_cung zad kyang mi g.yengs/_de nas yang dag par gshegs pas 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'od chen po btang nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par 
[\[1b.4\]]snang ste/_'od de'i nang nas chos kun mngon par bstan nas de'i tshe mang po'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'i ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba zhig yod pa stan las langs te/_sangs rgyas la 
[\[1b.5\]]lan gsum bskor nas slar ngos gcig tu 'dug ste/_lus smad lnga sa la gtugs ngus te mchi ma blags nas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_lha'i nang na btsun pa yang dag par gshegs pas 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das par gshegs pa'i dus kyang nye/_gshegs su yang sla na/_gshegs pa'i slad na rnyog pa rnam pa lnga'i sems can las ngan pa mang ba bgyid cing ngan pa bcu sha stag spyod pa 'di lta bu'i sems can legs pa'i 
[\[2a.2\]]dpal gyi stobs snang ba la sangs rgyas kyis shin tu zab cing /_dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge sde bcu gnyis bshad pa yi ge'i 'bru ni [{]mangs[,]mang[}]/_gzhung ni rgya ches pas khong du chud cing 'tshal bar bgyi ba'ang dka'/_chos 'di kun blta zhing rjes kyang mi chod na/_
[\[2a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te/_theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag pa'i bden pa bye brag phyed par bshad de/_sems can rnams yang dag pa'i sman bzang po thob par bgyis te/_nad gdug go cog sos par bgyir smon to/_/sangs 
[\[2a.4\]]rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_shin tu dge'o/_/shin tu dge'o/_/rigs kyi bu pho khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri bar nus pa bsod nams chen po thob ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/
[\[2a.5\]]ngas khyod la yang dag pa'i bden pa/_theg pa chen po'i chos bye brag phyed pa/_mi 'gyur ba'i gzhung rdzogs par bshad do/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_sems can rgya cher thar bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/sems can rnams mya ngan dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[2a.6\]]sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pa las phyin cing yul gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/yang dag par grol thar cing skye shi las 'das par bya ba'i phyir khyed rnams kun sems gcig tu soms shig dang khyed la go bar bshad do/_/de nas phal mang 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]po kun shin tu dga' gzha' ste/_kha tha dad kyis kyang tshig 'thun par cig car smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te/_bdag cag rnams la bye brag phyed par bshad par smon to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu pho rnams grol thar bar 
[\[2b.2\]]'dod na/_'dod pa'i yan lag bcad la sems gnyis su mi bsam par gcig tu bsams te yod pa bsam pa'i sems btang ngo /_/sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul ni stong pa ste/_sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang na 'go ba'ang med do/_/gtang ba'ang med do/_/blang ba 
[\[2b.3\]]dang gtang ba med na ci'ang thob pa med do/_/de'i ming ni byang chub bo/_/ji lta zhe na/_mya ngan phal mang po kun ni sems gcig las skyes so/_/sems mi sems na mya ngan kyang mi skye ste/_'du mched dang /_shes rab rnams la blang ba dang /_gtang ba med do/_/
[\[2b.4\]]blang ba dang gtang ba med pa 'dod chags so cog dang bral lo/_/'dod chags so cog dang bral na 'dod pa'i yan lag med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi 'du mched dang /_shes 
[\[2b.5\]]rab kyi legs nyes skye nus shing /_lan bon ldang ba'i gnas lags te/_phyi nang mu gnyis kyi chos so cog gcig gi nang du gcig zhugs nas/_ci'i slad nas de'i nang na blang ba dang /_gtang ba ma ma mchis zhes bgyir rung /_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam 
[\[2b.6\]]mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho bsam gtan gcig tu 'dus pa'i nang du zhugs la kun gyis phyi nang du brtags na tha mar yong med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nang du bltas nang du brtags na yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid la skye ba med/_phyir bltas phyir brtags na 
[\[2b.7\]]ma rig pa mi ldang /_skye ba'ang med/_ldang ba'ang med na/_mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med de/_de ni gtsang gdang ba yin no/_/de ni mchog tu dga' ba'i sman yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]par gshegs pas theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag pa'i gzugs shin tu zab cing gces pa/_bla na ma mchis pa'i sman bzang po dang /_theg pa gcig gi bden pa'i nang du 'jug pa bshad na/_slan chad kyi sems can mi gtsang ba'i las gsum gyis ngan 
[\[3a.2\]]pa bcu'i las bgyis te/_log sred kyi las spyad pas rtsa ba dang gzhi phra zhing zhan te/_sems la gzungs su gzung ba'ang dka' nas sman dang nad kyang gal te mi 'thun na thabs ji ltar bgyis na theg pa chen po'i nang du 'jug par rung /_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems 
[\[3a.3\]]dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_nga la thabs yod kyis theg pa chen po la 'jug par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gna' sngon thos pa yang dag par gshegs pas theg pa 
[\[3a.4\]]chen po'i mi la ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos bshad/_theg pa bar ma'i mi la ni rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi chos bshad/_theg pa chung ngu'i mi la ni bden pa bzhi'i chos bshad/_log sred kyi mi la ni dge ba bcu'i chos bshad de/_kun kyang nad kyi gzugs dang sbyar nas chos kyi sman 
[\[3a.5\]]bzang po bshad na/_de ci'i slad nas theg pa gcig gi chos bshad de mi 'di rnam bzhi'i ra mda' bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_ngas theg pa gcig gi lam gyi chos bshad pa 'di ni dper na sa gcig gis yod do cog bskyed cing 
[\[3a.6\]]thams cad gso nus pa dang mtshungs so/_/yang dper na chos kyi char pa'i rlan gyis thams cad la khyab par yog ste/_sa las skyes so thams cad ngoms so/_/dper na 'bras sna gcig gi chan bro ba la 'jig rten gyi sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa kun za'o/_/zos 
[\[3a.7\]]so cog kun lus ni skye/_srog ni 'tsho ste/_kun skye bar byas pa ni dper na sman gyi rgyal po sman sbyor mkhas pas sman gces pa bzang po kun sbyar te/_sems can tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa la btang na ni grang bsil/_sems can grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa la btang na ni dro tsha'o/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]tshad pa na ba la btang na ni chad do/_/'khyil pa la btang na ni phol te nad mi sos pa med do/_/ngas theg pa gcig bshad de mi de'i gzhi'i nad rnams gso ba yang de dang mtshungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[3b.2\]]'das thabs ji lta bu spyad de/_ngan pa bcu dang sems can log sred de/_theg pa gcig cig gi lam du 'jug par bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho nga'i theg pa gcig gi chos la theg pa gsum ldan te/_
[\[3b.3\]]yang gud na theg pa gsum zhes bya ba bshad pa med do/_/khyod brtag par nyon cig dang khyod la zhib tu bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu pho dam pa'i chos kyi lam mo cog phyi mo'i gzhi ngo bo nyid gcig ste/_gnyis su med na thabs spyad pa'i phyir theg pa gsum du bshad do/_/
[\[3b.4\]]theg pa gsum gyi chos kun gcig tu 'dus par brtag_/sems can no cog la rnam pa bzhi yod mod kyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnyis su med do/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_sangs rgyas so cog dang /_sems can no cog gi ngo bo nyid gcig tu 'thun te/_mdo gcig ste 
[\[3b.5\]]sems can tha dad pa med na/_sems can rang gi sems kyis bye brag dbye ba g.yos so/_/yong ni sangs rgyas kyang sems can yin/_sems can kyang sangs rgyas yin te/_sems can no cog la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang sems can 
[\[3b.6\]]gyi ngo bo nyid de gnyis kyang gcig ste/_ngo bo nyid gcig tu mtshungs mnyam mo/_/chos so cog dang yang mnyam pas na nga la thabs yod pas theg pa gcig la zhugs par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu pho sems can de rnams kyi sems kyi mkhar dam du srung du btsud de rkun po 
[\[3b.7\]]ma zhugs par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa drug gi sgo mo chen po rdo rjes bsrungs bran la sems 'dug pa'i gnas la brtags te/_sems 'dug pa'i gnas shes na sems 'dug pa'i gnas na sems mi 'dug go/_/sems mi 'dug na gdod sems 'dug pa med do/_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]ngan no cog la sems mi 'dug cing /_'du mched khams la sems mi 'dug na 'dod pa'i yan lag gi sems med do/_/'dod pa'i yan lag med na sems kyi 'dod cing btsal ba med do/_/sems la btsal ba med na sems ga la yang mi 'dug go/_/
[\[4a.2\]]ga la yang mi 'dug na gdod de'i ming ni sems 'dug ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu pho sems can gyi sems kyi mya ngan no cog byas pa ni kun kyang rnam par shes pa las g.yos te mi 'dug pa'i lan no/_/sems 'dug na gdod mya ngan kyang med do/_/mya ngan med na 
[\[4a.3\]]gdod byang chub yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis mya ngan no cog bgyis shing sems mi 'dug pa de ci zhig gi stobs kyis bslang ste/_'dod pa'i yan lag bgyis pa sangs 
[\[4a.4\]]rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te/_phal mang po la sgrol zhing bshad par smon to/_/sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can no cog sems kyi yan lag g.yos pas rang bzhin gyi stobs gnyis yod do/_/gnyis zhes bya ba gang yin zhes byas na/_
[\[4a.5\]]gcig ni 'du mched kyi phyir g.yos te sems kyi yan lag rang bzhin gyi stobs so/_/gnyis ni 'du mched kyi phyir ma langs kyi bdag gi sems la rang langs te de ni bdag gi rang bzhin gyi stobs so/_/rigs kyi bu pho de sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin gnyis mi g.yo bar 
[\[4a.6\]]byas na gdod mya ngan kyang med byang chub kyang med do/_/mya ngan kyang med byang chub kyang med na gdod yang dag par bden pa'i gnas su chud de/_de ni byang chub yang dag pa yin no/_/khyod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpas sems can zhig bstan cing drang na yang sems 'dug 
[\[4a.7\]]par ston cig_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can bslab cing drang na de'i sems 'dug par bgyi na/_khams gang la 'dug na byang chub thob par rung /_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_shin tu dge'o shin tu dge'o/_/rigs kyi bu pho khyod de 'dri re mkhas sems kyi phyi mo 'di lta bu 'dri ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/khyed brtags par nyon cig dang /_khyed la zhib tu bshad do/_/
[\[4b.2\]]rigs kyi bu pho sems can bslabs shing drang ste sems 'dug par bya na 'dug pa ni nang na yang mi 'dug_/phyi rol na yang mi 'dug_/bar na yang mi 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i chos kyang nang na yang mi 'dug_/phyi rol na yang mi 'dug_/
[\[4b.3\]]bar na yang mi 'dug go/_/sems kyi shes pa gcig pu la gnas te/_med pa'i gnas la 'dug pas na byang chub thob bo/_/byang chub thob tu zin kyang byang chub thob pa yong med de/_de'i ming ni yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_mya ngan ni mi 
[\[4b.4\]]bden pa las skyes te mya ngan kyang stong pa'o/_/chos so cog kyang rang skyes pa med de chos kyang stong pa'o/_/sems zhes bya ba yang gyin da ming yod du zad kyi thob par mi rung ste/_sems kyang stong pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu pho sems stong pa yin par rig na/_stong pa'i 
[\[4b.5\]]sems gcig gis nang nas mi bden pa thams cad la blta ba'i mi rigs so/_/thams cad la bltas na de'i ming ni sems kyi dri ma zhes bya'o/_/sems la dri ma med na de'i ming ni zag pa zad ces bya ba ste/_mig dang kha dog dang sems gsum char yang stong pa ste/_rtag 
[\[4b.6\]]par gtsang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_chos so cog kun kyang /_de bzhin lags pa lta na/_sems can thams cad kyang lus gcig_/sems gcig_/khams 
[\[4b.7\]]gcig_/sangs rgyas gcig gi khams su chud par nus pa'i rigs/_sangs rgyas gcig gi khams nas stong pa gang zhig khyab pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi khams su 'jug nus pa'i rigs/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho khams thams cad kyang khams gcig tu gzhug tu rung ngo /_/khams gcig dang /_pad mo'i gdan gcig dang /_yang dag par gshegs pa'i sku lus gcig gis khams thams cad kyang kun rgyas shing 
[\[5a.2\]]gang bar rung ngo /_/khams thams cad mngon par bstan na kun kyang stong pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khams bzang du brgyan par yang rung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi lus kyis khams thams cad gang rgyas par rung ngo /_/ba spu nyag ma gcig 
[\[5a.3\]]gi bu ga'i nang du khams thams cad shong bar yang rung ngo /_/khams thams cad khams gcig gi nang du gzhug pa dang /_sems can gcig gi lus kyi nang du shong bar yang rung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gcig dang /_byang chub kyi shing sdong po gcig gis 
[\[5a.4\]]khams thams cad gang bar yang rung ngo /_/sgra skad snyan pa gcig gis khams thams cad gang ste/_thams cad de bzhin thos shing shes te kun dga' gzha' bar yang rung ngo /_/chos spyod pa rnams chos de bzhin gang bar shes na gzhan gyi yul khams thams cad du sangs 
[\[5a.5\]]rgyas kyi lus btsal ba'i mi rigs kyi/_sems gcig dang /_khams gcig gi gnas la sangs rgyas kyi lus btsal ba'i rigs so/_/lus gcig gi nang nas thams cad kyi lus 'byung bar nus so/_/thams cad kyi lus kyi nang nas lus gcig 'byung bar nus so/_/
[\[5a.6\]]ji lta zhes byas na/_lus gcig ni sangs rgyas gcig gi lus yin no/_/lus mang po thams cad ni sems can gyi lus yin pas na/_kun sems gcig las skyes so/_/sems gcig pu dge na chos so cog zad par dge'o/_/sems gcig phyi mo mi dge na 
[\[5a.7\]]chos so cog zad par yang mi dge'o/_/las ngan pa byas na sems can ngan pa'i lus su skye'o/_/las dge ba byas na lha dang mi'i lus su skye'o/_/sems gcig po yang sems gcig gi gzugs dang bral na sems kyi gzugs kyi nang na stong pa ste/_ci la'ang 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]thob pa med do/_/stong pa'i khams dang yang bral na blang ba med pa'i sa ni sangs rgyas kyi lus skye nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi lus la ni lus gcig tu zad kyi gnyis su med do/_/yong sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gcig go/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig gi nang na 
[\[5b.2\]]sems kyi ngo bo nyid gcig tu zad do/_/sems gcig po ma gtogs par gud du gzhan la btsal ba med do/_/gzhan la btsal ba byas na de ni yon po mi drang ba'o/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_sems kyi chos thams cad ni phyi logs nas btsal ba med do/_/phyi logs 
[\[5b.3\]]kyi gnas nas btsal na/_de'i ming ni gzhan zhes bya'o/_/gzhan gyi gnas las btsal na de ni mi bden pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems gcig gi nang nas sangs rgyas thob par rung na/_thams 
[\[5b.4\]]cad kyi sems kyi nang na/_kun la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis pa lta/_sems can thams cad kun la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis na/_yang dag par gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems gcig po spyad de/_sems can thams cad bskyed nus te sems gcig lus 
[\[5b.5\]]gcig gis 'khrul pa bsal na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan ma mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku lus su skyes lags pa lta/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de yin no de yin no/_/khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin 
[\[5b.6\]]te/_sems can kun la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod de/_sangs rgyas yang dag par gshegs pa thams cad kun gyis sems gcig pu'i chos spyad de/_sems can thams cad kyi sems so cog sems gcig pu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol du btsud pas sangs 
[\[5b.7\]]rgyas kyi lus thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du btsal bas sangs rgyas thob na sems can thams cad kyi so so'i 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]sems kyi nang na yang sangs rgyas lags te/_de thob par yang rung /_mthong bar yang rung lags pa lta/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag pa'i gzugs dam par 
[\[6a.2\]]'jug pa ni thob ces byar yang mi rung ngo /_/mi thob ces byar yang mi rung ngo /_/mthong zhes byar yang mi rung /_mi mthong zhes byar yang mi rung ngo /_/ji lta zhes byas na/_byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod ces bshad na/_de'i ming ni sangs rgyas la skur 
[\[6a.3\]]to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na yang sangs rgyas la skur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin/_zhes bshad na yang sangs rgyas la skur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na yang sangs rgyas la skur to/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_
[\[6a.4\]]byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin na ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs/_med pa ma yin na ni ri bong gi rwa dang mtshungs te/_ri bong gi rwa ni yong med do/_/nam mkha' ni rtag par yod do/_/gzugs kyi tshul ni yod pa ma yin no/_/
[\[6a.5\]]nam mkha'i tshul ni med pa ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi tshul kun dang bral na ci la'ang chags pa med do/_/skye ba'i gnas la mi 'dug ste/_de la skye bar mthong na dri ma'o/_/med pa'i gnas na mi 'dug ste/_de la ma mthong na chad pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can gyi sangs 
[\[6a.6\]]rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dam pa'i gzugs ni de lta bu yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod ces bshad na bskyed de skur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med ces bshad na smad de skur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod kyang yod/_med kyang med ces bshad na log par skur 
[\[6a.7\]]to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang ma yin zhes bshad na 'gran tor du skur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dam pa de bzhin du zab ste/_'du mched 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]kyi rnams dang bral bas cis kyang gos pa ma mchis te/_dper na nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing phyi mo'i ngo bo nyid rtag par gtsang na ci'i slad nas sems can gyis mya ngan rnams bgyis/_mya ngan bgyis na sems nyid dri ma lags pa lta na/_sems kyi dri ma de thog ma ga las 
[\[6b.2\]]skyes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phal mang po la bshad de/_sems can gyi rnams kun gyis thos shing shes par bgyis te/_sems can gyi rnams kyi mya ngan ngan no 'tshal ba zhig ste/_sems kyi dri ma bkrus pas la la bkab cing dkris pa yang bral bar smon to/_/de nas sangs 
[\[6b.3\]]rgyas 'dzum mul zhes bzhad de phyag g.yon pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyi bo la phyis te/_'od chen po btang nas thams cad kun tu khyab par byas so/_/de nas sems can phal mang po thams cad kun shin tu dga' gzha'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas byang chub sems dpas 
[\[6b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi phyir de lta bu'i dri ba byas pa de'i ming ni drang po dris pa ste/_sems can thar bar bya ba yin no/_/tshig gzhan dris na de'i ming ni yon por dris zhes bya ste/_sems can brlag pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyod drang po 'dri nus pa sems can thar par 
[\[6b.5\]]byas pa yin no/_/khyed la sogs pa sems can kun sems gcig tu soms la brtags par nyon te/_'gyes shing 'khrug pa'i sems sol la phyi logs kyi don med par byos te/_sems kyi yid thub par 'dug shig dang khyed la bshad do/_/bshad pa thos na ngan pa 
[\[6b.6\]]bcu'i sems can kun grol thar pa thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la sogs pa sems can phal mang po thams cad kun sems gcig tu bgyis lags te/_'khrug pa'i sems gzhan ma 
[\[6b.7\]]mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis phal mang po la dgrol bshad par smon to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dang phal mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_mya ngan thams cad ni phyin ci log las skyes so/_/phyin ci log thams cad ni mi bden pa'i 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]sems las skyes so/_/mi bden pa'i sems thams cad ni nga yod pa las skyes so/_/nga yod pa thams cad ni phyi mo yong med pa las skyes so/_/phyi mo med pa thams cad ni mi 'dug pa nyid yin no/_/phyi mo med na yod pa ma yin no/_/yod pa 
[\[7a.2\]]ni dri ma'o/_/med pa ni gtsang ma'o/_/gtsang ma de'i gnas ni rtag par pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/skyid pa pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/nga pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/gtsang ma pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/de lta bu mthong ba ni ming drang po mthong ba zhes bya ste/_gzhan 
[\[7a.3\]]mthong ba ni ming yon po mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/de lta bu mthong ba ni mi de la shes rab yod do/_/gzhan mthong ba ni mi de la shes rab med do/_/shes rab yod pas ni thabs kyis bkrol lo/_/shes rab med pas ni thabs kyis bcings so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[7a.4\]]dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gtsang ma'i gnas de na sems can la la zhig sems rtag tu rtag pa'i sems g.yos so/_/rtag tu skyid pa'i sems g.yo'o/_/rtag tu nga'i sems g.yo'o/_/rtag tu gtsang ma'i sems 
[\[7a.5\]]g.yo'o/_/shes rab yod pa lags te phyin ci log ma lags so/_/sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_sems can la la zhig de ltar sems pa ni ming drang po sems pa ste/_mi de drang po mthong ba yin no/_/mi de shes rab yod 
[\[7a.6\]]pa yin no/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_yang dag par gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku lus rtag pa pha rol tu phyin/_skyid pa pha rol tu phyin/_nga pha rol tu phyin/_gtsang ma pha rol tu phyin te gtsang gdang bar gnas so/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku lus de lta bur mthong 
[\[7a.7\]]ba'i mi de ni sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i slob ma gcig pu yin te/_drang po'i chos las skyes/_chos las 'phrul te skyes/_sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas skyes/_sangs rgyas kyi brtan pa bzhi thob bo/_/mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi brtan pa bzhi byang chub sems dpa' yin no/_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]rigs kyi bu pho nga 'das pa'i phyi na lo lnga brgya yang rung /_lo stong yang rung /_lo stong lnga brgya yang rung /_de'i phyi na yang mi la la zhig gis chos kyi yi ge 'di gzungs su bzung ste/_kha ton dang klog nus la bshad pa bzhin du las su byas te/_rtag skyid/_nga gtsang gi 
[\[7b.2\]]gnas la yid ches shing drang por mthong gi steng du chos 'di spyad de/_sems can bstan bslabs na/_sems can gcig bstan na de'i ming byang chub sems dpa'o/_/mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi yon phul ba blang du rung ste/_khyim nas byung ba'i mi yin no/_/
[\[7b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das la yong khyim nas byung ba'i mi de skra dang kha spu bregs la chos kyi gos gyon te/_tshul khrims tshang ba mnos te/_tha mal pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa de'i ming ni khyim nas byung ste/_
[\[7b.4\]]yon blang du rung ba zhes bgyi na/_yang dag par gshegs pas da bshad pa mi tha mal pa la khyim nas byung ba'i mi lags te/_yon blang du rung zhes bgyi ba de'i gzhung bye brag ma phyed na/_sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te bdag la bshad par smon 
[\[7b.5\]]to/_/sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho skra dang kha spu bregs pa ni lus la nga med par gdul ba'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi gos gyon pa ni tha mal pa'i chos dang dbral ba'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims tshang bar 
[\[7b.6\]]'dzin pa ni thob cing mi gzhig pa'i phyir ro/_/ngas bshad pa de mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi lus dang sems thul bar nus te/_nga dang le lo mi g.yo sems la rdul gyis ma gos te/_tha mal pa'i chos dang bral nas yun [{]rings te[,]ring ste[}]/_rdo rje dang mtshungs te/_tshul khrims kyi ngo bo 
[\[7b.7\]]nyid ma zhig pas/_tha mal pa yin mod kyi yang dag par na khyim nas byung ba yang dag pa yin no/_/yang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge 'di'i nang na bshad pa bzhin du las su spyad na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la yid ches pas rtag skyid nga gtsang mthong ste/_sems can 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]la bkrol bshad na mi tha mal pa yin mod kyi brtan pa bzhi'i mi yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i las spyod pa yon blang du rung ste/_ming ni dge bsnyen zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi thabs thob ste theg pa chen po'i chos bshad do/_/de lta bu'i chos kyi 
[\[8a.2\]]ngo bo nyid kun sems dang ma bral te/_sems las 'phrul skyes te/_ting nge 'dzin mi g.yo rtag par gcig pu'i sems la gnyis su med do/_/gcig pu'i sems kyi nang na phyi nang yang med/_bar ma yang nga med de thams cad dang bral lo/_/thams cad dang bral na 
[\[8a.3\]]skye ba dang shi ba'ang med do/_/skye ba dang shi ba med na gdod yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba yin no/_/yang dag pa'i mi g.yo ba rtag par 'dug la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun ni med par mi 'gyur ro/_/khams gsum gyi sems can ni rang skyes rang shi'o/_/
[\[8a.4\]]rigs kyi bu pho ched kar sems can la nga med par bshad do/_/sangs rgyas dang yang dag par gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i bden pa'i nga yin te/_skye shir 'bab pa las 'das so/_/khyod la sogs pa sems can rnams rtag par 'dug pa tshol na 'dod pa'i rnams 
[\[8a.5\]]dang spongs la skye ba med pa'i las byos shig_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das las ji lta bu spyad na ming skye ba med pa'i las zhes bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu pho rnams nga las gzhan ma skyes na/_
[\[8a.6\]]gzhan las nga mi skye'o/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_tshul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gtsang ma stong pa ste/_yod pa'ang ma yin/_rtag pa med pa yang ma yin no/_/yod do cog kyang yod ni stong pa gtsang ma ste/_med pa yang ma yin na mthar yang yod pa yang ma yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[8a.7\]]dpa' dang sangs rgyas yang dag par gshegs pa rnams kyis khor mor ngo bo nyid gcig gi spos kyi ro bro bas sems can rnams kyi sems gcig gis ngo bo nyid gtsang mar bsangs na/_mdzangs pa'i rnams ni go ste stong par khong du chud/_blun po'i rnams kyis ni bslad pa'i 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]nang du zhugs te chags bcings so/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_sems can shes rab yod pa la gti mug med pas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid yod de/_ma rig pa'o cog tshor bas tshor ba med pa mi g.yo'o/_/stong pa'ang med/_mi 'gyur ba'ang med de/_gtsang gdang ba gcig pu'i 
[\[8b.2\]]nang du chud nas mya ngan no cog dang yong bral lo/_/sems can blun po ni gti mug yod pas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ma tshor bas ma rig pa g.yos te tshor ba med pas ni rdul dang mya ngan thams cad byas so/_/tshor ba yod par shes na tshor ba med pa'ang med do/_/tshor ba 
[\[8b.3\]]med pa'ang med na gdod nad kyang mi skye'o/_/nad mi skye na tshor ba yod pa'ang med do/_/tshor ba yod pa med pa ni yid mi ches pa'i sems med do/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_yid mi ches pa'i sems gcig gi nang na yid rnam gnyis yod do/_/yid mi ches pa'i sems 
[\[8b.4\]]med na nad kyang mi skye'o/_/skye ba'i gnas yod na ni khang pa stong par zhugs so/_/ngo bo nyid gcig gi yang dag pa'i stong pa ni bya ba ni yod/_gzugs ni med/_'du mched dang phrad do/_/rgyu g.yos pa ni stong pa sgyu ma dang mtshungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[8b.5\]]sems can no cog yid mi ches pa'i sems ni chod par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag gis sems kyi mkhan po bya bar smon to/_/sems kyis bdag gi mkhan po bya bar mi smon to/_/'dod pa'i rnams dang bral la rang nyams med par byas te/_bsam pa'i gnas skyes kyang 
[\[8b.6\]]bsal ba'i sems med do/_/snga ma'i sems dang phyi ma'i sems gcig la gcig 'gal bas na gzhung bzhin te ma rig pa mi g.yo/_tshor ba 'gyur ba yod mod kyi phyi mo mi g.yo ba'o/_/sems g.yos pa'i tshe snga ma g.yos pa'i sems kyis dgag go/_/byang chub 
[\[8b.7\]]sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems kyi sngon logs na sems g.yos pa mchis na chos ci bgyis pas tshor zhing dgag nus/_sangs rgyas kyi zhal nas byang chub sems dpas las spyod pa'i rnams las khor mor sems 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'dug pa'i rnams la rtog tu bcug ste/_sems 'dug pa'i gnas rig na gdod sems mi 'dug go/_/de ltar tshor bas na tshor ba dgag go/_/'dod pa'i sems mi g.yo na dgag cing brtags yang med do/_/g.yo ba'i gnas yod na stong pa la bde bar 
[\[9a.2\]]gzhag go/_/ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa gcig gi nang na gos pa dang gtsang ma gnyis ka'ang med do/_/ngo bo nyid gtsang gdang bas na blangs pa'ang med/_btang ba'ang med do/_/sems kyang mi skye'o/_/skye ba'ang med/_spyod pa'ang med/_lus kyis spyad pa'i gnas kyang med/_
[\[9a.3\]]tshig smra ba'i lam yang chad/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dam pa tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid ni rtag par yod cing /_dpe stong pa dang mtshungs te thams cad la ma chags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' las 'di spyad na/_dper dbyi gu thogs la nam mkha' la brdegs pa dang mtshungs te/_
[\[9a.4\]]phog ni phog ste chags pa med do/_/de'i ming chos spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/chags pa'i gnas yod du zin na phyi nang du zhugs pa yin no/_/sa gtsang mar bgrod cing 'gro na sems gcig ste gnyis su med do/_/bsam gtan du zhugs la ldang dub kyi sems bkag ste/_
[\[9a.5\]]yang dag pa'i bden pa gcig la brtags la 'gyod tshangs bya'o/_/de'i tshe phal mang po'i nang na log sred ming 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]zhes bya ba zhig yod pa gna' thog ma med pa tshun chad log pa mang du byas te/_nyes pa bcu rtag par byas nas sdang ba dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_
[\[9a.6\]]'gran nga ba dang /_'di rnams bzhi'i sbrul gyis ni drangs/_mi bden pa dang phyi log gi sems kyi byi ba gnyis kyis ni sems kyi rtsa ba bcad de/_dper na mi zhig shing gi kha na mar spyangs la 'og na sbrul bzhi 'dug ste/_kha gdug pa'i rlangs pas ni gyen du bdugs/_shing gi kha 
[\[9a.7\]]nas byi ba gnyis kyis ni dpyangs thag gi rtsa ba la gzas te chad la thug_/sems gtsang ma gsum ni med par byas/_mig dang /_kha dog dang /_sems dang kun ni mi bden pa phyin ci log byed pa ste mthong bas bcings nas sems can dmyal bar lhung la thug pa las skad cig 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]bsam pa'i sems kyi nang na gnod bkur ba'i sems g.yos te/_yang dag par gshegs pa la 'gyod tshangs kyi chos 'dri'am snyam na yid la gnong zhing ngo tsha bas 'dri ma phod na/_yang dag par gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi thugs kyis de'i yid la sems pa mkhyen te/_mi de sdug 
[\[9b.2\]]bsngal ba las bral te/_sems can dmyal ba'i sgo nas dbyung bar thugs la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_nga 'das te song ba'i phyi na log sred la la zhig gis las ngan pa mang du byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi dkon mchog gsum 
[\[9b.3\]]med par byed pa de lta bu'i mi ni phyi ma'i dus la sems can dmyal ba'i nang du yang dag par lhung nas/_bskal pa chen po bcu gnyis kyi bar du'ang mi thar to/_/khyed byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byams shing snying rje spyod la sems can 'di lta bu'i rnams 'gyod tshangs 
[\[9b.4\]]byed du chug la/_de'i sems kyi dri ma gtsang gdang bar byos la grol thar par byos shig_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'gyod tshangs kyi chos ci zhig bgyis na/_sdig bsal bar rung ba sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[9b.5\]]byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te/_bye brag phyed par bshad par smon to/_/sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/_'gyod tshangs bya na yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung la brtag go/_/yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung mthong na 
[\[9b.6\]]sdig go cog thams cad bsal to/_/sangs rgyas kyis tshig 'di skad bshad zin nas de'i tshe phal mang po brgya stong khri 'bum gyi sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kun sems gcig tu yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung gcig la brtags te/_mthong 
[\[9b.7\]]zin nas log sred 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]mod bzhin stan las langs te lus smad lnga sa la gtugs nas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems la ma rig pa mchis pas brtag pa bslabs mod kyi yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung ma mthong ngo /_/thog ma zhes 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]bgyi ba ma mchis pa tshun chad ngan pa bcu 'ba' zhig gi las bgyis na/_da thabs ci spyad na bdag gis yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung mthong zhing sdig zhu byang bar bgyir rung /_sangs rgyas kyis 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la bka' stsal pa/_khyod la sogs pa log sred kyi 
[\[10a.2\]]rnams kun sems gcig tu byos shig dang ngas khyed la bye brag phyed par dgrol bshad do/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]khyod la sogs pa sems can rnams kyis lus dang sems la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo gcig pu la brtags na chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rtag pa gcig pu'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[10a.3\]]so cog la'ang ngo bo nyid gcig pu ste/_gnyis su med pas na yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung yin no/_/de la gnyis su yod par mthong na de'i ming ni yon po zhes bya'o/_/yon por lta na ni mya ngan 'khrug pa ldang ngo /_/yon po mthong ba med na mya ngan 'khrug pa'ang mi skye'o/_/
[\[10a.4\]]mya ngan 'khrug pa chod na de'i ming gtsang gdang zhes bya'o/_/khyed la sogs pa sems can kun gyis sems gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig pu la rtogs shig_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid las gzhan mthong ba ni yong med do/_/gzhan mthong ba yod du zin na kun kyang 
[\[10a.5\]]sgyu ma mi bden pa yin no/_/mi bden pa de lta bu byed pa ni phyin ci log ces bya'o/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]sems gcig gtsang na ni chos so cog kun kyang gtsang ngo /_/sems gcig sme na ni chos so cog kun kyang sme'o/_/sme ba'i dri ma ni sdig pa yin no/_/gtsang ma ni yang 
[\[10a.6\]]dag pa yin no/_/sems dri ma dang bral na sdig mi skye'o/_/'dod [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gna' nas las ngan pa'i rnams bgyis pa ni bskal pa stong khri grangs ma mchis mu ma mchis pa lon na de ring sems bskyed do/_/yang 
[\[10a.7\]]dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung gcig la brtags na mu ma mchis pa'i sdig kun byang ngam mi byang ba sangs rgyas kyis dgrol bshad par smon to/_/sangs rgyas kyis 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la bka' stsal pa/_yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung rtogs na sdig to cog kun ni byang ngo /_/ci'i 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]phyi nas shes byas na 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]sngon chad ni dri ma'i sems so/_/da ni gtsang ma'i sems so/_/sems gcig ste gnyis su med de gud na sems gzhan med do/_/de ring gi sems gtsang na sngon gyi sems kyang gtsang ngo /_/de lta bas na bskal pa grangs med pa 
[\[10b.2\]]tshun chad kyi sdig rnams kun byang zhing med par mngon no/_/dper me long lo stong lon pa'i steng na/_rdul chags pa la gos kyis thang cig phyis na me long de'i mod la bzhin snang ste/_rdul kun phyid nas lhag ma'ang ma lus pa dang mtshungs so/_/yang gcig tu na 
[\[10b.3\]]khang pa mun nag lo stong lon pa'i nang du mar me gcig bsregs pa dang mtshungs te/_mun pa kun med par song ngo /_/khyed la sogs pa sems can gyi rnams rtag par sems gcig gis yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung gcig la brtags pa'i rigs so/_/chos so 
[\[10b.4\]]cog gi nang gi las rnams spyad de 'jig rten gyi chos so cog thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i rigs so/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'jig rten gyi chos ni g.yos kyang rung ma g.yos kyang rung ste/_kun kyang mthar 'jig cing 'dral ba yin no/_/chos la zhig 
[\[10b.5\]]cing ral na spyod pa la'ang rtag pa med de/_chos la skye shi yod par 'gyur ro/_/skye shi yod pa'i chos dang bral na gdod ming yang dag pa'i gzhung zhes bya'o/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dper na rdza mkhan gyis rdza spyad byas pa dang mtshungs te/_yid la ci 'dod pa bzhin du byas na spyad 
[\[10b.6\]]la mi 'gyur ba med de/_spyad kyi dpe gzugs dang ming kun skyes shing dengs so/_/gyo mo'i rang bzhin 'ba' zhig yod de/_rang bzhin gcig pu ni rtag par yod do/_/dpe gzugs gzhan kun ni skyes shing dengs so/_/skyes shing dengs pa'i gzugs ni rang skyes pa 
[\[10b.7\]]ma yin no/_/rang skyes pa ma yin na yod pa ma yin no/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni dper gyo mo dang mtshungs so/_/sems can gyi rang bzhin ni dper snod dang mtshungs te skye shi'i chos yin no/_/las so cog dang bral na sangs rgyas kyi sku lus gcig 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi sku lus gcig la brtags na lus gzhan med do/_/'dod [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung la brtags pas sdig gi rnams kun byang lags na yang las ci 
[\[11a.2\]]spyad na chos kyi lus skye bar rung /_sangs rgyas kyis 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la bka' stsal pa/_yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung la brtags na nad do cog mi ldang ngo /_/sdig dang dri ma kun ma g.yos na sems ni rdo rje dang mtshungs te/_nam du'ang mi 'jig go/_/tshul khrims gzung 
[\[11a.3\]]nus na sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs te phyi nang gnyis ka gtsang gdang ngo /_/bsam gtan 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug pa la mkhas na/_sems ni dper rlung dang me dang mtshungs te/_las ngan pa'o cog kun gyis shing bsal to/_/shes rab la rten pa la mkhas na shes 
[\[11a.4\]]rab thob par rung ste/_de'i ming ni grol thar pa zhes bya'o/_/grol thar pas na yang dag pa shes shing mthong bar nus so/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i don sbyang zhing spyad nus na chos kyi sku lus rnam pa lnga thob par rung ngo /_/'dod [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]sangs rgyas la 
[\[11a.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku lus rnam pa lnga la rgyu dang 'bras bu ci mchis/_sangs rgyas kyis 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rtag pa'i rgyu yin no/_/chos kyi sku lus ni rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_sems kyi rgyu 
[\[11a.6\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid de chos kyi yon gyis 'bras bu thob bo/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu dang bral na rgyu'i 'bras bu med do/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu med na sangs rgyas kyi lus yang dag pa yin no/_/'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]sems gtsang ma'i yul la sems mi g.yo bar sangs rgyas tshe dpag 
[\[11a.7\]]med bsams na gdod yul gtsang mar skye ste/_sems can gyi phyir mi g.yo ba'i chos bshad de/_sems yang dag pa'i stong pa'i nang du chud la g.yo zhing bshad pa'i rnams dang bral te/_shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid gcig ste/_rdo rje dang mtshungs par mi 'jig go/_/
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]de'i tshe phal gyi nang na yang byang chub sems dpa' ming spyod med ces bya ba zhig yod pa stan las langs te/_phrag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin byas/_pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'das te gshegs 
[\[11b.2\]]pa'i slad na lo lnga brgya'am/_lo stong ngam/_stong lnga brgya na sems can la chos bshad na/_chos gang bshad pa'i rigs pa sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rje gzigs te/_bdag la drang zhing bshad par smon to/_/sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la 
[\[11b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho chos kyis rnams bshad pa ni mdo ni bshad/_gzugs ni mi bshad do/_/gzhung ni bshad/_yi ge'i ri mo ni mi bshad do/_/de lta bur bshad pa ni chos yang dag pa yin no/_/yi ge'i ri mo dang /_gzugs bshad na ni kha g.yos 
[\[11b.4\]]sems g.yos pa kun kyang bskur cing dbang bzas pa'i rigs kyi bu pho sems can thams cad la chos bshad na mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad/_mnyam snyoms par bshad pa'i rigs so/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_sems can no cog gi sems gcig la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo 
[\[11b.5\]]nyid kyang gcig ste/_ngo bo nyid gcig tu mnyam snyoms na chos so cog kun kyang mnyam snyoms so/_/de la mtho dman du bshad na de'i ming yon po bshad pa ste/_de'i kha ni ral/_de'i lce ni gas te/_ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi dri ma yang 
[\[11b.6\]]dri ma gcig tu 'thun no/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems gtsang ma yang gtsang ma gcig tu 'thun no/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_sems can thams cad kyi sems gcig tu gtsang ste/_dge ba bcu'i chos 'thun par gtsang ngo /_/sems can thams cad kyi sems 
[\[11b.7\]]gcig tu dri ma yod na ngan pa bcu'i chos gcig tu 'thun par dri ma yod do/_/sems can gyi nad ni gcig tu 'thun te/_sems can gyi sman dgos na sman kyang gcig tu dgos so/_/chos mang du bshad na de'i ming ni phyin ci log ces bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_mi bden pas bye brag phye ste/_
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]dge ba dang ngan pa'i chos bshig ste/_chos gcig bshig cing yod bzhin du chos bshad na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos lam bshad pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas chos bshad pa na mi g.yo ba bzhin du shod cig_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod med kyis 
[\[12a.2\]]sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad ces bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho yang dag pa'i bden pa'i chos gcig bshad pa ni mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/_/sems drang po 
[\[12a.3\]]rdzogs par bshad pa ni mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/_/mu gcig la chags pa med par bshad pa ni mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/_/bye brag dbye ba med par bshad pa ni mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/_/sems gcig tu gtsang mar gnas te 
[\[12a.4\]]bshad na mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/_/bshad do cog kun bshad du med na mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyod med kyis sems can phal mang po thams cad kun gyis bye brag phyed par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yang sangs rgyas 
[\[12a.5\]]la gsol pa/_ji lta bur bshad na bshad pa med de/_mi g.yo ba bzhin du bshad ces bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu pho chos so cog gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs stong pa bas na dgrol zhing bshad du med do/_/chos so cog 
[\[12a.6\]]la gzugs med pas na gzugs la dgrol zhing bshad du med de bshad du mi rung ngo /_/chos so cog la bya ba'ang med/_g.yo ba'ang med pas na bya ba med pa'i dgrol bshad pa la bshad du mi rung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu pho dgrol bshad pa ni de ltar bshad de/_bshad pa de 
[\[12a.7\]]bshad du mi rung bas mi g.yo ba bzhin bshad ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod med kyis sangs rgyas la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos ni de ltar bshad lags pa lta na/_ji lta bur na sems drang por rdzogs par bshad ces bgyi/_sangs rgyas kyis byang chub 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]sems dpa' spyod med la bka' stsal pa/_sems drang po zhes bya ba ni sems drang po spyad de yang dag par gshegs pa'i gzhung yid ches par bshad pa la bdag gi sems bzhin mi bshad pa'o/_/rdzogs zhes bya ba ni dge ba bcu'i gzhung rdzogs pa dang /_bden pa 
[\[12b.2\]]bzhi'i gzhung rdzogs pa dang /_rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi gzhung rdzogs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzhung rdzogs pa dang /_grol thar pa'i gzhung rdzogs pa yin te/_de lta bu'i chos rnams rdzogs na nga ni sems gcig gi na sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid gcig gi sar gtsang 
[\[12b.3\]]ma gcig snyoms par bshad na/_de'i ming rdzogs par bshad de mi g.yo ba bzhin bshad ces bya'o/_/ci'i phyi nas shes byas na/_chos so cog thams cad kun gcig tu rdzogs par bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpas chos gcig tu gtsang mar snyoms/_
[\[12b.4\]]dper mtsho chen po gcig gi chu'i nang na nor bu rin po che rnam pa mang du yod pa la tshol bas yid bzhin du rnyed pa dang mtshungs so/_/yang dper na 'phrul gyi sman tan zhes bya ba sman go 'dun rnam pa mang po las sbyar te/_nad do cog gsos na sman btang ba bzhin du kun sos 
[\[12b.5\]]so/_/snying gtsang ma gcig tu snyoms na sems gcig tu gtsang /_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig tu gtsang /_chos kyi rnams gcig tu gtsang ste/_mnyam snyoms na chos kyi rnams snyoms te/_de lta bur bshad pa ni gtsang mar bshad pa yin no/_/gzhan ltar bshad pa ni 
[\[12b.6\]]sme bar bshad pa yin no/_/ci'i phyi nas shes byas na sems can thams cad kun la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid med pa med de/_tshor ba la nye ring yod du zad do/_/rtsa ba'i phyi mo bzhin du theg pa chung ngu'i mi la ni theg pa chung ngu'i chos bshad/_
[\[12b.7\]]log sred kyi mi la ni log sred kyi chos bshad na de'i ming ni sangs rgyas kyi chos lam yon por bshad pa zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid 'chad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku lus med par 'chad pa'o/_/de lta bur chos 'chad pa'i mi ni bskal pa brgya stong khri'i bar du 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sems can dmyal ba rnams su lhung ste/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung du zin kyang mi thar to/_/thar du zin te mi'i nang du skyes na yang yul gyi mtha' 'khob mi'i tha ma'i nang du skyes te/_mchu sho rel lce med pa de lta bu'i lus thob bo/_/ci'i phyi nas 
[\[13a.2\]]shes byas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid yin te/_chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni rtag par gtsang la yang dag pa'i mtshan bzang po rnam pa kun ldan te/_phyi mo nas thob pa'ang med/_stor ba'ang med de byung ba'ang med/_nub pa'ang med de ngo bo 
[\[13a.3\]]nyid rtag cing yang dag pa'i bden pa ste/_sgyu ma mi bden pa'ang med do/_/mya ngan 'khrug pa'ang med do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med do/_/skyed bri'ang med la mtha' yun du gtsang gdang ste/_ngo bo nyid gcig tu gtsang gdang ba ni byang chub nyid yin no/_/gtsang 
[\[13a.4\]]gdang ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /_byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni gcig tu zad de gnyis su med do/_/gtsang gdang ba'i btang snyoms pa ste/_yi ge'i 'bru dang tshig gi lam yang chad do/_/dper na nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/_phyi nang gnyis ka gtsang gdang ngo /_/gtsang gdang ba 
[\[13a.5\]]gcig po de ni phyi nang na'ang mi gnas/_bar na'ang mi gnas/_smra ba'ang med/_bshad pa'ang med do/_/ji lta bur na de'i nang nas nad kyi rtsi bye brag dbye/_bye brag dbye ba med na bye brag dbye ba'i shes rab yin no/_/rigs kyi bu pho sems gcig dang /_gtsang gdang ba 
[\[13a.6\]]gcig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig dang /_'di rnams dang bral na sangs rgyas btsal du yang med/_chos bshad du yang med/_dge 'dun thob pa'ang med do/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_sangs rgyas ni chos yin no/_/chos ni dge 'dun yin no/_/de lta bas na ngas 
[\[13a.7\]]chos kyi yi ge 'di bshad pa sems can gyi lus gcig_/sems gcig_/gtsang gdang ba gcig_/sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gcig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gcig_/byang chub kyi sdong po gcig gis khams so cog thams cad gang rgyas te sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]lus kyi nang du chud do/_/rigs kyi bu pho sangs rgyas thams cad ni chos kyi yi ge 'di las skyes so/_/chos so cog kun ni chos kyi yi ge 'di las byung ngo /_/dge 'dun thams cad kyang chos kyi yi ge 'di las snang ngo /_/chos kyi yi ge 'di mnos shing gzungs su 
[\[13b.2\]]'dzin pa ni ming dkon mchog gsum gzungs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi yi ge 'di klog cing 'di'i gzhung rgya cher klog tu bcug na la la zhig na ba yod na'ang kun sos te 'dre gdon dang ngan pa'i rnams nye nus pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyod kyis sems 
[\[13b.3\]]can la phan bsod de lta bu yod kyis ngas chos kyi yi ge 'di khyod la gtams te/_gtad la gcig tu na sems can la ra mda' bya zhing bsgral ba'i chos nyung ngu thos la mang du shes pa dang /_nyung ngu mthong ba la mang du rig pa dang /_yi ge'i ri mo mang du ma btsal bar gzhung gi 
[\[13b.4\]]mngon rtags thob pa yang bshad kyis/_khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kun sems gcig tu brtags par nyon cig dang khyod la dgrol bshad do/_/sems can thams cad kun sems gcig_/sangs rgyas gcig_/ngo bo nyid gcig ste/_mya 
[\[13b.5\]]ngan 'khrug pa thams cad kun ni sems gcig las skyes so/_/kun kyang 'du mched dang shes rab gnyis kyi gnas kyi rgyu las langs so/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_rgyu'i rang bzhin dang /_bdag gi rang bzhin dang /_rang bzhin gnyis kyi stobs las stobs rnams gnyis 
[\[13b.6\]]kyi rang bzhin g.yos te/_skad cig bsams pa las mi bden pa'i sems skyes te/_mi bden pa de la ni phyi mo'ang med do/_/skad cig sems g.yos pa'i tshe mya ngan 'khrug pa'ang mod bzhin ldang ngo /_/sems 'di la brtags na mi bden pa'i sems la phyi mo med do/_/
[\[13b.7\]]phyi mo med na gnas kyang med do/_/de la gnas med par rtogs na tshor ba'i sems skyes te/_phyi mo tshor ba'i sems gtsang ma la bsam pa yong med do/_/sems la bsam pa med na sems mi g.yo'o/_/sems mi g.yo na sems kyi gnas kyang med de/_de'i 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ming ni gtsang gdang ngo /_/gtsang gdang ba'i stong pa'i sems ni ngo bo nyid phyi mo nas gtsang gdang ste/_gtsang mas mngon brtags par yang med do/_/gtsang gdang ba'i sems dang yang bral bas na gtsang gdang zhes bshad do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[14a.2\]]dpa' ni gtsang gdang ba'i sems la bya ba yang med/_g.yo ba yang med/_dri ma yang med/_gtsang ma yang med/_skye ba yang med/_'bri ba yang med de mthar cis kyang gos pa med de/_gnas gcig la'ang 'dug pa med de/_de'i ming dang grangs las yang bral lo/_/rtag 
[\[14a.3\]]pa de bzhin na de bzhin zhes bya ba yang med de/_dper rdo rje dang mtshungs te/_ngo bo nyid gcig pu la zhig pa'ang med do/_/dper nam mkha' dang mtshungs te thams cad shong /_dper me tog pad mo dang mtshungs te sred pa'i chus mi chags so/_/las 'di spyad na yang dag par 
[\[14a.4\]]grol thar te/_skye shi 'bab las 'das te/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las phyin to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems gcig gi chos 'di ming gcig ni 'gyod tshangs kyis grol thar pa zhes kyang bya ste/_yang dag pa'i bden pa'i gzhung mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[14a.5\]]gnyis su na ming chos spyad pas grol thar ces kyang bya ste/_nags gcig na 'dug pa'i phyir ro/_/gsum du na ming spyad pa med pas grol thar ces kyang bya ste/_'dug cing chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/grol thar pa 'di gsum ni kun kyang sems gcig las skyes te/_sems 
[\[14a.6\]]can thams cad la sems gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can thams cad kun la theg pa gcig pu yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyal po chos gcig shes par nus na chos gcig mi shes pa med do/_/chos gcig mi shes na chos gcig kyang 
[\[14a.7\]]shes pa med do/_/ji lta zhes byas na/_chos kyi rnams mi gcig pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di gcig pu thos na de ni nyung du thos pa yin no/_/chos mi shes pa med pa de'i ming ni mang du shes pa'o/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_chos so cog gi ngo 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bo nyid gtsang ma gcig la 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/gcig pu 'di mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/gcig pu 'di mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus mthong ngo /_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_sangs rgyas so cog gi lus ni gtsang ma gcig las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gtsang ma 
[\[14b.2\]]gcig gis ni sangs rgyas gcig gi lus dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa gcig dang /_byang chub kyi sdong po gcig yin no/_/rigs kyi bu pho chos 'di'i nang nas mya ngan 'khrug pa'i rnams bcad pa ni dper sdong po bcad pa dang mtshungs/_rtsa ba 'ba' zhig bcad kyi 
[\[14b.3\]]yal ga dang 'dab ma mi gcod do/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_dper mi la la zhig lus la dug mdas phog ste/_lus na tsha ba la mda' phyung na ni nad kyang sos so/_/mda' ma phyung na ni nad kyang mi sos so/_/de la bsdad de mda' de'i sgro ni ci'i sgro/_gcig tu 
[\[14b.4\]]na de'i smyug ri gang las byung /_mda' de sus 'phangs zhes 'dri na de'i bar du mi de na tsha bas tshe srog zad zin to/_/de'i 'og tu mda' phyung ba ni phan pa med par mngon no/_/rigs kyi bu pho sems mod bzhin du khrus shig_/sems gtsang mar 'dug na de'i ming 
[\[14b.5\]]ni gtsang gdang zhes bya'o/_/'du mched kyi rnams gtsang gdang na yod pa la chags pa'i rnams dang bral te/_chags pa med pa'i nang du chud par nus so/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas na/_phyi mo sems can la bslabs te/_sman bzang po 'di bshad de nad kyi rnams gsos 
[\[14b.6\]]la kun sos par 'tshal lo/_/yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di'i rdo rje'i shes rab kyi ral gris sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i yid breg go/_/yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di gtsang gdang ba'i chos spyad de/_sems can rnams kyi gdug pa gsum gyi dri ma 
[\[14b.7\]]brdab cing bsal lo/_/yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di shes rab kyi stobs po che spyad de/_sems can dkris pa bcus bcings pa grol thar par 'tshal lo/_/yang gcig tu na chos kyi yi ge 'di ngo bo nyid gtsang gdang bar gcig tu spyad de/_sems can gyi rnams 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]kun gyis lus gcig_/sems gcig_/sangs rgyas gcig_/ngo bo nyid gcig_/gtsang gdang ba gcig thob ste/_theg pa tshigs kyi nang du chud yang dag par 'tshal lo/_/sems sems can dmyal ba nas thar yang dag par 'tshal lo/_/
[\[15a.2\]]sems can dmyal ba nas thar yang dag par 'tshal lo/_/bdag gi sems can gyi rnams bsgral ba'i ra mda' nus te/_sems can gyi rnams sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku lus nub cing med par bgyis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[15a.3\]]kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di bdag la gtad cing gdams par smon to/_/bdag la yang sems can rgya cher bsgral ba bshad de sems can gyi rnams thos pa nyung la shes pa mang /_mthong ba nyung la rig pa mang /_yi ge'i ri mo mang du ma 'tshal bar gzhung gi mngon rtags thob 
[\[15a.4\]]ste/_chos nyung ngus yang dag par grol thar la/_gzhan dogs pa 'dri ba ma mchis par bgyi na/_sangs rgyas kyis byams shing thugs rjes gzigs te bdag la dgrol bshad par smon to/_/sangs rgyas kyis phal mang po la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 
[\[15a.5\]]rgyal po 'dis bskal pa brgya stong khri 'bum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yon gsol myong zin pas na/_thabs spyod pa mkhas te sems can la ra mda' bya zhing bsgral nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ro bro ba'i rlung spyad de sems can rnams kyi srog mthud nus so/_/khyed la 
[\[15a.6\]]sogs pa da lta'i dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming gzungs su bzung gi steng du/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gyis/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong par grol thar pa thogs pa med pa thob bo/_/de 
[\[15a.7\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal pos sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas langs te/_de'i gzhi nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen por zhugs nas/_stong pas grol thar par go ste/_chags pa med pa'i sa las rkang pa bteg pa dang rkang pa bor ba kun kyang gtsang gdang ba 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bsgrod de/_thal mo sbyar nas/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i yi ge bam po gcig ste rdzogs so//_//sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i rnying pa skad gsar gyis ma bcos par snang //_//
[\[15b.2\]{D244}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma Na ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[15b.3\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na smyug ma las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe smyug ma las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis ji ltar 
[\[15b.4\]]gnas par bya/_ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya/_ji ltar sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po de dag gi bsam pa mkhyen nas smyug ma las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams 
[\[15b.5\]]ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi rtog pa ni bzang ngo /_/yid 
[\[15b.6\]]kyi dri ba ni mdzes so/_/spobs pa ni dge'o/_/yid la bya ba ni tshul bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul gang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston 
[\[15b.7\]]par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rjod par byed pa de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can du gyis shig_/'khor bar sbyor ba can du gyis shig_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas par ma byed cig_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[16a.2\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can dang 'khor bar sbyor ba can lags/_ji ltar na 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi gnas pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chi ba med pa'i bde ba la 
[\[16a.3\]]reg par bya ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa can yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir 'khor bar sbyor ba can yin/_'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo dag sten pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de 
[\[16a.4\]]lta bas na rang gi sems yongs su sbyongs shig_/pha rol gyi sems srungs shig_/sems dpa' ba can du gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi sems yongs su sbyong bar bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na gzhan gyi 
[\[16a.5\]]sems srung ba lags/_ji ltar na sems dpa' ba can lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nyon mongs pa sel bas rang gi sems yongs su sbyong bar byed pa yin/_khong khro ba med pas gzhan gyi sems srung ba yin/_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas sems dpa' ba yin te de ni 
[\[16a.6\]]tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bya ba dang yang 'gal bar ma byed cig_/bya ba ma yin pa la yang snang bar gyis shig_/byas pa la lan re ba med par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgyi ba dang mi 'gal bar 
[\[16a.7\]]bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na mi bgyi ba la yang gda' ba lags/_ji ltar na bgyi ba la lan re ba ma mchis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bya ba dang 'gal bar mi bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos la 'jug pas las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches par bya'o/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bya ba ma yin pa la snang ba ni snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'o/_/byas pa la lan re ba med pa ni lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na dus ma yin par ni ma ldang cig_/dus la bab na ni ma nyal cig_/nyal ba rnams ni 
[\[16b.2\]]slong shig_/rtag tu ni nyol cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ma lags par mi ldang ba lags/_ji ltar na dus la bab na mi nyal ba lags/_ji ltar na nyal ba rnams slong ba lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu nyal ba lags/_
[\[16b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_dus ma yin par mi ldang ba ni snod du ma gyur pa rnams la chos mi bstan pa'o/_/dus la bab na mi nyal ba ni snod du gyur pa las 'da' bar mi bya'o/_/nyal ba rnams bslang ba ni dus dang dus ma yin pas bskul ba'o/_/rtag tu nyal ba ni snyoms 
[\[16b.4\]]par 'jug pa las mi ldang ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na yid brtan pa med par gyis shig_/yid brtan pa gzhig par gyis shig_/yid ma brtan pa rnams la yid brtan par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang 
[\[16b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi rton pa lags/_ji ltar na yid brtan pa 'jig par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na yid ma brtan pa rnams la yid rton pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_yid mi brtan zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yid mi 
[\[16b.6\]]gzhag pa'o/_/yid brtan pa gzhig par bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzlog pa'o/_/yid ma brtan pa rnams la yid brtan par bya ba ni log par zhugs pa rnams la ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na nor dang ldan par gyis shig_/byas pa 
[\[16b.7\]]shes pa med par sbyor cig_/ci la'ang lan re bar ma byed cig_/rnyed pa chen pos nye bar 'tsho bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams nor dang ldan pa lags/_ji ltar na byas pa 'tshal ba ma mchis par sbyor ba lags/_
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]ji ltar na ci la'ang lan mi re ba lags/_ji ltar na rnyed pa chen pos nye bar 'tsho ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nor dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni nor bdun dang ldan pa'o/_/byas pa shes pa med par sbyar ba ni ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la sbyar ba dang /_shes 
[\[17a.2\]]rab 'chal pa rnams shes rab la sbyar ba'o/_/ci la'ang lan re ba med pa ni rang gi dgos pa la'ang nan tan du bya ba'o/_/rnyed pa chen pos nye bar 'tsho ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de 
[\[17a.3\]]lta bas na chags pa yang shes par gyis shig_/chags pa rnams la yang spyod cig_/chags pa la zhen pa rnams la'ang ltos shig_/chags pa med pa la'ang srungs shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chags 
[\[17a.4\]]pa 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chags pa rnams la spyod pa lags/_ji ltar na chags par zhen pa la lta ba lags/_ji ltar na chags pa ma mchis pa srung ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chags pa shes par bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/
[\[17a.5\]]chags pa rnams la spyad pa ni skye mched drug gcad pa'o/_/chags par zhen pa la lta ba ni so so'i skye bo yongs su smin par bya ba'o/_/chags pa med pa srung ba ni skyon med par mi 'jug pa ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 'jigs par gyis shig_/
[\[17a.6\]]mngon par dga' ba med par gyis shig_/snying brtse ba med par gyis shig_/snying rje ba med par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na mngon par dga' ba ma mchis pa lags/_
[\[17a.7\]]ji ltar na snying brtse ba ma mchis pa lags/_ji ltar na snying rje ba ma mchis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jigs zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs pa'o/_/mngon par dga' ba med ces bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]dga' ba med pa'o/_/snying brtse ba med pa ni phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang ba la'o/_/snying rje ba med pa ni nang gi dngos po mgo la sogs pa yongs su btang ba la ste/_de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bden pa yang khong du chud par gyis shig_/
[\[17b.2\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yang ma spang zhig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bden pa khong du chud par bgyi ba lags/_ji ltar na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni mi spong ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bden pa khong du chud par bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[17b.3\]]rgyas 'dul ba'i phyir ro/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba mi spang ba ni 'dus byas la nye bar spyod pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na pha rol tu phyin par bgyis te/_tshu rol gyi ngogs la blta bar gyis shig_/pha rol tu phyin par ma byed par pha rol gyi ngogs la 
[\[17b.4\]]blta bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin cing tshu rol gyi ngogs la blta ba lags/_ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin par mi bgyid cing pha rol gyi ngogs la blta ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa ni 
[\[17b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa dang /_bsam pa la'o/_/tshu rol gyi ngogs la blta ba ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/pha rol tu phyin par mi bya ba ni pha rol bsgral ba'i phyir ro/_/pha rol gyi ngogs la lta ba ni rtag tu mya ngan 
[\[17b.6\]]las 'da' ba la gzhol bar bya ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na rtag tu mi 'thun par yang gyis la rtsod pa med pa mchog tu yang gyis shig_/byams pa la yang gnas la skyon yang mthong bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang 
[\[17b.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu mi 'thun par bgyid pa dang /_rtsod pa ma mchis pa mchog tu bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na byams pa la gnas shing skyon yang mthong ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rtag tu mi 'thun par byed pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]rtsod pa med pa mchog tu byed pa ni bsam pa dag pa'i phyir ro/_/byams pa la gnas pa ni sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir ro/_/nyes pa mthong ba ni 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad de de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 
[\[18a.2\]]zad pa yang zad par ma byed cig_/mi zad par yang ltung bar ma byed cig_/zad pa'i chos nyid kyang khong du chud par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams zad pa zad par mi bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na mi zad par mi 
[\[18a.3\]]ltung ba lags/_ji ltar na zad pa'i chos nyid kyang khong du chud pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas so/_/mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas so/_/de la byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyang zad par mi bya'o/_/
[\[18a.4\]]thabs la mkhas pas 'dus ma byas su yang ltung bar mi bya'o/_/zad pa'i chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba ni mi rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mun pa'i nang na'ang gnas par gyis shig_/snang ba yang zin par gyis shig_/
[\[18a.5\]]mi bya ba ni gyis shig_/bya ba ni yal bar zhog shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mun pa'i nang na gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na snang ba zin pa lags/_ji ltar na mi bgyi ba bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na bgyi ba yal bar gzhog 
[\[18a.6\]]pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mun pa zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can mi shes pa rnams kyi don du bden pa thob par bya'o/_/snang ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab ste/_shes rab des kyang mun pa bsal bar bya'o/_/mi bya ba 
[\[18a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/bya ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o/_/de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal bar gzhag par bya ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na zab mo'i chos kyi snang ba la yang gnas par gyis shig_/snang ba'i 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]chos rnams la'ang brnyas par ma byed cig_/snang ba dang mi snang ba la'ang ma gnas shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams zab mo'i chos kyi snang ba la gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na snang bar gyur pa'i chos rnams la brnyas pa ma mchis 
[\[18b.2\]]pa lags/_ji ltar na snang ba dang mi snang ba la mi gnas pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_zab ces bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lta ba thams cad dang bral bas chos thams cad la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin par rig 
[\[18b.3\]]par bya'o/_/chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas snang bar gyur pa de dag la yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brnyas par mi bya'o/_/snang ba dang mi snang ba la gnas par mi bya ba ni gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de 
[\[18b.4\]]lta bas na gang yang dag par bsdu bar bya ba de la 'dod pa med par gyis shig_/yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus ma glod cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi ba de la 'dod pa ma mchis 
[\[18b.5\]]pa lags/_ji ltar na yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson 'grus lhod par mi bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_yang dag par bsdu ba zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams so/_/de la 'dod pa med pa ni mi lta bar sems can rnams la gtang ba'o/_/yang dag 
[\[18b.6\]]par bsdu ba la brtson 'grus mi glod pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba la ngoms mi shes par brtson par bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gting dpag dka' bar yang gyis shig_/spyod pa gsal ba la yang snang bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[18b.7\]]'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gting dpag dka' ba lags/_ji ltar na spyod pa gsal ba la yang gda' ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya ba ni zab pa la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/_gang la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]kyang gting mi rnyed pa'o/_/spyod pa gsal ba la yang snang ba zhes bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang 'dre bar bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na lam las gzur bar gyis shig_/lam gol ba na yang snang bar gyis shig_/
[\[19a.2\]]yang dag pa'i lam yang ma dor cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam las 'dzur ba lags/_ji ltar na lam gol ba na yang gda' ba lags/_ji ltar na yang dag pa'i lam mi 'dor ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lam las 
[\[19a.3\]]'dzur ba zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam las 'byol ba'o/_/lam gol ba na snang ba ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/yang dag pa'i lam mi 'dor ba ni 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag 
[\[19a.4\]]de lta bas na phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha yang bgo bar gyis shig_/thams cad las kyang phyir ldog par gyis shig_/phyir log nas kyang sgrol cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa lags/_ji ltar 
[\[19a.5\]]na thams cad las phyir ldog pa lags/_ji ltar na phyir ldog nas sgrol ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos zhes bya ba ni chos dang 'thun pa'i dam bcas pa la gnas pa'o/_/thams cad las phyir ldog pa ni chos dang mi ldan pa'i dam bcas pa 
[\[19a.6\]]las ldog pa'o/_/phyir log pa nas sgrol ba ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 'dum par gyis shig_/rtag tu dbye bar gyis shig_/brtan par gyis shig_/blo rgod cing mi rgod par yang gyis shig_/
[\[19a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dum pa lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu bye ba lags/_ji ltar na brtan pa lags/_ji ltar na blo rgod cing mi rgod pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'dum pa zhes bya ba ni bdud zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ro/_/rtag tu bye ba ni gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mi gnas pa'i sems gzhan dang gzhan shes pa'o/_/brtan pa ni bsgrub pa la'o/_/blo rgod cing mi rgod pa ni dge ba'i chos gzhan dang gzhan la dmigs pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na rjes 
[\[19b.2\]]su chags par yang gyis shig_/rtag tu zhe 'gras par yang gyis shig_/yun ring por lta bar yang gyis shig_/byas pa mi gzo bar yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su chags pa lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu 
[\[19b.3\]]zhe 'gras pa lags/_ji ltar na yun ring por lta ba lags/_ji ltar na byas pa mi gzo ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po la'o/_/zhe 'gras pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la'o/_/yun ring por lta ba ni 'khor ba yongs su bzung ba'i 
[\[19b.4\]]phyir ro/_/byas pa mi gzo ba ni sdig pa byas pa rnams la phyir lan mi glon pa ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gtong ba yang shin tu thong shig_/ser sna can du yang gyis shig_/'dzin pa'i sems kyang med par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[19b.5\]]'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong ba shin tu gtang ba lags/_ji ltar na ser sna can lags/_ji ltar na 'dzin pa'i sems ma mchis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gtong ba shin tu gtang ba ni sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i phyir sbyin pa gtang 
[\[19b.6\]]ba'o/_/ser sna can du bya ba ni snod du ma gyur pa rnams la'o/_/'dzin pa med pa'i sems su bya ba ni chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gang dag spangs pa de dag ni yongs su zung shig_/gang dag yongs su bzung ba 
[\[19b.7\]]de dag ni yal bar zhog shig_/nad pa ltar yang gyis shig_/na ba rnams kyang gsos shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang dag spangs pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa lags/_ji ltar na gang dag yongs su bzung ba de dag yal bar 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]'jog pa lags/_ji ltar na nad pa lta bur gyur pa lags/_ji ltar na na ba rnams kyang gso ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang dag spangs pa de dag yongs su gzung ba ni log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can sangs rgyas thams cad kyis spangs pa de dag byang chub 
[\[20a.2\]]sems dpas yongs su bzung bar bya'o/_/gang dag yongs su bzung ba de dag yal bar gzhag pa ni slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad do/_/nad pa ltar yang bya zhing na ba rnams kyang gso bar bya ba ni bsams bzhin du rga ba dang na ba bstan nas so so'i skye bo rnams la chos 
[\[20a.3\]]bstan pa ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bdud kyi las rnams ni 'bar bar gyis shig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zhi bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud kyi las rnams ni 'bar bar bgyid 
[\[20a.4\]]pa lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zhi bar bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bdud kyi las 'bar bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos la brtson pa rnams la'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhi bar byed pa ni chos thams cad nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[20a.5\]]pa med par sbyor ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bdud rnams dang ni 'thab par gyis shig_/ston pa ni ma tshol cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang 'thab pa lags/_ji ltar na ston pa mi tshol ba 
[\[20a.6\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bdud dang 'thab par bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dag gang gi tshe sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de'i tshe bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud brtson par byed pa na'o/_/ston pa mi tshol ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa ste de ni tshul 
[\[20a.7\]]lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gang dag nyan thos kyis smad par bya ba de khyed kyis ma smad cig_/gang la nyan thos mngon par dga' ba de la khyed dga' bar ma byed cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang dag nyan thos kyis 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]smad par bgyi ba de dag la mi dmod pa lags/_ji ltar na gang la nyan thos dga' ba de la mi dga' ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos ni skye ba'i gnas rnams la smod de/_de dag khyed kyis smad par mi bya'o/_/nyan thos ni rang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 
[\[20b.2\]]mngon par dga' na de la khyed kyis mngon par dga' bar mi bya ste/_de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 'jig rten na gnas par gyis shig_/'jig rten gyi chos rnams myong bar gyis shig_/'jig rten gyis kyang ma gos par gyis shig_/'jig rten 
[\[20b.3\]]na thogs pa rnams kyang sgrol cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten na gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams myong ba lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyis mi gos pa lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten du 
[\[20b.4\]]thogs pa sgrol ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten na gnas par bya ba ni 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa rnams su'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos rnams myang bar bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po dag go/_/'jig rten gyis mi gos par bya ba ni 
[\[20b.5\]]bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro/_/'jig rten du thogs pa bsgral ba ni khams gsum gyi btson ra nas 'don pa ste/_de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na yang bar gyis shig_/lci bar gyis shig_/sdug bsngal bar gyis shig_/bde 
[\[20b.6\]]bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang ba lags/_ji ltar na lci ba lags/_ji ltar na sdug bsngal ba lags/_ji ltar na bde ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_yang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la snying las 
[\[20b.7\]]su byed pa'o/_/lci ba ni yi dam la brtan pa'o/_/sdug bsngal bar bya ba ni mi 'thun pa'i gnyen po rnams la'o/_/bde bar bya ba ni bsod nams byas pa'i phyir te/_de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mi snang bar yang gyis shig_/thams cad du snang 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]bar yang gyis shig_/byol bar bya ba rnams la ni byol cig_/bsdad par bya ba rnams la ni sdod cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi gda' ba yang lags/_ji ltar na thams cad du gda' ba yang lags/_
[\[21a.2\]]ji ltar na byol bar bgyi ba rnams la byol ba lags/_ji ltar na bsdad par bgyi ba rnams la sdod par bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mi snang bar bya ba ni ltung ba dang 'khrul pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'o/_/thams cad du snang bar yang bya ba ni byang 
[\[21a.3\]]chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/byol bar bya ba rnams las 'byol ba ni 'thab mo dang rtsod pa rnams las so/_/bsdad par bya ba rnams la sdod pa ni sems can tshogs par bya ba'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na ma byas pa 
[\[21a.4\]]rnams la'ang gnas par gyis shig_/byas pa rnams la'ang gnas par gyis shig_/byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams la'ang sems mnyam par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma bgyis pa rnams la'ang gnas pa 
[\[21a.5\]]lags/_ji ltar na bgyis pa rnams la'ang gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na bgyis pa dang ma bgyis pa rnams la'ang sems mnyam pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ma byas pa rnams la gnas pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/byas pa rnams la gnas 
[\[21a.6\]]pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa de'i gong ma'i chos dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams la sems mnyam par bya ba ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la bye brag med pa'i 'du shes su bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de 
[\[21a.7\]]lta bas na snying po med pa las kyang snying po tshol cig_/snying po la yang snying po med pa'i 'du shes skyed cig_/snying po dang snying po med pa la yang spyod cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po ma mchis pa la snying po tshol ba lags/_
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]ji ltar na snying po la snying po ma mchis par 'du shes bskyed pa lags/_ji ltar na snying po dang snying po ma mchis pa la spyod pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_snying po med ces bya ba ni lus dang /_srog dang /_longs spyod rnams te/_de las dam pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya 
[\[21b.2\]]bas snying po btsal ba'o/_/snying po zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa'i phyir de la snying po ma yin pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/snying po dang snying po ma yin pa la spyod pa ni 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la blo gtang ba 
[\[21b.3\]]ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na dam bcas pa ni nyams par gyis shig_/tshul khrims ni ma nyams par gyis shig_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la ni ltos shig_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la ni yal bar zhog cig_/gsol pa/_/
[\[21b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam bcas pa nyams par bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims ma nyams pa lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la lta ba lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la yal bar gzhog pa 
[\[21b.5\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dam bcas pa nyams par bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gong ma dang gong ma la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims ma nyams par bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la lta ba ni 
[\[21b.6\]]tshul khrims la sbyar ba'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la yal bar gzhag pa ni bya ba byas pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gzhan gyi nor la dga' bar gyis shig_/rang gi nor ni yongs su thong cig_/nye bar gnas par gyis 
[\[21b.7\]]shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi nor la dga' ba lags/_ji ltar na rang gi nor yongs su gtong ba lags/_ji ltar na nye bar gnas pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gzhan gyi nor la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/rang gi nor yongs su gtang ba ni rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la yongs su gtang 
[\[22a.2\]]bar bya'o/_/nye bar gnas par bya ba ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mchog tu phyin par yang gyis shig_/sems dma' bar yang gyis shig_/le lo can du'ang gyis shig_/rtag tu brtson par yang gyis shig_/
[\[22a.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchog tu phyin pa lags/_ji ltar na sems dma' ba lags/_ji ltar na le lo can lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu brtson pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mchog tu phyin pa ni shes rab dang ye shes kyis 
[\[22a.4\]]so/_/sems dma' ba ni nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ro/_/le lo can ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par bya ba la'o/_/rtag tu brtson pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mi srun par yang gyis shig_/dul ba'i sa 
[\[22a.5\]]la gnas par yang gyis shig_/'jigs par yang gyis shig_/seng ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi srun pa lags/_ji ltar na dul ba'i sa la gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na 
[\[22a.6\]]'jigs pa lags/_ji ltar na seng ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mi srun par bya ba ni bdud thams cad gdul ba'i phyir ro/_/dul ba'i sa la gnas pa ni sems can cang shes gdul ba'i phyir ro/_/'jigs par bya ba ni sdig pa thams cad las 
[\[22a.7\]]so/_/seng ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon par bya ba ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad smad bab pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na yid du 'ong bar yang gyis shig_/yid du mi 'ong bar yang gyis shig_/smad du med par yang gyis shig_/smad 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]du yod par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid du 'ong ba lags/_ji ltar na yid du mi 'ong ba lags/_ji ltar na smad du ma mchis pa lags/_ji ltar na smad du mchis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_yid du 'ong ba zhes 
[\[22b.2\]]bya ba ni yon tan gyis phyug pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa'o/_/yid du mi 'ong ba ni mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir bdud thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'o/_/smad du med pa ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[22b.3\]]phyir ro/_/smad du yod pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la dmod pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na rma byung ba rnams la rma ma 'byin cig_/rma ma byung ba rnams la rma phyung shig_/ye shes tshol cig_/ye shes kyi bya ba rnams la dga' bar ma byed cig_/
[\[22b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rma byung ba rnams la rma mi 'byin pa lags/_ji ltar na rma ma byung ba rnams la rma 'byin pa lags/_ji ltar na ye shes tshol ba lags/_ji ltar na ye shes kyi bgyi ba rnams la mi dga' ba lags/_bka' 
[\[22b.5\]]stsal pa/_rma byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste de la rma dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/rma ma byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo thams cad de/_de dag ni rma dbyung bar bya'o/_/ye shes btsal bar bya ba ni/_zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o/_/ye shes kyi 
[\[22b.6\]]bya ba la dga' bar mi bya ba ni 'dus ma byas su ltung bar mi bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mnyam par gzhag par yang gyis shig_/sems rnam par g.yeng bar yang gyis shig_/sems mi gnas par yang gyis shig_/rtag tu snyoms par zhugs 
[\[22b.7\]]par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam par gzhag pa lags/_ji ltar na sems rnam par g.yeng bar bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na sems mi gnas pa lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa lags/_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyis so/_/sems rnam par g.yeng bar bya ba ni nyan thos kyi sems las so/_/mi gnas pa ni de la ma chags pa'i phyir ro/_/rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can thams cad la sems
