[\[23a.2\]]mnyam pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bsreg par bya ba ni sregs shig_/tshig pa ni skyed cig_/skyes pa ni thong cig_/rnam par phye ba ni bsdus shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsreg par 
[\[23a.3\]]bgyi ba sreg pa lags/_ji ltar na tshig pa rnams skyed pa lags/_ji ltar na skyes pa rnams gtong ba lags/_ji ltar na rnam par phye ba rnams sdud pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bsreg par bya ba sreg pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad shes rab kyi mes sreg pa'o/_/tshig pa 
[\[23a.4\]]skyed pa ni thabs kyis phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams gzung ba'o/_/skyes nas gtong ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la snying las su bya ba'o/_/rnam par phye bas bsdu ba zhes bya ba de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs 
[\[23a.5\]]kyi bu dag de lta bas na dus ma yin pa ni dus su shes par gyis shig_/dus ni dus ma yin par shes par gyis shig_/dus dang dus ma yin pa la mkhas par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ma lags pa la 
[\[23a.6\]]dus su 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na dus la dus ma lags par 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na dus dang dus ma lags pa la mkhas pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang nyan thos kyi sa thob par bya ba'i dus de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dus ma yin no/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 
[\[23a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i dus so/_/dus dang dus ma yin pa la mkhas par bya ba ni dus bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir te de ni tshul 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 'byor pa ni phye shig_/ma 'byor pa ni sbyor cig_/'byor pa dang ma 'byor pa la chags par yang ma byed cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byor pa 'byed pa lags/_ji ltar na ma 'byor 
[\[23b.2\]]pa ni sbyor ba lags/_ji ltar na sbyor ba dang /_mi sbyor ba la ma chags pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'byor pa ni phyin ci log bzhi 'khor ba'i 'dam dang 'byor pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpas dbye bar bya'o/_/ma 'byor pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ste/_
[\[23b.3\]]de ni byang chub sems dpas sbyar ba'o/_/'byor pa dang ma 'byor pa la chags par mi bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang /_so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa la ma chags par bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na dbugs phyin pa rnams ni dbugs ma 
[\[23b.4\]]phyung shig_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs phyung shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs mi 'byin pa lags/_ji ltar na dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa lags/_bka' stsal 
[\[23b.5\]]pa/_dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs mi dbyung ba ni/_yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi bya'o/_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba ni yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[23b.6\]]dag de lta bas na rma byung bar yang gyis shig_/ma rmas par yang gyis shig_/rma byung ba rnams ni sos par yang gyis shig_/rma ma byung ba rnams ni rma dbyung shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rma 'byin pa lags/_ji ltar 
[\[23b.7\]]na ma rmas pa lags/_ji ltar na rma byung ba rnams gso ba lags/_ji ltar na rma ma byung ba rma mi 'byin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rma 'byung ba ni yan lag dang nying lag yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro/_/ma rmas par bya ba ni sems kyis so/_/rma byung ba rnams gso ba 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]ni ltung ba byung ba rnams chos bzhin du bcos pa'o/_/rma ma byung ba rma mi dbyung ba ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las 'gal bar mi bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na nye bar 'tshor med par yang gyis shig_/sems can thams cad nye 
[\[24a.2\]]bar 'tsho bar yang gyis shig_/ma bsags pa rnams kyang sogs shig_/bsags pa rnams kyang chud ma gzan cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar 'tsho ba ma mchis pa lags/_ji ltar na sems can thams cad nye bar 
[\[24a.3\]]'tsho ba lags/_ji ltar na ma bsags pa sogs pa lags/_ji ltar na bsags pa chud mi gzon pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nye bar 'tsho ba med pa ni bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed pa'o/_/sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ni dpag 
[\[24a.4\]]bsam gyi shing lta bu'o/_/ma bsags pa bsags pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/bsags pa chud mi gzan pa ni dge ba'i sems skyes so cog byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na stobs chung bar yang gyis shig_/
[\[24a.5\]]stobs dang ldan par yang gyis shig_/rten med par yang gyis shig_/dpung gnyen med par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams stobs chung ba lags/_ji ltar na stobs dang ldan pa lags/_ji ltar na rten ma mchis 
[\[24a.6\]]pa lags/_ji ltar na dpung gnyen ma mchis pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_stobs chung ngu bya ba ni gnod par byed pa rnams la lan mi bya'o/_/stobs dang ldan par bya ba ni phan pa mi byed pa rnams la bzod pas phan gdags pa'o/_/rten med par bya ba ni so so rang 
[\[24a.7\]]gis shes pas so/_/dpung gnyen med par bya ba ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na dang ba dag ni rnyog pa can du gyis shig_/rnyog pa can dag ni dang bar gyis shig_/rnyog pa med par yang gyis shig_/rtag tu dang bar 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ba dag ni rnyog pa can du bgyi ba lags/_ji ltar na rnyog pa can dag ni dang bar bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na rnyog pa ma mchis pa lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu dang ba lags/_bka' 
[\[24b.2\]]stsal pa/_dang ba dag rnyog pa can du bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bsgo ba'o/_/rnyog pa can dag dang bar bya ba ni nyon mongs pas rnyogs pa'i sems byang chub kyi sems su dang bar bya ba'o/_/rnyog pa med par bya ba ni nyon mongs 
[\[24b.3\]]pa thams cad bsal ba'o/_/rtag tu dang bar bya ba ni sems can thams cad la sems dang ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na lugs las bzlog par 'jug par yang gyis shig_/lugs bzhin du yang slobs shig_/spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud 
[\[24b.4\]]kyang shes par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lugs las bzlog par 'jug pa lags/_ji ltar na lugs bzhin du slob pa lags/_ji ltar na spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud 'tshal ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lugs las 
[\[24b.5\]]bzlog par 'jug par bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa las phyir log pa'o/_/lugs bzhin du bslab pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la'o/_/spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud shes par bya ba ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 
[\[24b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa las log ste 'dod pa'i khams su snang bar bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bdud rtsi dang dug tu ma 'dres par gyis shig_/dug med pa rnams dang ma bsten cig_/dug dang ldan pa rnams la bdud rtsi'i sbyin pa gyis shig_/
[\[24b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud rtsi dang dug tu ma 'dres pa lags/_ji ltar na dug ma mchis pa rnams dang mi sten pa lags/_ji ltar na dug dang ldan pa rnams la bdud rtsi'i sbyin pa bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bdud 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rtsi zhes bya ba ni bag yod pa'o/_/dug ces bya ba ni bag med pa ste/_de la byang chub sems dpas bag yod par bya zhing bag med pa'i sems dang ma 'dres par bya'o/_/dug med pa rnams zhes bya ba ni nyan thos rnams te/_de dag dang bsten par mi bya'o/_/
[\[25a.2\]]dug dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams te/_de dag la bdud rtsi bstan par bya ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mngon par dga' bar bya ba la ni mngon par dga' bar ma byed cig_/mngon par dga' bar mi bya ba la ni mngon par dga' bar gyis 
[\[25a.3\]]shig_/dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan par yang gyis shig_/dga' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su bcad par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyi ba la mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid 
[\[25a.4\]]pa lags/_ji ltar na mngon par dga' bar mi bgyi ba la mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan pa lags/_ji ltar na dga' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su gcod pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 
[\[25a.5\]]ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa ste/_de dag la mngon par dga' bar mi bya'o/_/mngon par mi dga' ba ni bdud rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ste/_de la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/_/dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan par bya ba ni 'khor ba na sred pa ni zla 
[\[25a.6\]]yin pa'o/_/dga' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su gcad pa ni 'gog pa yongs su shes par bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bcing bas bcings par yang gyis shig_/bcing bas bcings pa rnams kyang khrol cig_/grol ba rnams la'ang 
[\[25a.7\]]bsnyen bkur gyis shig_/ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bcing bas bcings pa lags/_ji ltar na bcings pa rnams dgrol ba lags/_ji ltar na grol ba rnams la bsnyen bkur 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_bcing bas bcings par bya ba ni bslab pa'i bcing bas so/_/bcings pa 'grol ba ni sred pa'i bcing ba las so/_/grol ba rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[25b.2\]]rgyas rnams la'o/_/ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 'dod par bya ba rnams la ni 'dod par gyis shig_/'dod par mi bya ba rnams la ni 'dod par ma 
[\[25b.3\]]byed cig_/'dod pa dang bral bar yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal bar bgyi ba rnams 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na 'tshal bar mi bgyi ba rnams mi 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na 'tshal ba dang bral ba 
[\[25b.4\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod par mi bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad de/_de dag la 'dod par mi bya'o/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'dod par bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/_de dag la 'dod par bya'o/_/'dod 
[\[25b.5\]]pa dang bral bar bya ba ni brgya byin dang tshangs par skye ba la lta ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na ji tsam du chung ba'i sa bon la 'dam brnyas shig_/zhing tshad med pa la yang mos par gyis shig_/'thob pa chen po ni ma sgrubs shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[25b.6\]]'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji tsam du chung ba'i sa bon la yang brnyas par mi bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na zhing tshad ma mchis pa la mos pa lags/_ji ltar na 'thob pa chen po mi sgrub pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ji tsam du chung ba'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du chung 
[\[25b.7\]]ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ste/_de la brnyas par mi bya'o/_/zhing tshad med pa la yang mos par bya ba ni sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sbyin pa tshad med pa la mos par bya ba'o/_/'thob pa chen po mi sgrub pa ni sems can thams cad la sbyin pa'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bas na chags pa rnams ni khong du chud par gyis shig_/chags pa rnams la ni spyod cig_/chags pa la zhen pa rnams la ni ltos shig_/chags pa med par ni ma ltung shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26a.2\]]rnams chags pa rnams 'tshal ba lags/_ji ltar na chags pa rnams la spyod pa lags/_ji ltar na chags pa la zhen pa rnams la lta ba lags/_ji ltar na chags pa ma mchis pa nyid du mi ltung ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chags pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la 
[\[26a.3\]]'dod pa dang /_khong khro ba'i sems te/_de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpas bsrung bar bya'o/_/chags pa rnams la spyad pa ni 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa rnams su'o/_/chags pa la zhen pa rnams la lta ba ni 
[\[26a.4\]]chags pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na yang bar yang gyis shig_/khur chen po yang khyer cig_/ma blangs pa ni ma len cig_/blangs pa ni nyams 'og tu chud par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_
[\[26a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang ba lags/_ji ltar na khur chen po khyer ba lags/_ji ltar na ma blangs pa mi len pa lags/_ji ltar na blangs pa nyams 'og tu chud par bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_yang bar bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[26a.6\]]cad bcad do/_/khur chen po bkur ba ni sems can thams cad do/_/ma blangs pa mi blang ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/blangs pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba ni theg pa chen po ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na smad par yang gyis 
[\[26a.7\]]shig_/bstod par yang gyis shig_/nye bar bsnyen par yang gyis shig_/spang bar yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smod pa lags/_ji ltar na bstod pa lags/_ji ltar na nye bar bsnyen pa lags/_ji 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]ltar na spang ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_smad pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad smad pa'o/_/bstod pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad bstod pa'o/_/bsnyen pa ni 'phags pa'i lam mo/_/spang ba ni mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi lam thams cad de de ni tshul lo/_/rigs 
[\[26b.2\]]kyi bu dag de lta bas na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor dag tu ni bsam gtan gyi stobs ston cing /_dgon pa dang bas mtha' rnams su ni nyon mongs pa chung bar ston cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26b.3\]]rnams grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor rnams su bsam gtan gyi stobs ston pa lags/_ji ltar na dgon pa dang /_bas mtha' rnams su nyon mongs pa chung bar ston pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor 
[\[26b.4\]]dang /_pho brang 'khor dag tu phyin pa na gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya reg pa dag snang bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis mnan par bya'o/_/dgon pa dang bas mtha' rnams na 'dug pa'i tshe nyon mongs pa gang dag skye bar 
[\[26b.5\]]'gyur ba de dag ni dben pa'i yon tan gyis mnan par bya ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chu'i nang na'ang 'dug par gyis shig_/rtag par skom par yang gyis shig_/skom pa yang sol cig_/skom pa med par ma byed cig_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[26b.6\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chab kyi nang na mchis pa lags/_ji ltar na rtag tu skom pa lags/_ji ltar na skom pa bsal ba lags/_ji ltar na skom pa ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chu'i nang na 'dug par bya ba ni/_
[\[26b.7\]]chos kyi tshul gnas par bya ba'o/_/rtag par skom par bya ba ni chos kyis skom par byas pa'o/_/skom pa bsal ba ni chos kyis chos kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'o/_/skom pa med par mi bya ba ni 'dus ma byas su ltung bar mi bya ba ste de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na gcig 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]pu grogs med par yang gyis shig_/g.yog mang po dang 'khor mang po dang ldan par yang gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gcig pu grogs ma mchis par yang bgyid pa lags/_ji ltar na g.yog mang po 
[\[27a.2\]]dang 'khor mang po dang ldan pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gcig pu grogs med par bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa la'o/_/g.yog mang po dang ldan par bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'o/_/'khor mang po 
[\[27a.3\]]dang ldan par bya ba la 'khor mang po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na grol bar yang gyis shig_/btson rar tshud par yang gyis shig_/pha rol tu phyin par yang gyis shig_/chu bo chen po'i nang du 'dug par yang gyis 
[\[27a.4\]]shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams grol ba lags/_ji ltar na btson rar tshud pa lags/_ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_ji ltar na chu bo chen po'i nang na gnas pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_grol bar bya ba ni nyon mongs pa 
[\[27a.5\]]dang bdud kyi bcing ba thams cad las so/_/btson rar tshud par yang bya ba ni bsams bzhin du skye ba rnams su'o/_/pha rol tu phyin par yang bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa la'o/_/chu bo chen po'i nang na gnas par yang bya ba ni chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems 
[\[27a.6\]]can sgrol ba'i phyir te de ni tshul lo/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na tshad yod pa la yang so sor rtog par gyis shig_/tshad med par yang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshad mchis pa 
[\[27a.7\]]la yang so sor rtog pa lags/_ji ltar na tshad ma mchis pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag tshad yod pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas so/_/tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/_de la byang chub sems 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]dpas 'dus byas kyang spang bar mi bya ste/_'dus byas su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang 'grogs par mi bya'o/_/'dus ma byas la yang brtag par bya ste/_skyon med par yang 'jug par mi bya'o/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan 
[\[27b.2\]]pa'i shes rab kyis byang chub kyi snying por mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste de ni tshul lo/_/tshul gyi tshig 'di dag bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgyad stong ni byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[27b.3\]]la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[27b.4\]]pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[27b.5\]{D245}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma skan d+ho nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[27b.6\]]ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang 
[\[27b.7\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi na/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po'i tshad ji tsam gyis chos kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal/_chos kyi phung po ni ji tsam zhig_/chos kyi phung po ni gang lags/_de skad ces 
[\[28a.2\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po ni brgyad khri bzhi stong du gsungs te/_shA ri'i bu de la chos thams cad skye ba med pa 'di ni chos kyi phung po'i rjes su 'jug pa dang 
[\[28a.3\]]po yin no/_/shA ri'i bu chos 'ga' zhig la chos zhe'am/_chos gang yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i chos can dang /_'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste 
[\[28a.4\]]dper na ma ning ni skyes pa'am bud med ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob cing skyes pa'am bud med ces brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de ni skyes pa'am bud med du gdags su med pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas bla 
[\[28a.5\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de'i phyir chos kyis chos rab tu shes so zhes brjod par mi bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na za ma'am ma ning ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa yang ma yin la/_'dod pa la sten pa yang ma 
[\[28a.6\]]yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de dag gis bud med sdug gu mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pas za ma'am ma ning rnams las phal cher byin pa nad kyis btab par 'gyur/_byin pa 'dzag par 'gyur/_byin pa khar ba lta bur 'gyur/_bzhin dmar por 'gyur ro/_/shA 
[\[28a.7\]]ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_za ma'am ma ning gang yin pa de sa la ma 'gyel/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis ma btab par ci'i phyir de dag byin pa na bar 'gyur snyam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ldan 'das za ma'am ma ning ni btsun mo'i 'khor srung ba lags te/_de dag bud med sdug gu mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems skye lags so/_/de dag 'dod chags kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pa khol bar 'gyur te/_nyon mongs pa khol ba de dag gi lus khu chus rgyas par gyur pas 
[\[28b.2\]]de dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas gdungs pa na byin pa shin tu gas par 'gyur lags te/_de ltar de dag gi lus ma rungs par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[28b.3\]]za ma'am ma ning las gang dag bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba ni nyung ste/_phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams las gang dag 'dod chags kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ba'i khyad par la ltos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[28b.4\]]'dod pa rnams ni dngos po med par shes/_'dod pa rnams ni mi gtsang bar shes nas de dag 'dod pa rnams kyis skyo zhing yid byung la mngon par mi dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/_bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu skyes bu ngan pa rnams 
[\[28b.5\]]kyis ni skyo ba'am yid 'byung bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu ngan pa de dag ni 'dod pa la kun tu rtog pa rnams kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa rnams gang zhe na/_gang dag 
[\[28b.6\]]med pa la rtog par byed pa ste/_mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar rtog par byed/_'du shes med pa la 'du shes su rtog par byed/_bud med la bud med du rtog par byed/_'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas par rtog par byed pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de lta bu de dag ni skyes 
[\[28b.7\]]bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa rnams yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de dag ni za ma dang ma ning 'dod pas zin pa rnams kyi las rnams yin te/_de dag skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams ni ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu ma ning gang la la zhig skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa de lta bu dag 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]la kun tu rtog par byed pa ni bdag gis reg go zhes nyams su myong bar byed de/_bu ga dgu'i sgo dang ldan pa 'di mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa 'di la gtsang bar 'du shes skyed par byed do/_/'di dag thams cad ni bya ba ma yin pa ste/_de dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i las 
[\[29a.2\]]rnams ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gang la la dag 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa de dag ni bud med la kun tu rtog cing mig la mtshan mar 'dzin par byed de/_bai dUr+ya lta bu'i 'du shes su byed la chu'i dbu ba bzhin du 'du shes 
[\[29a.3\]]su ni mi byed do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na bong mo 'brangs pa dang /_phag mo 'brangs pa ni 'brangs pas lus stongs par 'gyur zhing lus las sha ma mi gtsang ba btsog pa blta bar bya ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu mig kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod de/_'di lta ste dper na 
[\[29a.4\]]bong mo'i sha ma'am/_phag mo'am/_khyi mo'i sha ma dang 'dra bar mig kyang de bzhin 'dug ste/_mig gi 'bras bu'i nang de ni chu'i chu bur lta bur 'dug go/_/de ltar mi gtsang ba 'byung zhing de ltar mi 'thun pa ste/_rnag dang khrag rab tu 'dzag cing mi gtsang ba rab tu 'dzag go/_/
[\[29a.5\]]shA ri'i bu mi gtsang ba rnag dang khrag rab tu 'dzag cing chu'i snying po 'dzag pa'i lus la chags pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni mig ces brjod do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rgyu gang gis mig ces bya ba de'i rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang zhe na/_de ni lus kyi gtso bo yin te/_gzugs la blta bas thog 
[\[29a.6\]]ma dang /_dbus dang /_mthar ngoms pa med la lus kyis mi dge ba rgya mtsho snyed byed de/_rgyu des na mig ces bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la gang gis na de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang zhe na/_mi 'thun pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu mig gi mi 'thun pa de gang zhe na/_gang gzugs 
[\[29a.7\]]med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du byed rnams med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'o/_/yang 'di la rgyu gang gis de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang zhe na/_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]'dis dge ba spyod pa nyams par byed de rgyu des na mig ces bya'o/_/'dis dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par byed pas na mig ces bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu mig ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa ste/_rgyu des na mig ces bya bar shes par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[29b.2\]]dge slong mkhas pa/_mang du thos pa/_zhum pa med pa rnams kyis ni mig bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_gang zag ma yin pa dang /_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid 
[\[29b.3\]]ni bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_gang zag ma yin te/_de dag ni phung po lnga la phyin ci log pa las byung ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gang dag kha cig 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag 
[\[29b.4\]]pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa de dag ni 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdung bar 'gyur la/_kha dog ngan cing skya skya bor 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na shing ljon pa chen po'i lo ma'am/_ljon pa'i 'bras bu smin pa 'brul ba'i tshe skya bor 'gyur ro/_/
[\[29b.5\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin du dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang dag kha cig 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa de dag ni 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur/_kha dog ngan par 
[\[29b.6\]]'gyur/_bsam pa mi gsal bar 'gyur/_kha dog ngan cing blta na mi sdug par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong gang dag gsar bu dar la bab pa gzhon nu rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa de dag ni 'dod pa rnams dngos po med do zhes 'dod pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod 
[\[29b.7\]]pa'i rtog pa skyes na yang myur ba nyid du rab tu zhi bar byed de/_de dag mi dge ba yin par shes par yang byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar na dge slong dag gis 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong nas 'dod pa de dag las yid 'byung bar byed 'dod chags dang bral bar byed de/_mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig gi lus la nad kyis thebs la rnag smin nas de'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad la rma'i kha brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/_rma'i kha re re la yang srin bu'i tshogs 
[\[30a.2\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/_de dag mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis na yod la/_kha zas yongs su zos pa rnams kyis tshim par mi 'gyur zhing /_de ma dag ma spungs pa'i drung du 'dug na/_ji tsam na srog chags de dag mes gdungs par gyur pa dang /_de la phyir zhing za bar byed/_yongs 
[\[30a.3\]]su za bar byed na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de srog chags de dag gis zos pa yin nam/_'on te ma zos/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di thos pa nyid 
[\[30a.4\]]kyis lus kyi spu zing zhes bgyid par gyur na/_mi de'i mi 'thun pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das mi de ni srog chags kyi rigs de dag gis 'tshal ba lags kyi ma 'tshal ba ni ma lags so/_/de srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lus g.ya' bar 
[\[30a.5\]]bgyid cing 'di ltar zhi bar mi bgyid la/_bde ba thob par yang mi bgyid pa lags so/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de'i lus la rnag dang khrag 'dzag cing de lta bur gyur pa de smad par bya ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_smad par bgyi ba lags/_mi 'thun pa lags/_blta bar 
[\[30a.6\]]mi 'os pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du dge slong mkhas pa dag ni 'di la so so yang dag par slob ste/_bud med ni 'di ltar btsog pa/_'di ltar dri nga ba/_'di ltar mi 'thun pa/_'di ltar blta bar mi 'os pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa khol ba'i bud med de dag dang 
[\[30a.7\]]bsten par bya ba ma yin te/_'dod pa rnams ni dri nga ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni mi 'thun pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni mi gtsang ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni blta bar mi 'os pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to snyam mo/_/shA ri'i bu skyes pa'i lus la yod pa lta bu ma yin 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pa/_bud med la ches lhag pa srin bu'i tshogs lnga yod de/_shA ri'i bu srin bu'i tshogs lnga po de dag ni bud med kyi gci ba'i lam na gnas te/_srin bu'i tshogs re re la srin bu brgyad cu brgyad cu yod la/_mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis na yod de/_de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[30b.2\]]bud med kyi lus la za'o/_/des na nyon mongs pa dag gis bud med log par g.yem spyo ste/_'dod pa yongs su spyod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de ltar na 'dod pa rnams ni nyes dmigs yin par mthong na de dag 'dod pa rnams las yid 'byung bar 'gyur/_
[\[30b.3\]]'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/_mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'dod pa'i phung po las brtsams nas chos bstan pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa dag las yid 'byung 
[\[30b.4\]]bar bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rang gis byas pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnam par byang ba dang rnam par zhi ba gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu rnam par byang ba dang rnam par zhi ba ni rang gis byas pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon 
[\[30b.5\]]mongs pa ni gang /_rang gis byas pa ni gang zhe na/_chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o/_/chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye bar 'du shes pa dang /_'gag par 'du shes pa dang /_bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med par 
[\[30b.6\]]bdag tu 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yod de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni long ba yin te/_gzugs kyi phung po'o zhes rlom sems su byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams 
[\[30b.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o zhes rlom sems su byed de/_rlom sems su byed na 'ching ngo /_/rlom sems su mi byed na grol lo/_/shA ri'i bu rlom sems su byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi phung por 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa 'gyod par 'gyur ba dang /_mnar med par 'gro'o zhes 'khor gyi nang na 'dug na skrag pa dang /_
[\[31a.2\]]bdag nyid tshul khrims la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /_bdag ni nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /_bdag ni lha rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa'o snyam pa dang /_'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[31a.3\]]ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /_mi'i lus thob par dka' ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu de dag ni dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa ste/_tshul khrims 'chal pa ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na 'dod pa rnams la 
[\[31a.4\]]nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa'am/_shing drung na gnas pa'am/_khang stong na gnas pa'am/_bla gab med pa na gnas pa ni 'dod pa rnams ni dri nga ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni mi 'thun pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni rma'i kha lta 
[\[31a.5\]]bu'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni blta bar mi 'os pa'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni smad par bya ba'o/_/'dod pa rnams ni bshang bas yongs su gang ba'i ro lta bu'o/_/zhes de ltar so sor yang dag par slob bo/_/de dag ni byis pa 'phyar ba'i spyod yul yin te/_shA ri'i bu bud med la sten pa dang bsnyen pas 
[\[31a.6\]]chog go/_shA ri'i bu bud med kyi lus phyi sa dang mchil mas yongs su gang ba de la su zhig dga' ste/_shA ri'i bu de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khyi ro rul pa dang 'dra bar smad par bya ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_khyi ro mi gtsang ba rul ba/_dri nga ba/_mdog mi sdug 
[\[31a.7\]]cing sngo la pags pa mugs pa/_srog chags kyis yongs su gang ba zhig lam ka na snang la/_de'i steng na char pa yang bab cing de rlung gis kyang kun nas btab/_der mi rnams kyang kun nas 'khor bar gyur te/_de dag gis dri de tshor na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]de dag dri mi zhim pa de snom par byed dam/_'on te mi snom/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[31b.2\]]khyi ro de la rig par byed dam/_skyod par byed dam/_mngon par dga' bar byed na/_de skye bo mang pos bsngags par bya ba yin nam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi de ni 
[\[31b.3\]]blta bar dka' ste/_de la bsngags par ga la bgyid/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa'am/_skyod par byed pa'am/_mngon par dga' ba'i 
[\[31b.4\]]mi de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsngags pa mdzad kyi/_gang zhig bud med yul gyi bzang mo na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa'am/_lhag pa lta bu/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_nu ma rgyas pas mdzes pa/_rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_shin tu gzhon pa/_
[\[31b.5\]]reg na bde ba/_nad dang bral ba de la tha na rkang pa'i mthe bos reg par byed pa'i mi de la ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags par mi mdzad de/_shA ri'i bu yul gyi bzang mo de la tha na rkang pa'i mthe bos reg par byed pa'i mi gang zag de lta bu de ni shin tu smad par bya ba yin te/_
[\[31b.6\]]khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa'am/_skyod par byed pa'am/_mngon par dga' bar byed pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyi ro la 'khyud pa'am/_reg pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[31b.7\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dge slong gis 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu ji ltar na dge slong gis lus la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya zhe na/_shA ri'i bu lus 'di ni gnod pa mang ba'o/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'khrug pa mang ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi lus la ni skyes pa'i lus la yod pa lta bu ma yin pa ches lhag pa srin bu'i tshogs nyi shu rtsa lnga yod de/_shA ri'i bu bud med kyi mgo klad pa'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs 'phrog byed ces bya ba dag yod de/_de dag 
[\[32a.2\]]bud med kyi klad pa la za bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi sna'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs kha rdzogs zhes bya ba dag yod de/_de dag bud med kyi kha spu la za ste/_des na bud med la kha spu mi skye'o/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi rna khung na srin bu'i tshogs za bar byed pa zhes bya ba 
[\[32a.3\]]dag yod de/_de dag bud med kyi rna ba la za zhing bud med kyi rna ba 'bigs par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi mgrin pa'i mtshams dang mgo bo'i mtshams la srin bu'i tshogs zhen byed ces bya ba dag yod de/_de dag bud med kyi rna ba za zhing bud med kyi rna ba 'bigs par 
[\[32a.4\]]byed la mig kyang rno bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bu skyes pa'i rna ba la mi 'bigs kyi bud med kyi rna ba la 'bigs so/_/shA ri'i bu bud med la srin bu'i tshogs a ba re ban zhes bya ba dag yod de/_de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud med kyi kha la za ste/_des na bud med kyi 
[\[32a.5\]]mgul dma' ba yin te/_skyes pa la ni de lta bu med do/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba khar bcug ma thag tu thog mar de dag za bar byed do/_/de dag nyal nyil bud med kyi nu ma'i nang du 'jog ste/_des na bud med nu ma 'phyang ba yin no/_/gang gi tshe bud med sbrum par gyur pa 
[\[32a.6\]]de'i tshe srin bu de dag kyang sbrum par gyur te/_des na bud med kyi nu zho mang ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi lus kyi nang mngal gyi gnas gang na mngal yod pa'i phyogs de na srin bu zad par byed pa dpa' ba zhes bya ba dag yod de/_de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed ces bya ba dag bsad nas 
[\[32a.7\]]za'o/_/de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed de dag ma rnyed na de dag kyang 'chi'o/_/srin bu'i tshogs de gnyis ka shi ste med pa dang /_pha ma 'dus pa las mngal chags par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi lus la lus kyi nang skye gnas kyi sgo na srin bu'i tshogs bzhi yod de/_'di lta ste/_mchu mchog 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ces bya ba dang /_gong bu sbed ces bya ba dang /_rlung 'byin ces bya ba dang /_'dod len ces bya ba ste/_de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud med kyi lus la za ste/_des na bud med nyon mongs pa rnams kyis shin tu 'bar bar byas te/_'dod pa yongs su spyad pas mi ngoms pa 
[\[32b.2\]]yin no/_/de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bud med kyi skyon ches lhag pa de dag mkhyen nas bslab pa'i gzhi lhag pa dang bca' bar mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bu chos kyi phung po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dang yang du 'khor bzhi po dag la ston cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod 
[\[32b.3\]]pa rnams ni smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur/_lus ni smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar lus 'di bcos ma yin par shes nas byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par su zhig 'dod pa rnams la sten par byed de de 
[\[32b.4\]]ni gnas med do/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na lus 'di la mngon par dga' bar mi bya/_lhag par chags par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lus ni mi 
[\[32b.5\]]gtsang las byung ste/_/rtag tu srog chags rnams kyang gnas/_/gcin dang rtug pas rab gang na/_/de la byis pa rab tu chags/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen ma/_/'di thos nas ni 'dod chags 'bral/_/'dod chags bral nas rnam par grol/_/chos dang ldan pa 
[\[32b.6\]]rnams la ni/_/nyes pa 'di dag ngas ma bstan/_/gang dag 'dod la longs spyod pa/_/de dag la ni skyon rnams bshad/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa bzhin/_/bud med mthong na su rtog ste/_/yang dag bskul ba shes nas su/_/mkhas pa de dag rtog mi byed/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[32b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D246}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pa ra mAr+tha d+harma bi dza ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa don dam pa'i 
[\[33a.2\]]chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par ga yA'i ri la dge 
[\[33a.3\]]slong mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang /_
[\[33a.4\]]gyad drug khri dang /_gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang /_drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_gdung ba lngas yan lag chog pa lnga brgya yan lag dkar ba/_sha med cing rus mgo pags kyis yog pa/_lto zhar zhing skra'i khur khyer ba/_lus rgu ba/_g.yang bzhi 
[\[33a.5\]]dang shing shun gyon pa/_lag na ril ba thogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs cig go/_/rgal bar 'dun pa rnams dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar drang srong rnams kyi nang na lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ste/_
[\[33a.6\]]lug rnams kyi nang na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra la/_srin bu me khyer gyi drung na nyi zla dang mtshungs shing /_rtswa ka shi'i me tog gi nang na man dA ra ba'i yal ga dang 'dra la/_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bya rog gis bskor ba dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi 
[\[33a.7\]]nang na nyis 'gyur du mdzes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par mdzad cing glo g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]phyung /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa phyung /_dgra bcom pa brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma brgya stong 
[\[33b.2\]]dpag tu med pa phyung /_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_khams kyi rgyal po dang /_rig sngags 'chang dpag tu med pa phyung /_rgya dang /_ri brags pa dang /_'gro lding ba dang /_lho phyogs pa dang /_nags khrod pa dpag tu med pa phyung /_
[\[33b.3\]]rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_mi gzugs dang /_cha byad dang /_mdog dang /_smra ba'i skad sna tshogs pa ji snyed pa dang /_lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung 
[\[33b.4\]]ngo /_/de nas 'khor chen po de the tshom du gyur nas phan tshun gdong du lta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/_rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[33b.5\]]las bzhengs te/_seng ge bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang ba de dag thams cad lag 
[\[33b.6\]]mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ji ltar phyung ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa 
[\[33b.7\]]de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'dus par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i bye 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]ma snyed dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po dpe med pa thogs te 'dir lhags so/_/de bzhin du lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi 
[\[34a.2\]]dang mi ma yin pa du ma de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpas de dag gis mchod pa bla na med pas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te/_
[\[34a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/_/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du yang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad 'og min gyi gnas man chad du mngon par 
[\[34a.4\]]byung ste slar yang log go/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad du nub bo/_/gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa phyung ba de dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams 
[\[34a.5\]]su nub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom 
[\[34a.6\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/kye ma mi rnams kyi ni 'dren pa yis/_/sngon chad ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di/_/skye dgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa/_/de yis bdud sde thams cad mog mog bgyis/_/phan tshun dag tu tshig tu 
[\[34a.7\]]smra bgyid pa/_/kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi/_/bdag cag ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lhags kye/_/bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi/_/dka' thub can bdag dka' thub can min gyur/_/nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las/_/bdag 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]'khogs bdag skams bde ba rnams las nyams/_/bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur ma yin/_/yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul gsum rnams kyis/_/bstan pa'i dgra rnams mog mog gyur par mdzad/_/bstan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni/_/sangs 
[\[34b.2\]]rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad/_/'khor 'di thams cad the tshom 'tshal bar gyur/_/dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste/_/gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang /_/'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas gyur cig mchi/_/'jam dbyangs 
[\[34b.3\]]sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas rnams kyis bskor/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis/_/cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol/_/'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig lags/_/thub pa 
[\[34b.4\]]chos ni gang zhig gsung bar bzhed/_/'khor 'di thams cad 'bod cing mchis lags na/_/sems can thugs brtse'i slad du bdag la gsungs/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor de'i nang nas drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba gcig gis byang chub 
[\[34b.5\]]sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye gzhon nu re shig kha rog shig kho bos dri ba dri bar bya'o/_/gal te kho bo'i dri ba khong du chud par byed na ni de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming dang yang 'thun no/_/'on te sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug chen 
[\[34b.6\]]pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul pa byed du bcug na 'dir ngo mtshar yang mi che ste/_skyes bu ngan pa dang /_sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis 'di 'grub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis drang srong gi tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas drang srong chen po 
[\[34b.7\]]me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po ci nus kyis dri ba dris shig dang rnam par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung /_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur/_sems can rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/_nang na sems can phra ba khru gang tsam mam/_mtho gang tsam mam/_mdzub mo tsam mam/_mthe bo tsam mam/_nas dang /_gro dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_mon 
[\[35a.2\]]sran gre'u dang /_til dang /_yungs 'bru tsam mam/_sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la drang srong chen po legs so legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin no/_/drang srong chen po tshe bskal pa drug 
[\[35a.3\]]cu pa'i dri ba dri ba 'di ni 'thun pa'o/_/de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_drang srong chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na 'dis ji ltar shes snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[35a.4\]]stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o/_/sems can zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen nas skye ba dang /_rga shi'i 
[\[35a.5\]]bar du byung ba'o/_/drang srong chen po yang rgyu rkyen las sems can skyes te rgyu rkyen ni pha ma'o/_/drang srong chen po yang pha ma 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o/_/gang gi tshe yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med kyi grong du 'jug pa de ni rkyen no/_/
[\[35a.6\]]drang srong chen po yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni sems can 
[\[35a.7\]]no/_/drang srong chen po sems can yang gzhan la las kyang gzhan ma yin/_las kyang gzhan la sems can yang gzhan ma yin no/_/drang srong chen po sems can ni 'grib pa ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin no/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma gal te sems can 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]'grib pa ma mchis/_'phel ba ma mchis na/_ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma yin no/_/gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin 
[\[35b.2\]]na ni dbang med par 'chi bar mi rigs so/_/drang srong chen po gang rang gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur/_drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na srin bu me khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar bya'o/_/snyam du sems pa'i rkyen 
[\[35b.3\]]gyis srin bu me khyer gyis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/_sems ma dul ba'i dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no/_/drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar gyur na ni khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs 
[\[35b.4\]]pa dag khyi la yang yod cing dbang sgyur la yang yod pa de'i tshe sems can 'grib pa yang mi dmigs/_'phel ba yang mi dmigs so/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_gau ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po 
[\[35b.5\]]ngas phyin ci log dag bzlog pa yang med/_'grib par byas pa yang med do/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_gal te de ltar na khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/_ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma 
[\[35b.6\]]yin no/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_gau ta ma bka' mchid 'di re zhig zhog_/gau ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o zhes gsungs na/_sems can mang du 'grogs pa la sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'di ci lta bu/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[35b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te/_'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro/_/de la res 'ga' ni gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi lhag ma sa bon gyi 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]'os su mi 'gyur ba de ji lta bu/_drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma rlung dang nyi mas shing tog rnams ma rung bar bgyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/_las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnams ma 
[\[36a.2\]]rung bar byas so/_/drang srong chen po kha cig ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe srin bu rnams kyis zos so/_/kha cig ni las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byas so/_/drang srong chen po shing gi nyes pa ni nyung ngo /_/sems can gyi nyes pa ni mang ngo /_/drang srong chen po yang sems can 
[\[36a.3\]]gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba ste/_drang srong chen po sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmigs te/_drang srong chen po de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o zhes nga 
[\[36a.4\]]smra'o/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma de de bzhin te/_zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag go/_/ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ba bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal 
[\[36a.5\]]pas sreg par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po gal te bskal pas sreg par mi 'gyur na chos kyi dbyings gnyis su 'gyur te/_la la mi rtag la/_la la rtag par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po gang gi phyir 'di thams cad 
[\[36a.6\]]rtag pa ma yin/_brtan pa ma yin/_dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob bo/_/drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/_'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol pa ni 'thun no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po gal te bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na 'di ni dus bzang po'o/_/'di ni dus ngan pa'o zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po gal te yang bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na legs par byas pa dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste/_bskal pas sreg pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/_drang srong chen po sems can ji snyed bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thos 
[\[36b.2\]]nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de snyed de bzhin gshegs pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na kha chu ldag pa'i sbrul ni mig gis kyang rdub/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_kha'i sgo nas kyang rdub bo/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin 
[\[36b.3\]]gshegs pa la yang de ltar blta ste/_sbyin pas kyang sdud/_snyan par smra bas kyang sdud/_don spyod pas kyang sdud/_don 'thun pas kyang sdud do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na gser la gnod par bya ba'i phyir mer 'jug pa ma yin gyis/_gser dul ma ma yin pa 
[\[36b.4\]]'di ji ltar na dul mar 'gyur snyam nas de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/_shin tu bsregs pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/rin po ches spras pa de'i rin thang med par 'gyur te/_drang srong chen po de'i phyir gser brdung ba dang bsreg pas rnam par sbyong ngo /_/drang srong chen 
[\[36b.5\]]po de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rgyu med par sreg pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/_'dir sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bskal 
[\[36b.6\]]pas sreg pa'i me phyung yang sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gang la yang gnod par mi mdzad do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na 
[\[36b.7\]]phyogs bcu rnams su char phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa de bas ni drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar gnas te/_rang gi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa ni ches mang ngo /_/drang srong chen po de'i tshe 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong /_kha dog mdzes pa yang mthong /_bskal pas bsregs pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid sgrol ba yang mthong nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu 
[\[37a.2\]]dga' ba skyes te 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol ba por gyur cig_/bdag cag kyang 'di ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur cig_/bdag cag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par gyur cig ces 'dzer te/_kha cig ni yid byung nas sems rnam par grol te rgyun du zhugs 
[\[37a.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/_kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/_kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid/_kha cig ni rang byang chub/_kha cig ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/_kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 
[\[37a.4\]]gnon/_kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye/_kha cig ni sum cu rtsa gsum du/_kha cig ni mtshe mar/_kha cig ni dga' ldan du/_kha cig ni 'phrul dgar/_kha cig ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/drang srong chen po rnam grangs 
[\[37a.5\]]'di lta bur 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang khams kyi rgyal po rnams su 'gyur te/_drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du yang 'gyur 
[\[37a.6\]]ro/_/drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las grol bar mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid thos 
[\[37a.7\]]nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro/_/thabs 'dis na ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po yang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de bas ni sems can gyi khams gang 'khor bar 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]chags pa'i skyon chags par shes nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ches mang ste/_drang srong chen po de'i phyir bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ro/_/de nas drang srong chen po me sgron gyis rang gi yid kyis rnam 
[\[37b.2\]]par dpyad nas tshig tu smras pa/_kye ma'o gang bdag drang srong chen po zhes 'bod pa shAkya'i sras 'di'i che ba nyid ni rgya che ba'o/_/bdag gis 'di la bgams pas kyang chog ste/_'di ni thams cad mkhyen par mngon gyis/_bdag gis kyang 'di la yang dag pa'i ming gis bod par 
[\[37b.3\]]bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tu ma mchis pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/_sems can gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur ba 
[\[37b.4\]]bdag la bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po gnas med pa la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/mnyam pa nyid la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po theg pa gcig gis 'byung ba la sems can 'du bar 'gyur 
[\[37b.5\]]ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na chu klung chen po tha dad pa dang /_klung phran dang /_klung chen po dag 
[\[37b.6\]]rgya mtsho chen por bab nas ro gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed zag pa zad par byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du gyur pas 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po 'khor bar 'du bas sems can 'du bar 'gyur 
[\[37b.7\]]ba ni 'du ba ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung gis bdas nas phye ma leb phyi phyi zhwa la 'du bar 'gyur te/_rlung med na so sor 'gyes so/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bas phan tshun las 'brel pa'i 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]sems can gyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bur phan tshun las kyis 'brel ba dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur te/_der de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po lha dang mi 
[\[38a.2\]]rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_mir skyes pa 'di sems can che ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhig dang 'dus par gyur to/_/dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa 'di 
[\[38a.3\]]'dus par gyur to zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po sems can gang zhig sems can gang dang lhan cig tu sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid mi 
[\[38a.4\]]bde bar 'gyur/_zhe sdang bar 'gyur/_des de mthong nas gal te na de klad pa na bar yang 'gyur/_bshang ba dang /_gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/_drang srong chen po 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/gang la la de ltar gyur pa des kyang 
[\[38a.5\]]bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_rigs gsal bar mdzad pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_dud 'gro dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan mar 
[\[38a.6\]]'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe phan tshun mthong ba na khon du mdud par 'dzin cing /_'di las bdag gis skyon ji ltar rnyed snyam du skyon tshol ba 'di ni drang srong chen po dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can 
[\[38a.7\]]rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de/_bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu dud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/_/drang srong chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa rnams ni dri nga ba 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu sred par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol la sbyin par bsams kyang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes nas lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa de'i dbang phyug mthong nas phrag dog skye bar 'gyur/_gzhan gyi nor la 'dod par 'gyur te/_'di ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de la bdag dang 'di 
[\[38b.2\]]lhan cig tu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/_/drang srong chen po mir skyes pa gang la la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag nas 'dus par gyur pa ni des de mthong na 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/_drang srong chen po 'di ni mir 
[\[38b.3\]]skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de la bdag dang 'di mi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no/_/zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/_/drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag lhar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa las mir 
[\[38b.4\]]skyes pa de dag gi ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po gang dag lhar skyes te/_'dus par gyur pa de dag ni/_phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/_des na bdag dang 'di lhar skyes te lhan cig 'dus par gyur to zhes 
[\[38b.5\]]shes par bya'o/_/drang srong chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas drang srong chen po me sgron dga' mgu ste yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon pa mi 
[\[38b.6\]]bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bslus pa'o zhes bdag 'chad do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po gang na sems can zhes bya ba phra ba ji tsam zhig yod ces nga la de skad zer ba ni drang srong 
[\[38b.7\]]chen po gang sems can du dmigs pa de sems can phra mor rnam par 'byed do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na la la zhig gis dmus long zhig la 'di skad du/_kye skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba ci 'dra zhes smras na/_drang srong chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]ma mthong ba'i phyir kha dog dkar po 'di 'dra'o zhes de smra bar nus sam/_drang srong chen pos gsol pa/_'brel pa ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus long ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir sems can zhes bya 
[\[39a.2\]]ba ni phra mo 'di lta bu zhig go zhes sems can brjod par mi nus so/_/drang srong chen po yang mig la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed de/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do/_/drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la 
[\[39a.3\]]sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do/_/drang srong chen po khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed/_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do/_/drang srong 
[\[39a.4\]]chen po mig ni ngan pa'o/_/'jig pa'o/_/skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang ngan pa'o/_/'jig pa'o/_/skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/_/drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang ngan pa'o/_/
[\[39a.5\]]'jig pa'o/_/skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/_/drang srong chen po mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug kyang ngan pa'o/_/'jig pa'o/_/skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/_/sems can zhes bya ba yang med/_gzugs kyang med de/_drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa ni sems can 
[\[39a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/yongs su rtog pa pa gang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni/_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu mi dmigs so/_/drang srong chen po gal te sems can yod du zin na/_de 
[\[39a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis shin tu chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na drang srong chen po gang gi phyir sems can med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob ste/_de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar yang dag par sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar yang dag par 'grub bo/_/
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad drang srong chen po me sgron bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par sems can 
[\[39b.2\]]dmyal ba'i zhugs kyi 'obs su gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_ri rab 'og min gyi gnas tsam du gyur pa mthon po'i kha de nas bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur ba'am/_gdung ba lnga bskal pas bsreg pa lta bur 'gyur ba'am/_nyi ma bskal par gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[39b.3\]]bskal pa sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu smyung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni bcom ldan 'das bdag spro ste 'dun gyi/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi slad du ni brtson 'grus nyams par mi bgyi'o/_/drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed bcom ldan 
[\[39b.4\]]'das kyi gan du lhags pa de dag kyang stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slad chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon par bgyi'o/_/rngo ci thogs kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par 
[\[39b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/drang srong rnams kyis tshig de dag smras ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/_'od zer de dag 
[\[39b.6\]]gi mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg ste/_shar phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_shar phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_nub phyogs mtho na byang 
[\[39b.7\]]phyogs dma'o/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du me tog gi char phab/_rnga bo che rnams brdungs so/_/dri za'i bdag po yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga pa'i sil snyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]do/_/lha'i bdug pa dri rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gis ngad bslang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du ngad ldang bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal 
[\[40a.2\]]dang /_se mo do rnams 'thor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis kyang mchod par byed do/_/lha'i tshogs 
[\[40a.3\]]rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i char 'bebs so/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang dga' mgu yi rangs te/_ji ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to/_/de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya 
[\[40a.4\]]ba'i 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas man chad/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byas te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba byas te/_slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[40a.5\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyu ma mchis par shAka thub de ring 'dir/_/phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong ste/_/'khor 'di thams cad the tshom gyur lags na/_/thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston/_/mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul 
[\[40a.6\]]mthong nas/_/dga' bar gyur cing spro ba che gyur te/_/rab tu dga' bas legs par bstod bgyid nas/_/kha cig 'di na bcom ldan legs zhes mchi/_/brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/_/nam mkha'i gnas nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyang bstod/_/
[\[40a.7\]]mkha' las lha yi me tog char du 'bebs/_/ma brdungs rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis drang srong chen po me sgron mthong ngam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor drang srong chen po me sgron 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[40b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor drang srong chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos 
[\[40b.3\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rjes su thob ste/_rab 'byor de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab las sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[40b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_skad dang skad ma yin par shes 
[\[40b.5\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyal ba dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_blo gros rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgya mtsho snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bsam 
[\[40b.6\]]pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/rab 'byor lha bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma stong phrag tshad med pa 
[\[40b.7\]]dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/rab 'byor lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags kyi dbang pos zhal khebs par mdzad de/_
[\[41a.2\]]ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog du ma/_kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag 
[\[41a.3\]]tu mngon par byung nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus 
[\[41a.4\]]mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 
[\[41a.5\]]rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams kyi don du ljags 'di lta bu ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir ljags kyi 
[\[41a.6\]]dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bogs na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[41a.7\]]bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du gang zhig 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]gis bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang lung 'bogs na/_'dis bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[41b.2\]]skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na gang zhig dad pa'i sems kyis legs so/_/zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis 'di la rim gro byas pa des nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gzigs nas/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag nga ni bden pa smra ba ste/_sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags pa'i sa phyogs de la/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[41b.4\]]cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du gyur par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gsum brjod dam/_brjod du bcug na/_des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor 
[\[41b.5\]]lo rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing /_yid bde ba dang bcas bzhin du/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/des 
[\[41b.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te/_yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[41b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gang gis sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dad dam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu byang chub song ngo zhes bshad do/_/des mig lnga thob 
[\[42a.2\]]par 'gyur/_dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/_dran pa brjed pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/_rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[42a.3\]]dang /_gtsug gi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur/_yi ge med pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur/_chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i 
[\[42a.4\]]gzungs dang /_the tsom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang /_don dam pa'i rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/_de la sogs pa gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bsams 
[\[42a.5\]]bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa khyod la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad kyis yang dang yang rgya cher 
[\[42a.6\]]yang dag par rab tu shod cig_/'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsti stang byas pa dang /_btsun par byas pa dang /_rim gror byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa de ji snyam du sems/_'jam dpal dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mtha' 'am mu yod dam/_
[\[42a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dpag par nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang gis snyigs ma lnga'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir rgyas par byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mang po de snyed cig la na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gsos kyi sman dang /_yo byad 
[\[42b.2\]]rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston par mi byed na/_khyod da dung du yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phyag mi byed kyi/_chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[42b.3\]]'di rgyas par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_drang srong chen po me sgron dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_
[\[42b.4\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[42b.5\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa/_/[{D247}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma ar+tha bi b+haM ga nA ma ma 
[\[42b.6\]]hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos dang don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu 
[\[42b.7\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]bas dga' la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med cing tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba lo 
[\[43a.2\]]legs pa nyams dga' ba skye bo mang po dang mi rnams kyis gang ba lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi 'byung gnas de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 
[\[43a.3\]]las byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la chos kyang 
[\[43a.4\]]ston to/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi 'byung gnas de na mi'i dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang byed pa rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de'i 
[\[43a.5\]]tshig rab la sems can de dag bde zhing yid bde ba skyes la/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing bdag gi chung mas mngon par dga'o/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gcig la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/_'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po 
[\[43a.6\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa mchog la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa gtso bo la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_bla ma dang /_bla ma'i yang bla ma dang /_
[\[43a.7\]]bla na med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa mnyam pa med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa gzhal du med pa la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]pa sha stag go/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de'i tshe tshig rab la theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang mi grag go/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor ni dgu khri dgu stong yod de/_de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gzhan 
[\[43b.2\]]ma yin pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa chen po'i khongs su 'dus pa/_nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos la dga' ba sha stag go/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa rin po che dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sdud pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[43b.3\]]pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la yang dag par zhugs pa/_theg pa chen po'i khongs su 'dus pa/_nyin mtshan du chos 'dod pa/_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba zhig yod de/_rigs kyi bu rin chen dpal de chen po la 'os pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang /_de'i pang
