[\[64a.6\]]dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang /_dbul po la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bsam pa dka' ba byed pa dang /_yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dka' ba byed kyi steng du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sems bskyed pa dang /_skye ba la mi rtog pas 
[\[64a.7\]]bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nad med pa'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_khams mnyam pas nad med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med pas nad med pa dang /_sems can 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]thams cad bde bar gzhog pas nad med pa dang /_chos thams cad la the tsom med pas nad med pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi phyogs so/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[64b.2\]]phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa'i phyogs dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i phyogs te/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems 
[\[64b.3\]]mi bskyod pa dang /_yi dam mi bskyod pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa las mi bskyod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i nan tan las mi bskyod pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs so/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[64b.4\]]zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang /_lhag mthong gi tshogs dang /_thos pa'i tshogs dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs te/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung du 'brel bar 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bsam 
[\[64b.5\]]pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel pa dang /_gtong ba dang bsngo ba zung du 'brel ba dang /_byams pa dang snying rje zung du 'brel pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi 
[\[64b.6\]]lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_khron pa rdul can mthong zhing de'i gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /_mtshe'u 'am/_rdzing bu'am/_khron pa rnyog pa can mthong zhing /_de'i gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /_bar snang la sprin chen pos yog cing de la yang 
[\[64b.7\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /_bar snang la rlung dang /_rdul dang /_du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing /_de la yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_g.yang sa chen po nas bdag g.yang du lhung bar mthong ba dang /_lam mtho dma' can du mthong ba dang /_bdag lam srang dog par zhugs par mthong ba dang /_rmi lam na phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag 
[\[65a.2\]]go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang /_gcan gzan gtum po phal po che'i sgra thos pa dang /_bdag g.yon can gyi nang na gnas 
[\[65a.3\]]par mthong ba dang /_bdag gi lus dri ma can dang gos dri ma can du mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba 
[\[65a.4\]]mthong ba dang /_rdzing bu me tog pad ma rgyas pas yongs su gang ba mthong ba dang /_bdag gos dkar po'i phrugs rnyed par mthong ba dang /_lha zhig spyi bo'i gtsug na gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[65a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang /_nam mkha' la bya ngang pa dkar po thal kar gyi khyu skad 'byin cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos 
[\[65a.6\]]brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog pa mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i 
[\[65a.7\]]rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang /_me tog pad ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam mthong ba ste/_lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_shing sA la chen po'i 'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs 
[\[65b.2\]]kyis gang bar mthong ba dang /_khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong ba dang /_nam mkha'i ngos gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag 
[\[65b.3\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_gyad chen pos gyad thams cad mnan nas ba dan thogs te 'gro bar mthong ba dang /_dpa' bo chen pos g.yul las 'das te 'gro bar mthong ba dang /_rgyal po dbang bskur 
[\[65b.4\]]bar mthong ba dang /_bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_mgo la thod dkar 
[\[65b.5\]]pos bcings par mthong ba dang /_bdag gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed par mthong ba dang /_bdag chos kyi stan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/lha'i bu 
[\[65b.6\]]bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po 'thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bum pa mthong ba dang /_bya tsa shas bskor bar mthong ba dang /_gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du shing thams cad ldang zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal 
[\[65b.7\]]bar byed pa dang /_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba chen po mthong ba ste/_lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po 'thob pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]pa dang /_lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldan dga' mgu yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_'khor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_ud pa la dang /_pad 
[\[66a.2\]]ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gtor to/_/me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la me tog pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi tshad blta na sdug pa bsung dang ldan pa yid du 
[\[66a.3\]]'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to/_/me tog de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa' lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[66a.4\]]'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang nas lhags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu me tog 'di dag ga las 'ongs pa nyid nas so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa ste/_bdag gis khyod la mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad 
[\[66a.5\]]du gtor to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar me tog 'di dag sprul pa yin pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la'ang de bzhin du blta'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang 
[\[66a.6\]]gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo /_/de dag gis kyang 
[\[66a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/_steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/_gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas lha'i bu 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldan stan de las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/_gser bzang dri ma med 
[\[66b.2\]]pa'i 'od kyis gzi brjid ldan/_/skyes chen mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs mnga'/_/yon tan khrag khrig yon tan gzhal yas gzi brjid can/_/mgon po ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad/_/sgra snyan 'byin par mdzad cing rab tu gsung 'brel ba/_/
[\[66b.3\]]tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gsung ba/_/nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen bde gshegs blo gros ldan/_/ka la ping ka'i gsung can ci slad 'dzum pa gsungs/_/mi mchog skyes bu dam pa ngan pa'i tshogs can 'dul/_/bdud kyi stobs ni rtag 
[\[66b.4\]]par mtha' mar 'byin par mdzad/_/lha dang lha min nam mkha' lding gis rtag mchod pa/_/stobs bcu ldan pas ci slad 'dzum pa bstan/_/dri med dri bral dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur zhal rgyas pa/_/mun pa rab rib sgrib pa'i rdul 
[\[66b.5\]]gyi nyes gcod pa/_/bde dang bde ldan sbyin par mdzad pa 'dzum don gsungs/_/bde bar gshegs pa sa dang lha yul phan pa mchog_/bde dang bde ldan sbyin mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/mtshungs shing 'brel la legs gsungs gsal ba'i gsung ldan pa/_/
[\[66b.6\]]'dzum bstan 'di yi don ni ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/_/ling tog stug po mun pa rab rib rnam bsal ba/_/shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi gzi brjid ldan pa po/_/glang chen khyu mchog stobs dang seng ge'i stabs ltar brjid/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad 'dzum pa'i don ni bstan 
[\[66b.7\]]du gsol/_/mi yi dam pa mi ngan tshogs can 'dul mdzad pa/_/zab cing mthong bar dka' la gting tshod dpag dka' ba/_/srid pa'i chu ni skems mdzad mnyam pa med pa can/_/sgyu med stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum pa ci slad bstan/_/rga shi zhi bar bgyi ba'i 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bdud rtsi'i don stsol ba/_/zhabs ni 'jam zhing dra ba dag dang 'khor lor ldan/_/blun pa sbyong mdzad srid pa gsum na mnyam med pa/_/ye shes chen po mnga' bas 'dzum don bstan du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[67a.2\]]kyis lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' steng gi bar snang la seng ge'i khri la pad ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[67a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung du chos mnyan pa dang /_bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir lhags so/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[67a.4\]]'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[67a.5\]]khams ming sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs 
[\[67a.6\]]par rngo mi thogs na ji snyed cig mchis/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[67a.7\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang skar ma'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni skad cig_/thang cig_/yud tsam gcig gis bgrang bar spro'i/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni lo brgyar yang bgrang bar spro ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang bar gyur kyang /_rdul phra rab de bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_byang 
[\[67b.2\]]chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de tsam du tshad med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[67b.3\]]stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu kha rog 'dug de skad ma smra zhig_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu yongs su brtags pa bzung na/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 
[\[67b.4\]]gyur la/_nyi ma re re thams cad la'ang chos bshad pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstan par gyur la/_gang gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i 
[\[67b.5\]]klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/_byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar bzhag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan tha mal pas gzigs par 
[\[67b.6\]]'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis stong pa lta ci smos/_de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_tshig 
[\[67b.7\]]'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/_de ltar mthu che ba/_de ltar ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/_bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]nas 'dus pa steng gi bar snang la 'khod pa de dag bar snang de las babs nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[68a.2\]]gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[68a.3\]]yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos las brtsams te spobs par mdzod cig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga'o/_/sum cu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dus su skul 
[\[68a.4\]]ba dang /_tshod la skul ba dang /_ran par skul ba dang /_dbang po la skul ba dang /_brtan par skul ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la skul ba dang /_thabs la skul ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa la skul ba dang /_byams pa chen po la skul ba dang /_snying rje chen po la 
[\[68a.5\]]skul ba dang /_theg pa chen po la skul ba dang /_theg pa dman pa la skul ba dang /_bden pa la skul ba dang /_de bya ba la skul ba dang /_chos srung bar skul ba dang /_thos pa bstan par skul ba dang /_sems can sna tshogs su mi dbye bar skul ba dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[68a.6\]]'chal pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par skul ba dang /_bdud kyi las bstan par skul ba dang /_dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par skul ba dang /_'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar skul ba dang /_bdud gdul bar skul ba dang /_
[\[68a.7\]]byas pa shes pa dang /_byas pa gzo bar skul ba dang /_rgyu zad pa la 'jug par skul ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi 'jigs par skul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya bar skul ba dang /_sems can thams cad la ci bya snyam pa la spro 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]bar skul ba dang /_'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'dres par skul ba dang /_dgon pa la dga' bar skul ba dang /_'dod pa chung zhing chog shes par skul ba dang /_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su 
[\[68b.2\]]mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar skul ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par skul ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag par blang bar skul ba ste/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs 
[\[68b.3\]]su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag go/_/lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bskyod du med pa yin te/_de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis thul bar mi nus so/_/de ni phyin 
[\[68b.4\]]chad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcus dregs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang /_thos pas dregs pa dang /_spobs pas dregs pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pas dregs pa dang /_dgon par 
[\[68b.5\]]gnas pas dregs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pas dregs pa dang /_gzugs dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_g.yog 'khor gyis dregs pa dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bsnyen bkur byed pas dregs pa dang /_
[\[68b.6\]]bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pas dregs pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang bstod pa 
[\[68b.7\]]dang bsngags par byed pa des kyang snyems pa med pa yin te/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcu po de dag gis mi snyems rab tu mi snyems so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]khyod phyogs gang na gnas pa dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa der ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar blta'o/_/de na ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu de de bzhin te/_ji 
[\[69a.2\]]skad smras pa bzhin no/_/phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa de ni stong pa ma yin par mngon no/_/gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po nyid brtson par mdzad do/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 
[\[69a.3\]]nyan par byed/_mos par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni nga'i yin par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_mos pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[69a.4\]]nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu 
[\[69a.5\]]dam pa dag ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_bshad pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa'i phyir khyed la gtad do/_/nga ni ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/_de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas 
[\[69a.6\]]kyi bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis gnas par gyis shig_/byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[69a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzhi pa sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]byams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa 
[\[69b.2\]]bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/_/[{D253}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tri d+harma ka nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[69b.3\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[69b.4\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum dang ldan na sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed la/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas par mi byed do/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags 
[\[69b.5\]]dang /_ser sna dang /_bag med pa ste/_dge slong dag 'di na mi blun po la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum po de dag dang ldan pas sbyin pa dag ma byin zhing bsod nams dag ma byas la/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma byas pas/_lus zhig ste shi ba'i 
[\[69b.6\]]'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos gsum dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed la/_tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed do/_/gsum 
[\[69b.7\]]po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma chags pa dang /_ser sna med pa dang /_bag yod pa'o/_/dge slong dag dam pa'i chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu dam pa sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed la tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byas pas lus 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang 
[\[70a.2\]]phyir ser sna bag med pas/_/sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed de/_/de phyir bsod nams 'dod pa yi/_/mkhas pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya/_/ser sna can gyis 'jigs pa ni/_/bkres dang skom pa 'di yin na/_/gang gis 'jigs pas 'dir ma byin/_/de nyid mi yi 
[\[70a.3\]]'jigs pa yin/_/gang gis ser sna'i dbang gis na/_/yod ma byin pa 'jigs pa ste/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/de yis byis pa bgos par 'gyur/_/gang dag ser sna spangs nas kyang /_/dus su sbyin pa sbyin byed na/_/shi yang de ni shi ma yin/_/
[\[70a.4\]]rgyags bzang po yi 'gron po bzhin/_/gang dag shin tu gtang dka' ba/_/nyung ngu'am mang po gtong byed na/_/gtang dka' gtong ba de dag ni/_/dka' ba'i las dag byed pa yin/_/dam pa min pas mi rtogs te/_/dam pa chos las 'da' mi byed/_/de phyir 
[\[70a.5\]]dam pa dam pa min/_/'di nas shi bar 'gyur ba na/_/dam pa min pa dmyal bar 'gro/_/dam pa dag ni mtho ris 'gro/_/rga bas gtses pa la ni skyabs med de/_/tshe thung bas ni srog khyer dus kyang nye/_/'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di mthong rnams kyis ni/_/bsod nams 
[\[70a.6\]]bde sbyor dag ni bya ba'i rigs/_/bud med spangs 'dir sbyor bas 'tsho ba gang /_/dka' bas byin pa nyung ngu byin na yang /_/stong gi mchod sbyin brgya stong byed pa ni/_/de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/ci phyir mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/_/mchod sbyin 'thun pa 
[\[70a.7\]]de yi lam mi 'gro/_/ji ltar stong gi mchod sbyin che rnams kyang /_/de yi bcu drug char mi 'gyur zhe na/_/byis pa la la gsod cing 'ching byed 'dir/_/gzhan nor ma byin len byed brlag par 'gyur/_/mchi ma'i gdong bcas chad par bcas pa yi/_/yon de'i mchod 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]sbyin 'thun pa'i lam mi 'gro/_/de ltar mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/_/mchod sbyin 'thun pa'i lam du mi 'gro la/_/de ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang /_/de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/la la gang dag gzu lums ma yin pa/_/chos bzhin 
[\[70b.2\]]nor rnams thob pa gtong byed pa/_/de dag gtang dka' de rnams btang bas na/_/rang gi bsod nams kyis ni lha gnas 'gro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon 
[\[70b.3\]]par bstod do//_//chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras bsgyur/_lo ts+tsha ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[70b.4\]{D254}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma ke tu ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[70b.5\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[70b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[70b.7\]]rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'dir byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtang ba dang /_dgon par bsten cing 'du 'dzi spang ba dang /_bla ma dang mkhan po'i 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gdams ngag yongs su stsal ba dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don ma lus par bsgrub pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[71a.2\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[71a.3\]{D255}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_d+harma sa mu dra na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i gling phran po ta la ka'i ri la rgyal ba'i sras mi ldog pa phal po ches bskor 
[\[71a.4\]]cing mdun du byas te bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa chos kyi gtam ci 'dod pa dri bar gyis shig_/ces pa dang /_brtse ba la bsgribs pa med pas rnam 
[\[71a.5\]]par grol ba thob pa/_'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa ji ltar na gzhon nur gyur pas bdud las rgyal ba lags/_gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag pas 'dod pa la rtog cing mi sten pa dang /_mi 'chang ba dang /_
[\[71a.6\]]nga rgyal med pa dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_stong pa nyid la shin tu mos pa dang ldan te/_yod pa dang med pa spangs pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa la brtags pas grangs med par yang 'khor bar 'gyur/_ji ltar na dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba 
[\[71a.7\]]la rab tu byung zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags/_'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams las 'das pa dang /_gnas ngan len la rten cing 'jug pa'i sems dang /_yid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das te/_mi gnyis pa'i chos thos pa ni shin tu rab 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]tu byung ba'o/_/sems can gang tha dad pa 'di lta bus rab tu byung ba de ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba'o/_/gang rab tu byung yang tshul khrims dang /_spyod yul dang /_'tsho ba dang /_lta ba dang /_bsam pa nyams pa ste/_de ni mgo dang /_kha spu bregs kyang don med pa ste/_rnyog pa 
[\[71b.2\]]'chang bas na rnyog pa des ngan song du gzhol ba yin no/_/ngas dad pas byin pa spyod du gnang ba ni rigs pas grol ba ste/_dge slong gang brtson pa mi 'dor ba des gzugs mi 'dor/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi 'dor/_phung po lnga 
[\[71b.3\]]tha dad pa dang /_ril gyis brtags pa'i rang bzhin bas na/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par lta ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams dang /_skye mched kyi lha rnams ma yin par spro ba dam par byed pas rtag tu sgom mo/_/snying 
[\[71b.4\]]po med pa dang /_'brum pa can/_zug rngu can dang ldan pa/_skyon can/_pha rol po slu ba'i chos nyid ces sun 'byin pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul du sbyor bas/_gang lus kyis lus la sred pa dang /_lus la byams pa dang /_lus la bdag yid ches pa dang /_lus la 
[\[71b.5\]]zhen pa de dag rab tu spong ngo /_/gang 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/_dad pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa yin te/_'di lta bu'i dge slong ni lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi sbyin gnas su gyur 
[\[71b.6\]]pa'o/_/de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams la 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams thob pa de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 
[\[71b.7\]]dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa zhes gsungs/_gzhan gang zhig rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs kyang bdag bslus pa ste/_pha bong ltar byi ba yang ma yin/_bya yang ma yin pa bzhin du de ni khyim pa yang ma yin/_rab tu 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]byung ba yang ma yin pas na glen pa'i skyes bu de de lta bu'i tshul du zung shig_/skyes bu dam pa 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_de las 'da' bar yang mi nus/_'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos ni yongs su ma rdzogs pas na de las 'da' bar yang dka'/_
[\[72a.2\]]sems can gyi khams ni phyi na yang med/_nang na yang med de/_gnyis kar yang dmigs su med pas na/_gang sems can gyi khams kyi dngos po de ni 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos kyi dngos po ste/_de las 'da' bar yang dka' ba de la kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro 
[\[72a.3\]]ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa'i dge slong de ni rab tu byung bar gyur/_bsnyen par rdzogs par yang dag par rdzogs pa ste/_de ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs pa yang kye rgyal ba'i sras rten pa'i 
[\[72a.4\]]gnas med na/_de la 'thob pa gang ci ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur na de ni dmigs par gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni mi dmigs pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar 
[\[72a.5\]]dgongs nas 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa de ni dge slong yang dag par gyur pa ste/_dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas so/_/de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_
[\[72a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te/_brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i dge slong gang gis gzugs mi 'dor/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi 'dor ba de ni rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ste/_de ni dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyis 'dul ba la shin tu 
[\[72a.7\]]rab tu byung bar gyur pas na 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o zhes gsungs/_'jig rten gyi dbang pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid la dgongs te chos kyi dbyings nang na yang med/_phyi na yang med de/_gnyi 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]gar yang dmigs su med pas na nad med par btags pa dang /_mi skye bar btags pa dang /_mi 'gag par btags pa rnams gdags su med pa ste/_sems can gyi khams mnyam pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid/_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa bzhin du 
[\[72b.2\]]sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid de/_sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du mi gnyis te/_gnyis su med do/_/de mi gnyis te gnyis su med pas na de la dor ba yang med/_mi dor ba yang med/_gang dor ba yang med/_mi dor ba yang med 
[\[72b.3\]]pas na de la 'da' ba dang /_thob par mi nus te bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas gdags su med pa'i dge slong btags pa la mi 'jug go/_/gang yi ge med pa'i dge slong yi ge las 'das pa ste/_de la grangs kyis bstan par yang mi rung ste/_de ni mi 'ong mi 'gro mi 
[\[72b.4\]]gnas mi 'dug nyal bar yang mi rtog go/_/zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i dge slong la brtags pa ste/_spyod pa rnams kyang brtags pa'o/_/log pa la rnam pa mang du rtog pa'i dge slong spyod pa ni ma brtags pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgongs nas 'di 
[\[72b.5\]]lta bu'i dge slong ni dad pas sbyin pa spyod pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la dge ba byin te ngas dgongs te bshad pa bzhin du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bstan pa ni dge'o dge'o/_/dge bar gsungs 
[\[72b.6\]]pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'di bla na med pa dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste/_'di tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_ma dul ba dang /_nga rgyal mngon par byed pa rnams kyi mdun du mi bshad par gyis shig_/de lta bu de dag rnams kyi snyems pa spang ba'i phyir phyag rgya 'di la gang 
[\[72b.7\]]gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis bltas shing mi dmigs pa'i lus mngon du byas na/_des yid kyi lus myur du 'thob bo/_/gang gi yid kyi lus des grangs med pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu smin par byed do/_/de nas chos kyi gzhung 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]bdun stong zag pa med par mi skye ba'i sems rnam par grol bar gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur/_dmigs pa can gyi dge slong lnga brgya chos kyi gzhung 'di mi sgrub cing mi 'jug pa dang /_ma dad pas na stan las 
[\[73a.2\]]langs te dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ngas dgongs te gsungs pa 'di dag 'jig rten thams cad yid mi ches pa'i gnyen po yin pas na chos kyi gzhung 'di dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams mi 'thun pa'o/_/yod pa ma yin pa la brten pa rnams dang mi 'gal te/_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[73a.3\]]gnyen gyis bzung ba rnams dang /_zab mo'i chos la mos pa rnams dang /_skyo zhing chog shes pas bsnyungs te dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams kyis nga'i chos kyi gzhung 'di la ston par shes so/_/kye rgyal 
[\[73a.4\]]ba'i sras 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu gang zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na 'gro ba mang po'i mdun na smra zhing chos 'chad kyang chos de 'jig rten thams cad las ma grags na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras ci 'gro ba mang po de rnams yod de/_gang des sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa dang mi 'gal 
[\[73a.5\]]ba snyam du sems sam/_byams pas smras pa/_rmi lam ni yang dag par ma mchis pa ste/_'khrul pa tsam zhing mchis par bas na de ngan 'gro phal po che la chos 'chad par gyur pa lta ga la zhig mchis/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang mtshungs te/_
[\[73a.6\]]yang dag pa ma yin par 'byung bar byung nas kyang med par gyur pa ste/_kun rdzob kyang 'khrul pa tsam zhig yod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba mngon du byas na bsam gtan sems pa'i bsam gtan pa yang mi dmigs pa ste/_de la chos kyi tshul 
[\[73a.7\]]tsam zhig yod kyi kun tu brtags pa dang /_gzhan gyi dbang las kyi rnams ni yod pa ma yin no/_/de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di ni 'jig rten pa thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o/_/chos 'di dag la dmigs pa rnams kyis ni don dam par 'dzin gyi 'phags pa'i rnams ni mi dmigs 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]so/_/byis pa rnams mi shes pas de la mngon par zhen pas na dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa myong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi gzhung 'di ji lta ba de ni dmigs pa'o/_/ji ltar dmigs pa de ni chos thams cad do/_/de ltar dus gsum 
[\[73b.2\]]gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/_mi dmigs pas na gang dmigs pa de ni rtogs pa'o/_/gang rtogs pa de ni thob pa/_gang thob pa de ni byang chub/_gang byang chub pa de ni de bzhin nyid/_gang de bzhin nyid pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'/_gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni 
[\[73b.3\]]stong pa nyid/_gang stong pa nyid de ni mtshan ma med pa/_gang mtshan ma med pa de ni smon pa med pa/_gang smon pa med pa de ni don dam pa/_gang don dam pa de ni chos kyi dbyings/_gang chos kyi dbyings de ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha'/_gang gnyis su med pa'i mtha' de ni dbu mar 
[\[73b.4\]]sgrub pa/_gang dbu mar sgrub pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rtag pa/_brtan pa/_mi 'gyur ba ste/_rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang ma yin te/_de ni gdags pa yang ma yin/_mi gdags pa yang ma yin/_gang gdags pa yang ma yin/_mi gdags 
[\[73b.5\]]pa yang ma yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin/_gang 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin pa de ni brjod du med pa/_gang brjod du med pa de ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med pa/_gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med pa de ni sems can 
[\[73b.6\]]rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing /_gang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing de ni ston pa/_gang ston pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa/_gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni dmigs pa med pa/_gang dmigs pa med pa de ni mi 'gyur ba grub pa/_gang mi 'gyur ba grub pa de ni yid bzhin 
[\[73b.7\]]gyi nor bu rin po che ste/_'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar mos pa thams cad byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis tshig 'thun par smras pa/_chos kyi gzhung 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de rdo rje lta bu ste/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs pas na sems can de myur du mngon par shes pa dang /_dbang po rnon por 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/gang zhig chos kyi gzhung 'di la brjod dam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_chub par byed dam/_kha ton 
[\[74a.2\]]du byed dam/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed na de bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa 'di bshad nas 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_lha dang mir bcas pa dang /_
[\[74a.3\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri za'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga'o/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya las 'gyur ba skad gsar chad kyis gtan la phab pa'o//_//
[\[74a.4\]{D256}]@##/_/chos kyi rgya mo/_sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa sems thag pa nas nyon cig_/mang po tshogs 
[\[74a.5\]]pa yid bsdus te nyon cig_/bdag la kun tu ltung ba yod par shes na mthol tshangs byos shig_/mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro/_/mthol tshangs ma byas na sdig phyir zhing zab tu skye'o/_/kun tu ltung ba med na ma smra bar 'khod cig dang /_kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no/_/
[\[74a.6\]]legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnams dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyon cig_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir na mchod rten las chos byed pa'i tshe so sor thar pa la btsud cing lci ba dang /_gus shing rin cher byos shig_/so sor thar pa zhes 
[\[74a.7\]]bya ba'i tshul khrims ni 'di yin no/_/tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshungs so/_/mi dbul po las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungs so/_/nad pa sman rnyed pa dang mtshungs so/_/btson khri mun nas phyung ba dang mtshungs so/_/lam ring por song ba las 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]slar 'khor ba dang mtshungs te/_'di ni kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon pas sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do/_/'jigs pa'i sems ni skye dka'/_dge ba'i sems ni g.yo dka' bas na kha na ma tho ba las brnyas te med snyam du byas na 
[\[74b.2\]]chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi rgyun gyis na snod chen po 'gang ngo /_/yud tsam gyi bar du sdig byas pas na bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/re zhig mi lus stor na bskal pa khri'i bar du yang slar mi lus mi thob bo/_/dar ba'i tshe mi sdod do/_/dper na ni rta 
[\[74b.3\]]rgyugs pa dang 'dra/_mi'i tshe yang rtag pa med de/_dba' rgal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/_de ring gson mod kyi/_sang gi gnya' yang dka'o/_/da dus kho na la bab kyis mang po'i rnams so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so/_/
[\[74b.4\]]bag byas la le lo bla khyad dang /_nyal ba dang /_gnyid kyis log cing rang nyams kyi yid mi bya'o/_/mtshan zhing ni sems bsdus la rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la phyal ba don med pa la nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la yang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar 
[\[74b.5\]]ji'ang thob pa med par mi bya'o/_/mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs par byos shig_/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis mang po'i phyir chu bo gang gA'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mdo phye ste/_de'i 
[\[74b.6\]]nang nas sems kyis gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo rnyed do/_/snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bshad do/_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la yang de bzhin 'chad do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi 
[\[74b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang /_slob pa dang /_slob par 'gyur ro/_/ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o/_/khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ngas bshad do cog gcig nas gcig tu 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]sems can thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye shig_/de nas pad mo'i snying po'i snod kyi khams na gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i gdan gyi steng nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/_'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas 
[\[75a.2\]]la sbran te/_nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungs su zung la deng shig_/yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyi sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod de/_khyod 
[\[75a.3\]]la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zung la byos shig_/de nas me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa pad mo'i snod kyi khams na lham me lhang nge ba'i seng ge'i khri las langs te/_so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te/_phyir nur nas lus kun 
[\[75a.4\]]gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/_kun 'od kyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas phyung ste/_cig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/_ser po/_dmar po/_dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad 
[\[75a.5\]]pa yang khong du chud nas so sor pad mo'i snod kyi khams kyi nang du nub ste/_rang bzhin gyis bskal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnas su slar song ste/_'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas/_rang bzhin gyi bskal pa me tog 
[\[75a.6\]]'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/_gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang /_'od shin tu bzang po'i khang par 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs par bshad do/_/de nas yang seng ge'i khri las langs te sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas gral bcu'i chos bshad 
[\[75a.7\]]do/_/de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te las su bya ba bcu bshad do/_/de nas yang khri las langs te rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas phyogs shing lta ba bcu bshad do/_/de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te/_'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bcu bshad/_de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te gnam bden gnam du phyin nas sa bcu'i chos bshad/_de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas rdo rje bcu bshad/_de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad/_de nas yang 
[\[75b.2\]]bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas smon lam bcu bshad/_de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/_nga'i thog ma'i phyi mo'i pad mo me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas 
[\[75b.3\]]kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa bshad do/_/gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa yang de bzhin te/_gnyis su med do/_/tha dad pa yang med do/_/bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do/_/de'i 
[\[75b.4\]]tshe shAkya thub pa pad mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas byung nas lding ba'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas bdud kyis chos mnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas/_yas babs te 'dzam bu'i gling gi ka pi lar skyes nas yum gyi mtshan ni lha mdzes chen mo/_yab kyi mtshan ni 
[\[75b.5\]]zas gtsang ma/_nga bdag gi ming ni sid+d+hAratha zhes bya ste/_lo bdun na rab tu byung /_lo sum cu nas sangs rgyas su phyin nas nga'i mtshan ni shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/_mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas/_dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du 
[\[75b.6\]]phyin te/_de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po dra ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir grangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na/_khams gcig nas gcig so so mi 
[\[75b.7\]]'thun te tha dad pa'i grangs med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/_/ngas khams 'dir lan brgyad stong phyin te/_khams 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste/_dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de'i nang gi mang po 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo che'o/_/de nas gnam gyi pho brang nas mar babs te 'dzam bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi mo rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas 
[\[76a.2\]]kyi nang bshad do/_/sems thog ma g.yos pa ni rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klog go/_/rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni thog ma'i phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo 
[\[76a.3\]]bo nyid kyi sa bon no/_/sems can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal ba yod do/_/thams cad kyi shes pa dang /_kha dog dang /_sems dang /_yid dang /_sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so/_/tshul khrims kyi nang 
[\[76a.4\]]na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod nams yod do/_/rtag pa yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do/_/so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/_dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to/_/ngas da 
[\[76a.5\]]mang po 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do/_/rdzogs longs spyod pa nga bdag ste/_/pad mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas/_/mtha' bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng /_/shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs/_/me tog gcig khams 'bum 
[\[76a.6\]]phrag brgya/_/khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig_/kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs/_/mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son/_/de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong /_/rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus/_/sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po/_/kun kyang rdul phran 
[\[76a.7\]]mang por 'dren/_/cig car nga yi gnas su 'ong /_/sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon/_/zil dngar sgo mo de nas bye/_/'ung nas 'bum phrag brgya stong po/_/slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin/_/kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs/_/nga yi mkhan po tshul khrims kha ton 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]lhogs/_/tshul khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad/_/tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin/_/gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin/_/'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub/_/gdod ma rdzogs longs spyod pa nyid kyis blags/_/ngas kyang de bzhin kha 
[\[76b.2\]]ton blags/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa/_/klad la khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin/_/thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston/_/nga yi bde blag rtag par nyon/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod/_/so sor thar pa shes rab bzhin/_/mang po yid kun brtags par 
[\[76b.3\]]ches/_/khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'ong /_/nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang /_/rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed/_/tshul khrims le'u kun chog gtsang zin/_/yid sems yod pa thams cad ni/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bas bsdu/_/sems can sangs rgyas khrims 
[\[76b.4\]]mnod pa/_/de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin/_/tshor chen sa dang mtshungs zin te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag_/mang po kun gyis gus par byas/_/sems gcig brtul te nga klog nyon/_/de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs bla na med pa'i g.yung 
[\[76b.5\]]drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dud pa ni pha ma dang /_dge 'dun dang /_dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang /_yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o/_/sri zhu byas te bla ma'i yid dang mi 'gal ba ni chos zab mor thob pa'i gzhung ste/_sri zhu'i ming 
[\[76b.6\]]ni tshul khrims so/_/ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang gtong ba'o/_/de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo /_/de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnam [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim 
[\[76b.7\]]pa drug gi lha dang /_rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/_sems gcig tu mnyan nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po blags te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go/_/
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig_/sems g.yos te phyogs pa bcu dang /_g.yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang /_rdo rje bcu pa dang /_sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs 
[\[77a.2\]]shig_/'ung na tshul khrims kyi 'od kha nas byung ste rgyu yod/_rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te/_'od sngon po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po/_dkar po/_nag po yang ma yin/_kha dog kyang ma yin/_sems kyang ma yin/_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_rgyu rkyen gyi chos 
[\[77a.3\]]kyang ma yin te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdod ma phyi mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni lam gyi rtsa ba bas na mang po thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/_/
[\[77a.4\]]legs par bslabs pa'i rigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams brtags par nyon cig_/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po che phra dang /_dge slong pho smos dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi gnam [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_'dod pa'i khams gnam 
[\[77a.5\]]drug dang /_gdol pa dang /_nying grum dang /_pho g.yem dang /_mo g.yem dang /_bran pho smos dang /_lha ma srin sde brgyad dang /_phyag brnyan dang /_byol song dang /_'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i mi la sogs te chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig brda phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims mnod 
[\[77a.6\]]du rung ste/_kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_so sor thar pa la phas pham pa bcu yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton du ma blags na byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/_
[\[77a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin/_nga yang 'di bzhin du kha ton du klog go/_/lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis bslab cing gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/_/sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_bdag gis bsad pa dang /_mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang /_thams cad kyis gsod pa gsod pa la sdod pa gsod pa mthong na dga' bar 
[\[77b.2\]]sems pa/_sngags dang /_rngad mo byas te bsad pa/_gsad pa'i rgyu/_gsad pa'i rkyen/_gsad pa'i chos byed pa/_gsod pa'i las byed pa la sogs te/_sems yod do cog la ched kar gsad du mi rung /_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni rtag par snying rje ba dang /_sri zhu 
[\[77b.3\]]che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te bags kyis sems can thams cad kyi ra mda' dang /_'or ba bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag gis rang nyams byas te snying tshim par sems can bsad na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag 
[\[77b.4\]]gis ma byin par blangs sam/_pha log po ma byin par len du bcug gam/_thabs kyis ma byin par blangs sam/_ma byin par len pa'i rgyu/_ma byin par len pa'i rkyen/_ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/_sngags sgyu ma byas te nor khyer ba la sogs te/_lha ma srin dang /_
[\[77b.5\]]bdag po yod pa dang /_yang blo'i nor rdzas dang /_nor rdzas so cog la khab dang /_rtswa nyag ma gcig la ngas ched kar ma byin par blangs su mi rung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/_sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'gal zhing /_byams zhing snying rje bar byas te rtag 
[\[77b.6\]]par sems can no cog gi yon tan dang bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so/_/de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par spyod dam/_gzhan mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nam/_bud med do 
[\[77b.7\]]cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa dang /_gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang /_byol song dang /_lha dang /_lha ma srin gyi 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]bu mo la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod na byang chub sems dpa' ni sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad thar pa'i ra mda' bya zhing chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs so/_/de la slar mi'o cog la mi 
[\[78a.2\]]tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/_byol song dang /_ma dang /_bu mo dang /_sring mo la sogs te gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas te/_byams shing snying rje ba med na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]byas sam/_pha rol po 
[\[78a.3\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer bar bstan tam/_thabs kyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]byas pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi rgyu byas pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi rkyen byas pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi chos byed pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi las byed pa dang /_mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer ba dang /_ma mthong ba la mthong zhes zer ba dang /_lus dang sems 
[\[78a.4\]]kyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/_de la slar log par sems can thams cad kyi tshig mi drang ba dang /_yon po la lta ba dang /_yon po'i las byed par bskyod na de ni byang chub 
[\[78a.5\]]sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu smyo ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam/_pha log po smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/_thabs kyis smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ngam/_smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/_smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/_smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i 
[\[78a.6\]]chos byed dam/_smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/_smyo ba'i khu ba'o cog 'tshong du mi rung /_smyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la snang zhing drang ba'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs na/_slar log par sems 
[\[78a.7\]]can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang /_ma byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'i nyes pa bdag gis 'phyas su byas sam/_gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]tam/_'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/_'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/_'phya ba'i chos dang /_'phya ba'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang /_theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis byed pa'i mi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/_tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/_rtag par snying 
[\[78b.2\]]rje bskyed de ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/_yid ches par bstan cing bslab pa'i rigs na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' slar log par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges shes bshad na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig 
[\[78b.3\]]bdag gis bdag bstod cing phar smod pa dang /_gzhan la bdag bstod/_phar smod par ston pa/_smod pa'i rgyu/_smod pa'i rkyen byed pa/_smod pa'i chos dang /_smod pa'i las byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi skyin par sma dbab cing ngan sems 
[\[78b.4\]]pa ni bdag gis blangs te/_dge zhing legs pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na la la zhig gis bdag gi legs pa ni bsnyad/_gzhan gyi legs pa ni bcabs te/_gzhan la sma dbab par byas na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna 
[\[78b.5\]]che'am/_gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/_ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/_ser sna che ba'i rkyen byed dam/_ser sna'i chos byed dam/_ser sna'i las byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul po 'ongs so cog dang /_gzhan ji 'dod pa bzhin dgos so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[78b.6\]]dpa'i sems la ngan du sems shing sems la gshe ba dang /_dong tshe gcig gam/_khab gcig gam/_rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/_chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na tshig gcig le'u gcig_/rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/_slar ngag ngan pas spyos te sma phab na de ni 
[\[78b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro'am/_mi pha log po khro bar ston tam/_khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/_khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/_khro ba'i chos byed dam/_khro ba'i las byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]cing 'thab cing rtsod pa med par byas la rtag par snying rje bskyed cing bya ba'i rigs kyi/_phyir log par sems can thams cad kyi nang na sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing lag pas 'tshog pa dang /_ral gri dang /_dbyig pas gdab cing brdegs kyang snying 
[\[79a.2\]]brtse ma bri ste/_pha log po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing gnong bskur kyang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig gis dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/_gzhan dkon mchog gsum 
[\[79a.3\]]la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/_ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang /_rkyen byed dam/_ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/_ma yin pa'i las byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'dug dang ma rabs kyi ngan tshig gcig sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad ma yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong ngam thos na mdung rtse kha 
[\[79a.4\]]gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na/_bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_yid ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/_slar log par ma rabs log pa la lta zhing ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na de ni byang 
[\[79a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/_/dge zhugs spyod pa'i rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslabs pa'i rigs so/_/'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na tshul khrims bcu tshang bar bshig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_la la zhig gis tshul khrims 
[\[79a.6\]]bshig pa zhig na da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las ma nus te/_rgyal po'i gral yang stor/_'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral yang stor/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'i gral yang stor/_g.yos shing phyogs pa bcu dang /_bskyed cing gsol ba bcu 
[\[79a.7\]]dang /_chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang /_sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa'o/_/yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas ngan song gsum du ltung ste/_bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/_de bas na 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]gcig kyang gzhig tu mi rung ngo /_/khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang /_slob pa dang /_slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus par byos te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/_/gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri pa'i nang 
[\[79b.2\]]nas rgya cher bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/_phas pham pa bcu ni bshad zin to/_/ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /_'khor los bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /_blon po'i 
[\[79b.3\]]gral thob pa'i tshe dang /_sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i rigs so/_/'ung tang lha ma srin thams cad kyang rgyal po'i lus dang /_blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang skyabs byed do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgyes so/_/tshul khrims thob zin na sri zhu dang mi 
[\[79b.4\]]'gal ba'i sems dang /_sems la gus par byas pa'i sems bskyed de/_gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang /_mtshungs par mthong ba dang /_las 'thun par byed pa mthong na langs te bsu 
[\[79b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal te nad dri ba'i rigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_glen pa'i sems bskyed de/_ma langs/_ma bsu/_phyag ma byas te/_ji la'ang chos bzhin du zhe sa dang /_ri mo dang /_bdag gi lus dang /_yul mkhar 
[\[79b.6\]]dang /_pho smos dang /_nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor ro cog btsongs la dgos so cog ma sbyar te/_de ltar ma nus na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched kar chang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes te/_dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa stor to/_/la la zhig gis bdag 
[\[79b.7\]]gis lus dang lag gis chang snod blangs te mi pha rol po la byin te blud na tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/_bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di lta ste/_mi'o cog thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan du mi rung ngo /_/bdag 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_bdag ched kar 'thungs pa dang /_pha rol po la bdar ba ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sha ched kar zos pa dang /_sha'o cog bzar mi rung ste/_zos na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas sems can 
[\[80a.2\]]thams cad kyis mthong nas 'jigs nas spong ngo /_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems can gyi sha bzar mi rung ngo /_/sha zos pa ni sdig grangs med de sha zos na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu dku ba rnam lnga bzar mi rung ngo /_/sgog pa dang /_btsong dang /_
[\[80a.3\]]rgya sgog dang /_ri sgog rnams dang /_shing kun dang /_'di rnam lnga kha zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo /_/la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang /_tshul khrims lnga dang /_tshul khrims bcu dang /_
[\[80a.4\]]rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi bshig pa dang /_log pa bdun dang /_gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa'i sdig byed pa mthong na mthol tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigs so/_/de las byang chub sems dpa' ma bstan te mthol tshangs byed du ma bcug na/_lhan cig 'dug 'dug 
[\[80a.5\]]cing tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig tu tshogs te tshul khrims bshad pa'i tshe sdig dngos su byung gis nyes pa mthol tshangs byed du chug shig_/ma bcug na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ba lhan cig tu las 
[\[80a.6\]]byed pa/_dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang /_mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na rgyang grags stong gi lam na tshur 'ongs na ni bsu/_'gro ba ni bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/_bkur sti dang /_ri mo dang /_nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya/_nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha 
[\[80a.7\]]zas dang /_khri stan dang /_chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/_dus gsum du chos bshad de/_nyin gcig cing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la khro ba'i sems dang /_mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so/_/
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]chos kyi phyir lus dang bsngos te chos gsol lo/_/de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/_tshul khrims dang mdo sde 'chang ba'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na chos 'chad pa yod na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims kyi glegs bam khyer 
[\[80b.2\]]te/_chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la gsol te/_dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so/_/la la zhig ri dang /_tshal dang /_shing gi drung dang /_dge 'dun gyi sa dang /_khyim gyi nang dang /_chos 'chad do cog gi sar byin par byas te/_mnyan cing 'dod do/_/de'i gnas su 
[\[80b.3\]]song ste ma mnyan/_ma mnos na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sems ni theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang /_tshul khrims la 'dug kyang khar smra na sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/_rtag par theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang /_mur 
[\[80b.4\]]'dug gi chos la lta zhing log par lta ba'o cog gi tshul khrims dang /_chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab bo cog rtag par rim gro byas te/_gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad 
[\[80b.5\]]kyi nang na nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o/_/pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_dge 'dun dang /_slob ma'am/_dbang po ma tshang ba nad do cog gis btab cing nyon mongs na kun kyang gsos te sos par bya'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[80b.6\]]sems dpa' sems can la lta gshe zhing ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang /_yul mkhar du ma phyin pa/_dbye dang /_ri lung dang /_mkhar dang /_tshal na nad pa 'dug pa mthong ste ra mda' dang /_rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gri dang /_mda' 
[\[80b.7\]]gzhu dang /_mdung dang /_sta re la sogs te thab mo'i spyad mtshon cha dang /_sems can gsod pa'i spyad dang 'dra ba rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chang du mi rung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma gzhan gyis bsad kyang sha mi glan na/_sems can thams cad gsad pa lta smos kyang 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ci dgos/_mtshon cha ched kar 'chang ba na ltung ba'o/_/'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnam bcu ni bslabs te/_rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/_/'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[81a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/_nyi 'og gi yul du pho nyar 'drul ba dmag gi g.yul bshams te/_dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te sems can mang po bsad na byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phan tshun du 'drul yang mi rung na ched 
[\[81a.3\]]kar yul gyi dgra byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang /_bran pho smos dang /_phyugs bdag sna drug dang /_gshin sgrom ro gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa khe dang tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs 
[\[81a.4\]]na gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de la ched kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de pha log po dag pa nges pa/_chos kyi mkhan po/_dge 'dun rgyal po/_ya rabs btsun pa la ma nyes par log pa bdun dang /_pham pa 
[\[81a.5\]]bcu dang /_pha ma dang /_phu bo nu bo dang /_gnyen pa rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshig go zhes skur na sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing byams shing snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/_de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gnas su lhung na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[81a.6\]]kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/_ched kar me chen po btang la ri dang tshal dbye dang /_ri lung dbyar zla ra ba man chad/_ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]yan chad bsregs sam/_la la zhig gis me btang ste/_gzhan gyi khang khyim dang /_mkhar dang /_grong dang /_dge 'dun gyi khyim dang /_zhing 
[\[81a.7\]]dang /_bskyed shing dang /_lha ma srin dang /_bla'i dkor la sogs te bdag po yod do cog gi nor rdzas bsreg tu mi rung ngo /_/la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi slob ma bdag dang /_mur 'dug dang /_gnyen rnam drug la 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]sogs te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen no cog kun kyang ci yang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /_tshul khrims nod cing gzungs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i rigs so/_/gzhung dang lugs shes shing byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang /_
[\[81b.2\]]rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/_gcig nas gcig tu [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dang /_chos kyis cho ga shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang /_zhe sdang bskyed de/_gzhan nyan thos kyi theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang /_
[\[81b.3\]]yi ge dang /_mur 'dug dang /_log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang /_tshul khrims dang /_yi ge bslabs nas rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gsar 
[\[81b.4\]]du slob pa rgyang grags brgya stong gi lam nas theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /_tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rigs so/_/dka' thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs pa/_lag ngar bsregs pa sor mo bsregs pa'o/_/
[\[81b.5\]]de la lus dang /_lag ngar dang /_sor mo bsregs te/_sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na/_de'i rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/_/stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang /_'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad 
[\[81b.6\]]la lus kyi sha dang /_rkang lag gtong phod par byas te/_byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de/_sems ni phye/_yid ni gol bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir lan blan pa'i rigs pa ni 
[\[81b.7\]]ma blan gyi/_yi ge dang /_tshul khrims ri mo dang /_'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas snga phyi med par dkon mchog gsum la 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang /_nor rdzas dang /_gso ba'i khe dang /_ming snyan pa'i phyir rgyal po dang /_rgyal 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]bu dang /_blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/_snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/_btsan ngag gis bsdigs te nan gyis nor dang /_khe tshol lo cog gi ming ni ngan pa mang po tshol zhes bya'o/_/gzhan la yang snying rje med cing sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i 
[\[82a.2\]]sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob pa na nyin gcig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung la/_de'i gzhung dang /_don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul 
[\[82a.3\]]khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba ni bdag la brnyas shing bslus/_gzhan la yang brnyas te chos so cog rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes par gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu 
[\[82a.4\]]ngan sems bskyed de/_tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na pog snod khyer te/_byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis bar du bar bcug ste/_'phags pa'i mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing ngan mi byed pa med do zhes skur te/_de lta bu ched 
[\[82a.5\]]kar byas na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de ci'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing pho'o cog ni bdag gi pha yin/_mo'o cog ni bdag gi ma yin/_bdag sngan chad kyi tshe rabs la gar skyes so cog na yang de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na 'gro ba drug 
[\[82a.6\]]gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te/_de bsad cing zos na bdag gi pha ma bsad do/_/gcig tu na bdag gi lus rnying pa bsad do/_/sa dang chu thams cad ni bdag gi lus snga ma yin no/_/me dang rlung ngo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas rtag par gson por 
[\[82a.7\]]btang ba'i las byed/_gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na thabs spyad de/_bdag gis 'or tshos kyi rgya mo/_ba dang ra mda' byas te/_nyon mongs shing phongs pa thar bar bya'o/_/rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad de/_bstan bslabs nas sems 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]can thar pa'i ra mda' bya'o/_/pha ma dang /_bu pho dang /_nu bo zhig shi na de nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na de'i bsod nams kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad de mtho ris su skye'o/_/de ltar ma byas na 
[\[82b.2\]]ltung ba'o//_//chos kyi rgya mo/_bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs na sems gus par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/_/sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang tshul khrims gcig pu gcig nas rgya che zhing gsal 
[\[82b.3\]]bar bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_khros pa'i lan khros pas mi blan/_brdeg pa'i lan brdeg pas mi blan/_pha ma dang /_phu nu bo gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha blan du mi rung ngo /_/gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po gsad kyang 
[\[82b.4\]]sha blan du mi rung ngo /_/srog gcod cing sha blan na sri zhu'i chos dang 'gal lo/_/bran pho smos la ngag ngan pas spyos shing brdegs la nyin gcig cing las ngan pa rnam gsum spyod pa la yang sdig grangs med na ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci 
[\[82b.5\]]dgos te/_rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/_gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha blan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung ste/_ji'ang mi shes par bdag dbang po rno la mdzangs par rlom zhing la la ni lo grangs 
[\[82b.6\]]rgan zhing phyug btsan snyems te/_la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang /_mang du shes pa dang /_dbang che ba dang /_nor rin po che sna bdun mang du bdog pas rgyags dregs sngan chad chos shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang /_tshul khrims mi gsol/_mi nod/_chos kyi 
[\[82b.7\]]mkhan po la la ni rung chung /_la la ni nas gzhon/_la la ni thabs chung /_la la ni dbul/_la la ni dbang po ma tshang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa yod de/_chos kyi yi ge dang /_tshul khrims so cog zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo/_/chos 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]kyi slob dpon ma rig pa dang /_thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing chos kyi mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing nod du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul 
[\[83a.2\]]khrims 'dod cing nod na sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te/_zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la/_ltas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims thob bo/_/ltas bzang po ma mthong 
[\[83a.3\]]ba ni zhag bdun gnyis/_bdun gsum/_lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis gzung ngo /_/ltas bzang po mthong nas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod do/_/ltas bzang po ma mthong na sangs rgyas 
[\[83a.4\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod kyang ming tshul khrims thob pa zhes mi bya'o/_/la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nod na ltas bzang po mi dgos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi 
[\[83a.5\]]mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na ltas bzang po mi dgos te/_chos kyi mkhan po de'i mdun du tshul khrims mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste/_gus pa'i sems skye'o/_/rgyang grags stong lam tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la sangs rgyas 
[\[83a.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nod na ltas bzang po mthong bar dgos so/_/chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /_tshul khrims shes pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po rnams byams shing mdza' ba 
[\[83a.7\]]snyems te/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang /_tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'drir 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang /_ngan sems dang /_le lo'i sems kyis gcig pu gcig pu nas 'dri ba'i lan ma blan na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang /_theg pa chen po'i drang po'i chos/_drang por mthong ba/_drang po'i ngo bo nyid/_drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom mi nus pa rnams ni dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/_slar log par bltas te theg pa 
[\[83b.2\]]chung ngu rnam gnyis dang /_mur 'dug gi chos dang /_ma rabs kyi gzhung la bsten pa dang /_a b+hi d+harma bshad pa slob pa dang /_theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang /_'dug par slob na de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon chad pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis byang 
[\[83b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no/_/de lta na ched kar byas pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na chos 'chad pa bdag po byed pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang /_ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag po dang /_bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i 
[\[83b.4\]]bdag po dang /_'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag po dang /_de lta bu byed na byams pa'i sems bskyed la mi mdza' ste/_'thab cing rtsod pa yang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs so/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrungs te ma 'os par mi spyad/_bdag gis bdag 
[\[83b.5\]]gi sgor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang /_rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[83b.6\]]dge slong 'dron pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang /_mkhar dang /_grong dang /_rgyal po'i khyim dang /_dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang /_'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni bsu/_'gro na ni bskyal te/_zas kyi bsti stang 
[\[83b.7\]]dang /_khang khyim dang /_nyal ba'i mal cha dang /_khri dang /_sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin no/_/la la zhig bdag la nor med na bdag gi lus dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dag btsongs te/_ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos so/_/sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te/_dge 'dun 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]phal dang /_dge 'dun gyi 'dron pa zhig gnyer te/_yon gyi nor skal ba yod pa'i sar dge 'dun khyim bdag pos dge 'dun 'dron pa'i rnams rim gyis gnyer ba btang ste/_de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste/_dge 
[\[84a.2\]]'dun 'dron pa ma btang na dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste byol song dang mtshungs so/_/dge sbyong ma yin shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/_de ltar byas pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu ci yang [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]ma bab par logs shig 
[\[84a.3\]]tu yon blangs shing bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo /_/de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas ni phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/_de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[84a.4\]]'phags pa rnams dang /_mkhan po dang /_dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang /_nad pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang /_rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gis dge 'dun gnyer te/_bsod nams bskyed 
[\[84a.5\]]cing smon lam gsol na dge 'dun gyi nang du song na dge skos la dris te/_de ring [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun 'thob bo/_/gud nas dgra bcom pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]
[\[84a.6\]]bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o/_/de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni mur 'dug ngan pa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas bdun la ni gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do/_/sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni ltung 
[\[84a.7\]]ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems spyad de gso ba'i khe'i phyir pho smos kyi g.yem pa 'tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed pa dang /_bdag rdung ba/_bdag 'du ba pho smos kyi mtshan lta/_rmi lam bzang ngan 'gro la pho zhes zer/_mo zhes zer/_log pa'i chos kyi 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/_dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/_dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la dug rtsi rnam pa brgya stong byed de sbrul dug_/gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang /_byad stems la sogs pa snying rje yong med pa lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan 
[\[84b.2\]]sems bskyed de/_bdag gi lus kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur ba byas te gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te/_kha ni stong pa 'chad/_las ni yod pa'i las byed la/_tha mal pa'i bud med dang /_skyes pa'i smyan byed cing mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/_ci la'ang mi 
[\[84b.3\]]'jigs shing chags pa med/_dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang /_lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe sems can gsod/_rkun po dang /_chom po byed cing mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ltung ba'o/_/tshul khrims 'di 
[\[84b.4\]]bcu bslabs la rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/_/khrims gzung ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang /_mi ngan pa'o
