[\[84b.5\]]cog dang /_rkun po chen pos sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/_chos dang /_tshul khrims kyi yi ge 'tshong ba mthong ngam/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma 'tshong ngam/_gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang 
[\[84b.6\]]chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dang /_la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas/_bran pho bran mor byas pa zhig byang chub sems dpas de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed de/_thabs kyis ra mda' dang /_skyabs byas te gnas gnas na 'khod do cog kyang slar 
[\[84b.7\]]slob cing ston cig_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_chos dang /_tshul khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na nor gyis slus shig_/de ltar ma slus na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu 'chang du mi 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gnang ba la mtshon cha dang /_mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang /_tshong spogs byed pa dang /_srang dang /_bre che chung 'chang ba dang /_rtsa lag snyems shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang /_sems can la phrag dog byed de/_pha log po bcings dgas byas pa dang /_ngo so don 
[\[85a.2\]]du yod pa zhig btang byi la dang /_sel byi dang /_khyi dang /_phag dang /_bya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo /_/de lta bu ched kar gsos na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/_pho smos la sogs pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang dgra chen po byed 
[\[85a.3\]]pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo /_/yang gcig tu dung 'bud pa dang /_rnga gling dang /_gyim shing dang /_dzeng dang /_gling bu dang /_kong hi'u dang /_glu len pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo /_/cho lo dang /_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_par sig gi rtsed mo dang /_ra 
[\[85a.4\]]'bri lug gi dmag gi rtsed mo dang /_pho long rdob pa dang /_rdo 'phen gyis rtse ba dang /_bum bu la rde'u 'phen pa dang /_khras byed pa dang /_me long brud pa byar mi rung ngo /_/rtsa tsi tsha'u dang /_rgya cang dang /_phor bu kha rub dang /_mi'i thod pa dang /_de rnams la mo gdab tu mi 
[\[85a.5\]]rung ngo /_/rkun po'i than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung ngo /_/de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par bzung ba'i rim gro byas na 'gro nyal 'dug langs dang /_nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha ton blags na rdo rje dang 
[\[85a.6\]]mtshungs so/_/rkyal pa thogs pa mtsho chen po brgal ba dang mtshungs so/_/gcig tu na dge slong rtswas bcings pa dang mtshungs te/_theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam pa nga ni da rung sangs rgyas su ma phyin pa'i 
[\[85a.7\]]sangs rgyas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams ni sangs rgyas su phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de bar mi chad par sems la bsams la de skad cig gcig theg pa chung ngu gnyis dang /_mur 'dug la sems kyis bsams na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]kyi bu rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la/_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_dge 'dun dang /_dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/_rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang /_tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de 
[\[85b.2\]]rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /_khrims dang /_g.yo zhing phyogs pa bcu dang /_bskyed cing gso gso ba bcu dang /_chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang /_sa bcu la sogs pa bdag byed cing shes la chos bzhin du las byed par smon to/_/sangs 
[\[85b.3\]]rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims bzung la sran thub par bya ba ni lus dang srog kyang bor te sems la sems pa'i bar mi gcad par sems bsam mo/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po 
[\[85b.4\]]bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzungs su bzung ste/_smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo/_/bdag gi lus 'di me chen po'i nang du tshig kyang rung khung zab mo dang /_ral gri'i ri la song yang rung ste/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang /_
[\[85b.5\]]tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang /_nam du yang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad sogs pa mi byed par smon to/_/gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/lcags bsregs pa'i dra ba dang /_de lta bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te lus dkris kyang mthar yun du tshul 
[\[85b.6\]]khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/kha 'di'i nang du lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang /_me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ong ba la/_bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul 
[\[85b.7\]]khrims bshig pa'i khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams cad mi za bar smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/lus 'di me chen pos bsregs pa'i lcags kyi dra ba dang /_lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khri'o cog gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/lus 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas gtsags kyang rung ste/_mthar tshul khrims 
[\[86a.2\]]bshig pa'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi za bar smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/lus 'dis bskal pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/_mthar tshul khrims dral ba'i lus 
[\[86a.3\]]kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyim mo cog dang /_ldum ra dang /_skyed shing dang /_zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/lus 'di mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun bus brdungs te rdul phra mo bzhin du song 
[\[86a.4\]]yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang /_mdung rtses mig gnyis brus shing gtsags 
[\[86a.5\]]kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis pha logs kyi kha dog bzang po la mi lta bar smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/lcags kyi smyung bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang /_rna ba'i rtsa bar btsugs kyang tha mar 
[\[86a.6\]]khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan pa la mi mnyan par smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing gzhogs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spos so cog la mi snom par smon to/_/yang 
[\[86a.7\]]gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lce ral gris bcad gtubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis mi'o cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/sta re rnon pos 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi brkam mi chags par smon to/_/yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/_/sems can no cog sangs rgyas su yod par smon to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma 
[\[86b.2\]]bskyed na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa dgun dang /_dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang /_tshul khrims su 'jug pa so shing dang /_sran phye dang /_chos gos gsum dang /_ril ba dang /_lhung bzed dang /_
[\[86b.3\]]gding ba dang /_gsil byed dang /_pog phor dang /_chu tshags dang /_lag phyis dang /_gri dang /_gtsub shing dang /_gtsub stan dang /_smang tsher dang /_tha gu'i khri dang /_dar ma dang /_khrims dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa'i cha grong rgyu ba'i tshe 'gro zhing 'ongs 
[\[86b.4\]]na rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na yo byad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni dpyid zla ra ba tshes bco lnga nas dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o/_/ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga nas dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[86b.5\]]brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/_dper na bya'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o/_/de ste gso sbyin gyi nyi ma la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing kha ton du phas pham pa bcu dang /_ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi khrims kha ton du lhogs shig_/de ste khrims klog pa'i 
[\[86b.6\]]tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang /_gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton blags la gcig gis mthol tshangs bya ste/_gcig gam gnyis sam gang yang rung ste/_stong brgya de yang mi 
[\[86b.7\]]gcig gis kha ton klog go/_/kha ton klog pa ni sa mthon po la 'dug la nyan pa ni dma' ba la 'dug go/_/so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_bdun pa bgos te tshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa'i tshe bgegs yod cing mi bde ba'i nang du ma 'gro cig_/yul gyi bgegs dang /_rgyal po mi srun pa dang /_sa mtho dma' dang /_rtsi shing zab mo dang /_dbyar seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_chu ste rlung gi bgegs dang /_rkun po chom po dang /_sbrul 
[\[87a.2\]]gdug pa'i lam la sogs te/_bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo /_/de la ched kar song na ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig_/tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig_/tshul khrims 
[\[87a.3\]]phyis nod pa ni phyi nas 'dug shig_/rgan gzhon mi lta/_dge slong pho dang /_dge slong mo dang /_ya rabs dang /_btsun pa dang /_rgyal po rgyal bu dang /_nyung rum dang /_bran pho smos la sogs pa tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shig_/phyis nos pa ni phyis 
[\[87a.4\]{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du 'dug shig_/mur 'dug ngan pa dang /_mi glen po bzhin du rgan yang rung /_gzhon yang rung /_snga med phyi med pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]med pa ni g.yung po bran gyi chos so/_/nga sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na ni snga ma ni steng du 'dug_/phyi ma ni 'og tu 'dug go/_/
[\[87a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhin du [{]go rims su [,]go rim du [}]ma 'khod na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems can no cog bstan cing bcos te/_dge 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing ri dang /_tshal dang /_ra ba dang /_zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang pa byas la dbyar dgun 
[\[87a.6\]]du tshul dang /_bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang /_gtsang ma'i 'chags 'dzugs su gzhug pa'i rigs so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can no cog gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chos dang /_tshul khrims kyi yi ge bkrol bshad na nam na tsha byung ba dang /_yul gyi 
[\[87a.7\]]bgegs dang /_dgra'i bgegs dang /_pha ma dang /_phu nu bo dang /_mkhan po la sogs pa thog ma shi ba'i dus dang /_bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang /_bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang /_bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang /_bdun bdun gyi nyi ma la de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /_tshul 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]khrims bkrol bshad de/_mchod ston byas te dge ba'i bsod nams thob par gsol cig_/'gro 'ongs kyang gson po'i mtsho bsod nams byed pa la me chen pos bsregs/_chu chen pos khyer/_rlung nag po chen pos gru bus pa dang /_gtsang po dang mtsho chen po'i dgra'i bgegs la 
[\[87b.2\]]sogs te/_sdig go cog bgegs dang lan gyis na mtshams med pa bdun/_bgegs brgyad/_lag sgril/_rkang sgril ltung dang /_lcags dang lus bcings drags te/_g.yem zhing khro ba mang po dang /_blun zhing glen pa mang po dang /_na tsha'i mang po'i dgra zus na kun gyis kyang theg pa chen 
[\[87b.3\]]po'i chos kyi yi ge dang /_tshul khrims kha ton blags te dgrol bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na ltung ba'o/_/tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la gus par rtag par gzungs su zung shig_/snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon 
[\[87b.4\]]par bshad do/_/sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bu mi la tshul khrims shig sbyin na bye brag dbye zhing gdam du mi rung /_rgyal po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po chen po dang /_blon po phal dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_
[\[87b.5\]]dge bsnyen ma dang /_pho g.yem mo g.yem dang /_gzugs kyi gnam [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang /_dbang po med pa dang /_dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang /_nyung rum dang /_bran pho smos dang /_lha ma srin la sogs te/_thams cad kun khrims mnod du 
[\[87b.6\]]rung ngo /_/lus la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni kha dog bsgyur bar ston la chos dang 'thun par gyis shig_/kha dog ser po sngon po nag po dmar po/_mal gos yan chad kha dog bsgyur ro/_/lus la gos bgo'o cog tshos te kha dog sgyur cig_/yul lo cog gi nang na mi'i gos 
[\[87b.7\]]su bgo ba la/_dge slong ngo cog gi gos ni tha mal pa'i gos dang mi 'thun no/_/thog ma tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe mkhan pos dri ba khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdun gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig_/chos kyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ni log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo /_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]log pa bdun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba dang /_pha ma dang mkhan po dang slob dpon bsad pa dang /_lus kyi tshul khrims gtsang ma bshig pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa'i 'phags pa gsod pa yin te/_'di rnam bdun tshang bar byas te bsgribs pa'i 
[\[88a.2\]]tshul la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo /_/gzhan ni thams cad kyang tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo /_/rab tu byung ba'i chos ni rgyal po la yang phyag mi 'tshal/_pha ma la yang phyag mi 'tshal/_gnyen pa rnam pa drug la yang zhe sa mi bya/_lha ma srin la yang phyag mi 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi mkhan 
[\[88a.3\]]po skad shes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi lam nas 'ongs te/_khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mkhan pos ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de/_sems can no cog la tshul khrims ma byin na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te yid ches 
[\[88a.4\]]pa'i sems g.yo bar bya na byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te/_tshul khrims mnod du 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong na sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du thong shig_/mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shig_/
[\[88a.5\]]de la yang tshe 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na mkhan pos tshul khrims sbyin pa mi rigs so/_/bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig med na tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo /_/la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu bshig pa zhig yod na mthol tshangs byed du chug shig_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[88a.6\]]dpa'i zhal sngar nyin mtshan drug tu pham pa bcu dang /_ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du blags la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe ltas bzang por bya dgos so/_/de la nyi ma bdun dang /_bdun gnyis dang /_bdun gsum dang /_lo gcig tshun chad ltas 
[\[88a.7\]]bzang po mthong dgos so/_/ltas bzang po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gshegs te spyi bo la byugs te 'od mthong ba dang /_me tog mthong ba dang /_ltas ci yang rung ba bzang po mthong na mod la sdig 'byin to/_/de la ltas bzang po med na mthol tshangs su zin kyang mi phan te/_de'i tshe lus kyis ni tshul khrims mi thob 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bo/_/lo dang nyi mas bstan te spogs te byas la/_ltas 'od byung ba dag mthong na tshul khrims mnod du rung ngo /_/la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bshig pa ni mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la 'byung ste/_bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so/_/de bas na tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan 
[\[88b.2\]]pos chos 'di'i nang nas kyang gcig nas gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o/_/theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /_tshul khrims yang ba dang /_lci ba dang /_yin pa dang ma yin pa'i gzugs dam pa mi shes na gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang /_snga ma'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon dang /_da ltar bskyed cing 
[\[88b.3\]]gso ba'i rang bzhin dang /_gtan mi rlag pa'i rang bzhin dang /_chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin dang /_drang po'i rang bzhin dang /_de'i nang nas rtogs pa dang /_dpyod pa'i rang bzhin dang /_phyi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te chos kyis las bya'o/_/cho ga dang tshul khrims dang /_chos kyi 
[\[88b.4\]]yi ge 'di gcig nas gcig khong du ma chud de/_byang chub sems dpa' g.yo ba'i khe dang /_ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i phyir slob ma la khe brkam pas ngan pa btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang /_tshul khrims kyi yi ge kun shes so zhes zer zhing yon len pa'i bdag la yang bslus shing brnyas/_
[\[88b.5\]]gcig tu na gzhan la yang bslus shing brnyas te/_de lta bus mi la tshul khrims byin na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdun du mur 'dug dang /_ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen po 'di bshad du mi rung ngo /_/
[\[88b.6\]]log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo /_/rgyal po ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du yang bshad du mi rung ngo /_/mi ngan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims ma mnos pa ni ming byol song zhes bya'o/_/gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing rdo shing dang mtshungs/_sems 
[\[88b.7\]]med de ming chos log pa zhes bya'o/_/log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing dum dang mtshungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas rab bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de bstan na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]po mnos la ched kar sems bskyed de/_'phags pa'i tshul khrims bshig na sbyin bdag go cog gi yon blang du mi rung ngo /_/gcig tu ni rgyal po'i khab kyis ris la yang 'gror mi rung /_rgyal po'i chu la yang 'thung du mi rung ste/_'dre chen po lnga stong gis rtag par de'i mdun bcad 
[\[89a.2\]]nas 'dre na re dgra chen po khyim dang /_mkhar dang /_yul gyi nang du 'ongs so zhes zer te/_de rnams kyis khor mor mi de'i rjes phyags so/_/'jig rten na re yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro'o zhes zer te mig gis mthong du 'ong mi dga'o/_/tshul khrims bshig pa ni byol song dang mtshungs/_
[\[89a.3\]]shing dum dang mtshungs te/_drang po'i tshul khrims bshig na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te rtag par gzungs su bzung ste kha ton du yang klog go/_/pags pa bshus te ni shog shog byas/_khrag phyung bas ni snag tshar byas/_rus pa bcag ste smyig gur byas la sangs 
[\[89a.4\]]rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ge bri'o/_/shing gi shun pa dang /_thod kar la bris te rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang /_rin med pa'i spos dang /_me tog la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzeb dang snod byas te/_nang du chos kyi yi ge tshul khrims kyi glegs bam gzhug go/_/de la chos kyi bzhin 
[\[89a.5\]]du ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems rgya cher bskyed de/_yul mkhar dang khang khyim mo cog tu phyin te/_sems can no cog ni mthong na khyed la sogs pa sems can no cog thams cad dkon mchog gsum la phyogs shing tshul khrims bcu nos shig ces bsgo ba'i 
[\[89a.6\]]rigs so/_/byol song gi khams shig na'ang sems la bsam khar smras te/_khyod ni byol song na byang chub sems dpa'i sems skyed cig ces bsam zhing bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni ri lung dbye thang ga la gnas kyang rung ste/_sems can no cog kun byang chub sems dpa'i sems 
[\[89a.7\]]skye bar byos shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can ma bstan ma bcos na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par bstan cing bcos pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed nas chos byed pa dang /_ya rabs la sogs pa sbyin bdag dang /_'du ba mang po'i nang du 'greng la gos skya bo gyon te chos bshad 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]du mi rung ngo /_/gos skya bo gyon pa 'du ba mang po'i nang du chos bshad na chos kyi mkhan po ni sa mthon por 'dug la/_spos dang me tog gis yen gsol te/_mtha' bzhir nyan pa'i rnams dma' ba na 'khod la gus par mnyan to/_/pha ma la sri zhu mi 'gal bar bya ba dang /_slob mas mkhan 
[\[89b.2\]]po la bya ba bzhin chos la yang de bzhin gus par bya'o/_/bram ze me lha can chos byed pa bzhin gus par bya'o/_/de bzhin ma byas te chos 'chad pa pa chos bzhin du ma bshad na ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang the tsom med pa'i yid kyis khrims nos shig_/rgyal po dang rgyal bu 
[\[89b.3\]]dang slob ma sde bzhi dang /_bdag mtho zhing btsan snyems te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_tshul khrims bshig la nan tur gyis chos byas te/_nga'i slob ma rnam bzhi rab tu byung zhing chos byed par mi ster te/_bgegs gcig tu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_mchod rten 'dzugs shing 
[\[89b.4\]]chos dang tshul khrims yi ger 'drir mi ster te/_dkon mchog 'jig cing de lta bur ched kar chos 'jig pa ni ltung ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bu dge ba'i sems spyod pa la rab tu phyung shig_/legs pa'i ming snyan pa 'dod pa dang /_gso ba'i khe'i phyir rgyal po dang /_blon po'i mdun du 
[\[89b.5\]]sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de/_dge slong dang dge slong ma la byang chub sems dpa'i khrims mi rigs par byin te/_slob ma rnams bcings btags na seng ge'i lus la srin bu 'dug pas seng ge bdag gis sha zos pa dang mtshungs te/_phyi'i srin bus sha zos pa ma yin no/_/
[\[89b.6\]]de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi bu mur 'dug dang /_bdud kyis chos bshig pa ma yin no/_/bdag gis chos bshig pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos na/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rim gro bya ba ni pha mas pha ma bu gcig pu la bsam pa dang mtshungs so/_/pha ma la 
[\[89b.7\]]sri zhu bya ba dang 'dra'o/_/mur 'dug dang /_mi ngan pa la ngag ngan pa tshig ngan pas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la skur ba zer na mdung rtse kha gsum pa'i mdung rtse sum brgyas snying la btsugs pa dang /_ral gri stong dbyig pa stong khris lus brdegs pa dang mtshungs par bya ste/_bdag gi lus 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems can dmyal bar song yang sla'i/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshig gcig ngan du zer ba'i skad ni mi thos par smon to/_/bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims bshig pa gzhan la lan lon pa dang /_zhar gyis zhar gyis tshul khrims bshig par bstan 
[\[90a.2\]]pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems med do/_/de lta bu byas na ltung ba'o/_/tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la sems gus par gzungs su zung shig_/sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams tshul khrims yang ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad khyed la sogs pas rtag par gzungs 
[\[90a.3\]]su zung shig_/sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha ton zin to/_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni da ltar kha ton byas so/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyis 'ong ba'i rnams ni da de'i khar kha ton byed do/_/sangs 
[\[90a.4\]]rgyas kyi bu nyon cig_/phas pham pa bcu dang /_ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad cig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kha ton zin/_da ltar gyi kha ton byas phyis kyang kha ton byed de/_nga'ang de bzhin da ltar kha ton byed do/_/de lta bas na khyed la sogs pas sems can phal mang po rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang /_
[\[90a.5\]]blon po dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen mas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos na 'grus par kha ton klogs la bkrol bshad de/_yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis skal ba rtag par 'dug ste/_khrims kyi glegs bam dus gsum 
[\[90a.6\]]gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing thogs pa med par byas te/_sems can thams cad bstan cing bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing /_sangs rgyas mthong la sangs rgyas gcig gis gcig la gtad de/_tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang ngan song dang /_bgegs brgyad kyi nang du yang mi ltung 
[\[90a.7\]]zhing /_rtag par mi'i lam dang /_gnam gyi steng du skye'o/_/ngas da ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phye ba khyed la sogs pa snying gcig tu brtul te/_so sor thar pa la bslabs la dga' zhing /_gus par gyis shig_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon 'debs pa'i nang nas gcig pu gcig pu nas rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do/_/de'i tshe slob ma mkhas pa sum stong 'dug cing nyan pas sangs rgyas kyis kha ton blags pa thos nas sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te/_dga' gzha' 
[\[90b.2\]]nas rtag par gzungs su bzung ngo /_/de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi sa yan chad pad mo'i me tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos kyi sgo mo le'u'i nang na zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bcu bshad zin to/_/stong phrag brgya 'bum gyi thub pa yang 
[\[90b.3\]]de bzhin no/_/dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na chos dang tshul khrims kyi le'u yang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsgo ba bshad kyis mi lang ngo /_/mang po phal rtag par gzungs su zung 
[\[90b.4\]]la kha ton du lhogs shig_/de'i gzhung bkrol bshad pa de yin no/_/stong phrag brgya yang 'bum gyi khams pad mo'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi khams kyi thams cad kyi sems kyi snod tshul khrims kyi snod grangs med pa'i smon lam gyi snod yon tan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rang 
[\[90b.5\]]bzhin 'dug pa'i snod de sangs rgyas thams cad grangs med/_chos kyi sgo mo yang bshad zin to/_/stong phrag brgya'i khams kyi nang na sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung ste dga' zhing gus par byed do/_/sems kyi gnas rgya cher phye ba'i gzungs ni sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi 
[\[90b.6\]]rgyal ba'i le'u'i nang nas bshad do/_/sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/_sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad pa/_bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thub zhugs/_/bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'da'/_/gzhan la gnod pa de ni byang chub 
[\[90b.7\]]ma yin no/_/gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_mig can mi bde yod las byol te 'gro/_/mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na/_/sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs/_/gsum ste thams cad skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_gnod la mi smra mi sems te/_/so sor thar 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa bzhin du sdom/_/zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya/_/gnas kyang dben par 'jug par bya/_/rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni/_/de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/_/bzhi ste log par dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_ji ltar bung ba me tog gi/_/kha dog bsung la mi 
[\[91a.2\]]gnod par/_/khu ba blangs te 'phur ba bzhin/_/de bzhin byang chub grong du spyod/_/gzhan gyi rnams la mi blta bar/_/gzhan gyis legs pa byas la'o/_/bdag rang nyid la ltos/_legs nyes ci byas pa/_lnga ste gser thub sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_bsam gtan las ni ma 
[\[91a.3\]]byol bar/_/thub pa rnams kyis tshul thub slobs/_/mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur mgon/_/mngon par zhi bas rtag tu dran pa'i yid/_/drug ste bsod skyabs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_thams cad sdig pa mi bya'o/_/dge'o cog ni rdzogs par bya/_/bdag gi sems kyang shin tu gdul/_/de 
[\[91a.4\]]ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/_/bdun te shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/_lus kyis su ni sdom pa dge/_/ngag gi sdom pa yang ni dge/_/yid kyi sdom pa yang ni dge/_/dge'o thams cad sdom pa ni/_/byang chub kun la mgon skyabs byed/_/nyon mongs thams cad kun las 
[\[91a.5\]]skyob/_/byang chub dag bsrung yid kyang sdom/_/lus kyis mi dge mi bya zhing /_/'di gsum las las rnam par skyongs/_/'thob bo drang srong gsungs pa'i lam/_/mi yis brdegs spyos sha mi blan/_/sdig gi mi la sems mi 'khon/_/gshe ba'i mi la'ang rtag tu gtsang /_/
[\[91a.6\]]mi yis ngan byas bdag mi byed/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rabs btsun byas/_/'jig rten ra mda' pha skyabs nus/_/sangs rgyas 'dis tshul khrims bshad pa/_/ngas rgya cher bshad du kun rdzogs/_/sangs rgyas kun dang slob ma rnams/_/chos kyi tshul khrims gus par 
[\[91a.7\]]'dzin/_/gcig la gcig kyang gus par byos/_/chos la drin gzo chog tshang na/_/bya ba med pa'i chos thob nus/_/tshul khrims yi ge bshad zin nas/_/sems gcig brtul te byang chub thob/_/chos kyi rgya mo rdzogs so//_//
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]{D257}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sUr+ya gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA bai bu l+yaM sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[91b.2\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag nas der lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med/_dpag tu med/_
[\[91b.3\]]brjod du med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas der 'dus te lhags pa'i nyan thos chen po grangs med/_dpag tu med/_brjod du med pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis 
[\[91b.4\]]bltas so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dir lhags pa brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /_lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_dri za'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam 
[\[91b.5\]]mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po grangs med/_dpag tu med/_brjod du med pa dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_
[\[91b.6\]]gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gzhan dang /_gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta 
[\[91b.7\]]zhing /_bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs par mthar phyin pa/_nam mkha' ltar snang ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu 'byed pa/_dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba dran pa 'chi ba med pa'i sgo/_tshangs pa'i gnas pa lung bstan pa ston pa na cang mi smra bar 'khod de thams 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam gang bar gyur cing /_da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi char gyi ston pas tshim par ma gyur nas thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kho na la blta zhing 'khod pa ni dper na 
[\[92a.2\]]nad pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /_mun pas khebs pa dag snang ba la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /_chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /_sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag skyabs la lta bar byed pa bzhin te/_de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[92a.3\]]zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_nyan thos dag dang /_dbang po brgya byin dag nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag gi bar dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag nas mi dang 
[\[92a.4\]]mi ma yin pa rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po la lta zhing thal mo rab tu sbyar te cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po pad ma 'bar ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge 
[\[92a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/_chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas par gyur to/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po pad ma 'bar ba'i dpal stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 
[\[92a.6\]]pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis chos bshad par gsol ba btab bo/_/ring du gshegs shing myur ba'i rgyun dang ldan/_/zad pa lhur mdzad 
[\[92a.7\]]mi g.yo 'od gsal ba/_/rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa po/_/khyod gsung rab zhi rgyu skar tshul mkhyen mkhas/_/dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa mkhyen/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag dang ldan/_/srid pa gsum po ji ltar dag 'gyur bar/_/sems can 'gro 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ba spong bar mdzad pa po/_/tshul gcig ldan pa nyid kyi mkhyen mnga' ba/_/lha mi rnam pa mang po khri dag kyang /_/som nyi rgal mdzad dge brnyes chu bo rgal/_/bde 'gro'i mkhyen pa myur dang ldan pa po/_/byang chub spyod dang sangs rgyas chos mngon sum/_/sems g.yo 
[\[92b.2\]]sems can kha cig 'dod klung lhung /_/mun pas khebs shing mig dang mi ldan pa'i/_/sdug bsngal thams cad bcom par gyur lags pa/_/ma thos dge bral slob dpon mkhas ldan pa'i/_/skye bo bral la mi dbang thugs rje skyed/_/mnyam pa'i chos nyan skye ba'i pha rol 
[\[92b.3\]]mchi/_/srid pa gcod pa bshad par mdzad du gsol/_/skye klung pha rol gshegs thub thugs rjes gsungs/_/blo 'chal skye mang sred pa'i dra ba'i lam/_/de dag thams cad nyon mongs rtsa ba can/_/der ni sems can 'khyams 'gyur gcad du gsol/_/gang du sdug 
[\[92b.4\]]bsngal rab zhi dbang drug dang /_/yid kyang zhi 'gyur sred skyon rgyal ba gsung /_/sred pa bral ba sred rgyu mi mnga' ba/_/sems can gdung ba dpal kun bral gyur pa/_/de slad thub pa thugs brtse ba yi rgyus/_/sred pa yi ni chu klung skems mdzad pa/_/myur du bde zhing 'chi 
[\[92b.5\]]ba ma mchis pa'i/_/chos kyang sred pa gcod pa bshad par gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa pad ma 'bar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang dag sngon chad pha rol phyin/_/spyod pa spyad cing spyod 'gyur ba/_/de dag nyan thos chos rnams la/_/
[\[92b.6\]]nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste/_/sangs rgyas chos las nyams 'gyur ba'i/_/ltung ba gnyis pa gzhan med de/_/de ni yang dang yang du yang /_/gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yin/_/khro dang nyan thos chos rnams dang /_/rkyen gyi byang chub 'jug pa yi/_/chos gsum rnam par 
[\[92b.7\]]spangs pas na/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/_/skye gnas bzhi ldan sems can 'di/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags pa dag_/thams cad 'dod pa rten mi byed/_/thams cad mi sdug thob pa yin/_/'di na sems can mkhas pa gang /_/byang chub 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]mchog gi phyir zhugs shing /_/gang blo gzungs dang bzod pa la/_/brtson zhing legs par goms byas la/_/dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing /_/skyil mo krung gis dran gzhag nas/_/rang gi spyod yul sa non pa/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[93a.2\]]nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa'ang yin/_/'dir ni mi sdug tshul bshad na/_/kun gzhi gang yin sems can gyi/_/'ching ba brtan pa 'dir bcad 'gyur/_/ngas ni chos kyi ser sna spangs/_/sems can srung phyir ma bshad de/_/'di la byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/byang 
[\[93a.3\]]chub phyir sems 'dir ma btang /_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/_/chos 'di yun ring gnas bya zhes/_/sa 'di yongs su spyad mdzad cing /_/sa 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin/_/de bzhin du ni khyod kyis kyang /_/zhing 'di la ni rtse bar byos/_/de bzhin bzod pa 
[\[93a.4\]]dag gis rtses/_/bsdams nas yun ring gnas par byos/_/nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de/_/sems can chags las thar bya zhing /_/phung po dag dang khams rnams dang /_/skye mched stong pa ngas bshad de/_/zhi gnas rnam pa bcu gsum dang /_/lhag mthong nga yis 
[\[93a.5\]]bshad bya ste/_/'dod pa'i 'ching bas dam bcings pa'i/_/sems can de yis rnam dag 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la snying brtse bas/_/nyan thos rnams kyi bden pa bzhi/_/chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang /_/zag pa med phyir ngas bshad do/_/nyan thos bden pas 
[\[93a.6\]]'dul ba ni/_/srid pa'i mtsho las ngas bsgral lo/_/byang chub spyod pa thams cad kyang /_/phyi nas khyed la bstan par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[93a.7\]]pa 'di ni nyan thos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad kyi/_theg pa chen po'i gtam ni mi mdzad do snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa yongs su spyad pa'i 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]phyir dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[93b.2\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang /_chos la gnas pa dag dang /_
[\[93b.3\]]yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang /_tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang /_rnam par tho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /_ji nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu yon tan dag gis 
[\[93b.4\]]bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang bsgo ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par bya ba'i phyir bdag cag nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pas/_ma la bdag cag gis 
[\[93b.5\]]da de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bdag cag thams cad kyis sa'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par bya zhing /_rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnal 'byor 
[\[93b.6\]]dag gis gnas pa dag tu bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang /_gang dag sa bcu dag dang /_gang dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar dag dang /_gang dag sangs 
[\[93b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa dag gi bar de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to/_/de bzhin du rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyi bzod pa 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dag la mnyam par gzhag pa dag tu gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu 'thun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag dang /_byang chub 
[\[94a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag las kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/_dper na mar me'i 'od lta bu'o/_/kha cig gi ni skar mda' dang mnyam pa dag go/_/kha cig gi ni brgya byin dang mnyam pa dag go/_/kha cig gi ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 
[\[94a.3\]]dang mnyam pa nas kha cig gi ni zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go/_/kha cig gi ni nyi ma dang mnyam pa dag go/_/kha cig gi ni nyi ma gnyis dang mnyam pa dag go/_/kha cig gi ni nyi ma gsum dang mnyam pa dag go/_/kha cig gi ni nyi ma lnga dang mnyam pa dag go/_/kha cig gi ni 
[\[94a.4\]]nyi ma stong dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go/_/kha cig gi ni lus las ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i 'od dag byung ste/_mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i snang ba chen po rgya che ba de lta bus 'jig rten khyab par gyur to/_/de dag gi lus 
[\[94a.5\]]las mchog tu sems can gzhan dag gi lus dang sems kyi bde ba la reg pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rab tu tshim par byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_lta ba ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_lus kyi gnas ngan len thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed 
[\[94a.6\]]pa/_bkres pa dang skom pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_'dod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_khro ba thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_'ching ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na srid 
[\[94a.7\]]pa gsum gyi btson ra'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams cad kyi bar rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang /_chos la 'bab pa dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi yon tan la dga' ba la mkhas pa dag 'khod 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang /_stong pa ma yin pa dag dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su dag pa ma yin pa dag na kun nas lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger yang dag par 
[\[94b.2\]]snang ba ni 'di lta ste/_mtshan mo mun pa byung ba na zla ba dang /_nyi ma brgya stong shar nas lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ba bzhin te/_de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang /_stong pa ma yin pa dag 
[\[94b.3\]]dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su ma dag pa dag na kun nas mchog tu lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa dang /_gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag 
[\[94b.4\]]dang /_gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i bar de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas chas te/_sems kyi skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs 
[\[94b.5\]]nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin sa steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to/_/de bzhin du rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la nan tan dag tu byed cing ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa de dag dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa de dag gi lus las de 'dra ba kho 
[\[94b.6\]]na'i 'od byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas nyan thos chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig_/byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang /_klu thams cad kyi 
[\[94b.7\]]yul zil gyis mnan nas/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dir chos kyi tshul dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang /_gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs su spyad pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa/_dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par rtse ba dang ldan pa dag gis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na chos kyi tshul yun ring du 
[\[95a.2\]]gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_gsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dad pa rnams phyir zhing 
[\[95a.3\]]'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang /_sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang /_chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang /_sems la dbang dang ldan par gyur pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang /_rnam par tho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang /_nga'i bstan 
[\[95a.4\]]pa rab tu mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sa chen po 'di yongs su spyad par byas pa yin no/_/don de nyid byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis 
[\[95a.5\]]rnam par rtse bar byed do/_/sa phyogs gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'khod cing bsam gtan gyi yul dag gis rnam par rtsen par byed pa de dang der da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang kha cig tu la lar nga 'das nas sems can 'khor ba'i 
[\[95a.6\]]'jigs pas skrag par byed cing mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa dag sku gdung gi mchod rten dag byed du 'jug par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag gam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gam/_chos kyi bzhugs khang dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na der glegs 
[\[95a.7\]]bam du bri ba byas nas nga'i chos kyi sku yang 'chang bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang byed par 'gyur zhing /_der rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang 'bul bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_mu tig 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dbyig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru la sogs pa dang /_dar yug dang /_dril bu dang /_za 'ug dang /_gso ras bzang po dang /_yul ka shi'i ras bzang po dang /_dbu stan nang tshangs 
[\[95b.2\]]can dang /_gding ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_chos gos dang /_mgur gyi rgyan dang /_phyag gi rgyan dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_lus 'dud pa dang /_bla ma dang /_gus pa chen po dang /_gces par 
[\[95b.3\]]byed pa dag tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de dag gi mchod pa ni de nas nga nyid kyis bzhes par mdzad de/_sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi 
[\[95b.4\]]ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs la lar ni gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas khang dang /_'chag sa dang /_dgon pa'i gnas dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dag rab tu shom par byed do/_/yang na nyan thos kyi chos kyi gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang /_
[\[95b.5\]]rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba'am/_byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang dang /_'chag sa dang /_dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[95b.6\]]de dag tu yang bkur stir byas te chos nyan pa dang /_rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i gtam byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba'am/_glegs bam dag klog par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang dang /_'chag sa la sogs pa de dag tu yang yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs 
[\[95b.7\]]su gtong bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_zhing gi gzhi 'am/_khyim gyi gzhi'am/_kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi'am/_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_bong bu dang /_phyugs gzhan dag dang /_snod spyad kyi yo byad rnam 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa sna tshogs dag der yongs su gtong bar 'gyur zhing /_nga'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi gnas pa rnams longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir mal cha dang /_stan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang /_sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 
[\[96a.2\]]kyi don dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir sngo ba dag tu byed do/_/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sems can de dag gi sbyin pa 
[\[96a.3\]]las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad la ci nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad do/_/bzhes par mdzad do/_/sems can log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan 'gro gsum rnam 
[\[96a.4\]]par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag yun ji srid du 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de srid du yang longs spyod gnyis po chos kyi longs spyod dang /_zang zing gi longs spyod dang mi 
[\[96a.5\]]'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/ri dang /_nags khrod dang /_shing ljon pa chen po dang /_dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab gang du yang rung ste/_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thar pa don du gnyer ba chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[96a.6\]]ma sgra bskyungs pa dag dang /_gcom bskyungs pa dag dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshul dang bcas pa dag dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang 'tsham pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gdul 
[\[96a.7\]]ba'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig_/bdud thams cad kyi yul dang /_klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dkon mchog 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sngon yang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa mdzad do/_/da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa/_dpag tu med pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[96b.2\]]bye ma snyed nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu ba dang /_zhal blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_nam mkha'i mig dang ldan pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi byang chub sems 
[\[96b.3\]]dpa'i spyod pa mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang nga la snying nye ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i don dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyis sa steng du 'khod nas/_
[\[96b.4\]]bdud thams cad kyi yul tshar bcad pa'i phyir dang /_'khor bas skrag pa sbyin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed do/_/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[96b.5\]]chos sam/_dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_zhing dang /_bran dang /_bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos pa de la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal 
[\[96b.6\]]pa gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang /_'bras bu gcig dang /_me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na de ni mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang /_phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_de la gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_phyogs thams cad 
[\[96b.7\]]du mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin/_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_rim gro pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/_nad tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]yin/_de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang yod pa yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur ba yin no/_/lnga gang dag gis zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis 
[\[97a.2\]]so/_/de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te/_bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/_lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas sems 
[\[97a.3\]]can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ris su long ba dang rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang /_skom pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 
[\[97a.4\]]'gyur ba yin/_gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas de dag shi 'phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sbrul gdug pa long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_'on 
[\[97a.5\]]kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu mi nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing /_mong rtul ba dang /_tshul du mi shes par 'gyur ba dang /_mig ma tshang ba dang /_lag pa ma tshang ba dang /_rkang pa ma tshang ba dang /_khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha zas la gdu zhing[(]rkyag [,]skyag [)] khung sa'i 
[\[97a.6\]]kha zas za ba dang /_'dam rdzab dang /_phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang /_'brog dang /_dgon pa dang /_lam po che rnams na 'tsho bar 'gyur la/_de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin 
[\[97a.7\]]pa de ltar lci ba 'byung zhe na/_'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang /_zhing dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_phyugs dag gi bar bsngos pa dag phrogs nas gang zag rang gi yongs su longs spyod pas 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/_sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang /_rnam par gzhig pa dang /_rgyun gcad pa dang /_nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin 
[\[97b.2\]]no/_/de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/_chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba 
[\[97b.3\]]yin te/_de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon par 'grub pa yin no/_/de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srung gis mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma thob kyang mi bsngo'i/_rab tu 
[\[97b.4\]]byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ga ya 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gang du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal 
[\[97b.5\]]bar gnas pa ni sla'i/_'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba rnyed de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang /_zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur 
[\[97b.6\]]ba ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas 'on kyang skyes bu blun po de dag gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur ba mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed 
[\[97b.7\]]pa yongs su bsams nas rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang /_zhing dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_bran dang /_bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag gi bar dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]yon tan gyis phyug pa dag longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dang /_dge ba'i phyogs dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsngos pa la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu'am/_khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar 
[\[98a.2\]]spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de/_skyes bu blun po de'i log par bsgrub pa de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[98a.3\]]dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa'i dge slong rab tu byung ba'i mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de lta bu 'byung lags na/_dpe tsam du bgyi na gang 
[\[98a.4\]]yang khyim na gnas par gyur la/_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid na de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po thong khyod kyis smras pa des ci zhig bya/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa de lta bu dag la longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dag gis stsol bar ni bgyid kyi/_'phrog par ni mi bgyid 
[\[98a.6\]]lags so/_/'on kyang slad ma'i dus na rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs ma dad pa 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos 
[\[98a.7\]]pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag gi rgud par 'gyur ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te ngas lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs dag nas/_dmangs 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]rigs dag gi bar dag chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis longs spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni/_de'i tshe de dag kyang nga'i 
[\[98b.2\]]bka' bstan pa'i phrin las kyi skabs thob nas spong ba dag tu byed la yid ches pa dag tu mi byed de/_de dag ni phung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyi ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gnyis su yang 'di 
[\[98b.3\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba legs par bstan 
[\[98b.4\]]pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar dag gi rigs rgyud rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni khyod kyi bka'i phrin las bstan pa thos nas stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu 
[\[98b.5\]]chen pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid pa dang /_yongs su skyong ba dag tu 'gyur zhing /_gang zag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang /_chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la yang mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_srung 
[\[98b.6\]]ba bgyid pa dang /_yongs su skyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das khyim na gnas pa gang gis gang zag chos kyis gnas pa dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar 
[\[98b.7\]]spyod pa phrogs nas bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyod par bgyid pa de'i rgud par 'gyur ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lung bong lta bu'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar dag chos kyis gnas pa/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa 'phrog cing bdag nyid kyis longs spyod par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis log par sgrub pa 'byung ba de bshad na ni de dag kyang nga'i bka' bstan pa'i phrin las kyi skabs thos nas 
[\[99a.2\]]spong ba dag tu byed la yid ches pa dag tu mi byed de/_de dag ni phung bar 'gyur ba'i gnod pa chen po'i gnod pa gnyis ka dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lan gsum du yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bstan 
[\[99a.3\]]du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par lta zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_gsal bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi 
[\[99a.4\]]bar dag gi rigs rgyud rigs btsun pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/de dag gi ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' phrin las bstan pa thos nas stobs dang brtson pa mchog tu chen pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa legs par bstan pa gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing /_gang 
[\[99a.5\]]zag de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang /_chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la yang mchod pa bgyid pa dang /_srung ba bgyid pa dang /_yongs su skyong bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba de dag kyang 
[\[99a.6\]]'phrog par mi bgyid lags so/_/chos kyis gnas pa de dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa 'phrog par mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi spobs pa legs so/_/rgyal po chen po ma 
[\[99a.7\]]'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dag gis chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim gyi gzhi dang /_zhing gi gzhi dang /_kun dga'i ra ba'i gzhi dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_mal cha dang /_
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag de ltar bsngos pa dang /_rkang pa bzhi pa'i bar bsngos pa yang 'phrog par byed pa'am/_rku bar byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de thams cad ni mthong ba'i chos la 'byung ba 'dod pa 
[\[99b.2\]]ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu gang dag ce na/_lha rnams kyis yongs su btang ba yin/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu yang de'i mi snyan pa grags par 'gyur ba yin/_mdza' bshes dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang de yang 
[\[99b.3\]]yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin/_de'i dgra bo dag kyang mang bar 'gyur ba yin/_nor dang nor gyi yo byad dag las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin/_rnam par g.yeng ba yang mang ba yin/_yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba yang yin/_de gnyid med pa yin/_rtag 
[\[99b.4\]]tu sred pas gnod par 'gyur ba yang yin/_de'i bza' ba dang btung ba yang dug gi bya ba byed pa yin/_sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral ba thob pa yin/_rtag tu gzhan dag dang thab mo 'byung ba yin/_pha dang /_ma dang /_spun dang /_chung ma dang bu mo dang bran dang /_
[\[99b.5\]]bran mo dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin mi byed pa yin/_de'i gsang sngags gsang ba dag dang /_nor gsang ba dang /_slas gsang ba dang /_de'i dngos po gsang ba rnams kyang thams cad gsang shor ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba la sogs pa lngas kyang 
[\[99b.6\]]longs spyod dag chud za bar 'gyur ba yin/_nad tshabs chen po dag gis kyang myur du thebs par 'gyur ba yin/_sman dang rim gro pa dang bral zhing sha dang khrag bskams nas sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/_rang gi bshang gci dag gi nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 
[\[99b.7\]]'gyur ba yin te/_rgyal po chen po 'dod pa ma yin pa'i las nyi shu po de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed cing /_bdag nyid kyis kyang 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]yongs su spyod par byed pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de der yang tshe bskal par lcags dang zangs bzhun 'thung bar 'gyur zhing /_lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur la/_me'i gos dang /_
[\[100a.2\]]longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa spyod par byed cing gnod pa mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/tshe bskal pa zad nas kyang de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam dag gi nang du lam du skyes pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang skal pa mnyam 
[\[100a.3\]]par rkang pa dang /_lag pa dang /_mig ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang phyogs bzhi nas langs pa'i rlung kun tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu gdung bar byed cing sa spu gri dang 'dra ba'i steng du dmyal bar byed/_yongs su dmyal bar byed de/_de der lo brgya stong mang por 
[\[100a.4\]]sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong bar byed pa yin no/_/de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lus dpag tshad brgya pa'i sha nar nar por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi rgyus de'i dpag tshad khor yug gi chu zangs bzhun ma ltar 
[\[100a.5\]]dmar po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de der yang lo brgya stong mang por chu'i nang du sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa myong bar byed pa yin no/_/de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'brog dgon pa chen por rdzus te skye ba sha nar nar po chen po ri dang mnyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs 
[\[100a.6\]]bzhi kun tu yang rlung kun tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu sreg par byed do/_/der yang phyogs bzhi nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya dag lhags te yongs su za ba dag tu byed do/_/de brgya la res 'ga' dus ring zhig 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas yang sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi nang du skye 
[\[100a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas yang dang yang du log par sgrub pa chen po de lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/_de brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]ldan pa dag tu mig ma tshang ba dang /_tshul du mi shis par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po gang chos kyis gnas pa dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang /_nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de'i log par sgrub pa de ni de lta bu yin no/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[100b.2\]]gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das skyes bu gang zag de lta bu ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas par mi bsngo lags kyi/_gang gis mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas bsod nams ma lags pa chen po de lta bu kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i mi 
[\[100b.3\]]nyid rnyed pa ni de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs chos kyis gnas pa khyed cag gi lag tu gang zag yongs su gtad kyis srungs shig_/yongs su srungs shig_/rab tu byung ba'am/_
[\[100b.4\]]khyim na gnas pa gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de la khyed kyis ji nas kyang chos dang 'thun pas chad pas gcad par bya'o/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[100b.5\]]ldan 'das gal te gang dag dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag ci nas chos dang 'thun pas chad pas gcod par mi bgyid cing /_de 
[\[100b.6\]]la rgyal po btang snyoms par gnas par bgyid lags na rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[100b.7\]]rgyal ba dag dang bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang /_sems can gcig cig ldan par gyur na/_sems can de nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ches 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin nam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can de ches khyad par du 'phags pa lags te/_de gang la sems can 'tsho ba kun gyi nang na nyan thos 
[\[101a.2\]]dang /_rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches bsod nams dang ldan pa ni skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung bar bas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te sems can snga ma de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[101a.3\]]de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu gyur la/_de la gang sems can 'tsho ba thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par byed cing mig 'byin pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar 
[\[101a.4\]]gyur na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de bsod nams ma yin pa sdig pa'i las ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/_de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[101a.5\]]po lan thob shig lan thob shig_/de nas rgyal po chen po gzugs can snying po shum zhes ngu bzhin du gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa de lta bu gcig gi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing /_mig 'byin pa dang /_
[\[101a.6\]]rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par bgyid pa'i skyes bu de yang bsod nams ma lags pa sdig pa'i las grangs ma mchis/_tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis/_dpe ma mchis pa skyed par 'gyur ba lags na/_gang de lta bu'i 
[\[101a.7\]]bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing /_mig 'byin pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag rnam par gcod pa lta ci smos lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]chen po da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho ba'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/_lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos zad par 'gyur ba'i bar du khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba gang chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis 
[\[101b.2\]]phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_nor gyi yo byad dang /_zhing gi gzhi dang /_khyim gyi gzhi dang /_kun dga'i ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[101b.3\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag yod pa de las 'phrog gam rku ba de la rgyal rigs btang snyoms par byed cing /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khyim na gnas pa rkun ma de dag chad pa ci yod pa bzhin chad pas gcod du mi 'jug na rgyal 
[\[101b.4\]]rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skyed do/_/rgyal rigs ji lta ba bzhin grong gi blar bskos pa dang /_grong khyer gyi bla dang /_grong rdal gyi bla dang /_ljongs kyi blar bskos pa yang de bzhin du btang snyoms par byed cing /_de ltar rku ba'i sems can de dag zlog par 
[\[101b.5\]]mi byed na/_de lta bu'i grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar de bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches mang du skyed do/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po nyid ni shin tu lci ba lags so/_/rgyal rigs ni 
[\[101b.6\]]bag ma mchis pa mang po dang ldan par gnas pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang yang rgyal po bag ma mchis par gnas shing /_gang zag chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu dag srung bar bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod 
[\[101b.7\]]pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog par bgyid pa dang /_grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar yang de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dag rku ba'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog par bgyid na de bsod 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te ngas sngar gsungs pa bzhin bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu gyur la/_thams cad kyang btson rar 
[\[102a.2\]]bcug cing bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gzir bar gyur la/_de la gang sems can thams cad de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa dag btson ra de nas yongs su thar bar byed cing /_lo brgya tshang bar yang sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[102a.3\]]mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag gis rim gro byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci skyes bu de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[102a.4\]]mang lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa skyes bu de ni bsod nams kyi phung po grangs ma mchis/_tshad ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis pa skyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bas kyang gang da ltar nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus 
[\[102a.5\]]lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar la chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog par byed pa'i rgyal rigs sam/_ljongs kyi bla de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal 
[\[102a.6\]]pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te dge slong chos kyis gnas pa gcig cig gi ma bsrungs na de bsod nams ma lags pa de snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags na/_gang yang gcig gis srung bar bgyid pa de bsod nams de snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags 
[\[102a.7\]]sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gang zag gcig gi len pa ngas ma gnang ngo /_/gnyis las ma yin/_gsum gyi ma yin/_bzhi'i ma yin gyi/_rgyal po chen po phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang gcig dang /_dgon pa'i 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]gnas gcig tu ye nyung na yang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa lnga'i len par ngas gnang ste/_gaN+DI brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong blo bur du lhags pa dag dang lhan cig tu longs spyod pa dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_gnas khang dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_bza' ba 
[\[102b.2\]]dang /_btung ba dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo /_/gal te gtsug lag khang gcig dang /_dgon pa'i gnas gcig tu dge slong brgya stong gi bar gnas par byed na/_der yang gaN+DI brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong blo bur 
[\[102b.3\]]du lhags pa dag dang lhan cig tu sman gyi yo byad kyi bar dag la longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo /_/ma chags pa dag dang /_ma bcings pa dag dang /_ma chums pa dag dang /_nam gyi cha stod dang /_nam gyi cha smad dag la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa dag dang /_
[\[102b.4\]]'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dag dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du phyogs pa dag dang /_gzhan la mi smod pa dag dang /_bdag la mi stod pa dag dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa dang /_rab tu dben pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams 
[\[102b.5\]]pa dag dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag gis gnas pa dag longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo /_/rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag gnas te/_rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de 
[\[102b.6\]]lta bu dag la sems can rnams kyis longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa yongs su btang bas bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do/_/rgyal po chen po gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas gang na dge slong lnga'am/_lhag par gnas kyang rung ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa 
[\[102b.7\]]dag dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra mo dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dag gnas par byed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde de dag kyang ston par byed/_kha ton du byed la/_gzhan la mi smod cing bdag 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]la mi bstod pa/_phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par spangs pa/_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba/_thar pa la mngon par brtson pa dag gnas la/_gaN+DI brdungs nas longs spyod par byed na dge slong gi dge 'dun de lta bu las sems can rnams bsod nams 
[\[103a.2\]]tshad med pa de lta bu 'dzin pa dag tu byed do/_/rgyal po chen po ye nyung ste dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga'i tshogs shig yod du zin kyang /_gal te yang tshul khrims yongs su dag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs la 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs 
[\[103a.3\]]par lta zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_'phags pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa yin na/_rgyal po chen po de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang 'dra bar gsungs shing /_de ni mi dpag tu med pa dag la phan pa byed pa dang /_don byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[103a.4\]]sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu rnam par thar bar byed pa yin par gsungs na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun bcu'i tshogs dang zhes bya ba nas brgya stong gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gang la bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[103a.5\]]chen po dad pa can dag rim gro bya ba'i phyir gaN+DI rdung ba dag tu byed cing /_der yang gal te dge sbyong ltar bcos pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong nyung yang rung /_mang yang rung ba dag kyang 'du la/_der gal te dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/_ngo tsha 
[\[103a.6\]]shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dge slong lnga yang 'du na/_rgyal po chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun de ni chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin zhing /_sbyin gnas chen po dang /_lha dang mi thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta 
[\[103a.7\]]bas na dge slong chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dag khyed kyi lag tu ngas yongs su gtad do/_/khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba la las de dag la rkyen gang yang rung ba dag gis gtses sam/_gnod par byas na mi rung gis/_khyed kyis 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]srungs shig/_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci dge slong sdig pa spyod pa tshul khrims 'chal 
[\[103b.2\]]pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du longs spyod par bgyi lags sam/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dam pa dag kyang longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod par bgyi lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gang khyed kyi blon po chen po dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang /_nyung rum dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gzhung lugs las 'gal ba nyes pa dang bcas pa zhig yod na/_gang 
[\[103b.4\]]na rgyal po chen po'i dga' ston nam dus ston nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i 'khor gyi nang der nyes pa dang bcas pa'i skyes bu de 'jug pa dang /_longs spyod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba nyams su myong bar bya ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba mang zhing gnas par nus 
[\[103b.5\]]sam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/_shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong 
[\[103b.6\]]du khas 'che ba/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gnod pa yin te/_de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma yin zhing bdud kyi 
[\[103b.7\]]stobs kyi rigs kyis zin pa yin no/_/gang zag de ni lam nyam nga ba la gnas pa yin te/_de ni phyis kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du bgrang ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du der 'jug par bya ba ma yin te/_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsngos na tha na til gyi 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]phub ma tsam yang longs spyod par 'os pa ma yin na/_dge 'dun gyi nang du nye bar longs spyod par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni chos 'dul ba 'dis bor ba yin no/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[104a.2\]]'das spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan ma gang dag gis dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa/_sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi nang du slan chad gnas pa dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod par bgyid par mi 'os par 'tshal lags/_bcom 
[\[104a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rnam pa 'di lta bus tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gang gis kyang myur du rnam par shes par mi nus te/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni nang gi dang por sangs rgyas la ma gus pa yin no/_/chos dang /_dge 
[\[104a.4\]]'dun dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams la ma gus pa yin/_'phags pa'i rigs btang ba yin/_rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la kun dga' ba ma yin/_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa rnam par spangs pa yin/_khyim na gnas pa dang 
[\[104a.5\]]'dris pa yin/_tshig kyal pa smra ba yin/_bdag la bstod pa yin/_gzhan la smod pa yin/_de lta bu dag la kun dga' ba yin/_sdig pa'i snyi la chags pa yin/_lam ngan par zhugs pa yin/_khengs pa yin/_kha drag pa yin/_'phral g.yar can yin/_'phyar 
[\[104a.6\]]po yin/_kha shing can yin/_g.yo sgyu can yin/_sgyu byed pa yin/_dge sbyong yon po yin/_dge sbyong g.yo can yin/_dge slong snye long lta bu yin/_dge slong gi dge 'dun mi 'thun par 'dod par smra ba yin/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mngon 
[\[104a.7\]]par dga' ba yin/_'du 'dzi'i kun dga' la dga' ba yin te/_sdig pa can gyi dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa de ni ji srid du de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo byung bar ma gyur gyi bar du gang gis kyang mtshan ma de dag gis myur du shes par mi nus so/_/sdig pa can gyi dge slong 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]de gang gi tshe khyim gyi gzhi dang /_zhing gi gzhi dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_bong bu dang /_lug dag gang zag gir srel bar byed na de ni de'i tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo byung ba yin te/_tshul 
[\[104b.2\]]khrims 'chal pa'i mgo des ni sdig pa can gyi dge slong de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang nas dor ba yin/_gnas par bya ba ma yin/_longs spyod par bya ba ma yin/_dge slong gi dngos po las lhung ba yin/_pham par gyur pa yin te/_dge slong gi tshul las kyang phyis 
[\[104b.3\]]bslang du med par 'gyur ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po mi gdol pa gnas na gnas par byed pa ni sla'i/_dge slong gdol pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/_rgyud tshig pa/_don la mi lta pa/_'jig rten pha rol btang ba/_snying rje'i bsam pa med pa/_phyi sa khung 
[\[104b.4\]]chen po dang 'dra ba/_bdud kyi lam du zhugs pa/_lha dang mi rnams la gnod pa byed pa/_dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa rnams la slu bar byed pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung chos kyi mar me med par byed pa/_chos kyi rgya mtsho skems par byed pa/_chos 
[\[104b.5\]]smra ba'i dbyen byed pa/_sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams la 'drid par byed pa/_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la tho 'tsham par byed pa/_dge 'dun 'thun par byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/sdig pa can gyi dge slong de ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i rkyen 
[\[104b.6\]]gyis mtho ris kyi lam las rgyal po ldog par byed pa yin no/_/rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo ldog par byed pa yin no/_/ngan song gi lam gsum la rab tu gzhog 
[\[104b.7\]]par byed pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po sdig pa can gyi dge slong de yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lha dang /_mi ji snyed cig mi skyid par byed par 'gyur ba la ltos/_rgyal po chen po de lta bas na yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong chos kyis 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba gcig dang /_gtsug lag khang gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o/_/gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de kha drag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par spangs te/_dge slong de dag dang
