[\[105a.2\]]lhan cig gnas par byed na/_de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis byams pa dang ldan zhing chos dang 'thun pas dran par bya ste/_gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gnas de nas 'gro ba lta na/_de lta na ni legs/_gal te 'gro bar mi byed na der dge slong chos kyis gnas 
[\[105a.3\]]pa de dag dong la grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong dang /_ljongs dang /_ri 'or de dag na rgyal rigs sam/_bram ze'am/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o/_/gal te rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_
[\[105a.4\]]dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa gnas de nas zlog par byed na der ni dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis gnas par bya'o/_/ji ste rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs de bza' ba dang /_
[\[105a.5\]]btung ba dang /_rnyed pa'i rgyus sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na/_de'i phyir dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis khro ba bstan par mi bya'o/_/chags pa ma yin/_nga rgyal ma yin te/_'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar 
[\[105a.6\]]bya zhing /_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_nags khrod dam/_ri'am/_ri bo'i 'or gzhan gang na sgra gcom chung ba dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham pa'am/_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang 'thun pa der gnas par bya'o/_/yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma phyung 
[\[105a.7\]]nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_rnyed pa'i slad du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing /_dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa rnams kyang gnas nas mchi 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs ni nyams pa lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu nyams pa lags so/_/de'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni rnyed par dka' ba lags te/_'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa de'i mi nyid rnyed 
[\[105b.2\]]pa'i tha ma ni de lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas kyang /_gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi tshig gus par mi nyan pa'i 
[\[105b.3\]]sems can de ni ngan song rnams las yongs su thar par bgyi ba'am/_mtho ris su gzhag par mi spyod de/_de ni sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na la lar gang dge slong chos 
[\[105b.4\]]kyis gnas pa rnams la shin tu dad pa'i rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi don du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang dang /_dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas 
[\[105b.5\]]zhing gi gzhi dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/_'du shes med 
[\[105b.6\]]'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ba nas ring po mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag bla na 
[\[105b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur te/_de dag ni nga'i bstan pa la dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_gang khyod kyi bu'am/_spun nam/_
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bkrabs pa'am/_sna chen po la gtogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig nyes pa dang bcas pa yin na/_gang dang gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam dga' ston byung ba der rgyal po chen pos dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed na/_rgyal po chen 
[\[106a.2\]]po 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de khyod kyi mdun du 'dug cing skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa'am/_dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas par byed nus sam/_rgyal po chen pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags te/_skyes bu des bdag 
[\[106a.3\]]gi mdun na mchis par yang rngo mi thogs lags na skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir bran dang /_bran mo srel bar byed cing khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi 
[\[106a.4\]]gzhi dang /_lug dag gi bar srel bar byed na/_nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la/_de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/_/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gnod par byed pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/de ni chos kyi gnas pa 
[\[106a.5\]]rnams kyi gnas de ltar bsngos pa dag tu chos dang 'thun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no/_/rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa de'i don byed pa dang /_de nas 'gror mi ster 
[\[106a.6\]]ba'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang gnod pa byed pa dang bcas pa chen po yin no/_/sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang 'on kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mnar med pa'i sems can 
[\[106a.7\]]dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na bdag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni lha dang mi thams cad la 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]yang gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang /_log par ltung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs sam/_bram ze'am/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs 
[\[106b.2\]]gang zhig dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi chos kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing /_sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na/_de sbyin pa mi sbyin du zin kyang 'on kyang de ni chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[106b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no/_/de ni dam pa'i chos rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta bar bya'o/_/'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba nas ring po 
[\[106b.4\]]mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na rgyal rigs 'tsham pa khyod kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyis lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas 
[\[106b.5\]]pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis gnas pa dag yang dag par zung shig dang /_de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[106b.6\]]'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhal ta pa zhes bgyi lags na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na zhal ta par gdags pas gdags par mdzad pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[106b.7\]]po dge slong gnyis zhal ta par ngas gnang ngo /_/gnyis gang yin zhe na/_gang yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sgom pa'i dgra bcom pa dang /_gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin te/_rgyal po chen po dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta pa'i las byed par ngas gnang ngo /_/'dus 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las le'u bcu gcig pa ste/_nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i 'dus pa dang po rdzogs so//_//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig tu dge 
[\[107a.2\]]slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kun tu bsrung ba'i gtam yang yang dag par rtsom pa mdzad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gdung ba med pa zhes bya ba yod do/_/de na 
[\[107a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de'i 'khor du byang chub sems 
[\[107a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos gyen du rnam par bltas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i 
[\[107a.5\]]shugs kyi snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su 'dong ba dag mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dong ba nub phyogs su 
[\[107a.6\]]bltas nas kyang /_de nas snang ba chen po mthong nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs 
[\[107a.7\]]ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su mchi ba dag bdag gis mthong lags so/_/nub phyogs su snang ba chen po yang bdag gis mthong lags na 'di la rgyu gang lags/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis byang chub 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_
[\[107b.2\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/_chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyis gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir 
[\[107b.3\]]'dus pa chen po la theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston par mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dang /_stobs dang mi ldan par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[107b.4\]]bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir 'du ba mdzad de/_der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang longs spyad par mdzad nas slar gshegs so/_/
[\[107b.5\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag 
[\[107b.6\]]bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' ma 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pa la ngoms pa med do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba shAkya thub pa bsdu ba'i 
[\[107b.7\]]dngos po bzhi dang /_nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa nyid dang /_bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /_sems can gyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]cad na pha rol tu phyin pa drug la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i phyir mi ldog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i bar 'khod 
[\[108a.2\]]pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir zhugs par gyur cing /_'dir 'khod nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs dang bsam gtan dag gis rnam par spyod par gyur la/_des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po shin tu skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_bcud dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[108a.3\]]yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_gtong ba dang ldan par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin gyur cig snyam dgongs so/_/de lta bas na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 
[\[108a.4\]]der zhugs pa de dag der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de/_sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis lus las ni 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/_dper na 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no/_/kha cig gi lus las ni 'od 'di lta bu'i bar 
[\[108a.5\]]dag byung ste/_dper na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no/_/der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed khyab par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas 
[\[108a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lhags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma phyin pa sha stag de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas te der dong nas kyang skyil mo krung gis 
[\[108a.7\]]'khod cing rang rang gi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do/_/der yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/bsnyen bkur byed do/_'dus pa chen po de la yang lta bar byed do/_/der de dag nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pa dang /_klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /_sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyan par yang byed do/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs pas rigs kyi bu khyod da mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 
[\[108b.2\]]'gro bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na ni sems can rnams shin tu sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan zhing srid pa'i ltung la btags pa dag yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nang na yang bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang /_tshul du mi shis pa dang /_mchog 
[\[108b.3\]]tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa dang /_dri nga ba dang /_mi gtsang ba dang /_gtsang sbrar spyod pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang /_ngo gnyis byed pa dang /_bden pa ma yin pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_tshangs par spyod par nga rgyal byed pa dang /_blun pa dang /_mkhas par nga rgyal 
[\[108b.4\]]can dang /_ser sna can dang /_gtong bar nga rgyal can dang /_ma dad pa dang /_dad par nga rgyal can dang /_g.yo sgyu can dang /_sgyu byed pa dang /_drang po'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /_phrag dog can dang /_phrag dog med pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /_gnod sems dang 
[\[108b.5\]]ldan pa'i sems dang /_byams par nga rgyal can dang /_rnam par dbyen byed pa dang /_'thun par nga rgyal can dang /_log par lta ba pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba'i nga rgyal can yin te/_skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa mngon par shes pas rnam par 
[\[108b.6\]]rtse bdag bsam gtan yongs su sbyong ba byas su zin kyang yud tsam gyis bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba yin no/_/bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang /_ngan song ba dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin 
[\[108b.7\]]no/_/rigs kyi bu khyed de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la nga'i bkas zhu ba'i phyir nga'i bkas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spro na/_der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad do/_/der bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad 
[\[109a.2\]]kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_tshol ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_brnab sems thams cad dang /_rgod 
[\[109a.3\]]pa thams cad dang /_ma rig pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_'jig tshogs la lta ba thams cad dang /_mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba thams cad dang /_the tsom thams cad dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_rtag par 
[\[109a.4\]]lta ba thams cad dang /_chad par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_sems can du lta ba thams cad dang /_sgrib par lta ba thams cad dang /_gso bar lta ba thams cad dang /_gang zag tu lta ba thams cad dang /_byed pa por lta ba thams cad dang /_tshor ba por 
[\[109a.5\]]lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs su lta ba thams cad dang /_sgrar lta ba thams cad dang /_drir lta ba thams cad dang /_ror lta ba thams cad dang /_reg byar lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_rmad du byung ba chen por lta ba thams cad dang /_skye 
[\[109a.6\]]bar lta ba thams cad dang /_gnas par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa 'di dang /_bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gzugs kyi phung po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po thams cad kyi bar 
[\[109a.7\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/_mig gi dbang po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas/_yid kyi dbang po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa phung po dang /_khams dang /_
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]skye mched thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/_spong bar byed pa/_chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa/_byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad ston par byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dang de na sems 
[\[109b.2\]]can rnams 'byung po dmus long 'dra ba dag dang /_mchog tu glen pa dag dang /_'byung po lug dang 'dra ba dag dang /_'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis myos pa dag yod de/_bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni sems can de dag gi lta ba thams cad spong ba dang /_
[\[109b.3\]]longs spyod mi zad pa nyid byed pa yin/_bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi gter brtan pa yin/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/_bdud thams cad kyi yul rnam par 'jig 
[\[109b.4\]]par byed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed pa yin/_klu rnams pham par byed pa yin/_lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/_gnod sbyin rnams snying dga' bar byed pa yin/_
[\[109b.5\]]lha ma yin rnams 'bros par byed pa yin/_nam mkha' lding rnams dngang bar byed pa yin/_mi 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa yin/_lto 'phye chen po rnams skrag par byed pa yin/_phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa yin/_rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dad par 
[\[109b.6\]]byed pa yin/_bram ze rnams 'jug par byed pa yin/_rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/_dmangs rigs rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/_bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa yin/_mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar byed pa yin/_rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams 
[\[109b.7\]]mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin/_thab mo dang /_mu ge dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_dus ma yin pa'i char dang /_shwa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i lhags 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i tsha ba dang /_dngos po kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rtsub po dang /_hrud hrud po dang /_reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar byed pa/_sprug par byed pa/_mdangs sum 'gyur du rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 
[\[110a.2\]]gsal bar byed pa yin/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par byed pa yin/_'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa yin pa nas/_zad pa shes pa'i bar skyed par byed pa yin/_mi skye ba shes pa 
[\[110a.3\]]rtogs par byed pa yin/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin no/_/s+yAd ya the da na/_ba ye ba ya pa ri bA re/_bA he bA ha pa ri bA re/_prI tha be/_prI tha bA pa ri bA re/_A be A ba pa ri bA re/_te dze 
[\[110a.4\]]te dza pa ri bA re/_mA le mA la pa ri bA re/_kha ge kha ga pa ri pA ri/_A lo ke A lo ka pa ri bA re/_s+thA me s+thA ma pa ri bA re/_ri dze ri dza pa ri bA re/_si le si la pa ri bA re/_ga me ga ma pa ri bA re/_A bo pa a bo pa pa ri bA re/_mA la ma la ma/_la ma la ma/_rA la rA la ma/_bI dz+nyA na 
[\[110a.5\]]b+hU ta gra he/_b+hU ta gra hA pa ri bA re/_tsak+Shu gra ha pa ri bA re/_sho tra gra he/_sho tra gra hA pa ri bA re/_g+h+rA Na gra he/_g+h+rA Na gra hA pa ri bA re/_dzi hwA gra he/_dzi hwA gra hA pa ri bA re/_kA ya gra he/_kA ya gra hA pa ri bA re/_man gra he/_man gra hA pa ri bA re/_spar+sha gra he/_spar+sha gra hA pa ri bA re/_be da 
[\[110a.6\]]nA gra he/_be da nA gra hA pa ri bA re/_trISh+NA gra he/_trISh+NA gra hA pa ri bA re/_u pA dA na gra he/_u pA dA na gra hA pa ri bA re/_b+hA ba gra he/_b+hA ba gra hA pa ri bA re/_dzA ti gra he/_dza ra mar Na gra he/_dza ra ma ra Na gra hA pa ri bA re/_duHkha san ta pA na gra he/_duHkha san 
[\[110a.7\]]ta pA na gra hA pa ri bA re/_A ra pA ra dwi dza gra he/_A ra pA ra dwi dza gra hA pa ri bA re/_a brta bi brta s+ya/_a ba ra mu pa ma sa s+ya/_be ga bi ni/_brti A r+ya ra smi saM be ga shAn ti swA hA/_rigs kyi bu nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di la ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa bskur bar mdzad kyis long la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song shig_/nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la gnod pa 
[\[110b.2\]]chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus la/_de la 'di skad du/_shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gdung ba med pa zhes bgyi ba mchis 
[\[110b.3\]]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang bdag de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du btang ba lags na/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[110b.4\]]ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung ngam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/_gnod pa chung ngam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/_ji ltar thos pa bzhin du chos dang ldan pa lags sam/_chos de la nan tan 
[\[110b.5\]]snying por bgyid pa lags sam/_chos kyis gnas pa dang ldan par gnas lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bdud kyi yul dang /_klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_sangs rgyas gcig gi yul lags sam/_'dir khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa ma mchis 
[\[110b.6\]]par bskor bar mdzad lags sam/_gang la la sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma lags pa'i 'khor lo skor ba de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /_sems can 
[\[110b.7\]]rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa gnang ste/_de nas kyang bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]tu zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags kun tu zad par bgyid pa nas/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bar bgyid pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po'i khur 'dor bar bgyid pa 'di bskur lags so zhes gsol 
[\[111a.2\]]cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yon tan dang /_phan yon dang bcas pa bdag gis bzung lags na/_btsun pa 
[\[111a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du mchi ba la 'jigs pa 'ba' zhig mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du bzung lags te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can 
[\[111a.4\]]rnams 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dmus long dang 'dra ba dag lags te/_de na bud med kyang gzugs mi sdug pa dang /_tshul du mi shis pa dang /_mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa nas sems can rnams bsam gtan la rab tu spyod pa bgyis pa/_mngon par 
[\[111a.5\]]shes pas rnam par rtse ba/_skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa chen po dag kyang lhag par bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba lags so/_/bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang /_ngan song ba dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i bar 'byung 
[\[111a.6\]]zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni bdag gi don du smra ba ma yin zhing bdag la 
[\[111a.7\]]phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni sems can thams cad kyi don du smra ba yin zhing khyod ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor na dge bsnyen dri 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba snang ba gang yin pa de yang su yin/_de ni khyod nyid ma yin nam/_de cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog nga yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med pa 'di'i bar du 
[\[111b.2\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir la lar kha cig tu ni tshangs pa'i lus byad du kun tu snang ngo /_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kha cig tu ni dbang phyug gi lus byad du kun tu snang ngo /_/la lar ni dge sbyong gi lus byad dang /_la lar ni brgya byin gyi lus 
[\[111b.3\]]byad dang /_la lar ni lha'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni klu'i dbang po'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni shed las skyes 
[\[111b.4\]]kyi dbang po'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lus byad dang /_la lar ni nyan thos kyi lus byad dang /_la lar ni rgyal rigs kyi lus byad dang /_la lar ni bram ze'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni khyim bdag gi lus byad dang /_la lar ni bud med kyi lus byad dang /_
[\[111b.5\]]la lar ni khye'u'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni bu mo'i lus byad dang /_la lar ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus byad dang /_la lar ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lus byad dang /_la lar ni sems can dmyal ba'i lus byad du kun tu snang ngo /_/de lta mod kyi 'khor 'di na gang dag nga dang thabs 
[\[111b.6\]]cig lhan cig tu snyoms par 'jug par mdzad cing bzhengs par yang mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri yod do/_/'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig blo g.yo ba dag dang /_blo rgyud rnam par mi gnas pa dag kyang yod de/_de bzhin 
[\[111b.7\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_'dus pa chen po de la yang blta ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de las kyang 'dus pa chen po mnyan par mchog tu 'dod par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]dag kyang nga kho na dang thabs cig tu de nyid du 'dong bar 'dod de/_der de dag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rgyus slu bar gyur na mi rung zhing der nga'i skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i byed pa 'gro bar gyur na mi rung bas/_de dag gi don du ngas bshad do/_/yang de 
[\[112a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/skyes bu dam pa khyed la 'di lta ste/_gzungs sngags gang gis srid pa gsum gyi btson rar 
[\[112a.3\]]thams cad du mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes can dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i sgo la reg nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /_mgo mnyam du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[112a.4\]]gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad ma zhes bya ba lus kyi tshor ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_lus kyi 'du shes thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_dul ba'i sa sgrub par byed pa/_rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed pa/_srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su gcod pa sgrub par byed pa/_dkon 
[\[112a.5\]]mchog gsum gyi gdung gi gags ldog pa sgrub par byed pa/_byams pa chen po sgrub par byed pa/_snying rje chen po sgrub par byed pa/_shes rab rnam par grol ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_bdud bzhi dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba sgrub par byed pa/_zad pa 
[\[112a.6\]]shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa sgrub par byed pa/_longs spyod dang /_tshe'i 'du byed thams cad dang /_zhi ba dang /_gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa ngas sbyin par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la nyi ma snang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di sems rtse 
[\[112a.7\]]gcig pas nyan par byed na/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad srab mor byed do/_/'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur la/_der 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ro/_/de rnams kyi nang du lha'i drang srong du 'gyur zhing lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/de de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams kyi nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis rjes su gos par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir mi rnams kyi nang 
[\[112b.2\]]du mi'i drang srong du 'gyur zhing lha dang mi thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/gang la la nyi ma snang ba'i gzungs sngags sems rtse gcig pas lan bdun gyi bar du nyan par byed na de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du lan 
[\[112b.3\]]bdun gyi bar du drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/de 'dir mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[112b.4\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang /_mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la lha rnams kyi nang du yang lha'i 'dus pa rnams la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad ma zhes bya ba 'di lan bdun du rjod par 
[\[112b.5\]]byed la/_de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na lha dang lha mo de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te la la 'dir rgyal po rnams 
[\[112b.6\]]sam/_rgyal rigs rnams sam/_bram ze rnams sam/_rje'u rigs rnams sam/_dmangs rigs rnams kyi rna gung du lan bdun du rjod par byed la/_gal te de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad la 
[\[112b.7\]]mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu bud med gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad ma zhes bya ba 'di nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par rnam par sems par byed dam/_
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]lces kha ton du byed na de'i ris 'thun pa la 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni de'i bud med 'thob pa'i tha ma yin no/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[113a.2\]]de phyis kyang bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bud med 'thob pa rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad ma zhes bya ba 'dis lan bdun du rtsi grang mo 
[\[113a.3\]]las bya bas nas rnga bo che'am/_dung la byugs nas/_rnga bo che de rdung bar byed dam/_dung 'bud par byed na gang dang gang du de dag gi sgra 'gro ba de dang der mi rnams la byad stems thams cad kyi rgyu med par 'gyur ro/_/der sman gyi sbyor ba 'gro ba dang /_pho nya dang /_yig 'bru 
[\[113a.4\]]dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_lus 'gyur ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_lus dang /_snying gi kun tu gdung ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/las sgrub pa med par 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad ma zhes bya ba 
[\[113a.5\]]'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no/_/tad ya thA/_sid d+ha ma te/_bi lo ka ma te/_e le ke te re She/_rU tsi su rU tsi/_bud d+he bi bud d+he/_ma hA bud d+he/_un mad te/_un mad ta/_pra ti She d+ha ne/_ra ga d+hu ra ga d+hu ba pra ti She d+ha ne bin du/_bin du ma te/_tsi Ta tsi Ta pra ti She d+ha ni/_
[\[113a.6\]]arka tsan dra a d+he/_ha ta tsid ti ha ta ni rmi/_ha ta kA ma be ge_/ha ta pau na b+ha bi ra dze/_ha ta tsak+Shu sa ma te/_ha ta bi ta ma bud d+he/_ha ta yA gre/_ha ta bi sa mA gre/_ha ta su mu dra tsa be/_ha ta bi ta mA ra dze/_ha ta ti te/_ha ta d+harma tsa tsa te/_ha ta d+harma rA dze/_ha ta ba hu rA dze/_ha ta pa 
[\[113a.7\]]brdza ma ti/_ha taug+ha rab+mi/_ha ta d+harma sid d+hi/_ha ta sarba u pa d+ha na dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/_bi dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/_ri bi dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nya/_sarba mArga dz+nya dz+nyA/_e Sha an+ta sang sA ra duHkhe swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 'dod pa'i chu bo thams cad kun tu skems par byed pa/_nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol du 'gro ba'i gzungs 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]sngags 'di bzung nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song shig_/khyod kyis 'dod pa'i bdud kyi mchil pa thams cad dang /_pha rol gnon pa dang /_yul la brtson pa'i pha rol gnon pas pha rol gnon pa byed du zin kyang /_sus kyang khyod kyi lus sam sems la 
[\[113b.2\]]'dod pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dag gis gos par byed mi nus na gzungs sngags 'di ji ltar thos pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song nas kyang sbyor ba byos shig_/der gal te bdud bye ba phrag brgya gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /_sman gyi sbyor ba thams cad 
[\[113b.3\]]dang /_chos kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi gzhan dag gis 'dod pa'i dri nga ba dag gis gos par bya ba lta ci smos/_de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[113b.4\]]phrag mang po dang /_lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams ngo mtshar rnyed cing rmad du byung ba rnyed par gyur nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gzigs pa dang /_mnga' brnyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/
[\[113b.5\]]mchog tu ngo mtshar lags te/_'dod pas kun tu gdung ba rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags 'di ni bdag cag gis sngon ma thos lags so/_/de nas 'khor der lha'i bu mo dang /_mi'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bsnyen bkur byas nas gzungs sngags 'di thos 
[\[113b.6\]]par gyur to/_/thos ma thag tu de dag gi mo mtshan nub par gyur cing /_pho mtshan byung bar gyur te/_thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis me tog tsam pa ka'i 
[\[113b.7\]]phreng ba bzhes te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye rigs kyi bu me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba 'di dang /_gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad ma zhes bya ba 'di dang /_bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]de zung shig_/'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar byed pa 'di gnyis dang /_chos kyi sgo mo der khyer la nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus 
[\[114a.2\]]la/_de la 'di skad du khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog zhu bar mdzad lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung ngam/_khyod kyi 'khor gus par nyan lags sam/_chos 'tshal ba lags sam/_chos kyis 
[\[114a.3\]]gnas pa lags sam/_chos la brtson pa lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa de dag dang /_chos kyi sgo la de bzhin gshegs pa des dad pa stsal te/_de nas 'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar bgyid pa/_chos kyi sgo'i 
[\[114a.4\]]gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa nas/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bar bgyid pa/_sdug bsngal 
[\[114a.5\]]gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa bskur lags so zhes gsol cig/_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po gsum pa/_des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 'tshal lags so/_/
[\[114a.6\]]yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khris tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_'dus pa chen po de la yang blta ba'i 
[\[114a.7\]]slad du/_bdag cag kyang mchi bar 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa'i chos kyi sgo bdag cag gis mnyan par bgyid lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]des de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag thams cad lhan cig 'thun par thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i lus byad dang /_rtags dang /_mdog dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam gyis deng shig_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs 
[\[114b.2\]]kyi snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i lus byad dang /_mdog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam du lus dag mngon par sprul nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i 
[\[114b.3\]]mdog gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas de nas chas te yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin to/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[114b.4\]]la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog tsam pa ka'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/_/de dag yul ma ga d+hA'i zhing ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der nye bar dong ngo /_/dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal 
[\[114b.5\]]te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ni de'i bar du yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam kun tu spyod par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe lho phyogs na grong khyer chu dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod pa bye ma dag gis yongs su gang ba de snyed kyi 
[\[114b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma lngas snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[114b.7\]]ston to/_/'khor der yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/_/des steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa lho phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas byang phyogs su 'gro ba dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]de nas gong du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dong ba'i phyogs de la bltas te/_des der snang ba chen po mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po la yongs su zhus so zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des byang 
[\[115a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_grong khyer chu dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod pa bye ma dag gis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa'i sangs 
[\[115a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de na da ltar 'dus pa chen po yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos kyi tshul yun ring du 
[\[115a.4\]]gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyis gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang /_bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir theg pa gsum 
[\[115a.5\]]rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad nas gshegs so zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[115a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas dag bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang steng gi 
[\[115a.7\]]nam mkha' ma 'dres par gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pa la ngoms pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar ji skad sngar gsungs pa bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spro na der nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad do/_/der stong pa nyid dang rjes su 
[\[115b.2\]]'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_nga rgyal 
[\[115b.3\]]dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas zad pa shes pa skyed pa'i bar byed pa/_mi skye ba shes pa rtog par byed pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/_sdug bsngal gyi khur thams 
[\[115b.4\]]cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do/_/tad ya thA/_d+hu ma te/_d+hu ma te/_ak+Shi d+hu ma te/_pra b+hA sa d+hu ma te/_sarbA kA sha d+hu ma te/_a ba bI k+Sha kha ga_/bi mA na kha ga_/a ba mo ha kha ga_/a na n+ya kha ga_/bya ba brid ti kha ga_/a ro tsa na kha ga_/a ni mA kha 
[\[115b.5\]]ga_/lo ka kha ga_/shi khi kha ga_/pi ti mi ra kha ga_/na mo kha ga_/ak+Shi kha ga_/shro tra kha ga_/g+h+rA Na kha ga_/dzi hwA kha ga_/kA ya kha ga_/ma na kha ga_/rU pa kha ga_/shap+ta kha ga_/gan+d+ha kha ga_/ra sa kha ga_/spar+sha kha ga_/d+harma kha ga_/tsak+Shu r+d+hA tu 
[\[115b.6\]]kha ga_/rU pa d+hA tu kha ga_/tsak+Shurbi dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha ga_/yA pad ma na d+hA tu kha ga_/d+harma d+hA tu kha ga_/man bi dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha ga_/prith+wId+hA tu kha ga_/a pa d+hA tu kha ga_/te dzo d+hA tu kha ga_/bA yud+hA tu kha ga_/tsa tu ra a nu smr-it+yu pa s+thA na kha ga_/yA ba da be Ni ka kha ga_/yA bad 
[\[115b.7\]]mArga kha ga_/a b+hik+Shi pa/_a na na na/_ba na na/_sa mu dra na na/_sarba ka ra na na/_sarba saM ska ra bi she Sha na na/_a kin tsa na na na/_k+Sha ta k+Sha ta/_i li mi li/_i i i i li mi le swA hA/_rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags de ni 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]'di yin te/_mthu stobs che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa'i bar yin no/_/long la 
[\[116a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song shig_/nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bya ba nas/_gang la la sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma lags pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos 
[\[116a.3\]]kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /_sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de nas kyang stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che 
[\[116a.4\]]ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[116a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags kyi yon tan gyi phan yon dang /_stong pa nyid kyi phan yon bdag gis bzung lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs 
[\[116a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der mchi ba la bdag 'jigs lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du bzung lags te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can rnams mchog tu 
[\[116a.7\]]'dod chags kyi shas che ba zhes bgyi ba nas/_bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang /_ngan song ba dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa'i bar 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar gyi slad du'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha' la rkyen gsum yod de/_gsum gyis khyab pas rnam par mdzes so/_/gangs ni gdung bar mi byed do/_/chu klung dag la chu skam par mi 'gyur ro/_/rkyen 
[\[116b.2\]]gsum pa dag la mkhas pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_bsdams pas lus khyab pa ni lung gis ma rig pa'i chu bos kyang dbang po drug gdung bar mi byed do/_/byis pas smras pa/_rkyen gsum gyis chu bo dag las thar bar byed cing sems can med pa dang /_phung po'i khur 
[\[116b.3\]]'dor ba'i chos ston par byed do/_/khyod kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rnam pa bcu gsum rab tu bsgoms pa yin zhing 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa yin na/_ci'i phyir khyod 'jigs so zhes smra bar byed/_kha cig tu ni khyod tshangs pa'i lus byad kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[116b.4\]]kyi zhing dag na sems can rnams thar bar byed do/_/kha cig tu ni dbang phyug chen po dang /_kha cig tu ni brgya byin dang /_kha cig tu ni sred med kyi bu dang /_kha cig tu ni lha'i lus byad dang /_kha cig tu ni gnod sbyin dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_kha cig 
[\[116b.5\]]tu ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus byad dang /_kha cig tu ni sman pa'i lus byad dang /_rgyal rigs kyi lus byad dang /_de bzhin du kha cig tu ni bram ze'i lus byad dang /_kha cig tu ni nyan thos kyi lus byad dang zhes bya ba nas/_kha cig tu ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang por blon 
[\[116b.6\]]po'i bar gyi lus byad du kun tu snang bar byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu dus rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin na ci ste sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i don du 'jigs pa'i tshig smra bar byed/_rigs kyi bu khyod la mi zad 
[\[116b.7\]]pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba sems kyi tshor ba sgrub pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'du ba/_bdud bzhi 'dul bar byed pa sgrub pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi gags med par sgrub pa/_klu'i yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i 'od 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]zer sgrub pa/_sems can rnams kyi las thams cad zad par 'gyur ba sgrub pa/_byams pa chen po dang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrub pa/_snying rje chen po dang bsams bzhin du ngan 'gror skye ba dang /_sems can yongs su skyob pa sgrub pa/_
[\[117a.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa sgrub pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lam ngan pa dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang /_'dod pa ngan pa dang /_smon lam ngan pa dang /_theg pa ngan pa phyir ldog par byed pa sgrub pa/_sems can thams cad ngan 
[\[117a.3\]]'gro las nges par rnam par thar bar byed pa sgrub pa/_bud med thams cad yongs su thar bar byed cing sems can skyes bu 'thob pa sgrub pa/_chos kyi phung po thams cad zad mi shes pa sgrub pa/_ser sna thams cad sel bar byed pa sgrub pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang 
[\[117a.4\]]mngon par shes pa thams cad mi zad pa sgrub pa/_sems can thams cad dad par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gzhog par byed pa sgrub pa/_nyan thos dang rkyen gyi theg pa sgyur ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba nas/_bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar sgrub 
[\[117a.5\]]pa 'di ni mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba yin te/_sems can rnams thos pa tsam gyi mod la las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed pa/_'phangs pa/_yongs su ma spyad pa/_ma zad pa/_ma sbyangs pa gang gA'i 
[\[117a.6\]]klung gi bye ma'i tshad snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur te/_'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las rnams dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i las rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu gang 
[\[117a.7\]]la la mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di lan cig tsam sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na de la dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa kun tu skyed par byed do/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]pa/_'phangs pa/_yongs su ma spyad pa/_ma zad pa/_ma sbyangs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu kun tu spyod kyang rung /_gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[117b.2\]]tu phyin pa kun tu rtsom par byed na yang de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rkyen gyi rgyal ba dang /_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i khyim longs spyod zad mi shes par 
[\[117b.3\]]yang 'gyur ro/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid ser sna'i dri ma dang bral bas snod yin zhing /_snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas la brnyas pa med pa'i sems kyis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa byin par byed na/_tha na yan lag gi dam pa mgo yongs su gtong bar byed na yang 
[\[117b.4\]]de la lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sus kyang bar chad bya bar mi nus te/_mtshams med pa dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa ni ma gtogs so/_/gal te yang de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed 
[\[117b.5\]]pa na de 'di lta bu rtsom par byed de/_'phags pa dgyes pa dang /_'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_nges pa la gnas par byed na brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis dad par 
[\[117b.6\]]bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin/_gzhan la mi smod pa yin/_bdag la mi stod pa yin zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag 
[\[117b.7\]]par chags pa med pas nyin mtshan 'das par byed do/_/bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang /_bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/_/gnod pa chung ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba mod cing mang ba dang /_snying rje la gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]dang /_rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ro/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur zhing de dag kyang de la skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/khyod tshul khrims skyon med pa yin gyis nged kyi zhing 
[\[118a.2\]]yongs su dag pa dag tu tshur shog_/der nged kyis khyod sa bcu la rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang /_dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs 
[\[118a.3\]]su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de der yang myur du sa bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de sa bcu la gnas nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/skyes bu de mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di 
[\[118a.4\]]thos pa tsam gyi mod la de gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na de 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don byed pa dang /_don 'thun pas brtson 'grus dang /_stobs dang /_spro ba dang /_blo dang /_pha rol gnon pa dam pa de lta bu dang ldan 
[\[118a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /_mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os 
[\[118a.6\]]su gyur pa yin/_mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin/_dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin/_mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_rab tu srung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[118a.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu de mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na de sems can thams cad dang bral ba dang /_mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa dang /_'phags pas byin 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]gyis brlabs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa de lta bu 'thob par 'gyur te/_des kyang de'i yan lag dang nying lag dag phyung zhing bcad na yang sems kyi skad cig gcig kyang khro ba skyed par mi 'gyur zhing khro ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po thams 
[\[118b.2\]]cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du skyes bu de mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod 
[\[118b.3\]]la gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na myur du 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_gzungs 
[\[118b.4\]]kyi sgo dang /_bzod pa'i sgo de lta bu bye ba phrag brgya stong thob par 'gyur ro/_/dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/de lha'i dbang po thams cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis bsams par 'gyur zhing dad par bya ba'i 'os 
[\[118b.5\]]su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di lan cig tsam sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na de la lhag par yang dga' 
[\[118b.6\]]ba dang /_dad pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa kun tu skyed par byed do/_/de las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sems kyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed pa/_'phangs pa/_so sor ma rten pa/_ma zad pa/_ma 
[\[118b.7\]]sbyangs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur te/_de la 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs par byed pa'i las rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de gang 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]gi tshe 'phags pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 
[\[119a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis de la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po legs par sbyang bar byas pa dang /_shin tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dag de'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[119a.3\]]de chos thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur zhing the tsom med pa dang the tsom las rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam 
[\[119a.4\]]mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /_mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_phyag bya 
[\[119a.5\]]ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_rab tu bsrung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no/_/de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu kun tu goms pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 
[\[119a.6\]]'di skad du skyes bu dam pa nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par tshur shog_/der gnas par byos shig_/der nged kyis rigs pas sa bcu la gzhag par mdzad do zhes kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_'phags pa'i dga' ba dang /_dad 
[\[119a.7\]]pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de der yang sa bcu 'thob cing ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rigs kyi bu mi zad pa'i 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar phan yon che ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad nas smad cing bor ba mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i sems 
[\[119b.2\]]can gang mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di thos nas byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_phra ma mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_tshig kyal pa mi 
[\[119b.3\]]smra ba'i sems dang ldan pas lo bdun du gnas par byed cing rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par byed la/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyi ga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas mngon du sangs 
[\[119b.4\]]rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na lo bdun 'das nas de'i las drag po thams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing sbyangs par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin 
[\[119b.5\]]no/_/'dir dbang phyug la mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhig mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di thos nas zla ba bdun du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum pus mo'i lha nga gnyi ga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad 
[\[119b.6\]]pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na bud med de ris 'thun par dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor bar bud med kyi dngos po 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyod 
[\[119b.7\]]mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba nas rigs mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_nor mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_mngal na bu yod pa'i khur gyis skyo ba'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bu mngon par 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar de khrus byas nas byi 'chor pa srung bar byed cing nyin lan gsum dben par/_mtshan lan gsum dben par pus mo'i lha nga gnyi ga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid 
[\[120a.2\]]la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di dran par byed na bud med de bu ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de'i bud med 'thob pa'i tha ma yin no/_/
[\[120a.3\]]mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba de ltar phan yon che ba ste khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa yin no/_/tad ya thA/_sha ra Na bya ya/_shik+Sha bya ya/_smr-iti bya ya/_bra h+ma Ni bya ya/_r-id+d+hibya ya/_in+d+rI ya bya ya/_ba la bya ya/_bo d+h+yang+ga bya ya/_sa mA d+hi bya ya/_d+hA ra 
[\[120a.4\]]NI bya ya/_k+ShAn ti bya ya/_b+h+ya na bya ya/_a rU pa bya ya/_a ni na dza bya ya/_mArga bya ya/_a bi dz+nyA bya ya/_pra ti sa ma bid bya ya/_b+hU mi bya ya/_bid+yA bya ya/_ma hA mai tri bya ya/_ma hA kA ru NA bya ya/_prI th+wI bya ya/_sa twa bya ya/_d+ha rma bya ya/_ta mo bya ya/_a lo ka bya ya/_
[\[120a.5\]]pra ti b+ha sa bya ya/_pra ti shrud ka bya ya/_ga ga na bya ya/_ma ru ta bya ya/_shU n+ya tA bya ya/_pra Ni hi ta bya ya/_a ni mit+ta bya ya/_ru ta bya ya/_g+ho Sha bya ya/_kin tsa nA bya ya/_a b+hi sa ma ya a nU na/_a pa ha/_tsa tsa tsa tsa/_tsA rA tsa/_tsa ra bi mu/_tsa bi tsak+Sha tsa/_ku tsa tsA 
[\[120a.6\]]ra bi mu/_bya ya bi mu/_k+Sha ya bi mu/_a sa mu dra/_tsa ra bi mu/_ts+tsha da bi mu/_A kA sha bi mu/_byu pa sha ma bi mu/_a nA b+ha sa bi mu/_a ha ta bi mu/_A ra pA ra bi mu/_a ra pa ra bi mu/_u pa sha ma sa li la bi mu swA hA/_rigs kyi bu mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan 
[\[120a.7\]]pa chen po de ni 'di yin te/_yon tan che ba/_don che ba/_phan yon che ba/_sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/_sems can thams cad 'khru bar byed pa/_snang bar byed pa/_nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/long la 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song shig_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing shin tu dga' ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sgrib pa 
[\[120b.2\]]mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dang /_lung bstan pa gang gis sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bgegs bgyid pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po sra ba dag ma lus par bas par 'gyur zhing myur du byang grol gyi bde ba yang rjes 
[\[120b.3\]]su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lung bstan pa chen po de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/'jig rten thams cad sgrol bgyid pa/_/mi zad sbubs 
[\[120b.4\]]bshad ji lta bar/_/sems can dag gi las rnams kun/_/zad bgyid gnyis pa ma mchis so/_/'khor ba rang gis las gang dag_/bgyis pa rnams ni ring du spong /_/sdug bsngal kun las grol 'gyur zhing /_/bsod nams gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/_/
[\[120b.5\]]srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems bgyid cing /_/sdig pa thams cad 'joms par bgyid/_/gang na 'dren pa bzhugs 'gyur ba'i/_/zhing dag tu ni myur 'gro bgyid/_/sdug bsngal snod kyi 'khor ba na/_/nyes dmigs mang po mthong nas kyang /_/nyon mongs thams 
[\[120b.6\]]cad sel bgyid cing /_/byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/sems can gang tshul 'di nyan na/_/thub par dka' bar 'gyur ba lags/_/de bas bkur sti bgyis nas mnyan/_/dpal kun thob par bgyis pa lags/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi zad pa'i 
[\[120b.7\]]sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di bdag gis bzung lags te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag mchi lags so/_/yang de'i tshe 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin dag las langs nas ring po ma lon pa grangs med dpag tu med pa 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]dag gis tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_'dus pa chen po blta ba dang /_nyi 
[\[121a.2\]]ma'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs sngon chad ma thos pa nyan par 'tshal lags na bcom ldan 'das der bdag cag mchi bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag thams cad 
[\[121a.3\]]lhan cig 'thun par brgya byin gyi cha byad dang /_spyod lam dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dag dang /_dbang phyug la dbang bas deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med 
[\[121a.4\]]dpag tu med pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu thams cad 'grogs shing 'thun par brgya byin gyi cha byad dang /_spyod lam dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dag dang /_dbang phyug la dbang bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang 
[\[121a.5\]]rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nas chas so/_/de dag yud tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te/_de dag phyin pa'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de 
[\[121a.6\]]la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir spos kyi char chen po mngon par rab tu phab ste/_'di lta ste/_tsan dan gor shir Sha dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang /_ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang /_a ga ru dang /_rgya spos dang /_dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par 
[\[121a.7\]]rab tu phab bo/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas kyang thams cad brgya byin gyi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]'das ni de'i bar du yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam kun tu spyod par mdzad do/_/yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das 
[\[121b.2\]]pa de na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing snying po'i rgyal mtshan de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya 
[\[121b.3\]]ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/_/'khor de na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te 'dug par 
[\[121b.4\]]gyur to/_/des kyang gyen du rnam par bltas so/_/des steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa nub phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas shar phyogs su 'gro ba dag mthong ngo /_/des gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[121b.5\]]de dag 'dong ba'i shar phyogs la rnam par bltas te/_des der snang ba chen po mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po la yongs su zhus so zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi phyogs cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par 
[\[121b.7\]]gnas pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de'i tshe de na 'dus pa chen po yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]gshegs pa de chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyis gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang /_bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar 
[\[122a.2\]]mdzad pa'i phyir theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs nas rin po che'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad nas kyang de dag gshegs par mdzad do/_/
[\[122a.3\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de/_der so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang /_tshangs pa'i 
[\[122a.4\]]gnas pa dag bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang nam mkha'i lam thams cad ma 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pas ngoms pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar ji ltar sngar gsungs pa 
[\[122a.5\]]bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spro na/_der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi 
[\[122a.6\]]las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad do/_/der smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa mthu stobs che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams 
[\[122a.7\]]cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/_zad pa shes pa skyed pa'i bar byed pa/_mi skye ba shes 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]pa rtogs par byed pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do/_/tad ya thA/_sha na sha ba/_ma sha na sha ba/_a bak+Sha sha ba/_k+Shu k+Shu ta sha ba/_tsak+Shu sha ba/_shro 
[\[122b.2\]]tra sha ba/_g+h+rA Na sha ba/_dzi hwa sha ba/_kA ya sha ba/_ma na sha ba/_k+Shu b+ha bi d+ha/_tsak+Shu pra ti bi sha ba/_shro tra a b+ha k+Sha b+ha/_g+h+rA Na te dza k+Sha b+ha/_dzi hwa bA yu k+Sha b+ha/_kA ya kra ma k+Sha b+ha/_ma na o dza/_A lo ka dz+nyA yak+Sha b+ha/_bI dza sang kra ma k+Sha b+ha/_ang ga ra kha ga 
[\[122b.3\]]k+Sha b+ha/_sa mA ro pa bya yak+Sha b+ha/_sha ma ka na k+Sha b+ha/_k+Sha ya ka ra sa k+Sha b+ha/_shA na ta bya t+ya s+tha k+Shab+ha/_na to tai ta to na/_a tsa nai na na to na/_na g+ha ba na yi na to na/_e sha e bAn to du kha s+ya swA hA/_rigs kyi bu smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags de 
[\[122b.4\]]ni 'di yin te/_mthu stobs che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa'i bar 
[\[122b.5\]]yin no/_/long la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song shig_/nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang /_bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus la/_de la 'di skad du nub 
[\[122b.6\]]phyogs kyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa/_snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[122b.7\]]zhing snying po'i rgyal mtshan de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang bdag de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du btang ba lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung ngam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 
[\[123a.2\]]'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/_ji ltar thos pa bzhin du chos dang ldan pa lags sam/_chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa lags sam/_chos kyis gnas pa dang ldan par gnas lags sam/_
[\[123a.3\]]khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bdud kyi yul dang /_klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_sangs rgyas gcig gi yul lags sam/_'dir khyod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa ma mchis par skor bar mdzad lags sam/_gang la la sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma 
[\[123a.4\]]lags pa'i 'khor lo skor ba de'i slad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang /_sems 
[\[123a.5\]]can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad par stsol bar mdzad cing /_de nas kyang smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/_gzugs 
[\[123a.6\]]kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di des bskur lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gsol cig ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal 
[\[123a.7\]]des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags kyi phan yon bdag gis bzung lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der mchi ba la 'jigs pa 'ba' zhig mchis lags so/_/
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du yongs su bzung lags te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can rnams mchog tu lta ba mi zad pas sdug bsngal thob par gyur pa mchog tu 'dod chags kyi shas che 
[\[123b.2\]]ba/_dmus long dang 'dra ba dag lags te zhes bya ba nas/_bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang /_yud tsam kho nas mnar med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[123b.3\]]gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu lan thob shig lan thob shig_/'o na khyod kyis zhag dgu la gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[123b.4\]]mi mjed der bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi cha byad kyis rgya mtsho chen por klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jigs par kun tu bstan pa'i rkyen gyis skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la rnam par ma bkod dam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed du ma bcug 
[\[123b.5\]]gam/_des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/ji skad gsungs pa de lta lags te/_bdag gis klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'jigs par kun tu bstan pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod lags so/_/
[\[123b.6\]]rigs kyi bu 'o na khyod kyis gling bzhi pa bar ma de na gang na char pa med pa der gang bstan pa las de na gnas pa'i klu thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur zhing /_de dag 'khrugs nas kyang zhag bdun du char pa mngon par rab tu 'bebs par byed pa'i glang po che'i klu chen po dag dang /_
[\[123b.7\]]rta'i klu chen po dang /_sbrul gyi klu chen po dag ma bstan tam/_des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/_sngon gyi smon lam gyi bye brag gis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_ngas khyod der mngags na de ji ltar 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]khyod dngang bar byed/_byang chub sems dpa' des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_rin po che'i gter chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/_de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la der mchis nas sen mo dag gis 
[\[124a.2\]]rko bar bgyid na de ji lta ji ltar sen mo dag gis rko bar bgyid pa de lta de ltar rin po che'i phung po chen po ches mang du rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin du mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter yang tshig de lta bu dag gis ji lta ji ltar phyung ba de 
[\[124a.3\]]lta de ltar de nas chos rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa ches phal cher 'thob par 'gyur lags pas der sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi phyag rgya gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs skyed pas/_der bdag gis sems can ches mang po yongs 
[\[124a.4\]]su smin par bgyid pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ches mang du de bzhin gshegs pa las bdag yongs su tshol bar bgyid lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal 
[\[124a.5\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas lung bstan pa chen po rig sngags kyi rten ces bya ba khyod la sbyin par mdzad do//_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po bzhi pa/_tad ya thA/_
[\[124a.6\]]sa tri ra Na sha ma/_sa mu da thA na sha ma/_a brdza na sha ma/_swa ra~M ga sha sa ma/_sa~M yo ga sha ma/_ban d+ha na sha ma/_sa ma bi sa ra sha ma/_bA tI na sha ma/_sa mA kra ma sha ma/_a bid+yA sha ma/_sa~M skA ra sha ma/_bi dz+nyA na sha ma/_nA ma rU pa sha ma/_Sha DA ya ta na sha ma/_
[\[124a.7\]]spar+sha sha ma/_be da na sha ma/_tr-iSh+Nasha ma/_u pA da na sha ma/_b+ha ba sha ma/_dzAti sha ma/_dza rA ma ra Na sha ma/_yA bad sarba ma nu Sh+ya sha ma/_yA bad sarba trai d+hA tu kasa~M skr-ita sha ma/_A ra pA ra sha ma/_'di ni rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po yin te/_lung 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bstan pa des na der sems can rnams kyis thos pa tsam gyis sred pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_rab dang /_srid pa'i rgyu nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid pa'i rgyu byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 
[\[124b.2\]]'gyur ba yin no/_/nyon mongs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba lnga lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa sngon chad byas pa 'bras bu mthar ma phyin pa dang ma sbyangs pa thams cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 
[\[124b.3\]]kyi rten lung ston pa 'di gang gis ris 'thun par sems rtse gcig pas mnyan nas nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par chos 'di rnam par sgom par byed na dge ba'i phyogs thams cad las yongs su nyams par byed pa dang /_bgegs byed pa dang /_nor yongs su 
[\[124b.4\]]nyams par byed pa dang /_sdug pa'i dngos po dang bral bar byed pa dang /_lus la kun tu gnod par byed pa dang /_sems kun tu 'khrug par byed pa dang /_dge ba thams cad la mngon par mi dga' bar byed pa dang /_mi dge ba thams cad la mngon par dga' bar 
[\[124b.5\]]byed pa'i sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad ma lus par 'bras bu mi sgrub par zad par 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba ni ma gtogs so/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta 
[\[124b.6\]]bu kun tu spyod par byed de/_gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu rtsom par byed na de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rkyen gyi rgyal ba dang /_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 
[\[124b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de'i khyim longs spyod zad mi shes par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas sngar gsungs pa bzhin tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na lha dang /_lha ma yin du bcas 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang zhes bya ba nas/_mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin/_dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su 
[\[125a.2\]]gyur pa dang /_mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_rab tu bsrung ba'i bar gyi 'os su gyur pa yin no/_/de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[125a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 'di skad du/_skyes bu dam pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/tshur nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gnas par byos shig_/der nged kyis khyod sa bcu dag la gzhag par mdzad do zhes kyang 
[\[125a.4\]]gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_'phags pa'i dga' ba dang /_dad pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_de der yang sa bcu thob par byed cing ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[125a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can rnams ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[125a.6\]]cad las yongs su nyams pa dag yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas bor ba dag yin zhing mtshams med pa byed pa dag dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dag dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag 
[\[125a.7\]]dang /_ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba dag yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag thams cad kyis ngan song gsum du yun ring por sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu drag po rab tu rtsub po nyams su myong ngo /_/de dag ngan song gsum las yongs su thar ba dang /_yongs su dag pas 
[\[125b\]]
