[\[125b.1\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyus de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mi nyid rnyed pa thob bo/_/gang de dag gi sngon gyi dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar dang /_
[\[125b.2\]]sbyin pa dang ldan pa la goms pa nas shes rab dang ldan pa la goms pa'i bar dang /_smon lam la goms pa dang /_'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba la goms pa dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba la goms pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa sgom pa la goms pa sngon chad byas 
[\[125b.3\]]par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba la goms pas ma lus par brjed do/_/ma lus par brjed nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes te/_da dung yang nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyus de dag gzugs mi sdug pa dag dang /_
[\[125b.4\]]tshul du mi shis pa dag dang /_yan lag dang bral ba dag dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_rgyan dang bral ba dag tu gyur to/_/de dag der yang tshe thung ba dag dang /_yid gzhungs pa chung ba dag dang /_blo chung ba dag 
[\[125b.5\]]dang /_longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dag dang /_bsod nams chung ba dag dang /_grub pa chung ba dag dang /_bya ba chung ba dag dang /_bya ba ngan pa la zhugs pa dag dang /_lta ba ngan pas zin pa dag dang /_bstan bcos 
[\[125b.6\]]ngan pa la dad pa dag dang /_smon lam ngan pa dang ldan pa dag dang /_nad mang ba dag yin/_rnam par g.yeng ba mang ba dag yin/_'jug pa la sbyor ba mang ba dag dang /_nyes par spyod pa gsum mang ba dag dang /_ltad mo dag dang /_ltas ngan pa dag dang /_
[\[125b.7\]]gzu lums can dag dang /_rtsub pa dag dang /_zhe sdang dang ldan pa dag dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag dang /_dkon mchog gsum 'gog par byed pa dag yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can ni phal cher ngan song gsum du 'gro ba dag 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag der rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di de dag gis thos pa tsam gyi mod la de dag nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba dag gi kun tu sbyor bas ngan song gi lam dag las sgrol bar byed do/_/de dag sngon 
[\[126a.2\]]byas pa'i dad pa'i dbang po la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba nas/_shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar la goms pas dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang /_smon lam dang /_'khor ba'i skyon dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa goms pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/
[\[126a.3\]]thos pa tsam gyis de dag gi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nad med pa 'phel ba dang /_longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa 'phel ba dang /_dge ba'i bya ba 'phel ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa 'phel ba dang /_shes rab 'phel ba dang /_byams pa 'phel 
[\[126a.4\]]ba nas/_btang snyoms kyi bar 'phel ba dang /_legs par byas pa'i las 'phel ba mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/thos pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag rig sngags kyi rten lung bstan pa chen po 'di bkur stir byas 
[\[126a.5\]]te nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par sems rtse gcig pas chos 'di dag rnam par sgom par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dag dang /_legs par spyod pa gsum dang ldan pa dag dang /_dkon mchog gsum 
[\[126a.6\]]la skyabs dang /_smon lam gyi shugs la mngon par dga' ba dag dang /_chos kyis gnas pa dag dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gsal bar byed pa dag tu 'gyur te/_sems can gang dag der sngon gyi skye gnas myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa byed pa nas 
[\[126a.7\]]ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i bar dag ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir skyes shing skye bar 'gyur ba dag yin te/_gang dag gi sdig pa'i las rab tu chen po'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par sngon chad yongs su ma spyad pa'i sems can 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]de dag gis rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di thos na yang yon tan de lta bu de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa tsam gyis mod la yang de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa dpag tu med pa ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag gis kyang der 
[\[126b.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag bri bar bya'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bdun yang bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi kun dga'i ra ba 
[\[126b.3\]]yang bya'o/_/der sbyin bdag kyang rab tu gzhag par bya'o/_/dus dus su gso sbyong gi sdom pa la yang mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/chos mnyan par bya'o/_/der sems can gang dag dkon mchog gsum la dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po de lta bu 
[\[126b.4\]]'thob pa'i gnas de yod de/_de dag gis gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal drag po rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de yang ris 'thun pa 'di nyid la mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig la 
[\[126b.5\]]ni yun ring du nad 'byung ste/_des de'i sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las 'phangs pa dag kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gi ni yan lag bcad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gi ni nor zad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gi ni 'khor 
[\[126b.6\]]zhig pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gi ni longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gi ni 'khor dang /_bran dang /_lus la gnod pa byed pa dang /_btson rar gzhag pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig 
[\[126b.7\]]gi ni mi snyan pa dang /_nyes par smras pa'i tshig thos pas yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_ris 'thun pa la de dag gis mi dge ba'i las sngon byas pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi gzhi lung ston pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]no/_/tad ya thA/_kha ga pa ri ts+tshe da/_gar+b+ha k+Sha se/_gar+b+ha re bid+yA/_pra b+ha ga k+She/_k+Sha ba yo ge/_pra ti hA re/_sha ma na si ka the/_sa ma me g+ha dzuSh+Te/_ak+Sha ya ta te/_k+Sha b+ha ba dze/_ni na da na dz+hu She/_sa mA gra dz+hu She/_ad+h+ya sha ya dz+hu She/_bi pra b+ha dz+hu 
[\[127a.2\]]She/_shai k+Sha dz+hu She/_sat+ya dza ba dz+hu She/_sai n+ya dza ba dz+hu She/_sa li la gu h+ya dz+hu She/_sa la gu h+ya byA k+She/_pa Na g+ho She/_sa dA na ko ne/_sarba d+ha nan th+ye/_bI ta pra pr-ita te/_u pa kra ma Na the/_a na ts+tsha d+ya pra khe/_pra ti kra ma na_/sa kha th+ye she_/sa lo tsa na ba me/_kro d+ha d+ha re kA sha 
[\[127a.3\]]sa she_/A kA sha kha ge_/na ya kuny+dze/_bi d+yA ba ne/_klA na ba ne/_u pa ba ne/_sa me ma kA re/_shA ra ya ba ne/_me g+ha dz+hu She/_ha ri ko na/_ba na ya na mu khe/_sa ra k+Sha ko le/_na rA ya na dz+hu She/_in dra bas ne/_o a/_a ba A/_a ra ba ha/_dza rA/_a ba 
[\[127a.4\]]rA ba/_sa me g+ha duHkhe na sti ra Ni nirbA he swA hA/_rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni yon tan che ba/_phan yon che ba/_sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa dang /_khrus byed pa/_snang bar byed pa/_dran par byed pa/_nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin te/_
[\[127a.5\]]de la gang dag sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed cing ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_rkyen gyi rgyal ba 
[\[127a.6\]]thams cad dang /_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad ni lha'i dbang po nas/_mi'i dbang po'i bar gyis bsams pa dang /_dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_mchod pa'i 'os 
[\[127a.7\]]su gyur pa yin no/_/shin tu bsrung bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no/_/sems can de dag ni phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la phyogs bcu kun nas mdun na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing 'di skad du/_kye yon tan gyis phyug pa dag tshur shog_/nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gnas par gyis shig_/deng nged kyis khyod sa bcu dag la gzhag par bya'o zhes kyang gsung bar mdzad do/_/de sangs rgyas 
[\[127b.2\]]mthong ba'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dad pa 'phags pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing de der yang sa bcu dag thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[127b.3\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_rig sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba dang /_rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar don che ba dang /_phan yon che ba yin gyis long la mi 
[\[127b.4\]]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song shig_/nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhus shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal 
[\[127b.5\]]lags so/_/yang de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas kyang tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag 
[\[127b.6\]]bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_'dus pa chen po de yang blta ba dang /_nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las bas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags thos par 'tshal te/_bdag 
[\[127b.7\]]cag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring po ma lags/_snga ma yang kun phyin lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag cag kyang mchi bar gnang bar mdzad par gsol/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]brtsegs rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang /_rtags dang /_gzugs dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam dang /_cha byad kyis khyed deng shig_/btsun 
[\[128a.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so zhes kyang gsol te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang /_rtags dang /_gzugs 
[\[128a.3\]]dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam dang /_cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas de nas chas te yud tsam 
[\[128a.4\]]gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab 
[\[128a.5\]]bo/_/de dag gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di ga la ba dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i zhing ga la ba de logs su dong ste/_dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ni da dung yang rgyal po 
[\[128a.6\]]gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do/_/yang de'i tshe byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_sangs rgyas 
[\[128a.7\]]kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]snying po zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la bltas so/_/des kyang der nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag 
[\[128b.2\]]tu med pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas lho phyogs su 'dong ba dag mthong bar gyur to/_/des lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas des de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces 
[\[128b.3\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring por ma lags te/_bdag gis ni steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis/_dpag tu ma mchis pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs 
[\[128b.4\]]cha nas lho phyogs su mchi ba dag mthong lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di la rgyu ni gang lags snyam lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi 
[\[128b.5\]]snying po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs kyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 
[\[128b.6\]]ces bya ba yod do/_/'di ltar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la 'dus pa chen po la chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya 
[\[128b.7\]]ba'i phyir dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir da ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]gzhig pa dang /_dri ma med par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang /_chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur to/_/der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[129a.2\]]kyis rin po che'i tog gi gzungs sngags gsungs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyad nas gshegs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang 
[\[129a.3\]]dag par sgrub par mdzad de/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa mig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan kyang de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang nam mkha' gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba'i chos 
[\[129a.4\]]bstan pas tshim par ma gyur to/_/mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa de yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /_nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par byed pa'i gzungs sngags 
[\[129a.5\]]bshad par bzhed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de 'di snyam du dgongs te/_phyogs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bskal pa brgyas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba nas gang dag srid pa tha ma pa sangs 
[\[129a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag 'di'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'jug par gyur cig_/'dir 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis gnas par gyur cig_/
[\[129a.7\]]'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag par mthu dang ldan pa dang /_bcud dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig_/'di ltar 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin du thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]dang /_gtong ba dang ldan pa dag dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i nang du 
[\[129b.2\]]chud par gyur cig_/de nyid du 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la stobs ji lta ba dang /_ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du 'khod nas bsam gtan byed par gyur cig snyam dgongs so/_/bsam gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu/_dper 
[\[129b.3\]]na 'bru mar gyi mar me lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba nas kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu/_dper na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro/_/de na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pas sangs rgyas 
[\[129b.4\]]kyi zhing mi mjed de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/da ltar gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snyoms par zhugs par gyur la/_sngon chad der phyin pa ni ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de ltar ting nge 'dzin 
[\[129b.5\]]las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas so/_/der phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags chen po de yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/skyil mo krung du 'dug 
[\[129b.6\]]nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtse bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der 'gro bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 
[\[129b.7\]]mjed de na yang sems can dag mchog tu tshe thung ba dag yin/_nad mang ba dag yin/_blo chung ba dag yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba dag yin/_bsod nams chung ba dag yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bya ba tshol ba chung ba dag yin/_'jig rten pha rol la 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]'jigs par mi lta ba dag yin/_longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag yin/_'dod pa la chums pa dag yin/_mi dge ba spyod pa dag yin/_phrag dog dang ldan pa dag yin/_ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dag spangs pa yin te/_de dag 
[\[130a.2\]]phal cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems can yod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/_sdig pa byed 
[\[130a.3\]]pa'i lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/_lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar de dag kyang der sa'i bcud kyi mdangs phrogs nas yongs su spyod par byed do/_/'bru dang /_sman dang /_me tog dang /_'bras 
[\[130a.4\]]bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_ro rnams kyi mdangs phrogs nas kyang yongs su spyod par byed do/_/des na stobs dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/der de dag mngal na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs dag 'phrog par byed do/_/mi rnams skyes pa tsam gyi mod dag la myur du 
[\[130a.5\]]mdangs 'phrog par byed do/_/'o ma'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do/_/bza' ba dang btung ba'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do/_/der de dag gis mi mngal du zhugs pa'i mdangs phrogs shing skyes pa tsam gyis mod la mdangs phrogs pas de dag kyang mdangs 
[\[130a.6\]]la mi reg cing bza' ba dang btung ba nyams pa yongs su spyad zin pa la yongs su spyod par byed de/_rgyu des de na mi rnams mchog tu na ba dag dang /_tshe thung ba dag dang /_dran pa nyams pa dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang /_bsod 
[\[130a.7\]]nams dang bral ba dag dang /_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag dang /_longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba dag dang /_'dod pa la chums pa dag dang /_kun spyod pa mi gtsang ba dag yin zhes bya ba nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no zhes bya ba'i bar yin no/_/rigs kyi bu sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta bur gyur te/_'di ltar nga bya ba la brtson pa dang /_spro ba dang /_brtul ba brten par gyur to/_/sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[130b.2\]]sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs par ngas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/ngas thabs gang gis bud med sbrum pa bsrung bar nus pa yang yongs su zhus so/_/nga'i brtson 'grus gang gis ma bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_mngal na yod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba 
[\[130b.3\]]yongs su zhus so/_/lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_grul bum mam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha za'am/_srul po'am/_lus 
[\[130b.4\]]srul po'am/_mdangs 'phrog pa'am/_brjed byed dam/_rims nyin gcig pa'am/_nyin gnyis pa'am/_nyin gsum pa'am/_nyin bzhi pa'am/_ro langs gang yang dug gam/_sngags kyi sbyor ba'am/_sman gyi sbyor bas lus dang /_sems la gnod 
[\[130b.5\]]pa bya bar mi nus pa yongs su zhus so/_/gang gis kyang ma'am/_mngal na yod pa dang /_skyes ma thag pa dang /_'o ma 'thung ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba yongs su spyod pa la gnod par bya bar mi nus par yongs su zhus so/_/gang gis kyang mdangs 
[\[130b.6\]]'phrog pa'am/_lus dkrug pa'am/_khams dkrug pa'am/_sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus par yongs su zhus so/_/gang gi phyir sems can de dag tha mal par mngal na gnas par yongs su zhus so/_/lus dang sems la rnam par tho ma btsams pas bde 
[\[130b.7\]]bar ma'i mngal nas gnod pa med par 'byung ba yongs su zhus so/_/bde bar 'o ma 'thung ba yongs su zhus so/_/bde bar bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su spyad pa yongs su zhus so/_/gnod pa chung ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas dge ba 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i bar dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs su zhus so/_/ngas gsang sngags gang dag 
[\[131a.2\]]dang /_sman gang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag yongs su smin par mdzad par spyod pa'i gsang sngags de dag ni gang yin/_sman de dag ni gang yin zhe na/_gzungs sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par mdzad pa 
[\[131a.3\]]dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs sngags lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang nga la bstan par gyur to/_/rtag tu brtson 'grus dang /_brtul ba brtan 
[\[131a.4\]]pa ngas rtag par rgyun du tshe rabs de dang de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gzungs sngags gsang sngags kyi gzhi rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas so/_/bud med de mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te skyabs gsum la rnam par gzhag go/_/
[\[131a.5\]]phyin chad kyang lha'am zhes bya ba nas/_bdud dam/_brjed byed dam/_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ma'i mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te rnam par tho btsams pa'am/_rnam par gtse ba'am/_lus dkrug pa'am/_khams dkrug pa'am/_sems 
[\[131a.6\]]dkrug par bya bar mi nus so/_/lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar gyis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa'am/_sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya bar mi nus so/_/de dag gis mngal na bu yod pa'i ma rnam par tho ma btsams pa dang /_mngal na bu gnas pa yang sngon 
[\[131a.7\]]gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyi dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dag dang /_shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde legs su ma'i lto nas byung 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]zhing brjed ngas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to/_/de dag skyes pa tsam gyi mod la yang lha stobs dang ldan pa dbang che bar grags pa re re la yang 'khor brgya stong yod pa dag bsrung ba dang /_rjes su sba bar byed par kun tu gnas so/_/de dag mi dang mi 
[\[131b.2\]]ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gis kyang rnam par tho btsam pa'am/_rnam par gtse ba'am/_lus dkrug pa'am/_khams dkrug pa'am/_sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so/_/mdangs blang bar yang mi nus so/_/gsang sngags dang /_sman gyis kyang 
[\[131b.3\]]rnam par tho btsam par mi nus so/_/gang gi phyir sems can de dag mchog tu gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_tshe rabs dran pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang /_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang /_gtong ba 
[\[131b.4\]]dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang /_bzod pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_dben pa la dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba dag dang /_
[\[131b.5\]]de thob par byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to/_/sems can nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gro bya 
[\[131b.6\]]bar brtson pa dag yin te/_mi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la skyon du blta ba dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur te/_/de dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag ris 'thun pa de nyid kyis myur du byang chub 
[\[131b.7\]]kyi sems ma brjed par byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/ci ste rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyed na de dag myur du skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/ci ste sems can de dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]la sems skyed par byed na sems can de dag ris 'thun pa nyid kyis bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par byed do/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum dang bral ba dang mtho ris su 'gro ba dag tu gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas thabs 
[\[132a.2\]]la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can dag yongs su smin par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no/_/rigs 
[\[132a.3\]]kyi bu ngas sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis sman sing ha k+Shir la brams nas nad pa la byin nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/gang na sman sing ha k+Shir med par yang ngas de'i mdun du bza' ba dang /_
[\[132a.4\]]btung ba gang yin pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pas brams nas nad pa la byin nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/gal te de yang med par gyur na ngas sman bkrus te bor ba la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag gis brams nas 
[\[132a.5\]]nad pa la byin nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so/_/gang na shing ljon pa dag 
[\[132a.6\]]me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gis char pa'i chu la brams nas shing dag la btab na shing de dag lo mang por chu med kyang me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyur to/_/de bzhin du bu ram shing 
[\[132a.7\]]dang /_rgun 'bru dag dang /_'bru dang /_sman dag gi bar dag la yang byas so/_/gang na char mi 'bab cing chu med pa der yang ngas ru sbal gyi snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis brams nas shing tsam pa ka'i 'dab mas dkris te/_klu mtsho'i 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'gram du bzhag na char chen po dang /_chu chen po'i tshogs byung bar gyur to/_/der chu chen po byung bas sems can rnams kyi khyim dang /_zhing dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i bar chud za bar gyur na der yang ngas sbrul gyi rgyal po'i nor bu la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i 
[\[132b.2\]]gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis brams nas klu'i gnas su bzhag na char chu rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/gang na dus ma yin par rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /_mun pa dang /_rdul gyi char pa dang /_grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_dus phyin ci log tu 'byung 
[\[132b.3\]]ba'i bar dang /_dmag tshogs dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_dus tshigs dang /_lo rnams yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i bar la ngas snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ched du zhag bdun pa gcig 
[\[132b.4\]]gi nyin mtshan du khrus byas nas 'o ma dang 'bras chan gyi kha zas za zhing tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa 'di las gzhan mi byed par brjod de/_nyin bdun pa la gal te yul yongs su ma bskyangs na der nga'i 
[\[132b.5\]]mdun du rang gi dam bcas pas mi gnas pa yin no/_/der yang ngas rtsi lcam pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis brams shing skyugs sman ma da na'i 'bras bu dag dang bsres te/_lha rten sar bzhag pas des dus ma yin pa'i 
[\[132b.6\]]rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sprin dang /_mun pa dang /_rdul gyi char pa dag dang /_grang ba dang /_dro ba thams cad zhi bar gyur to/_/yang dag pa'i dus tshigs dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_lo 
[\[132b.7\]]yang dag par byung bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu des na gang na sems can dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_so sor ldan pa dag dang /_lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag la ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di'i chos bstan 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]to/_/gang dang gang du sems can rnams kyis thos pa de dang der yang nyon mongs pa chung ngu dag tu gyur to/_/dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_lta ba ngan pa thams cad spangs te/_de phyin chad dge ba'i las dang yang dag par ldan pa legs par 
[\[133a.2\]]byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_smon lam dag mang ba nges pa'i phung po dag tu gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_
[\[133a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar sems can rnams la gces spras byed pa yin no/_/de ltar phan yon mang ba yin te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[133a.4\]]la phan par byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_bud med sbrum ma thams cad srung bar byed pa/_rab tu thar bar byed pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_phung po dang /_khams thams cad yongs su shes par byed pa/_chos thams cad 
[\[133a.5\]]rnam par 'byed par byed pa/_thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/_byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su rtogs par byed pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu dad par byed pa/_chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par byed pa/_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba 
[\[133a.6\]]thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par byed pa/_bdud kyi yul thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te/_lha rnams 
[\[133a.7\]]dga' bar byed pa/_gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/_lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/_nam mkha' lding rnams dngang bar byed pa/_mi 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa/_lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]'thab mo dang /_mu ge dang /_'chi ba dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dang /_nad thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa/_grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_hrud hrud po dang /_reg par 
[\[133b.2\]]dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_chos thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par byed pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/_'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/_zad pa 
[\[133b.3\]]shes pa skyed par byed pa/_mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon sum du byed pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin no/_/rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di yin te/_tad ya thA/_
[\[133b.4\]]ma nA k+Sha/_a bA k+Sha/_g+ha sA k+Sha/_dza ne k+Sha/_marma nA k+Sha/_k+Sha bA k+Sha/_ma Na DA k+Sha/_na TA k+Sha/_na da ra hu/_bi sa nA da/_kha ga nA da/_a ta na Ta/_ku na Ta/_pa ri ku na Ta/_nA Ta nA Ta/_pa ri ka nA Ta/_ud ta ra nA Ta/_bi nA Ta/_kuny+dza nA Ta/_tsa bAM ba ra nA Ta/_kha 
[\[133b.5\]]g+ha ma b+ha nA Ta/_pu sh+kar nA Ta/_sing ha ru dra nA Ta/_sa ma la nA Ta/_shi ri ku sa klau nA Ta/_ta la ma ru ta kha ba/_te hu k+Sha ba ti rak+Sha dA ma ra dzu ba ha/_na pu ti sa na ti ra na dza ba/_a mo ho ra ga dza la/_a tri mA/_a tri nA/_ra ba/_a tri nA k+Sha/_a ba hA/_mArga tri nA k+Sha/_e 
[\[133b.6\]]Sha e ba na to duHkha s+ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor der srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu ni rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dkrigs pa phrag drug cu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i 
[\[133b.7\]]sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la ngas khyod kyi lag nas bskur to/_/der yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad do/_/rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba 'di long la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der song shig_/nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang 
[\[134a.2\]]zhus shig_/'di skad du byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin 
[\[134a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du bdag mngags pa 
[\[134a.4\]]lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba dag ma mchis lags sam/_gnod pa dag chung lags sam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/_ji ltar chos thos 
[\[134a.5\]]pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/_chos kyis gnas pa dag gis gnas par bgyid pa lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang /_klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags 
[\[134a.6\]]sam/_'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam/_gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa de dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'dir nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul 
[\[134a.7\]]rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing de nas rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbu bas zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba 'di bskur lags te/_sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]par bgyid pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di bskur lags so zhes kyang gsol 
[\[134b.2\]]cig_/de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/mchog tu ngo mtshar to/_/de lta 
[\[134b.3\]]lags pas da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la mngon ma thos pa 'di ltar zab pa'i rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa 'di kho na bstan to/_/gang la yon tan 'di lta bu grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag 
[\[134b.4\]]mchis pa 'di la mkhas pa byang chub tshol bar byed pa su zhig mngon par brtson par mi bgyid/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems can gang su dag 'khor bas skrag cing byang grol gyi bde ba mngon par 'tshal ba ni 
[\[134b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi ming yongs su bsgrags pa na dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_gus par sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po dang /_dge ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel 
[\[134b.6\]]bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu nga byang chub sems dpa' gyur te brtson pa 'dis spyad pa spyod pa na smon 
[\[134b.7\]]lam 'di lta bu btab bo/_/bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sbyin pa la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba nas/_shes rab la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis bdag gi ming sgrogs 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]par byed cing sems can thams cad kyis sems par byed na gal te de dag la lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sems can la la pha rol tu phyin pa de dang de dag gi bar chad byed par nus pa zhig yod na sems can de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya 
[\[135a.2\]]stong du mar gyur cig_/sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtogs so/_/bdag kyang re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/gang yang bud med bu la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/_bu'i khur 
[\[135a.3\]]gyis skyo ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_gang bud med sbrum pa zhes bya ba'i bar bdag la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing /_sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang /_gus pa dang /_dad pas bdag gi ming yongs su sgrogs par byed la/_gal te ma'am mngal na yod pa de la 
[\[135a.4\]]mi'am mi ma yin pa sdang ba'i sems kyis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed dam/_sman dang /_gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste/_lus kun tu 'khrug par byed dam/_sems kun tu 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas btsas pa tsam gyi bar la yang tha na yud tsam gcig 
[\[135a.5\]]tsam yang rnam par tho 'tsham par byed na/_bdag re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig ces sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo/_/de bzhin du da ltar yang sems can gang dag 
[\[135a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir ba dag kyang zhes bya ba nas/_ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang /_gus pa dang /_dang bas bdag gi ming yongs su sgrogs par byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongs 
[\[135a.7\]]su grol bar 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/_/sbyangs pa ma yin na sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtogs so//_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po lnga pa/_des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni ngo mtshar lags te/_de na sems can rnams mchog tu sdang ba/_gzu lums can/_rtsub pa/_phrag dog dang ldan pa/_snying brtse ba ma mchis pa/_bgyis pa mi gzo ba/_tshig rtsub por smra ba/_log par lta ba 
[\[135b.2\]]dag lags pas der kha cig gis bdag la rnam par tho btsams na mi rung ste/_bdag mchis pas ci la yang mi sman lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/sus dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs 
[\[135b.3\]]pa'i gnas pa legs par bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas par gyur pa de la ni bdud bye bas kyang rnam par tho 'tsham pa'am/_bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni gnas med do/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa shin tu 
[\[135b.4\]]bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas zin gyis ma 'jigs shig_/rigs kyi bu khyod la gsang sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba dang /_rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis bzod pa dang /_dran pa dang /_rab tu dang ba thob par byed pa'i gzungs 
[\[135b.5\]]sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byams pa chen po sbyin par mdzad do/_/tad ya thA/_bo bri ha/_bu bu la/_i la ba ra/_i la sa ha/_ha T+ya T+ya ga ga nA k+Sha/_sha ma sha ma/_mi tra mi tra/_tsakra bar ti ti le/_sA ga ra ti le/_dur+b+ha li/_
[\[135b.6\]]hi hi le/_ha ba he na rA dza ne/_ya ba na mi tre/_k+ShA na ti mi tre/_mi tra rla me/_mi tra kha g+ha/_sarba sa to dza mi tre/_sarba kra ma mi tre/_ma na brta mi tre/_d+hi ti sha ra mi tre swA hA/_rigs kyi bu sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang /_rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs sngags 
[\[135b.7\]]'dis tsam pa ka'i 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas lag pa gnyis bskus na sdang ba thams cad dad par byed/_rmongs par byed cing sdang ba'i sbrul dag dang /_sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_grul bum dang /_srul po dang /_bdud bye ba brgya stong yang rung ste/_sdang 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ci yang byed par mi nus so/_/gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur kyang skyor chu gcig gis thams cad de'i mod kho na la med par 'gyur ro/_/gal te chu rnyog pa 
[\[136a.2\]]can gyis rgya mtsho bzhi yongs su gang bar gyur kyang rung /_skyor chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang bar byed de/_'di la the tsom med kyis long la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du song shig_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas 
[\[136a.3\]]tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_'dus pa chen po blta ba dang /_nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i 
[\[136a.4\]]yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags de yang mnyan par 'tshal lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag kyang mchir gnang ba lta na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bdag cag mchi lags 
[\[136a.5\]]so/_/de nas de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad so so nas gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_yo byad dang /_
[\[136a.6\]]spyod lam gyis lhan cig 'thun par deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag thams cad gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_yo byad dang /_spyod lam mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[136a.7\]]nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nam mkha' la 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang rin po che las byas 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]pa'i pad ma 'dab ma stong pa bdun bdun dang /_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang mngon par sprul to/_/spyod lam de lta bus de nas chas te/_de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[136b.2\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du kha cig gis ni gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[136b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir kha cig gis ni dngul gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/kha cig gis ni spos kyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/kha cig gis ni mu tig gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/kha cig gis ni gser skud dag mngon par 
[\[136b.4\]]rab tu phab bo/_/kha cig gis ni mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/kha cig gis ni dpung rgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/kha cig gis ni ras dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi char mngon par 
[\[136b.5\]]rab tu phab ste/_de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las/_pho nya'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[136b.6\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sngon ma mthong ba tshangs pa chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/_stan las langs nas ha cang yang thag mi ring bar 'dug 
[\[136b.7\]]go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi po de dag 'khor dang bcas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dag gtor te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/_/rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i snang ba 'dzin/_/lta ba nyams pa'i 'gro ba'i lam stsol 
[\[137a.2\]]ba/_/mnyam nyid ldan pa 'gro la phan mdzad khyod/_/bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod/_/gdul dka' 'gro ba nyon mongs thar mdzad khyod/_/chos 'dir snang ba yun ring 'bar mdzad khyod/_/bsam gtan sgo 'di dag gis skyes mchog ldan/_/zhing 
[\[137a.3\]]mang thams cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad/_/rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas dgu la/_/rgyang ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod par mdzad/_/'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'di dka' ba ste/_/de mthong bdag 'dir chos ched tshogs su mchis/_/'gro ba mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'/_/
[\[137a.4\]]shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang /_/nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub khyod ni/_/rab myur nyon mongs dra ba gcod mdzad lags/_/sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs klung lhung ba/_/khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral/_/rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag pho nyar 
[\[137a.5\]]mngags/_/khyod kyis chos kyi gter la yi rang mdzad/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so/_/sangs 
[\[137a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i 
[\[137a.7\]]chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]lags na bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/_ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan 
[\[137b.2\]]snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/_chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/_'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 
[\[137b.3\]]'khor lo skor lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/_klu'i yul 'jig pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u gzungs sngags 'di la dad 
[\[137b.4\]]pa sbyin par mdzad lags so/_/de nas bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags 
[\[137b.5\]]thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags so zhes bya ba ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin te/_bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod pa/_klu 
[\[137b.6\]]rnams pham par bgyid pa/_lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/_gnod sbyin rnams tshim par bgyid pa/_lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa/_rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/_dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/_bud med rnams 
[\[137b.7\]]'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa/_mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa/_rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_mu ge dang /_dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /_pha rol 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]gyi dmag tshogs dang /_rlung dang /_char pa dang /_chu bo dang /_grang ba dang /_dro ba thams cad rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_ro mi bro ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_hrud hrud po dang /_reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi 
[\[138a.2\]]bar bgyid pa/_chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/_chos kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par bgyid pa/_'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/_zad pa shes pa skye bar bgyid pa/_mi skye ba shes pa rtogs par bgyid 
[\[138a.3\]]pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/_sred pa'i klung skems par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te/_tad ya thA/_bA ye ba ya pa ri bA re/_ba he ba ha pa ri bA re/_pr-i tha bi pa ri bA re/_
[\[138a.4\]]a be a ba pa ri bA re/_te dze te dza pa ri bA re/_ma le ma la pa ri bA re/_kha g+he kha g+ha pa ri bA re/_A lo ke A lo ka pa ri bA re/_s+tha me s+tha ma pa ri bA re/_rA dze rA dza pa ri bA re/_si li si la pa ri bA re/_ga me ga ma pa ri bA re/_a bo tsa a bo tsa pa ri bA re/_ma la ma la la ma la me 
[\[138a.5\]]la ma/_rA la rA la la ma/_bid+yA dz+nyA na ma b+hu taM ga me/_b+hu tang ga ma pa ri bA re/_tsak+Shu gra he/_tsak+Shu gra ha pa ri bA re/_sho tra gra he/_sho tra gra ha pa ri bA re/_g+h+rA Na gra he/_g+h+rA Na gra ha pa ri bA re/_dzi hwa gra he/_dzi hwa gra hA pa ri bA re/_kA ya gra he/_kA ya gra ha pa ri bA re/_
[\[138a.6\]]ma na gra he/_ma na gra ha pa ri bA re/_spar sha gra he/_spar sha gra ha pa ri bA re/_be da na gra he/_be da na gra ha pa ri bA re/_tri Sh+NA gra he/_tri Sh+NA gra ha pa ri bA re/_u pA dA na gra he/_u pA dA na gra ha pa ri bA re/_b+hA ba gra he/_b+hA ba gra hA pa ri bA re/_dzA ti gra he/_dzA 
[\[138a.7\]]ti gra ha pa ri bA re/_dza ra ma ra Na gra he/_dza ra ma ra Na gra hA pa ri bA re/_duHkha san ta pA gra he/_duHkha san ta pA gra ha pa ri bA re/_A rA pA rA d+h+wa dze gra he/_A rA pA rA d+h+wa dza gra ha pa ri bA re/_A rA pA rA dwi dza gra he/_A rA bA rA dwi dzaM gra hA pa ri bA re/_a brta bi brta s+ya/_
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]a ba ra mu pa mA swa s+ya/_be ga bi ni brta/_A r+ya ra smi sa ma be ga shA na ti swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa bskur ba ni 'di lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so 
[\[138b.2\]]zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dag ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 
[\[138b.3\]]shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/_tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/_lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang /_rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par 
[\[138b.4\]]mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gis gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa lus kyi khyad par thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba nas/_shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i bar nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i sbu gu'i 
[\[138b.5\]]gzungs sngags de khyod kyis kyang ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_sid d+ha ma te/_bi lo ka ma te/_e le ge ta ri she_/ru tse su ru tse/_bud d+he/_bi bud 
[\[138b.6\]]d+he/_ma hA bud d+he/_un mad te/_un mad ta pra ti She d+ha ne/_ra ga d+h+ru ba pra ti She d+ha ne/_bin du bin du ma te/_tsi ta tsi ta ba ti She d+ha ne/_arke tsan dra ar+d+he/_ha ta tsi ti/_ha ta ni rmi/_ha ta kA ma be ge_/ha ta pau na b+ha bi ra dze/_ha ta tsak+Shu sa ma te/_ha ta 
[\[138b.7\]]bi ma ta mu dre/_ha ta yA g+he/_ha ta yA g+he/_ha ta sa mu dra dza be/_ha ta bi ma na rA dze/_ha ta hi te/_ha ta tsi ta Te/_ha ta d+harma rA dze/_ha ta ba hu rA dze/_ha ta brdza ma ti/_ha ta u pa ga ma te/_ha ta ro pa rasmi/_ha ta d+harma sid d+hi/_ha ta sarbon ma da/_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/_bi dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/_sarba mArga dz+nyA dz+nyA/_e Sho na da sa~M sa ra duHkhe swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bsrung ba'i slad du nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags stsal ba ni 'di 
[\[139a.2\]]lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa/_snyan pa khyod kyis nyi ma'i snying po'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung shig_/snyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[139a.3\]]rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/de bas kyang nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung /_gang gis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab 
[\[139a.4\]]bam/_rgya mtsho chen po'i yon tan dang /_phan yon ni brjod par nus so/_/nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang rung ste brjod par mi nus so/_/nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i 
[\[139a.5\]]gzungs sngags 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyi ma'i spyan pad ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/'khor bzhi po de dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_der sems can rnams 'dod 
[\[139a.6\]]pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/_zag pa thams cad zad pa dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shing gi rgyal 
[\[139a.7\]]po'i drung du bdud ni gcig pu khyod kyis bcom/_/byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang ni gcig pus brnyes pa lags/_/lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gcig pu khyod kyis dbang du mdzad/_/rgyal ba nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od zer lags/_/'di na mu 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]stegs gzhan ni gcig pus 'od dang bral mdzad pa/_/'jig rten kun na srin bu me khyer dag la nyi ltar mdzes/_/thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang chos tshul yun ring gnas par mdzad/_/
[\[139b.2\]]khyod gcig pu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa/_/dge dang byang chub yongs su btsal phyir chos don gnyer ba lags/_/rgyal ba khyod ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i chos ston pa/_/khyod ni ye shes byang chub spyod pa rab mchog 
[\[139b.3\]]ston par mdzad/_/gcig pus zhi 'gyur bdud rtsis sems can rnams kyang zhi mdzad pa/_/yang sred ma mchis mdzad slad srog chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyod/_/zag pa zad cing lta dang bral ba nyon mongs spangs gyur pa/_/gang na mya ngan byed med zhi 
[\[139b.4\]]ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod/_/'di ni 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs lags te/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis khyod la zhu ba'i slad du pho nyar mngags/_/rig pa'i rgya mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po/_/thub pa zla ba'i 
[\[139b.5\]]chos dang gsan nas gzungs kyang bskur ba lags/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dper bgyi na grong khyer rgyar dpag tshad tsam mchis pa/_bye mas gtams pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'das nas/_snyigs ma 
[\[139b.6\]]lnga dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags 
[\[139b.7\]]lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/_klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u/_sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma 
[\[140a.2\]]mchis lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/_ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/_chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa dag lags sam/_
[\[140a.3\]]khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang /_klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/_'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su 
[\[140a.4\]]dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par 
[\[140a.5\]]mdzad lags so/_/de nas stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad 
[\[140a.6\]]par bgyid pa/_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba nas/_ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar dang /_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa'i bar 'di yang bskur lags te/_tad ya thA/_d+hu 
[\[140a.7\]]ma te/_d+hu ma te/_ak+Shi d+hu ma te/_pra b+hA sa d+hu ma te/_sarbA kA sha d+hu ma te/_a bai kha g+ha/_bai me ta kha g+ha/_a bai k+Sha kha g+ha/_a mo ha kha g+ha/_a na n+ya kha g+ha/_byA brIt+ti kha g+ha/_sa~M ru tsa kha g+ha/_a nai ma kha g+ha/_lo tsa na kha g+ha/_shi khi kha g+ha/_
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]bi ti mi ra kha g+ha/_u k+Sho ma kha g+ha/_u ro kha g+ha/_ak+Shi kha g+ha/_yA bad ma no kha g+ha/_rU ba kha g+ha/_yA bad bi dz+nyA na kha g+ha/_tsak+Shu d+hA tu kha g+ha/_yA bad ma no bi dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha g+ha/_pr-i tha bI d+hA tu kha g+ha/_yA bad bi dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha g+ha/_tsa tu smr-i t+yu pa s+tha na kha g+ha/_
[\[140b.2\]]yA bad A bo na ka kha g+ha/_duHkha kha g+ha/_yA bad mArga kha g+ha/_bi pa ba na/_bi k+Sha pa/_a nan sa mu dra nan/_sarba kA ra nan/_sarba sang s+tha nan/_bi shU pa nan/_a kin tsa na nan/_k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/_i le i i le/_i i le mi le swA hA/_
[\[140b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal pos khyod la stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams 
[\[140b.4\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bsam gtan dang ldan pa dag ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[140b.5\]]kyi bu 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/_tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/_lhag chad med pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags rgya cher ston par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang 
[\[140b.6\]]rgyal pos gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa sems can rnams kyi sems dang tshor ba sgrub pa yang dag par 'du ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dang /_bdud bzhi 'dul ba/_sgrub pa'i gnas dang /_chos kyi tshul dang /_
[\[140b.7\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung sgrub pa/_mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i bar de khyod kyis kyang ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/tad ya thA/_sha ra Na byA ya/_shi k+Sha byA ya/_smr-i ti byA ya/_pra hI 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]na byA ya/_r-id+d+hibyA ya/_i na drI ya byA ya/_ba la byA ya/_bo d+h+yAng byA ya/_sa mA d+hi byA ya/_d+hA ra NI byA ya/_k+ShAn ti byA ya/_d+h+ya na byA ya/_a rU pa byA ya/_a ni na dza byA ya/_mA rga byA ya/_a b+hi dz+nyA byA ya/_pra ti sa~M bid byA ya/_b+hU mi byA ya/_bid+yA 
[\[141a.2\]]byA ya/_ma hA mai tri byA ya/_ma hA ka ru Na byA ya/_pr-i thi bI byA ya/_sa twa byA ya/_d+harma byA ya/_ta ma byA ya/_A lo ka byA ya/_pra ti b+hA sa byA ya/_pra ti shrut+ka byA ya/_ga ga na byA ya/_mA ra byA ya/_shU n+ya tA byA ya/_pra tI t+ya byA ya/_a pra Ni hi ta byA ya/_a 
[\[141a.3\]]ni mid ta byA ya/_ru ta byA ya/_g+ho Sha byA ya/_a kin tsan byA ya/_a b+hi sa ma ya a nu nu/_a no na/_a ba ha/_tsa tsA ra/_tsa tsa tsA ra bi mu/_tsa tsa tsa k+Sha/_tsa tsa tsa ra bi mu byA ya/_bi mu k+Sha ya/_bi mu A pa byA ya/_bi mu a sa mu dra tsa ra bi mu/_ts+tshe da bi mu/_
[\[141a.4\]]A kA shi ba mu/_byu pa sha ma bi mu/_a nA b+ha sa bi mu/_a ha ha bi mu/_a pA ra bi mu/_u pa sha ma/_sa li la bi mu swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bdag bsrung ba'i slad du mi zad pa'i sbubs 
[\[141a.5\]]kyi gzungs sngags stsal ba ni 'di lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kau Di n+ya khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di zung shig_/kau Di n+ya de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[141a.6\]]'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/de bas kyang mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung bskal pa brgya stong gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus so/_/gang 
[\[141a.7\]]dag mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'dir mun pa med par 'jug pas zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag ni gang gis kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/_/kau Di n+ya de lta bas na mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i chos 'di ji ltar thos pa 'khor bzhi po dag 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_de dag chos de thos pas las thams cad zad pa thob par 'gyur ba nas spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag dang /_spobs pa gcad du med pa dag dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bar dag thob par 'gyur zhing khams gsum las khyad 
[\[141b.2\]]par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu yang 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/
[\[141b.3\]]'gro drug sdug bsngal gyis khrid cing /_/nyon mongs nad kyis kun tu g.yengs/_/khyod ni mkhas pa mgon gyur khyod/_/rgal nas 'gro ba sgrol mdzad khyod/_/dbang po drug la rmongs gyur cing /_/bdud kyi zhags pas nyer zin la/_/yang dag lam ni ston pa khyod/_/'jig 
[\[141b.4\]]rten na ni rab rnyed dka'/_/yan lag drug ldan khyim gyi gzhi/_/mkhas pa'i mi rnams kyis spangs la/_/khyod ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen/_/chos kyi mu ge 'jig mdzad pa/_/mngon shes drug ldan sgom byed la/_/bden pa gsung ba drang srong che/_/sems can 'khor bar 
[\[141b.5\]]zhugs pa rnams/_/'ching ba dam las grol mdzad khyod/_/khyod kyi sngags la dad nas su/_/zhing 'dir yang ni lhags pa lags/_/'dir ni 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/bdag cag pho nyar mngags kyis gson/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[141b.6\]]zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas/_de na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang 
[\[141b.7\]]ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngags lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang 'dri bar mdzad lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 
[\[142a.2\]]'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal lags sam/_ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du yang chos de la yang nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/_chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/_khyod 
[\[142a.3\]]kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/_'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo skor lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin 
[\[142a.4\]]gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so/_/de nas smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun 
[\[142a.5\]]pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa/_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_
[\[142a.6\]]nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te zhes bgyi ba nas ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no/_/tad 
[\[142a.7\]]ya thA/_sha na sha ra/_sha ma na sha ba/_a pak+Sha ba sha_/tsak+Shu b+ha ba sha ba/_sho tra sha ba/_g+h+rA Na sha ba/_dzi hwa sha ba/_kA ya sha ba/_ma nA sha ba/_k+Sha ti bid+ya tsak+Shu pr-i thabI k+Sha b+ha/_shro tra a ba k+Sha b+ha/_dzi hwa bA yu k+Sha b+ha/_ma na o dza k+Sha b+ha/_A lo ka dz+nyA na k+Sha b+ha/_bI dza sang gra ma k+Sha b+ha/_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ang ku ra kha g+ha k+Sha b+ha/_sha ma ka ru k+Sha b+ha/_k+Sha ya rA sa k+Sha b+ha/_shAn ti bya sra k+Sha b+ha/_na to na tai na to na a ba n+ye ra to na/_na yA ba na yi na to na e Sha an ta duHkha s+ya swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des smon pa med pa'i rjes 
[\[142b.2\]]su 'thun pa'i gzugs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang 
[\[142b.3\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po lhag 
[\[142b.4\]]chad med pa/_smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal pos gang khyod la 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe byin pa rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig_/
[\[142b.5\]]lung bstan pa des ni 'dir sems can rnams kyi sred pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa gang gA'i 
[\[142b.6\]]klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'byang ba dang /_dge ba'i phyogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te bstan par bgyi lags so/_/tad ya thA/_be ga pa ri ts+tshe da/_gar+b+ha sa k+Sha se/_gar+b+ha re bid+yA pra b+ha ga k+She 
[\[142b.7\]]k+Sha ya/_yo ge pra ti ha re sha man na si ka the/_sa ma me g+ha dz+ha She/_a k+Sha ya/_na te k+Sha b+ha ba dze/_nid d+ha dz+ha She/_sa ma na dz+ha She/_a d+h+ya sha ya dz+ha She/_bi pra b+ha dz+ha She/_shaik+Sha dz+nya She/_se n+ya dza ba dz+ha She/_sa li la gu h+ya dz+ha She/_sa li gu ha b+hai k+Shi pa na ko she/_sA d+ha na ko no si ba d+ha na na th+ye/_bi ta pra 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bid te/_u pa kra ma pa the/_a na ts+tshe d+ya pra khe/_pra ti kra me na/_sa kang th+ya shai sa lo tsa na ba me/_kro d+ha d+ha re/_kA ma sa she/_A kA sha kha ge nA ga kun dze/_bid+ya ba ne/_kla na ba ne/_u tsa ba ne/_sa ma ma ke re/_sha ri ya ba ne/_me g+ha dza be ha ri ko no ba/_na ya na mu 
[\[143a.2\]]khe/_sA ra k+Sha ko le/_na rA ya Na tsa re/_in dra bA sa ne/_o a/_a ba a/_a rA ba A/_ba ra a bA ra/_sA ra me g+ha/_duHkha na sti ra ni nirbA he swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bsrung 
[\[143a.3\]]ba'i slad du rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa stsal ba ni 'di lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di zung shig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de 
[\[143a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/de bas kyang rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzung sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis 
[\[143a.5\]]kyang rung bskal pa brgyas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams bgrang ba'am mtha' rtogs par nus so/_/rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mtha' ni bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang brjod par mi nus so/_/rig sngags kyi rten gyi 
[\[143a.6\]]lung bstan pa 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di yang zung shig_/kun chub par byos shig_/'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par ston cig_/yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_de thos pas kyang sems can de 
[\[143a.7\]]dag gi sred pa chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po srid pa'i rgyu rnams dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/bud med mtshams med pa byed 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]pa'i las kyi sgrib pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zad par 'gyur zhing lhag ma med pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/zag pa thams cad zad pa dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das 
[\[143b.2\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/khyod ni ded dpon gcig pu lags/_/chos rnams kun la nges pa ste/_/mthong ba'i gus pa skyes pa yis/_/bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin/_/me tog gcig dang 
[\[143b.3\]]bdug pa yis/_/de bzhin gshegs la mchod bgyis na/_/yan lag kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/bshes gnyen sdug pa nye bar 'dzin/_/tshogs ni chen po bsdus pa yang /_/dus gcig tu ni 'dir mdzad pas/_/lha rnams thams cad bsngags bgyid cing /_/bshes 
[\[143b.4\]]gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin/_/der ni 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/'di ni lan cig kho na bstan/_/rtag tu lha min shes rab ldan/_/bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin/_/dpal gyi me tog snying po ni/_/dpal rnams kun gyis kun tu brgyan/_/de yis shAkya'i dpal zhu bar/_/bdag cag 
[\[143b.5\]]pho nyar mngags pa lags/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[143b.6\]]de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam 
[\[143b.7\]]par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba la rig par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]lags sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/_gnod pa chung lags sam/_dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/_ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags 
[\[144a.2\]]sam/_chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa dag lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang /_klu'i yul bcom lags sam/_khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/_'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor 
[\[144a.3\]]lo skor lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can 
[\[144a.4\]]rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so/_/de nas zhi ba rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 
[\[144a.5\]]bgyid pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/_phung po dang skye mched thams cad yongs su shes par bgyid pa/_chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa/_thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/_byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad 
[\[144a.6\]]yongs su myong bar bgyid pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu dad par bgyid pa/_chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par bgyid pa/_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par bgyid pa/_bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'jig 
[\[144a.7\]]par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te/_rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod par bgyid pa/_phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par bgyid pa/_lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/_gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bgyid pa/_lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa/_nam mkha' lding rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/_mi 'am ci rnams dad par bgyid pa/_lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa/_phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar 
[\[144b.2\]]bgyid pa/_rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/_bram ze rnams 'jug par bgyid pa/_rje'u rigs rnams rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/_dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/_bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa/_
[\[144b.3\]]bud med sbrum pa bde legs su yongs su thar bar bgyid pa/_mang du thos pa rnams dran par bgyid pa/_rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_mu ge dang /_mi ngas 
[\[144b.4\]]dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dang /_chu bo dang /_grang ba dang /_dro ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_hrud hrud po dang /_'dus te reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/_chos 
[\[144b.5\]]kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par bgyid pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa/_'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/_zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa/_mi skye ba shes pa rang gi 
[\[144b.6\]]mngon sum du bgyid pa/_mun pa'i phung po rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa/_sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/_mthu che ba lags so/_/tad ya thA/_ma nA k+Sha a nA k+Sha/_g+ha sa k+Sha/_dza la k+Sha/_mA nA k+Sha/_k+Sha ba k+Sha/_man d+hA k+Sha/_na Da k+Sha/_na Da ra ra hu bi 
[\[144b.7\]]sa nA ta/_kha g+ha nA Ta/_A Ta nA Ta ku nA Ta/_pa ri ku sa nA Ta/_nA Ta nA Ta/_pu ri k+Sha nA Ta/_u Ta ra nA Ta/_ka bi nA Ta/_kun dza nA Ta/_a ma kha nA Ta/_tsa ba ma b+ha nA Ta/_kha ga ma b+ha nA Ta/_pu k+Sha ra nA Ta/_hi sa du drA nA Ta/_sa ma la ya nA Ta/_shi ra ku mang kau ta Ta 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ma tu gu ra ba/_twe hu k+Sha/_ba ni ra dzU/_d+h+wa na ma ra dzU/_ba g+ha na pu te/_sa na ti ra ba dza ba/_ma ho ra ga dza la/_a tri nA/_a tri nA/_a tri nA na ba/_a tri nA k+Sha/_a ba ha mArga tri nA k+Sha/_e Sho na tau duHkha b+ha ra s+ya swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[145a.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba phan yon che ba 'di 'dir bskur ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/bsam gtan la brtson pa rnams 
[\[145a.3\]]ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du lhags pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[145a.4\]]kyi bu nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags don dang bcas pa/_tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/_lhag chad med pa 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi 
[\[145a.5\]]snying po des gang khyod chas pa'i dus kyi tshe gsang sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang /_gnyid kyis log par byed pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byin pa de khyod kyis 
[\[145a.6\]]kyang ston cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bstan par bgyi lags so/_/tad ya thA/_bo pr-i ha bu bu bu ra/_ta la ra ba i la sa ha/_ha Du ha Tu/_ga ga nA k+Sha sha ma mi tra/_tsa kra brti ti le sA ga ra/_ti le dU na hi le/_hi le ha ba he/_na ra dza Te/_ya ba na mi tre/_
[\[145a.7\]]k+Shi ti mi tre/_par mi tre/_shi khi mi tre/_ma ru tra mi tre/_kha ga mi tre/_sarba u dza mi tra/_sarba kA ma mi tre/_ma na pa ru mi tre/_d+ha na shwa ra mi tre swA hA/_kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/_gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sdang ba'i sbrul thams cad rang gi gnas su dong nas gnyid kyis log par gyur te/_gang dag bzod pa thob pa rnams dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/srid pa 
[\[145b.2\]]na gang dag sdang ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gang dag sdang ba'i lha ma yin rnams dang zhes bya ba nas sdang ba'i nam mkha' lding rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_sdang ba'i mi 'am ci rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_sha za 
[\[145b.3\]]rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_gang dag sdang ba'i lus srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de dag rang rang gi gnas su dong nas gnyid kyis log par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams dang /_phyir mi ldog pa 
[\[145b.4\]]rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/gang dag sdang ba'i mi gzu lums can dang /_rtsub pa dang /_snying brtse ba med pa dang /_phan tshun mi 'thun pa dang /_rtag tu khro ba spyod pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang /_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam 
[\[145b.5\]]pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/_gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di thos pas thams cad mchog tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_snying rje'i 
[\[145b.6\]]sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_'khon med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa'i 
[\[145b.7\]]sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_dkon mchog gsum la lhag par gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gnas par gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bsrung ba'i slad du gang sdang ba zhi bar bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags stsal ba ni 'di lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa maud 
[\[146a.2\]]gal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis sdang ba zhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di zung shig_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[146a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/_/de bas kyang sdang ba zhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o/_/maud gal gyi bu
