[\[187b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings na bzhugs pa mthong nas mchog tu yid mi bde ste lus thams cad nas rdul 'thon zhing mchi ma dag byung nas mi dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis gnas thams cad du rgyu bar byed/_/rnam par rgyu bar byed/_'jug par 
[\[187b.7\]]byed/_'byung bar byed/_ldang bar byed/_rgyug par byed/_kun tu rgyug par byed/_glal bar byed/_'dzum par byed/_shugs ring du 'byin par byed/_kha la lces ldag par byed/_mig 'dzums par byed/_lag pa gnyis rkyong zhing skum par byed/_mgo 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]la lag pa gnyis kyis rdob par byed/_mgrin pa dang nu ma la mnyed par byed de/_de mthong bas bdud kyi gnas na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gnod pa dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_yid mi bde bar gyur to/_/de nas bdud shor ba nam 
[\[188a.2\]]mkha'i shing zhes bya ba des bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad pas dris pa/_'khrug sems yid rab mi bde bas/_/ci slad de ltar khyod rgyug cing /_/kun la dga' bar mi dgongs pas/_/gang du yang ni dgyes mi mnga'/_/bdud sdig can gdong mchi ma 
[\[188a.3\]]dang bcas pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/gau ta ma stobs can mthong nas ni/_/nga yi snying ni rnam gas nas/_/lus kun nas ni rdul 'thon cing /_/gdong yang mchi mas gang ba yin/_/sems can thams cad 'thun pa ru/_/ji ltar thos pa bzhin du der/_/
[\[188a.4\]]tshogs chen ril gyis dong bas na/_/nga yi yul ni stongs par byas/_/nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i yul/_/phyogs bcu nas ni lhags pa yis/_/de la bskor ba byas nas su/_/bye ba mang pos yongs su bskor/_/bdud rnams thams cad 'khor 
[\[188a.5\]]bcas te/_/de la yang ni skyabs song bas/_/nga yi dpung ni ma mthong ste/_/gang na'ang nga yi phyogs med do/_/de nas bdud sdig can la bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag thams cad 'khor bcas te/_/
[\[188a.6\]]go cha sra ba dag bgos nas/_/ral gri 'khor lo mda' bo ches/_/de yi lus ni phye mar rlag_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_de la yang ni skyabs song zhing /_/der yang rang nyid song bas na/_/de la dmag ni yang dag phul/_/nga ni bcing ba dam pos bcings/_/de 
[\[188a.7\]]nas bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing des smras pa/_thabs rnams kun gyis ci bgyis kyang /_/dgra ni dbang du mi 'gyur te/_/mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis bslus bgyis na/_/de lta na ni gsad par nus/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis der 'gro 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bar/_/'di ltar bdag gis de bsams nas/_/rang gi mgul na dri nga ba'i/_/ro myags 'jigs su rung ba mthong /_/nam mkha'i shing gis slar smras pa/_/bdud dang klu dang bsam gtan pa'i/_/yul gsum dag tu bshad pa la/_/bdag cag gi ni yul 
[\[188b.2\]]bcom yang /_/klu rnams kyi ni yul brtan no/_/klu de dag kyang gzi brjid che/_/dmag rnams mang zhing stobs kyang che/_/de dag gi ni yul mchis pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/'dod pa'i khams na gang su dag_/klu yi bdag po gnas 
[\[188b.3\]]gyur pa/_/de dag rnams la gau ta ma/_/thal bar rlag par myur du bsgo/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_kye bsod nams shes rab chen po can/_/klu yi gnas su nyid song la/_/gau ta ma dang dmag 'gyed par/_/thams cad la ni khyod kyis bsgo/_/des 
[\[188b.4\]]smras pa/_de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes nas dmag brgya stong go bgos pa de dag la/_lag pa bsgreng ste bsgrags pa ni/_/klu yi rten du bdag cag 'deng /_/gau ta ma dang dmag 'gyed cing /_/srog dang bral bar byed du gzhug_/der ni bdag cag grogs bya bar/_/
[\[188b.5\]]thams cad la ni bsgo bar bya/_/de na 'khod pa de dag kyang gang du yang /_su yang 'gro bar ma nus pa dang /_shor ba nam mkha'i shing de gdong mchi ma dang bcas shing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/_thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas sdig can la smras pa/_bdag cag 
[\[188b.6\]]gis ni gang du yang /_/mchi bar bgyi ba'i rngo ma thogs/_/sgyu 'phrul brtan pa gau ta ma/_/drang srong gi ni sgyu lags so/_/bdag cag thams cad rkang pa bcings/_/lus rnams kun la rdul yang byung /_/gang gis dgra las khyed rgyal bar/_/gzhan zhig 
[\[188b.7\]]kyang ni mdzad par gsol/_/bdud sdig can je sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mya ngan du gyur pa de 'di lta bu'i blo skyes te/_gang bdag gis klu'i rten thams cad du gang kun tu smra bar byed pa dang /_mngon par mi dga' ba skyed par byed pa dang /_klu thams cad kun 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]du gshe bar byed pa'i bdud kyi stobs de lta bu yang dag par rjes su dran par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis klu'i rten thams cad du sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sbrang bu gdug pa rnams sprul to/_/thams cad 
[\[189a.2\]]dri nga bas bkang ngo /_/rdul dbyung ba dang mngon par mi dga' bar byas so/_/de bzhin du klu dang /_klu chen po skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad mngon par mi dga' nas de dag thams cad kyis rnam par bltas te/_bdag cag la 
[\[189a.3\]]co 'dri bar byed pa su yin snyam na de dag gis ma shes shing ma mthong ngo /_/gling bzhi pa 'di'i klu dang /_klu chen po skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang khro bas zil gyis non nas de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[189a.4\]]kyang rang gi gnas bor/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas kyang rang gi gnas bor nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'dab na ri kha la ti ya zhes bya ba yod de/_ri kha la ti ya de'i rtse mo na drang srong thub pa rnams kyi gnas kyi rten kun 
[\[189a.5\]]rten ces bya ba rgyar dpag tshad bzhi khri pa lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa bzhi yod pa/_drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs so/_/der de dag zhugs ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i lus chung ngur gyur te/_dper na mig sman bsku ba'i thur 
[\[189a.6\]]ma bzhin no/_/de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re re yang 'di lta bu'i lus ri rab tsam du yang dag par shes te/_de dag gis skad 'byin kyang ma nus so/_/de nas 'gro bar yang ma nus te/_mya ngan chen po dang khros pas zil gyis non nas der 'khod do/_/de bzhin 
[\[189a.7\]]du klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_de bzhin du sa srung gi bu zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du 'jog po zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du ma dros pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]btang bzung zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du rgya mtshos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du chu lhas byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du khyim bdag gis byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du chu bas byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du chu sog ma 
[\[189b.2\]]med kyis byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du ri bos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du ba lang mgo zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du rgyan skyes zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du e la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du lag pa'i tshigs 
[\[189b.3\]]mi mngon pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du sgra bsags zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du mtsho gyad ces bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du stobs kyis rgyu zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du ti se'i gangs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du chu'i shugs zhes 
[\[189b.4\]]bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du gtsug phud sngon po zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du gser ser skya zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du rtswa sngon po zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du gshe ba'i shing zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du mig gsal zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin 
[\[189b.5\]]du glang po zad ces bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du rnon pos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du gnas na rgyu zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du gshol ngan zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du e la'i gdong zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du mig dmar zhes bya ba'i 
[\[189b.6\]]bar dang /_de bzhin du yid 'phrog ces bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du rab mchog ces bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na klu'i rgyal po lnga khri drug stong gang dag yin pa'i bar de dag thams cad klu'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma drang srong thub 
[\[189b.7\]]pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs so/_/gling brgyad khri bzhi stong nas gling re re nas kyang klu chen po brgya stong phrag du mas rang rang gi gnas bor nas gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs so/_/de bzhin du byang gi sgra mi snyan nas klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]pa'i khab ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgyu ba chen po zhes bya ba de gnyis re re yang klu dang /_klu chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du brten to/_/
[\[190a.2\]]shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas klu'i rgyal po zla ba srung zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbyig gtong zhes bya ba de gnyis re re yang klu dang /_klu chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas lhan cig yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te drang srong thub pa'i 
[\[190a.3\]]gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs so/_/ba lang spyod kyi gling nas klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po ba lang gi 'od kyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba de gnyis re re yang klu dang /_klu chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[190a.4\]]brgya stong phrag du mas lhan cig tu mdun du bdar zhing drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du zhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa 'di dang gling gzhan brgya stong phrag brgyad cu na klu dang /_klu chen po dang /_klu'i skye gnas pa klu sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_klu mngal 
[\[190a.5\]]nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa pho dang /_mo dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo yang rung /_gang su dag yod pa skad cig de la gang der brten par ma gyur pa gcig kyang med de/_drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don 
[\[190a.6\]]du zhugs so/_/de dag thams cad zhugs ma thag tu re re yang 'di lta bu'i lus chung ngur gyur te/_dper na mig sman bsku ba'i thur ma bzhin no/_/de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re re yang 'di lta bu'i lus ri rab tsam chen por yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/
[\[190a.7\]]de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis gnas rten du klu'i skye gnas pa thams cad 'dus pa dang /_thams cad lus chung ngur mthong ngo /_/de mthong bas shas cher 'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs te skrag nas rang gi skye bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'byung po chen po klu 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]rnams thams cad g.yos/_/drang srong gnas pa der ni 'dus nas su/_/thams cad stobs dang gzugs dang dpal las nyams/_/dge sbyong mdangs kyi stobs la blta bar byos/_/de nas bdud shor ba gzhan tshul khrims rten zhes bya ba des smras pa/_
[\[190b.2\]]thugs mi dgyes pa ma mdzad bdag la gson/_/klu rnams bdag nyid rtse ba 'di lags te/_/'di ltar shAkya'i bu ni phyer rlog pa'i/_/tshogs can 'dus pa la ni mngon brtag mdzod/_/sdig can gyis smras pa/_blo mchog der ni myur du 'gro bar byos/_/klu yi 
[\[190b.3\]]tshogs ni thams cad spro bar byos/_/ji ste shAka bu tshogs bcas gsad nus na/_/klu rnams kyi ni yul yang mchog tu 'gyur/_/de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten de bdud kyi gnas de nas srog chags brgyad khri dang lhan cig chas so/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[190b.4\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sngon gyi smon lam mthar phyin pas drang srong thub pa thams cad dbang du mdzad/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa yang dag par bstan/_
[\[190b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad skyo bar mdzad/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas mi dang /_mi ma yin thams cad rab tu dga' bar mdzad/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad shin tu yongs su spyad pa mdzad/_sangs 
[\[190b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di mchog tu ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_ches skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_ches bsod nams kyi sa bon byed pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi mchod par 'os pa 
[\[190b.7\]]mdzad de/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rgyun bcad do/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud par gyur te/_de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]shes pa so sor sbyangs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rgyu 'thun pa'i cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs rgyun bcad pa dang /_de'i tshe sngon ji ltar bzhugs pa bzhin du yang dag par snang ste/_de 
[\[191a.2\]]de ltar shin tu lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de de'i bar du yang rang gi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya stong phrag du ma de dag 
[\[191a.3\]]thams cad ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_dri dang /_phye ma dang /_rin po che dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_phyang 'phrul dang /_rgyan sna tshogs dang /_rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te/_bskor 
[\[191a.4\]]ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_
[\[191a.5\]]lus srul po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi bar de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /_dri dang /_phye ma dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_phyang 'phrul dang /_rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas mchod 
[\[191a.6\]]pa'i bar du byas te/_bskor ba byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten bdud kyi ris brgyad khri dang de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir babs nas/_dge sbyong gau ta mas sku yangs pa kun tu bstan pa ji ltar rgyun bcad 
[\[191a.7\]]pa mthong ste/_de yul ma ga d+hA na bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo /_/de bdag cag gis skrag pas sgyu'i stobs las ma nyams sam snyam zhing /_da lta na der 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa'i nang du 'dug na/_de bdag cag gi phyir 'dug nas sdig pa mi byed dam snyam ste/_gang 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]bdag cag gis der dang por song nas 'di la rgyu gang yin par 'gyur ba mnyan par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten 'khor dang bcas te de nas babs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 
[\[191b.2\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_de'i tshe yang des tshigs su bcad pa spobs par byas pa/_khyod kyis nad ni chen po dag_/rga shi'i mtsho las ma rgal to/_/'di ltar sems can slu byed na/_/byang grol tu ni ji ltar zhugs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten la 
[\[191b.3\]]tshigs su bcad nas slar bka' stsal pa/_nga ni sems can chu bo rgal/_/nga la yang sred med pa yin/_/sems can rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/'khor bar yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]brtsams nas su/_/khyod kyis byang chub 
[\[191b.4\]]phyir spyad de/_/mar me mdzad ni tshun chad du/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims kun tu bsgrubs/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong po/_/de dag khyod kyis ri mor byas/_/theg pa mchog gi don du ni/_/nga yis khyod la lung bstan te/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun tu spyad/_/
[\[191b.5\]]mtshan ma med par rnam par bsgoms/_/nga yis mig rnams dag pa sbyin/_/sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par byos/_/de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten sngon gyi tshe rabs dang /_smon lam dang /_sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis 
[\[191b.6\]]bskul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtswa bkram ba lta bur 'ongs par gyur te/_gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas thal mo rab tu sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang /_myos pa ji lta ba dang /_sems 'khrug pa ji 
[\[191b.7\]]lta ba bzhin du nongs pa 'chags lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nongs pa 'chags so/_/'di ltar bdag gis dran lags te/_grangs ma mchis pa gcig rdzogs par bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa chen pos pha rol tu 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]phyin pa drug gi spyod pa spyad lags so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa mang du bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams dang bzhugs pa brgya stong phrag bye ba la bdag gis bsnyen bkur ba dang bkur sti rnam pa sna 
[\[192a.2\]]tshogs bgyis te chos kyang thos lags so/_/smon lam yang btab lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong la la nyan thos kyi gtam rjes su bskul bar bgyid lags te/_de nas bdag gis ma bsams par kye ma dge sbyong gi lus byad 
[\[192a.3\]]kyis gang zag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi mdun du nyan thos kyi gtam 'chad pa 'di ni bdud do zhes sdig pa can gyi tshig brjod lags te/_der gal te bdag gis sdig pa can gyi tshig de ma smras par gyur na ni der bdag gis bla na ma mchis pa yang dag 
[\[192a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur lags na/_sug las kyi lhag ma des bdag de nas shi 'phos nas bdud kyi gnas su skyes te/_dgung lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /_dgung lo brgya stong dag tu der bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[192a.5\]]byang chub tu bdag gi sems bskyed pa gcig kyang ma byung lags na tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lan gnyis kyi bar du bzod pa gsol to/_/ji srid du sngon gyi mtha'i 'khor bar 'khor ba 
[\[192a.6\]]de srid du slad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i mur sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro lags kyi/_bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems ldog par ni mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so 
[\[192a.7\]]legs so/_/gang la la snying rje'i sems kyis byang chub tu sems gzhol bar byed na/_'di ni 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog dang phul yin te/_'dren pa'i spyan sngar la la mar me ri rab tsam du 'bar bar byed kyang bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed yongs su bzung ba 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]ma yin gyis khyod longs shig_/nga la sdig pa'i las sra ba 'or cig_/phung po dang khams 'di dag la spros pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_'dus byas thams cad dran par byos shig dang /_khyod yon tan mchog tu kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de nyid kyi tshe byang 
[\[192b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rten gyis rjes su 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rten stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la rin thang med pa'i 
[\[192b.3\]]mu tig gi rgyan phreng gis sku la g.yogs nas gsol pa/_gang bdag cag gis chos thams cad myur du rtogs nas dbu ba dang 'dra ba'i lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par bgyid pa dang /_byang chub tu ni bzod pa mchog thob par 'gyur ba dang /_yun ring 
[\[192b.4\]]po mi thogs par sems can thams cad thar bar bgyid pa'i chos ni gang lags/_gang zhig ni byang chub sems dpas spang ba'i slad du bsgom par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshul khrims rten mkhas pas chos bzhi myur du bskyed 
[\[192b.5\]]par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can gyi phyir sdug bsngal tshad med pa thams cad la spro bar bya ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi bslab pa dpag yas pa gzung bar bya ba yin/_ma nyams par gzung bar bya ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa thams 
[\[192b.6\]]cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin no/_/yang de'i tshe tshul khrims rten gyi 'khor bdud kyi sde brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lung bstan pa de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa dang dang ba mchog skyes shing gus pa skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[192b.7\]]la lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa gsol bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_de dag thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das la de dag 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]gis rang rang gi lha rdzas kyi chos gos dag sku la gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bdud sdig can gyis mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang yang shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge sbyong gi ni ltor chud pas/_/
[\[193a.2\]]'khor de dag dang bral bar gyur/_/'di nas gang du dong ba ni/_/thams cad de yi dbang du song /_/des su yang phyi rol du ma 'byung shig_/bdud kyi spyod yul 'dir bdag cag gnas par bya'o zhes smras nas myur du grong khyer gyi sgo bcad de gab tu bcug go/_/
[\[193a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ji ltar nam mkha'i spyan las gsungs pa bzhin du de dag la tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnam pa gsum po sems can la dmigs pa dang /_chos la dmigs pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa rgya cher bstan par yang dag par brtsam pa mdzad do/_/
[\[193a.4\]]ri kha la ti ya'i rtse mo drang srong thub pa'i gnas su klu gang dag rten cing 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi lus chung ngur mthong ste/_dper na mig sman bsku ba'i thur ma bzhin no/_/ji ltar sngon gyi lus bzhin du yang bzhag par ma nus so/_/slar 'byung 
[\[193a.5\]]bar yang ma nus te/_de dag thams cad 'jigs shing skrag la spu zing zhes byed pa'i ba spu'i khung bu byung nas/_de dag thams cad kyis dga' bo dang nye dga' la rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gi tshe bdag cag gi grong du sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu 
[\[193a.6\]]mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kun tu byung ba de'i tshe bdag cag gnas thams cad bor nas bskyab pa'i phyir 'dir zhugs nas 'di nas gang du yang mchi bar ma nus te/_lus dag kyang chung ngur gyur lags na gang gis bdag cag gnas su mchi bar 
[\[193a.7\]]bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/_mi 'jigs pa stsal bar gsol/_dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/_dge sbyong 'di ni g.yo sgyu can gyis blo/_/shAkya'i bu pho sgyu ma byed pa yin/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir zhugs par gyur nas su/_/lus kun la 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]ni thams cad chud par gyur/_/des ni klu rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu/_/sha sbrang sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]sbrang bu sbrul/_/sa 'di bskyab phyir nged cag lhags gyur te/_/thams cad stobs rnams las ni nyams par gyur/_/gau ta ma ni blo gros g.yon can 
[\[193b.2\]]yang /_/las des rdzu 'phrul de las nyams gyur cing /_/de ni lus kyang chung ngur gyur nas su/_/stan gyi stengs na dmangs ni kun tu snang /_/des ni bdag cag lus kyang chung ngur byas/_/btson ra 'dir ni bcings par gyur nas su/_/nged cag ci yang byed 
[\[193b.3\]]par mi nus kyis/_/mi 'jigs lha la khyed cag phyag 'tshol cig_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud sdig can la klu de dag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_gang bdag cag btson ra de nas 'byer ba dang rang rang gi gnas rnams su gnas par rngo thogs par bdag cag 
[\[193b.4\]]bskyab tu gsol/_klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bus de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdud dpung bcas pa rang nyid skrag nas su/_/gau ta ma sgyu ma g.yo sgyu can la skyo/_/'khor dang lto gol rnams kyang g.yo yis su/_/des ni de yi skye bo mang po phrogs/_/bdud la 
[\[193b.5\]]mthu ni ci yang yod ma yin/_/'gro ba dang ni rdzu 'phrul de las nyams/_/gzhan la khyed cag myur du skyabs su deng /_/lha rnams la ni kun gyis rjed par byos/_/de nas klu thams cad kyang kha cig ni rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni brgya 
[\[193b.6\]]byin la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni rab 'thab bral la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni yongs su dga' ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni 'phrul dga' la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la phyag 'tshal bar byed 
[\[193b.7\]]do/_/kha cig ni tshangs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/klu'i rgyal po thams cad la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dang lha dbang 'di kun 'khod nas su/_/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang /_/gau tam dmangs la thams cad skyabs 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]gnas pa/_/khyed cag gi ni ci yi phyir ma mthong /_/dka' thub drag po drang srong chen po dag_/gzhan rnams la ni grogs dag khyed phyag 'tshol/_/rtas bsrungs mthon 'phur skar ma dga' ba dang /_/ngan spong bu la ci phyir phyag mi 'tshal/_/de nas klu 
[\[194a.2\]]de dag thams cad kha cig ni drang srong rab tu dpal ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni brten po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni rtas bsrungs la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni mthon por 'phur la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni skar ma la 
[\[194a.3\]]dga' ba la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/kha cig ni drang srong ngan spong gi bu la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag la skyabs su nye bar dong ngo /_/yang de'i tshe/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi 
[\[194a.4\]]ngos la drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i mdun na/_shAkya khyu mchog gi yon tan bsngags pa nyan cing 'khod de/_drang srong de dag gis klu thams cad 'o dod 'bod pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang drang srong lnga po de dag stan las langs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[194a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu thams cad gnod par gyur cing bdag cag la skyabs su nye bar gnas pa gzigs sam/_bzhengs te der bzhud la klu'i sde thams cad 
[\[194a.6\]]yongs su thar bar mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_khyed deng shig_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang po 'di dag nga'i mdun du 'khod nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa yongs su 'dri bar byed de/_ngas de dag gi sems yongs su mgu bar 
[\[194a.7\]]bya'o/_/de nas skar ma la dga' ba'i rkang pa gnyis la drang srong de dag thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ste drang srong thub pa'i gnas kyi gzhi rten du 'khod do/_/de nas de dag la klu de dag mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]te 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed bsod nams can shes rab dang ldan pa thabs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drang srong chen po lags na bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/_/btson ra'i 'jigs pa 'di las bdag cag yongs su dgrol bar gsol/_de nas 
[\[194b.2\]]drang srong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/nged kyis ni khyed 'di nas yongs su grol bar byed par mi nus so/_/lag 'gro'i bdag po dag gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngos la drang srong thams cad kyi bla ma dbang che bar grags pa/_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_gzi brjid 
[\[194b.3\]]chen pos rgyas pa skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_des khyed 'di nas yongs su grol bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la phyag 'tshol cig_/de thos nas klu thams cad drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas dbyangs gcig gis 'o dod bos so/_/de 
[\[194b.4\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad can drang srong skar ma la dga' bas lha dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang pos mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te/_de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas der yang phyin par gyur te/_de la 
[\[194b.5\]]klu thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gus pa mchog skyes nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang bdag cag rang gi gnas su mchis nas dga' bar 'gyur bar bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/_gnas 'di nas bdag cag yongs su dgrol bar gsol/_dus shes pa/_
[\[194b.6\]]dus la blta ba drang srong chen po des kyang rkyen gyi dbang gis de dag la rgyu skar gyi [{]go rims kyi [,]go rim gyi [}]gtam brtsams pa/_ji ltar thams cad thar 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin du ni bshad par bya/_/khyed la phan pa gzhan med kyis/_/mthar gyis su ni mnyan par gyis/_/'dir ni nab 
[\[194b.7\]]so gang gnas pa/_/de ni dbyar zla tha [{]chungs te[,]chung ste[}]/_/de ni nyi ma lha yin zhing /_/klu rnams kun dang 'brel pa yis/_/skar ma'i dpyad ni phongs pa dang /_/snying por drang srong sbyor bas bstan/_/gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/_/nam mkha' la ni su yis bzhag_/mkhas 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pa rnams ni dga' bgyid pa/_/lo skor shes pa bshad du gsol/_/zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar dang /_/gza' rnams 'gro ba ji ltar lags/_/zla ba rnams kyi dang por ni/_/rgyu skar gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zla ba'i yud tsam gang zhig lags/_/
[\[195a.2\]{]go rims kyang [,]go rim yang [}]ni ci 'dra lags/_/lha ni ci lags rus ci lags/_/lci ba ci lags yang ba gang /_/phan pa ci lags gnod pa ci/_/stobs ci bdag la myur du gsungs/_/gang gis su ni mtshan mo 'thob/_/nyi ma'i mdun na ci zhig lags/_/grib ma'i 
[\[195a.3\]]gom pa du zhig tu/_/nyi ma 'khor bar bgyid pa lags/_/zla ba gang la lho phyogs su/_/nyi ma byang du ji ltar gnas/_/drang srong khyod la kun zhu na/_/bdag cag la ni kun ston cig_/shes rab chen pos 'jig rten mkhas/_/skar la dga' bas de skad smras/_/
[\[195a.4\]]bskal pa bzang po zhugs pa na/_/sngon chad byung ba skye lags 'gro/_/dpal ldan grong khyer lnga len du/_/'dod pa spangs shing chos dang ldan/_/gtsang ma 'dod cing rab mkhas pa'i/_/mi rgyal 'byor ba chen po byung /_/de yi btsun mo dam pa ni/_/'dod pa rnams la 
[\[195a.5\]]'chums gyur nas/_/de tshe yul ni dben par yang /_/gzu lums can dang lhan cig spyad/_/mngal ni smin par bya ba'i phyir/_/yang dang yang du spyad nas su/_/de tshe chos kyis sbrum par gyur/_/mi sdug pa yi khye'u zhig byung /_/bung bu'i mgo la bong mgrin po/_/
[\[195a.6\]]bong rna po la bong gdong po/_/thams cad rtsub po ral pa can/_/mi yi lus ni phyed yod pa/_/de mthong 'jigs nas myur du ni/_/snam phyi sar ni de bor ro/_/reg tu mi rung mi gtsang ba/_/de phyir srin mo bong mos blangs/_/gangs kyi gnas su song nas su/_/
[\[195a.7\]]bu la chags pas gsos pa yin/_/bcud kyis len ni 'thungs pas na/_/de tshe lha dang lhan cig 'grogs/_/shes rab chen po skal ldan po/_/rab tu brtson ldan snying rje'i sems/_/gzi brjid chen po byams pa thob/_/sems can kun la phan byed pa'o/_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]lha yi tshogs kyang 'dus nas su/_/rnga bong la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/de la yang ni snying brtse'i phyir/_/gangs kyi ri bo sprul pa byas/_/shing dang me tog 'bras bur ldan/_/dri zhim dga' bar byed pa ste/_/sna tshogs rtsi yis khebs pa la/_/bya rnams sna 
[\[195b.2\]]tshogs rten pa yin/_/der ni drang srong rnga bong de/_/rnam par dben par rten nas su/_/lo ni drug khri tham par yang /_/rkang pa gcig gis dka' thub gnas/_/brgya byin tshangs pas phyag byas te/_/lha rnams kun gyis mngon par bstod/_/gzugs rten 
[\[195b.3\]]lha rnams thams cad dang /_/der ni tshangs pa nye bar 'ongs/_/'dod rten lha rnams thams cad dang /_/der ni brgya byin nye bar 'ongs/_/klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum dag_/thams cad der ni nye bar lhags/_/'jig rten gang su mkhas pa ni/_/drang srong tshangs 
[\[195b.4\]]par spyod pa rnams/_/'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams pa/_/thams cad der ni nye bar lhags/_/kun gyis drang srong rnga bong la/_/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/_/btud nas thal mo sbyar byas te/_/brgya byin tshangs pas 'di skad smras/_/skal 
[\[195b.5\]]ldan chen po kye khyod ni/_/ci phyir ded la mngon par dga'/_/re ba ci 'dra ci la bsams/_/ci 'dod pa ni smra bar gyis/_/drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa/_/gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/_/mkha' la ci 'drar byung gyur pa'i/_/sngon gyi bskal pa bdag gis 
[\[195b.6\]]dran/_/nyin zhag du ni rgyu skar rnams/_/re re nas ni rgyu bar byed/_/tshe rabs kun tu rgyu skar gyi/_/yon tan las rnams rnam par shes/_/bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni/_/'di ni ci yang mi snang na/_/snying brtser gyis de khyod kyis ni/_/rgyu skar [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]kun 
[\[195b.7\]]zhog shig_/ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir gnas bzhin/_/de yi las dang yon tan gsungs/_/yon tan rgya mtshos shod cig ces/_/lha yi tshogs rnams kun gyis smras/_/drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa/_/re zhig dang por smin drug ces/_/rgyu skar 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]dkyil 'khor thams cad la/_/nang gi dang por gzhag par bya/_/ji ltar smin drug bzhag pa bzhin/_/'di la su zhig dad pa 'bul/_/lha yi bu ni nyi ma yang /_/skar ma drug po ston par byed/_/smin drug rgyu skar de dag ni/_/mkha' la rtag 
[\[196a.2\]]tu rgyu bar shog_/thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor dga' nas/_/me lha zhig ni sprul pa byas/_/gzi brjid chen po drang srong lha/_/me bzhin 'jug gis bus smras pa/_/bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'di dag_/gling bzhi par ni gnas par shog_/drang srong rnga bong slar 
[\[196a.3\]]smras pa/_/dang por smin drug de dag yin/_/rgyu skar chu yi rus can ni/_/gnyis pa yang ni yin par bya/_/skye dgu'i bdag gis 'di skad smras/_/bdag gis bu lnga dbul lags te/_/rus ni drang srong chen po chu/_/rab tu brtson ldan snar ma lags/_/
[\[196a.4\]]chu yi rus kyi rgyu skar ni/_/snar ma'i ming gis gnyis pa lags/_/zla ba'i bu pho gsum po ni/_/ming ni mgo zhes bgyi ba lags/_/ba ra dwa dza'i rus su ni/_/mgo zhes bgyi ba bzhag pa lags/_/rab tu mi bzad lag ces bya/_/lha drag rnams kyis 
[\[196a.5\]]bstan pa lags/_/ljang sngo'i bu yi bu rus su/_/de ni bzhi par bzhag pa lags/_/drang srong bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyis/_/nyi ma'i bu ni bstan lags te/_/nab so lags shing gnas 'jog rus/_/phur bu'i bu ni gsum lags te/_/lag gi bu 
[\[196a.6\]]yi rus lags shing /_/rgyal zhes bgyi bar de dag bshad/_/sa srung gi ni bu lnga po/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa mkhas pa rnams/_/mdza' bo'i bu yi rus lags te/_/de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun/_/shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag_/de yi las 
[\[196a.7\]]dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dang /_/sbyor ba kha 'dzin gzhung las bstan/_/ngas kyang yang ni khyed cag la/_/gling bzhi pa ni gnas byed cing /_/las ni ci 'dra sgrub byed pa/_/mdor ni myur du bshad par bya/_/phur bu yi ni bu lnga po/_/byang grol brtul zhugs 'chang ba dag_/
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ser skya'i bu yi rus su ni/_/lho yi phyogs su ngas bzhag go/_/dbyangs can gyi ni bu gnyis po/_/ming gis kyang ni gre yin te/_/drang srong gau ta ma rus su ni/_/lho yi phyogs su ngas bzhag go/_/lha mo yi ni bu gnyis po/_/ming gis kyang ni dbo yin te/_/
[\[196b.2\]]kau Di n+ya yi rus su ni/_/lho phyogs kha 'dzin gsum pa bzhag_/sdig pa yi ni bu bstan pa/_/drang srong kA tA'i bu yi rus/_/lhar bcas drang srong rnams kyis der/_/me bzhi zhes ni bya bar bzhag_/dri za'i bu ni nag pa ste/_/kA tA'i bu yi rus yin no/_/
[\[196b.3\]]sa ri de ni ma yi bu/_/kA tA'i bu chen rus yin no/_/'dir ni sa ga dpal gyi bu/_/kA tA'i bu rgan rus yin te/_/drang srong rnams kyis rgyu skar bdun/_/lho phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag_/mdza' bo'i bu yi bu bzhi po/_/drag po'i bu yi rus yin te/_/ming 
[\[196b.4\]]gis lha mtshams zhes bya ba/_/nub phyogs su ni bzhag pa yin/_/dbang po yi ni bu gsum ste/_/zla ba kA tA'i bu yi rus/_/'jam pa'i las ni thams cad la/_/gnyis pa snron ni bzhag pa yin/_/sa yi lha mo'i bu gsum ste/_/snrubs ni lag pa'i 
[\[196b.5\]]bu yi rus/_/rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste/_/kA tA'i bu yi rus yin no/_/thams cad lha zhes bya ba bzhi/_/maud gal bu yi rus yin no/_/snrubs dang chu stod chu smad gnyis/_/rgyu skar gsum po bzhag pa yin/_/sred med bu yi bu gsum po/_/rgyu skar 
[\[196b.6\]]rnams ni byi bzhin 'khod/_/khyab 'jug gi ni bu gsum ste/_/kA tA'i bu pho dpal gyi rus/_/de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun/_/nub phyogs kyi ni kha 'dzin yin/_/nor lha'i bu ni mon gru ste/_/drang srong rna ba'i rus yin no/_/chu lha'i bu ni gcig pu ste/_/deb 
[\[196b.7\]]rtse'i bu yi rus yin zhing /_/sman ma sprul gyi lha mo yi/_/rgyu skar mon gre gnas pa yin/_/sdig pa yi ni bu gnyis te/_/khrums stod ces ni bya bar bshad/_/chu yi rna ba'i rus su ni/_/gsum pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin/_/lha yi drang srong chu lha'i bu/_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]khrums smad ces ni bya bar bshad/_/bra nye drang srong rus yin par/_/bzhi pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin/_/lha yi drang srong rgyal gyi bu/_/nam gru zhes bya de bstan te/_/drang srong dbang po'i rus su ni/_/lnga pa 'di ni bzhag pa yin/_/dri za'i rgyal po'i 
[\[197a.2\]]bu gsum ste/_/lnga len bu yi rus yin zhing /_/rgyu skar tha skar zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis bzhag_/drag po'i bu ni gsum yin te/_/bra nye ngan spong rus yin no/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/byang phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su bzhag_/
[\[197a.3\]]rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/_/kha 'dzin bzhir ni gzhung las bshad/_/gtor ma las dang yon tan rnams/_/mdor na nga yis bshad par bya/_/thams cad rab tu thal sbyar 'khod/_/lha dang shed las skyes rnams kyis/_/drang srong rnga bong la ni smras/_/mi dge 
[\[197a.4\]]sngon du 'gro ba'i las/_/gang byas khyod ni mi sdug skyes/_/gang du thams cad myur zad 'gyur/_/'di ni lha dang mi rnams dang /_/drang srong dag ni zhi ba rnams/_/thams cad gzugs ni bzang por gyur/_/rigs dang snyan ldan de dag kun/_/drang srong rnga bong 
[\[197a.5\]]de la ni/_/brgya byin lhan cig 'khod nas su/_/'khor kun rangs te thal sbyar gyur/_/bsam pa gcig tu smras pa ni/_/nam mkha' 'di la rgyu skar ni/_/gang zhig dang por rgyu bar byed/_/kha zas su ni ci za shod/_/mi rnams kyi ni las ci sgrub/_/yun ni ji srid 
[\[197a.6\]]rgyu bar byed/_/drang srong de dag thams cad la/_/rnga bong gis ni ji skad smras/_/ji ltar nga yis brjod pa bzhin/_/'dir ni khyed kyis dad pa phul/_/rgyu skar 'di la ngas mchog phyin/_/de ni khyod la brjod par bya/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]shes pa nga bdag bzhin/_/gling 
[\[197a.7\]]bzhi'i sems can phan pa'i phyir/_/lo skor yang ni shes par bya/_/dang por nyi ma gang yin pa/_/ngas byas pa ni nga yi mig_/bu drug g.yo can sems rangs pa/_/de ni nga yis dang por brjod/_/de yi phyir na smin drug ni/_/rgyu skar tshogs ni thams cad du/_/
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]nang gi gtso bor 'gyur bar shog_/zla ba nya dang nyi ma yi/_/nyin mtshan de dag mnyam par gnas/_/mtshan mo gzhan ni mun khyab dang /_/chu lha yang ni gnas par 'gyur/_/'gro ba bzod pa bgrang ba dang /_/bra nye gnas bzhin 'di ltar bshad/_/mon 
[\[197b.2\]]sran bcu drug brgyar bsgyur te/_/skyes bu dang ni brgyad pa gcig_/brgyad pa phrag ni bcu drug la/_/cha ni gcig tu 'gyur ba yin/_/cha ni drug cu tham pa la/_/yud tsam cig ni de yin no/_/de tsam yud tsam sum cu la/_/'dir ni 'jig rten gnas pa 
[\[197b.3\]]yin/_/ri rab g.yas nas bskor ba'i tshe/_/yud tsam sum cus 'gro bar byed/_/'dir ni mon sran tshod ma za/_/bya ba nyung ngu bsgrub par gyis/_/rgyal po nad pas 'gro ba kun/_/zhag bcu tham pa thar bar gyis/_/rtag tu dad pas mtshon chas bsrungs/_/
[\[197b.4\]]mchog sbyin khyod kyis bu skye gang /_/tshor ba dbang po thul ba dang /_/chos kyi blo gros nab so la/_/mngal du nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur/_/'dir ni gre la bya ba mang /_/chu smad bra nye gsum pa yin/_/me bzhi snar ma gro bzhin ni/_/nor rgud byed par 'gyur 
[\[197b.5\]]ba yin/_/snrubs dang skag dang nam gru ni/_/lam dag gi ni rgyu skar yin/_/khrums stod dang ni snron dang ni/_/rgyal dang yang ni khrums smad ni/_/phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin/_/mchu dang chu stod tha skar dang /_/mon gru dang ni smin drug dang /_/dbo zhes 
[\[197b.6\]]bya ba dag gis ni/_/bde ba sgrub par byed pa yin/_/'dir ni mgo dang nag pa dang /_/mon gru dang ni mon gre dang /_/sa ri lag ni rnam drug gis/_/grogs po dang ni grogs mchog 'gyur/_/lha yi dbang pos 'di skad smras/_/snron gyi tshe na tshes gnyis la/_/
[\[197b.7\]]yud tsam sum cur mi zad par/_/bya phyir mkha' la khyod gnas kyis/_/khyod kyis kyang ni la phug dang /_/bu ram zas la gnas par gyis/_/nad pa zhag ni bcu gsum khrol/_/da ltar skye dgu skye ba med/_/shin tu tshul 'chal snying rje spangs/_/mchod sbyin 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]dang ni skye ba dang /_/snron la skye tshe rtag tu ni/_/mngal du mtshams sbyor bsrung bar gyis/_/nag pa dang ni mon gru dang /_/mgo la grags pa mang du byed/_/byi bzhin dang ni gre dang dbo/_/las dag gi ni rgyu skar yin/_/khrums stod dang ni khrums smad 
[\[198a.2\]]ni/_/rgud byed chu dang chu stod dang /_/tha skar phun sum tshogs par byed/_/snrubs dang skag dang nam gru dang /_/mon gre me bzhi snar ma ni/_/bde ba sgrub par byed pa yin/_/bra nye dang ni gre dang ni/_/chu smad mdza' bo'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/khrums stod dang ni sa ri dang /_/
[\[198a.3\]]mon gru dang ni nab so dang /_/sa ga dang ni lag kyang ni/_/'dir ni rnam pa drug tu 'gyur/_/lha yi drang srong des gsob kyis/_/snrubs bshad pa na tshes gsum la/_/yud tsam sum cur nam mkha' la/_/bya ba che chung khyod gnas kyis/_/zas ni 'bras bu la phug dang /_/
[\[198a.4\]]bdug pa dang ni me tog ste/_/zhag ni sum cur bdag nyid kyis/_/nad pa yang ni thar bar byed/_/gang zhig spyod par byed pas ni/_/skye dgu mi skye nor dang 'bru/_/skal ldan skyes bu'i rnam pa dang /_/sa la las ni byed par 'gyur/_/mgo la mngal du mtshams sbyor 
[\[198a.5\]]ba/_/rta dang yang ni rnga mo dang /_/glang po che dang khyu mchog dang /_/dred dang bcas pa'i rnam par 'gyur/_/chu stod dang ni gre dang ni/_/bra nye dang ni gsum pa ste/_/'jig pa'i rgyur 'gyur skag dang snrubs/_/de la 'phel bar byed par 'gyur/_/nam gru bgrang dang mnyam 'gyur 
[\[198a.6\]]te/_/mon gru las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang /_/de la rgud par byed par 'gyur/_/lha mtshams nab so gsum pa yin/_/lag ni de la rgud byed 'gyur/_/sa ga dang ni mon gre yang /_/gsum pa zhes ni bya ba yin/_/tha skar de la sgrub par 
[\[198a.7\]]'gyur/_/chu stod zla ba gnyis pa ste/_/snron dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang /_/de la bde bar byed par 'gyur/_/khrums smad ces ni bya ba ni/_/grogs dang grogs po mchog tu 'gyur/_/drug po 'di dag lag dang ni/_/gro bzhin snar ma gsum pa yin/_/smin drug 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]ces ni bya ba yang /_/byi bzhin dang ni dbo yin no/_/'dir ni khron pa sa rir gyur/_/me lha yin te sa gas bshad/_/gling bzhir tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_/khyod spyod yud tsam bzhi bcu lngas/_/'gro bar byed cing bya ba ni/_/chen po mi zad pa yis gnas/_/zhag ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga 
[\[198b.2\]]tham par yang /_/nad pa yang ni thar bar gyis/_/su zhig kyang ni khyod kyi bur/_/dag par rjes su skye 'gyur ba/_/gzi brjid dang ni dpal dang ni/_/longs spyod dga' ba 'bar bar 'gyur/_/bud med brnab sems shin tu srungs/_/de skye'i rgyu skar lag yin 
[\[198b.3\]]no/_/de'i las rgyu skar mon gre yin/_/mchu dang tha skar chu stod rgyu/_/smin drug ces ni bya ba la/_/de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/byi bzhin dang ni dbo yang ni/_/'dir ni rgud par byed pa yin/_/khrums stod dang ni snron dang ni/_/nab so yang ni gsum pa ste/_/
[\[198b.4\]]lha mtshams zhes ni bya bar yang /_/de ni phun sum tshogs byed yin/_/nab so khrums stod snrubs dang ni/_/nam gru skag ni bde byed yin/_/gre dang yang ni chu smad dang /_/gsum pa bra nye sgrub pa yin/_/mdza' bo dang ni mdza' mchog tu/_/de dag der ni 'gyur ba 
[\[198b.5\]]yin/_/nag pa snar ma mon gru bzhin/_/mgo gnyis me bzhi gro bzhin yang /_/'dir ni de bdun lho phyogs kyi/_/kha 'dzin phrugs zhes bya ba yin//_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po bcu 
[\[198b.6\]]pa/_mdza' bshes kyi ni lha mo yis/_/yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/_/'gro bar byed pa'i [{]go rims kyang [,]go rim yang [}]/_/lha mtshams la ni smras pa yin/_/bra nye tshes ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yi/_/nyin par yang ni yud tsam yin/_/mtshan mo yang ni de tsam ste/_/nyin mtshan gcig la 
[\[198b.7\]]bra nye yin/_/chu yi lha mo de yang ni/_/nyin dang mtshan du mnyam pa ste/_/yud tsam sum cu tham pa yin/_/de yi longs spyod thang cig shog_/rgyal po legs brtan snying rje spangs/_/'thun par yul 'khor skyong ba bzhin/_/de bzhin du ni mi zad pa'i/_/bra 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]nye yang ni 'gro bar shog_/'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog_/de bzhin khyed cag thams cad kyis/_/de la dmod pa bor bar gyis/_/de bzhin 'gro la bstan par gyis/_/kun gyis smras pa/_de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog_/mi zad pa yi bya 
[\[199a.2\]]ba gyis/_/khyod kyis spyod pas gang skye ba/_/mi yi thu bo mi bzad 'gyur/_/de yi mngal 'jug chu stod yin/_/bra nye la ni skyes pa'i mi/_/'chi ba'i tshe na lha mtshams dang /_/khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/_/'di la mkhas pas brtag bya ste/_/sa ri 
[\[199a.3\]]mon gru ma yin gzhi/_/dmag 'gro rtsod pa'i gnas dag gis/_/bya spang spu gri'i las mi bya/_/snar ma me bzhi byi bzhin ni/_/rgud byed dgra rnams khyod kyis gzhom/_/khyod kyis las ni che chung kun/_/gre yi tshe na bya bar gyis/_/chu smad dang ni dbo yang ni/_/
[\[199a.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa byed par byed/_/sman rnams brten bya sbyin dang dul/_/gos dang rgyan gyi bya ba'ang brjod/_/mgo dang nag pa zhes bya dang /_/gro bzhin mchu ni bde bar byed/_/sa ga nab so mon gre ste/_/de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin/_/skag dang snrubs zhes bya ba 
[\[199a.5\]]dang /_/tha skar dang ni mchu dang gre/_/grogs po mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/_/bsgrub tu mi rung las kyang gyis/_/'di tshe khri bzhon gos dang mal/_/mdza' bo rnams la'ang brtsam par bya/_/nyi ma'i bu ni mig dmar te/_/drang srong chen po der dpang btsugs/_/bcu 
[\[199a.6\]]gnyis khyim dus gnas de nas/_/der yod las 'thun grib gom drug_/der ni dus kyang mnyam pa yin/_/nyin dang mtshan kyang mtshungs pa yin/_/de yod tha skar mtshan mo gang /_/lha mtshams nyin par gnas pa na/_/khyod kyis nga ni spang bar gyis/_/mkha' 
[\[199a.7\]]la spyod cing khyod kyis ston/_/gling bzhi pa ni mgu bya'i phyir/_/'di ni ji ltar lhags pa bzhin/_/ngas 'dir gang zhig yang dag brjod/_/lha yi drang srong kun dga' gyur/_/de bzhin khyod ni kun du song /_/smin drug de bzhin me yi lha/_/bdag nyid gling bzhi der 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]gnas shing /_/khyod kyis me bzhin myur bya gyis/_/yud tsam sum cur tshal du song /_/der gang mi yi zas 'byung ba/_/dam pa'i grags dang longs spyod kyang /_/zla nya khyod 'dir yang legs rdzogs/_/de ltar nga yis thob pa yin/_/zhag bzhi tham par 
[\[199b.2\]]nad pa ni/_/myur ba kho nar thar bar gyis/_/mngal du 'jug pa me bzhi bsrungs/_/chu stod 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/skag khrums stod smad nab so dang /_/mon gre 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/khyod kyis bya ba 'di spongs shig_/dmag dang rtsod pa'i gnas 'gro 
[\[199b.3\]]dang /_/spu gri yi ni las rnams so/_/gro bzhin dang ni nag pa dang /_/mgo ni rgud par byed pa yin/_/lag dang dbo ni 'dir 'joms byed/_/byed pa'i bya ba 'di gyis shig_/che dang chung ba gang ci yang /_/snar mas phun sum tshogs par byed/_/byi bzhin 
[\[199b.4\]]dang ni nag par bcas/_/der ni bya ba gang rtsi dang /_/gom pa sbyin pa gos dang mal/_/der ni rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/_/lag ni bde bar byed pa ste/_/mon gru dang ni sa ri yang /_/gsum po dag ni de dag yin/_/lam du 'jug pa'ang de dag yin/_/rgyal 
[\[199b.5\]]dang lha mtshams khrums stod ni/_/las dag sgrub par byed pa yin/_/mchu snrubs skag dang khrums smad dang /_/de dang de rnams drag byed grogs/_/skal bzang bag ma gtong dang bzhon/_/mal yang der ni de bya ste/_/khyim dang dus zhes bya ba dang /_/gza' 
[\[199b.6\]]rnams bdag gis brjod pa yin/_/de ltar bdag gis dus kun brjod/_/khyod ci drang srong lha mi dga'/_/bdag gis byed de bshad pa bzhin/_/lha dbang drang srong 'khor dang bcas/_/mi yis thal sbyar 'di skad smras/_/'byung po kun la phan pa khyod/_/'gro 
[\[199b.7\]]ba la ni skyob pa khyod/_/de ltar shes mnyam ji bzhin khyod/_/yang smras pa/_rnga bong can gyi drang srong ste/_/snar ma chu yi rigs kyang yin/_/chu yi lha mo khyod yin na/_/gsum par yang ni 'gro bar gyis/_/byed pa chung dang 'bring yin zhing /_/bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tham 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]pa yin/_/yud tsam du ni khyod kyis 'gro/_/dug dang sha ni zas yin no/_/khyod la spyod par byed pa yis/_/gang dag mi rnams skye 'gyur ba/_/de dag phyug cing chos dang ldan/_/zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos/_/de 'dir khyod kyis bstan par gyis/_/
[\[200a.2\]]byi bzhin nam grus mngal du 'jug_/'chi ba snrubs dang mchu bzhin te/_/rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod 'phel/_/dmag 'gro bag ma gtong ba yi/_/gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa dang /_/nyo tshong dang ni bzo byed pa/_/de 'dra ba yi bya ba spongs/_/sa ri mon 
[\[200a.3\]]gru de dag 'dir/_/rgud byed dgra 'dir gzhom par bya/_/me bzhi las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/che chung thams cad 'dir gyis shig_/mgo dang nag pa gro bzhin te/_/de dag phun sum tshogs par byed/_/rtsi byed na yang de dag sten/_/der byin gos rgyan sna tshogs sgrogs/_/
[\[200a.4\]]nab so dang ni sa ga dang /_/mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/_/de dag la ni lam du 'jug_/snron ni sgrub pa byed pa yin/_/skag ces bya ba khrums smad ni/_/drag po'i las dag byed pa yin/_/chu stod chu smad tha skar dang /_/bra nye khrums stod khrums smad mdza'/_/
[\[200a.5\]]dbos ni skal ba bzang po sbyin/_/brtson pa dang ni bzhon pa dang /_/mal dang khri ni bsham pa yang /_/'di la bya ba de 'jug go/_/yang smras pa/_'gro ba bzhi dang ldan par ni/_/mgo la khyod ni gnas par 'gyur/_/mi yi las bya myur du sgrubs/_/yud tsam 
[\[200a.6\]]sum cur 'gro bar gyis/_/zhag brgyad nad pa myur du gsos/_/khyod zas tshon sha zla ba'i lha/_/der ni skyes dgu gang dag skye/_/dpa' zhing 'byor bar 'gyur ba yin/_/khyab 'jug bden 'di shin tu bsrungs/_/de byed ji bzhin nga yis bshad/_/gro bzhin tha skar 
[\[200a.7\]]mngal du 'jug_/mchu gnyis gre dbo 'chi bar byed/_/snron gyi tshe ni bya ba 'phel/_/skag dang gzhan bcas thob par byed/_/lam ring rtsod dang gnas nas 'gro/_/bya ba de 'dra spang bar gyis/_/nab so rgud par byed pa ste/_/mon gre sa ga bzhin du shes/_/gsang 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]ba'i gnas bzhin brtsam par gyis/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]g.yo dmangs kyis 'joms par byed/_/nag pa las kyi rgyu skar te/_/'di la che chung thams cad rtsom/_/lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed/_/mon gru sa ri gzhan thob byed/_/'dir ni sman dang sbyin 'dul 
[\[200b.2\]]bzhon/_/rgyan dang gos kyang thob par byed/_/rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod bde/_/de dag lam du shin tu 'phrod/_/snrubs dang nam gru mchu sgrub byed/_/'di la gtum po'i las kyang bya/_/me bzhi dgra zin bra nye dang /_/snar ma dbyer med chu gnyis 
[\[200b.3\]]bzhin/_/skal bzang bag ma gtong dang bzhon/_/mal kun 'dir ni byed du chug_/lag lha drag mos de tshe smras/_/tshes lnga la ni khyod gnas te/_/yud tsam bco lnga khyod 'gro byed/_/khyod kyi zas ni mar sar te/_/drag cing mi bzad sdang byed sgrub/_/nad 
[\[200b.4\]]pa yang ni zhag bcu yin/_/khyod la spyad pas mi gang skye/_/srid pa gsum du mi zad 'gyur/_/nor tshol byed cing chom pos 'chi/_/khyod kyi sbyor bas de yin no/_/mon gru snrubs la mngal du 'jug_/chu dang nam grus 'phel bar 'gyur/_/dbo yi tshe na 'chi 
[\[200b.5\]]bar byed/_/chu gnyis bra nye ji bzhin no/_/skye dang 'jig dang 'phel ba yi/_/byed pa de ni spong bar gyis/_/lha mtshams dang ni khrums stod der/_/byed pa bstan nas rgud par byed/_/sa ri las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/byed pa chung ngu thams cad 'jug_/sa ga dang ni 
[\[200b.6\]]mon gre dang /_/nab so phun sum tshogs par byed/_/khrums smad par ni bde byed yin/_/snron dang skag ni lam na mnyam/_/gre ni sgrub par byed pa ste/_/chu stod tha skar gsum pa yin/_/me bzhi'i bar gzhan grogs mchog ste/_/smin drug nag pa gro bzhin 
[\[200b.7\]]dang /_/byi bzhin bag ma gtong dang bzhon/_/mal dang skal ba bzang por sgrub/_/nyi ma'i lha mo nab sos smras/_/tshes drug la yang gnas par 'gyur/_/sbrul sha khyod kyi zas su shog_/las kyang drag por bya bar gyis/_/yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'gro/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]'dir ni nad pa zhag brgyad yin/_/khyod spyad su yang mi nang skye/_/zhing pa longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/_/rta dang glang chen zad par 'gro/_/nab sos mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/_/'di ni mon gre'i zas yin te/_/smin drug la ni 'chi bar byed/_/
[\[201a.2\]]khrums smad rgud par byed pa yin/_/skag snron las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/sa ga brtul zhugs bstan pa yin/_/rgyal yang phun sum tshogs par byed/_/lag dang lha mtshams zhes bya dang /_/khrums stod kyang ni bde bar byed/_/mchu dang nam gru bzhin du ste/_/
[\[201a.3\]]de dag lam du zhugs na bzang /_/bra nye chu smad gre dang dbo/_/sgrub byed nag pa gro bzhin dang /_/sa ri snar ma mgo mon gru/_/mi yi nang khyod grogs mchog 'gyur/_/rgyal 'dir lha mo phur bu khyod/_/tshes bdun gnas khyod yud sum cu/_/'gro byed bu ram sbrang rtsi 
[\[201a.4\]]zas/_/chos ldan byed chud myur du sgrub/_/nad kyang zhag lnga kho na ste/_/khyod spyad su yang mi nang skye/_/tshul dga' chos smras mdun 'don blon/_/zhing ring bag gtong de dag 'jig_/khrums stod dang ni lha mtshams la/_/mngal du 'jug par byed pa ste/_/
[\[201a.5\]]dbo dang yang ni tha skar dang /_/chu smad la ni 'phel bar byed/_/snar ma nag pa gro bzhin 'chi/_/gsum po de dag shes par gyis/_/mchu snrubs nam gru de dag gsum/_/rgud byed mkhas pas shes par gyis/_/lha mtshams byed pa thams cad la/_/las 
[\[201a.6\]]dag gi ni rgyu skar te/_/mkhas pas shes pa kho nar gyis/_/snron ni phun sum tshogs par byed/_/khrums smad skag gis thob byed gre/_/chu stod tha skar gsum po bde/_/me bzhi sgrub min drug dbyer med/_/de bzhin mkhas pas gsum shes gyis/_/sa ri 
[\[201a.7\]]grogs dang grogs mchog ste/_/mgo dang lag dang mon gru bzhin/_/sa ga dang ni mon gre yang /_/don ni 'bras bur bcas pa yin/_/sbrul gyi lha mo skag 'dir smra/_/tshes brgyad la ni khyod gnas kyis/_/yud tsam bco lngas khyod 'gro byed/_/god 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]pa'i sha ni zas yin no/_/'gro ba'i nang du gshin rje yi/_/byed pa mi zad khyod gnas kyis/_/nyin der khyod spyod su mir skye/_/khro zhing sdig pa can du 'gyur/_/shin tu mi sdug tshul khrims nyams/_/chos gos gding ba zad 'gyur zhing /_/khrums smad ces 
[\[201b.2\]]bya rab mchog la/_/mngal du 'jug pa ston par byed/_/me bzhi smin drug 'chi bar byed/_/mgo snrubs gre ni ro myangs pas/_/rgud byed chu stod tha skar dang /_/snron ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/snrubs dang nam gru mchu zhes pa/_/gsum po phun sum tshogs par 
[\[201b.3\]]byed/_/bra nye bde byed gro dbo dang /_/gro bzhin mchu gnyis khyod thos sgrub/_/nag pa snar ma mchu gnyis dang /_/mon gre lha mtshams sa ga dang /_/lag dang nab so de dag grogs/_/khrums stod kyang ni de bzhin no/_/gshin rje'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha mos smras/_/
[\[201b.4\]]tshes dgu la ni khyod gnas shing /_/yud tsam sum cur nyin mtshan du/_/til gyi sbyar thug zas yin no/_/sems can byed pa chung 'bring sgrubs/_/zhag brgyad tham par nad pa sos/_/gang ma'i bra nye su mir skye/_/bsod nams byed par bshad pa yin/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[201b.5\]]srog shin tu yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]bsrungs/_/snrubs ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/'dir yang nam grus mngal du 'jug_/sa ga la yang 'chi bar byed/_/lag ces bya ba kho na dang /_/mon gre yang ni gsum pa yin/_/snar ma dang ni nag pa dang /_/gsum pa gro bzhin 'dir 
[\[201b.6\]]dga' byed/_/dbo dang bra nye rgud byed yin/_/chu smad phun sum tshogs par byed/_/tha skar dang ni gre dang ni/_/mchu gnyis 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/gsum po de dag shes par gyis/_/me bzhi dang ni byi bzhin dang /_/smin drug kyang ni bde bar byed/_/sa ri de la 
[\[201b.7\]]sgrub pa yin/_/mgo gnyis dang ni mon gru bcas/_/de gsum rje grogs shes par gyis/_/snron rgyal lha mtshams chu stod dang /_/nab so lhag par zla ba'ang yin/_/skal ldan lha mo gre yis smras/_/tshes bcu la ni khyod gnas shig_/bil ba mar sar zas yin 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]te/_/yud tsam sum cur khyod kyis 'gro/_/'gro 'dir bya ba chung ngu sgrubs/_/zhag bdun nad pa khyod spyod pas/_/su zhig mir skye dri dga' 'dod/_/gos dang rgyan dag 'dod pa yin/_/bye brag phyed rnams su srung ba/_/tha skar la ni mngal 'jug 
[\[202a.2\]]'gyur/_/nab sos 'chi mgo zin ro myang /_/'phel byed smin drug rgud par byed/_/me bzhi'ang mkhas pas mngon shes gyis/_/gre zhes bya dang bra nye dang /_/chu smad ces ni bya ba gsum/_/phun sum tshogs byed shes par gyis/_/'di ni sa ga mon gre yang /_/
[\[202a.3\]]sgrub yin lag la'ang bde ba ste/_/snar ma nag pa gro bzhin nyin/_/mkhas pas grogs gnyis shes par gyis/_/rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ba ni/_/skag dang nam gru rgyal dag dang /_/snrubs dang snron zhes bya ba dang /_/khrums gnyis gang yin 'dir yin 
[\[202a.4\]]no/_/lhag par yang ni de bzhin du/_/thams cad kyang ni bgrang bar gyis/_/mkhas pa blo gros ldan pa yis/_/rang gi thams cad shes par gyis/_/gre dbo nyi ma'i lha mos smras/_/tshes ni bcu gcig khyod gnas kyis/_/yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yis/_/
[\[202a.5\]]khyod ni rnam par grol bar gyis/_/mgo yis las ni chung ngus kyang /_/sa bon thob cing bskyed bya ste/_/zhag bcur nad pa zhi bar gyis/_/khyod spyad skye dgu gang 'byung ba/_/blun zhing bsnyen gnas gnas pa dang /_/sbyin bral 'gro la sdang mi sdug_/dug gis 
[\[202a.6\]]'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/_/de yi mngal 'jug bra nye shog_/nam gru mon gre 'phel bar byed/_/lag ces bya dang sa ga dang /_/snron zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/_/de dag 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/khrums smad dang ni rgyal yang 'dir/_/rgud byed yin par shes par gyis/_/
[\[202a.7\]]snar ma dang ni chu smad kyang /_/de'i las rgyu skar shes par gyis/_/me bzhi'ang phun sum tshogs byed cing /_/byi bzhin dang ni smin drug kyang /_/bde bar byed pa'i gnas yin te/_/mon gru dang ni mgo sgrub byed/_/nab so khrums stod lha mtshams 'dir/_/mkhas pa 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bzhin du'ang shes par gyis/_/grogs dang grogs mchog tha skar te/_/mchu dang nam gru skag dang bcas/_/snrubs dang khrums stod ces bya ba/_/drug po de dag nam mkha' la/_/nyi ma'i lha mo lhan cig par/_/mkhas pa yis ni shes par gyis/_/bcu 
[\[202b.2\]]gnyis khru myur rgyal byed mkha'i/_/dpal las bya bar myur mi bzad/_/yud tsam sum cur 'gro bar gyis/_/sems can rnams la phan par byin/_/e ma khyod zas lham mchu gsher/_/zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos/_/der gnas skye dgu gang skye ba/_/
[\[202b.3\]]dbang phyug gtso bo nor ldan yin/_/chom rkun rnams ni 'dul byed mchog_/sbyin dang dul bar byed pa yin/_/mchog sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur ba yin/_/byang chub kyi ni yan lag bdun/_/go 'phang srung bar byed pas na/_/
[\[202b.4\]]de yi grags pa mngal 'jug kyang /_/skag ces bya ba kho na yin/_/lha mtshams 'chi bar byed pa ste/_/de yi 'phel byed nab so yin/_/khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang /_/las kyi rgyu skar dbyer med pa'o/_/sa ri mon gru 'dir rgud byed/_/'dir ni 
[\[202b.5\]]mgo yang gsum pa yin/_/phun sum tshogs byed 'dir gro bzhin/_/sa ri snar ma'ang gsum pa yin/_/mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/_/'dir ni sa ga lag gsum pa/_/snron dang rgyal yang sgrub pa ste/_/'dir ni khrums smad gsum pa'ang yin/_/grogs dang 
[\[202b.6\]]grogs mchog 'di drug ste/_/chu stod mchu dang tha skar dang /_/chu smad ces ni bya ba dang /_/gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed/_/dga' byed lha mo nag pas smras/_/khyod mkha' myur song yud sum cur/_/mi bzad las byed myur gnas shig_/yan lag rmas pa'ang khyod 
[\[202b.7\]]kyis bza'/_/zhag drug nad pa myur du gsos/_/khyod la gnas pas skye dgu skye/_/glu dang rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/_/sbyin dga' 'dod spyod mkhas la sdug_/snar ma de yi mngal 'jug yin/_/tha skar zhes ni bya ba dang /_/mchu ni 'chi bar byed pa ste/_/chu stod ces 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]bya gsum pa'ang yin/_/khrums smad 'phel bar byed pa ste/_/snron dang rgyal ni gsum pa'ang yin/_/de yi las kyi rgyu skar ni/_/gro bzhin yin gyi bgrang bar gyis/_/'dir ni mon gre rgud par byed/_/sa ga 'dir lag gsum pa'ang yin/_/mgo 
[\[203a.2\]]ni phun sum tshogs byed 'dir/_/sa ri mon gru gsum pa'ang yin/_/'dir yang lha mtshams bde bar byed/_/mgo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang /_/khrums stod ces ni bya ba dang /_/skag kyang 'dir ni sgrub pa yin/_/grogs dang grogs mchog snrubs nam gru/_/'dir 
[\[203a.3\]]drug chu smad smin drug dang /_/bra nye dang ni dbo dang yang /_/sa bon gre dang sa ri ste/_/pha mas 'dir smras gling bzhi bar/_/mkha' la khyod song tshes bcu bzhir/_/khyod spyod 'gro ba'i gling bzhi bar/_/lnga yud drag byos khyod song shig_/me tog nas shin zas yin te/_/
[\[203a.4\]]zhag lngar nad pa myur du gsos/_/khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba/_/rtsis pa 'byor rnyed khro bar 'gyur/_/'dir ni rgyu skar khro sdang g.yo/_/snar ma me bzhi rgud par byed/_/'dir ni smin drug byi bzhin dang /_/gsum pa dbo ni phun sum tshogs/_/sa ga dang ni nab so 
[\[203a.5\]]dang /_/gsum pa khrums stod sgrub pa yin/_/'dir bde nag pa mgo mon gru/_/rnam pa drug ni mdza' bo yin/_/nam gru snron mdza' tha skar dang /_/mchu snrubs de dag mchog tu mdza'/_/byi bzhin tshangs pa'i lha mos smras/_/tshes drug mkha' la khyod yud 
[\[203a.6\]]song /_/mi bzad bya ba 'byung bya'i phyir/_/mar sar yang ni khyod zo shig_/khyod la sems can su gnas pa/_/dpa' zhing sran thub 'byor rgyal gtso/_/yul 'khor grong 'joms dgra thul ba/_/dbo la de ni mngal du 'jug_/de la 'phel byed 'chi ba med/_/
[\[203a.7\]]de yi rgyu skar kun grogs mchog_/gro bzhin khyab 'jug lha srong smras/_/nga'i g.yas tshes bdun 'dir khyod song /_/sum cu'i yud sha bu ram zas/_/'phrog byed bya ba chung ngu sgrubs/_/khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba/_/mkhas par byed pa'i mchog yin te/_/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]grogs skyong rnams kyis mchod pa yin/_/'dir de me bzhis mngal 'jug yin/_/rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang /_/khrums stod la ni 'phel bar byed/_/mchu snrubs gro bzhin 'chi bar byed/_/snar ma las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/sa ri mon gre lag rgud 
[\[203b.2\]]byed/_/mon gru mgo zhes bya ba dang /_/nag pa phun sum tshogs par byed/_/khrums stod nab so sa ga bde/_/nam gru nab so snron skag sgrub/_/rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog ste/_/smin drug chu smad de dag yin/_/de gnyis gsum pa dbo yang yin/_/
[\[203b.3\]]mon gru drang srong nor lhas smras/_/tshes brgyad yud tsam sum cur khyod/_/bzhir song las chung khyod khu 'thung /_/der ni nad btab lo gcig gsos/_/khyod gnas skye dgu su skye ba/_/khro zhing rnyed gos dus kyang spangs/_/nang mis yongs skor mchod sbyin bsrungs/_/
[\[203b.4\]]'dir de'i mngal 'jug nag pa yin/_/gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed/_/chu stod gsum par bgrang bar gyis/_/snron skag nam gru 'phel bar byed/_/sa ga nab so khrums stod rgud/_/sa ri dang ni mon gre dang /_/lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed/_/las kun 
[\[203b.5\]]gnyen gyis shin tu bsrungs/_/de yi mngal 'jug skag yin no/_/mon gre zhes ni bya ba dang /_/lag ni 'chi bar byed pa ste/_/me bzhi dang ni mon gre dang /_/snar ma 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/nam gru de las rgyu skar yin/_/bra nye dang ni chu smad dang /_/gre zhes 
[\[203b.6\]]kyang ni bya ba yang /_/gsum pa yin te rgud par byed/_/chu stod mchu dang tha skar ni/_/phun sum tshogs byed nag pa dang /_/mon gru mgo ni sgrub par byed/_/byi bzhin dbo ni bde bar bsgrags/_/rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog yin/_/khrums stod khrums 
[\[203b.7\]]smad nab so 'dir/_/rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang /_/sa ga 'dir ni smras pa yin/_/chu stod gzhi yi lha mos smras/_/tshes bzhi'i mtshams khyod mkha' la song /_/n+ya gro d+ha ni zas yin te/_/yud tsam sum cur 'gro bar byed/_/gdab mo chu yi las phyir yin/_
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bad kan gyur nad chung bar 'gyur/_/khyod spyod skye dgu der su skye/_/chos gnas brtson thos longs spyod ldan/_/mkhas pa dag dang phrad pa yin/_/bya ba kun la mkhas pa yin/_/der skye'i rgyu skar 'dir mchu yin/_/'dir las rgyu skar tha 
[\[204a.2\]]skar yin/_/nag pa mgo dang mon gru 'phel/_/sa ga khrums stod nab so ni/_/'dir yang 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/dbo ni 'dir yang rgud par byed/_/smin drug byi bzhin gsum pa'ang yin/_/'di ni phun sum tshogs byed gre/_/bra nye chu smad gsum pa'ang 
[\[204a.3\]]yin/_/khrums dang sa ri mon gre bsgrub/_/me bzhi snar ma gro bzhin bde/_/grogs dang grogs 'bring rnam drug ste/_/nam gru rgyal dang lha mtshams skag_/snron dang 'dir ni khrums smad yin/_/chu smad drang srong kun lhas smras/_/tshes lngar bzhi bcur lnga 
[\[204a.4\]]yud 'gro/_/khyod chung bsdu byar khyod zas mngar/_/zhag bdun nad gsos skye ba bsrung /_/khyod spyod skye dgu su skye ba/_/bu ldan yin zhing nad kyang med/_/grogs mang rab tu 'byor pa ste/_/mngal du 'jug pa'ang chu stod yin/_/mon gre dang ni lag dang 
[\[204a.5\]]ni/_/sa ri kho nas 'phel bar byed/_/khrums smad dang ni lha mtshams dang /_/rgyal yang 'dir ni 'chi byed yin/_/gshin rje'i lha mo la mgos smras/_/rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang /_/khrums smad bde bar byed pa ste/_/tha skar mchu snrubs sgrub pa yin/_/
[\[204a.6\]]dbo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang /_/chu smad smin drug grogs kyang byed/_/snar ma byi bzhin rtsis nas kyang /_/gsum pa me bzhi grogs mchog yin/_/mon gre bra nye'i lha mos smras/_/gling bzhi'i mkha' la khyod song shig_/yud tsam bco lngar zho mar zo/_/zhag bdun 
[\[204a.7\]]nad gsos las kyang chung /_/'dir khyod gnas pas skye dgu skye/_/khro bar byed cing med pa yin/_/chu bran la ni bsrung bar gyis/_/mngal 'jug 'dir ni sa ri yin/_/tha skar mchu snrubs 'phel bar byed/_/chu smad ces ni bya ba dang /_/smin drug 'chi bar byed pa ste/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]dbo yang gsum par shes par bya/_/khrums smad rgyal dang lha mtshams ni/_/rgud byed lag las rgyu skar yin/_/khrums stod nab so sa ga ste/_/de dag phun sum tshogs par byed/_/snron skag nam gru bde bar byed/_/gre dang chu stod bra nye sgrub/_/gro bzhin mgo dang me bzhi dang /_/snar ma byi bzhin 
[\[204b.2\]]grogs mchog grogs/_/khrums stod drang srong gis smras khyod/_/lan chung g.yo byed yud sum cur/_/bcu bzhi tshes gling bzhi 'dir song /_/sha sran khyod zo me tog bsnams/_/der ni sems can gang dag skyes/_/gya gyu g.yo rkun blun zhing 'thab/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]srog gcod yud sum 
[\[204b.3\]]cur/_/nad pa myur du thar byed cing /_/skye dgu de dag dmag rkun dang /_/rgyud sgra rtag bsrungs sa ga yang /_/'dir mngal 'jug yin bra nye dang /_/chu stod gsum pa gre 'dir 'phel/_/snar ma byi bzhin shi sos byed/_/thams cad bya phyir nab so lag_/
[\[204b.4\]]rgud byed nam gru snron skag bzhin/_/phun tshogs khrums smad lha mtshams rgyal/_/tha skar mchu snrubs 'dir bde byed/_/smin drug chu dbo gsum pa sgrub/_/mon gru mgo dang nag pa grogs/_/grogs mchog mon gru lag sa ri/_/khrums smad nyi ma'i lha mo 
[\[204b.5\]]khyod/_/bcu gcig tshes la mkha' la song /_/yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar song /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sha gtor zhag bdun rims/_/khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba/_/glu dang gar mkhas nor 'bru mang /_/rab tu rig pa'i pha rol phyin/_/'dir ni chos kyi sbyin pa byed/_/
[\[204b.6\]]lha mtshams 'phel byed smin drug dang /_/chu smad 'chi bar byed pa ste/_/nag pa mgo dang gro bzhin dang /_/rgyal de'i las kyi rgyu skar yin/_/snrubs dang tha skar mchu rgud byed/_/nam gru skag 'dir phun tshogs/_/me bzhi byi bzhin sgrub pa ste/_/bde bar 
[\[204b.7\]]byed pa chu stod gre/_/bra nye dang ni nag pa dang /_/sa ri mon gru lag yin no/_/nab so dang ni sa ga dang /_/mon gre gsum pa grogs mchog yin/_/drang srong lha mo rgyal smras khyod/_/mi yi 'jam chung bya ba'i phyir/_/bcu bzhi'i tshes yud sum cur song /_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]gtor ma bu ram mun pa srungs/_/zhag ni nyi shur khyod bsrung bas/_/skye dgu skye mdzangs nor 'bru ldan/_/sbyor dang rab sbyor bya ba dang /_/dbyig rnams dpag tu med pa'ang yin/_/de yi mngal 'jug snron yin te/_/me bzhi snar ma byi bzhin 
[\[205a.2\]]'phel/_/sa ri mon gru lag 'chi byed/_/las kyi rgyu skar 'dir skag yin/_/dbo dang chu smad smin drug bde/_/gro bzhin nag pa snar ma sgrub/_/chu stod gre bra nye rgud byed/_/tha skar mchu snrubs phun tshogs byed/_/nab so sa ga mon gre grogs/_/rgyal 
[\[205a.3\]]dang lha mtshams grogs mchog ste/_/khrums stod drang srong gis smras pa/_/dri za'i lha mo yud sum cur/_/tshes ni bcu bzhir khyod song shig_/myur bya'i gtor ma zan dron sha/_/'dir zhag nyi shu lnga nad yin/_/srog ldan 'bras dkar brgya yis bsrungs/_/
[\[205a.4\]]khyod spyad skye dgu su skye ba/_/sman sbyor byed pa sman pa yin/_/glu gar rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/_/'dir de'i mngal 'jug snrubs yin no/_/nag pa mgo dang gro bzhin 'phel/_/nab so mon gre lag 'chi byed/_/skye 'chi 'phel nyo tshong lam 'gyed/_/thal 
[\[205a.5\]]mo 'dreg mkhan las rtag spongs/_/smin drug gre dbo chu smad gnyis/_/rgud byed 'dir ni dgra pham byed/_/khyod kyis las dag che chung byas/_/mchu dang gre 'di brtan phun tshogs/_/chu stod dang ni bra nye dang /_/gsum pa khrums smad bde bar byed/_/me bzhi 
[\[205a.6\]]snar ma bde bya'i phyir/_/gsang ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin/_/lag dang mon gru sa ri sgrub/_/drag po'i las rnams kun gyis shig_/rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod grogs/_/bya ba skal bzang 'dir chud za/_/skag snron grogs mchog brten pa ste/_/khrums 
[\[205a.7\]]smad 'dir yang gsum pa yin/_/skal ba bzang dang bzhon pa dang /_/mal dang shin tu brtan par gyis/_/drug bdun de dag las bzhin dang /_/sna tshogs mkhas pas shes nas su/_/sngon gyi bya ba bzhin du gyis/_/gshin rje'i lha tshes bcu bzhir 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]song /_/zla nya zla ba rangs pa'i tshe/_/smin drug kyang ni 'gro bar gyis/_/lha dang mi dang drang srong rnams/_/byed pa gang gis sngar bstan bzhin/_/zhag ni sum cu zla ba rangs/_/nyin dang mtshan ni mnyam pa ste/_/yud tsam bco lnga bco lnga yin/_/grib ma'i 
[\[205b.2\]]gom drug 'dir kun 'khor/_/tha skar gyi ni mtshan mo thob/_/nyi ma'i mdun na lha mtshams te/_/lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor/_/zhing gi dkyil 'khor mig dmar yin/_/nyi bu lha srong rab spro byas/_/khyod kyis zla ba 'di la ni/_/rtswa dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin 
[\[205b.3\]]dang /_/sdig pa las sogs bsrung bar gyis/_/cha dang char ni dus bzhag par/_/sdig pa zhes bya khyod phan song /_/phyogs dang phyogs su las bzhag par/_/khyod ni yang dag phan par song /_/mi 'thun 'thun dang 'phel 'di yin/_/'gro ba la ni phan 
[\[205b.4\]]pa yi/_/rjes su 'thun pa bdag gis su/_/dang por bsdu ba byas 'di yin/_/de nas drang srong rnga bong gis thams cad la thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'khor la go bar byed cing smras pa/_'di ltar bdag gis [{]go rims kyi [,]go rim gyi [}]dang po dang /_mtshan mo dang /_nyin mo dang /_zla 
[\[205b.5\]]ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_dus dang /_khyim dang /_gnas dang /_'gro bar byed pa dang /_'khor ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_rnam par shes pa de bzhin du da ltar yang bstan cing rnam par gzhag na/_ci 
[\[205b.6\]]khyed cag 'di ltar rnam par gzhag pa dang /_gdags par rgyu skar dang /_gza' yongs su mgu ba la rjes su yi rang bar byed dam/_'on te ma yin/_de nas de nyid kyi tshe lha ma yin dang /_mi dang /_drang srong dang /_lha dang /_lag 'gro dang /_mi 'am ci'i 
[\[205b.7\]]tshogs thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye khyod ni lha thams cad kyi bla ma/_lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na gtso bo/_mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngon par rtogs pa'i snying brtse bas bskal pa pha rol dran 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o/_/dpal thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/dus gsum thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/_'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang /_nyin mo 
[\[206a.2\]]dang /_skad cig dang /_rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed 'dogs par byed pa'i ye shes de lta bu su la yod pa'i sems can de lta bu su yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na med pa yin no/_/ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar btags 
[\[206a.3\]]pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyis der dad pa byin pa yin/_rjes su yang yi rang ngo /_/legs ldan legs so/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_khyim dang /_dus kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa 
[\[206a.4\]]la yang gdags par gyis shig_/drang srong rnga bong gis rab tu smras pa/_bdag gi rgyu skar smin drug brjod/_/zla ba nya tshe zla rangs 'gyur/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]zhes bya ba/_/'di ni rab tu brjod pa yin/_/mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam cig_/yongs su bskor te 
[\[206a.5\]]slar ldog byed/_/bra nye dang ni smin drug kyang /_/lan gnyis yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/de bas rgyu skar thams cad kyang /_/phyir zhing 'jug par byed pa ste/_/snar ma gcig pu'ang zla ngo der/_/tshes gcig la ni mkha' la 'gro/_/ji ltar sngar bya bshad pa 
[\[206a.6\]]bzhin/_/de bzhin khyod kyis skye dgu srungs/_/de tsam mgo tshes gnyis la 'gro/_/de tsam lag tshes gsum la 'gro/_/tshes bzhi la yang nab so ste/_/rgyal yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro/_/tshes drug la ni skag gis tshigs/_/mchu yang tshes ni bdun la srungs/_/
[\[206a.7\]]tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te/_/tshes dgu la ni dbo 'gro byed/_/me bzhi'ang tshes ni bcu la 'jug_/nag pa'ang tshes bcu gcig la 'gro/_/sa ri'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas/_/tshes bcu gsum la'ang sa ga ste/_/tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams yin/_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]tshes bco lnga la de bzhin snron/_/'di ni zla ba phyed du bshad/_/yar gyi ngo la snrubs sgrub ste/_/tshes gcig la ni skye dgu srung /_/tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes gsum la ni chu smad yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni byi bzhin srung /_/tshes lnga la ni gro 
[\[206b.2\]]bzhin yin/_/tshes drug la ni mon gru tshigs/_/tshes bdun la ni chu lha yin/_/tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin/_/tshes dgu la ni khrums smad yin/_/tshes bcu la yang nam gru srung /_/de bzhin bcu gcig tshes tha skar/_/gshin rje'i lha mo tshes 
[\[206b.3\]]bcu gnyis/_/tshes bcu gsum la me lha mo/_/tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snar ma yin/_/zla ba rangs la mgo bshad do/_/dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba 'dir/_/lha yi bla ma phur bu ste/_/'di ni lhan cig byed par gzung /_/de bas gza' zhes bya bar bshad/_/de 
[\[206b.4\]]phyir nyin mo tshes bcu bzhir/_/yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste/_/smin drug gis ni mtshan mo 'thob/_/snrubs kyang nyi ma'i mdun na ste/_/grib tshod gom pa brgyad yin zhing /_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/lho phyogs nyi mar kha bltas 'khor/_/de bzhin 
[\[206b.5\]]dgun zla ra ba yi/_/zla 'dir khyim gzhur shes par bya/_/mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la'ang /_/lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni nab so ste/_/tshes gsum rgyal du shes par gyis/_/'dir tshes bzhi la'ang skag yin te/_/mchu yang 
[\[206b.6\]]tshes ni lnga la 'gro/_/tshes drug la yang gre yin te/_/tshes bdun la yang dbo yin bshad/_/tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin/_/tshes dgu la ni nag pa gnas/_/tshes bcu la ni sa ri 'gro/_/tshes bcu gcig la sa ga 'gro/_/tshes bcu gnyis la'ang lha 
[\[206b.7\]]mtshams te/_/tshes bcu gsum la snron yin no/_/tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snrubs yin te/_/tshes bco lnga la'ang chu stod bshad/_/yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/_/chu smad kyang ni rung ba yin/_/tshes gnyis byi bzhin gro bzhin te/_/tshes gsum la ni 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]mon gru 'gro/_/tshes bzhir mon gre 'gro rung ste/_/tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin/_/tshes drug la yang khrums smad yin/_/tshes bdun la ni nam gru 'gro/_/tshes brgyad la ni tha skar rung /_/tshes dgur gshin rje'i lha mo yin/_/tshes bcur smin 
[\[207a.2\]]drug 'gror rung ste/_/tshes bcu gcig la'ang snar ma yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la'ang mgo yin te/_/tshes bcu gsum la lag kyang 'gro/_/tshes bcu bzhi la nab so ste/_/zla ba nya la rgyal yang yin/_/zla ba nya ba 'di la yang /_/'dir ni rang bzhin brjod 
[\[207a.3\]]par bya/_/lho yi phyogs su phyin nas kyang /_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis/_/mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed/_/mtshan mo yang ni mgor shes gyis/_/nyi ma'i mdun du'ang gro bzhin te/_/grib tshod gom pa 
[\[207a.4\]]bcu tham pa/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang /_/'dir ni spen pa'i zhing bstan pa/_/'di la mgo yin shes par gyis/_/zla ba gsum pa rnam gzhag nas/_/zla ba mar gyi tshes gcig la/_/skag ni sgrub par 
[\[207a.5\]]byed pa yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni mchur shes gyis/_/tshes gsum la ni gre yin no/_/tshes bzhi la ni dbo 'gro ste/_/tshes lnga la ni me bzhi 'gro/_/tshes drug la ni nag pa sgrub/_/tshes bdun la ni sa ri 'gro/_/tshes brgyad la yang sa ga ste/_/tshes dgu 
[\[207a.6\]]la ni lha mtshams yin/_/tshes bcu la ni snron 'gro ste/_/tshes bcu gcig la snrubs 'jug bya/_/tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la byi bzhin te/_/tshes bco lnga la gro bzhin 'gro/_/zla ba yar gyi 
[\[207a.7\]]tshes gcig la/_/mon gru sgrub par byed pa yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni mon gre ste/_/tshes gsum la yang khrums stod yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni khrums smad yin/_/tshes lnga la ni nam gru 'gro/_/tshes drug la ni tha skar tshigs/_/tshes bdun gshin rje'i 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]lha mo yin/_/de bzhin tshes brgyad smin drug ste/_/tshes dgu la ni snar ma 'gro/_/tshes bcu la yang mgo yin te/_/lag ni tshes bcu gcig la 'gro/_/tshes bcu gnyis la'ang nab so ste/_/tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yang yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la'ang 
[\[207b.2\]]skag yin te/_/mchu ni zla ba rab rdzogs byed/_/dgun zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]rang bzhin yang /_/mthar gyis kyang ni brjod par bya/_/lho yi phyogs su phyin nas kyang /_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/mtshan mo bco brgyad shes par gyis/_/nyin par 
[\[207b.3\]]yang ni bcu gnyis yin/_/rgyal yang mtshan mo 'thob par byed/_/nyi ma'i mdun na mon gre yin/_/grib tshod kyang ni sor bcu bdun/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/spen pa lha yi bla ma dag_/zhing der rab tu brjod pa yin/_/'dir khyim bum pa 
[\[207b.4\]]mnyam pa med/_/dpyid zla ra ba mar gyi ngor/_/tshes gcig gre ni bsgrub par bya/_/tshes gnyis la ni dbo yin no/_/tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste/_/tshes bzhi'i bar du nag pa yin/_/tshes lnga la ni sa ri ste/_/tshes drug la ni sa ga yin/_/
[\[207b.5\]]tshes bdun la ni lha mtshams te/_/tshes brgyad la ni snron yin no/_/tshes dgu la ni snrubs yin te/_/tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes bcu gcig la chu smad yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la byi bzhin te/_/tshes bcu gsum la gro bzhin yin/_/tshes bcu 
[\[207b.6\]]bzhi la mon gru ste/_/tshes bco lnga la mon gre yin/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin no/_/zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/_/khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni khrums smad yin/_/tshes gsum la ni nam gru ste/_/tshes bzhi la ni tha skar yin/_/
[\[207b.7\]]tshes lnga la ni bra nye yin/_/tshes drug la ni smin drug ste/_/tshes bdun la ni snar ma yin/_/tshes brgyad la ni mgo yin te/_/tshes dgu la ni lag yin no/_/tshes bcu la ni nab so ste/_/tshes bcu gcig la rgyal yin no/_/tshes bcu gnyis la skag 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]yin te/_/tshes bcu gsum la mchu yin no/_/tshes bcu bzhi la gre yin te/_/zla rangs tshes bco lnga la dbo/_/'dir ni dpyid zla ra ba yis/_/rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya/_/byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor 
[\[208a.2\]]bar byed/_/nyin par bcu gsum shes par gyis/_/mtshan mo bcu bdun 'gro bar byed/_/mchus kyang mtshan mo 'thob par byed/_/nyin par khrums stod 'gro bar byed/_/grib tshod sor ni bcu gnyis su/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/zhing der lha 
[\[208a.3\]]yi bla ma yang /_/rnam par gnas pa kho nar ni/_/bshad pa yin te 'dir yang ni/_/der ni mtshan mo 'byung ba yin/_/dpyid zla 'bring po'i zla ngo yi/_/dang por tshes gcig me bzhi ste/_/tshes gnyis la ni nag pa yin/_/tshes gsum la ni sa ri yin/_/tshes bzhi 
[\[208a.4\]]la ni sa ga ste/_/tshes lnga la ni lha mtshams yin/_/tshes drug la ni snron yin no/_/tshes bdun la ni snrubs yin no/_/tshes brgyad la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes dgu la ni chu smad yin/_/tshes bcu la ni byi bzhin te/_/tshes bcu gcig la gro bzhin yin/_/
[\[208a.5\]]tshes bcu gnyis la mon gru ste/_/tshes bcu gsum la mon gre yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la khrums stod yin/_/tshes bco lnga la khrums smad yin/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin te/_/zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/_/nam gru tshes gnyis tha skar te/_/tshes gsum la ni 
[\[208a.6\]]bra nye yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni smin drug ste/_/tshes lnga la ni snar ma yin/_/tshes drug la ni mgo yin te/_/tshes bdun la ni lag yin no/_/tshes brgyad la ni nab so ste/_/tshes dgu la ni rgyal yin no/_/tshes bcu la ni skag yin te/_/tshes bcu gcig la 
[\[208a.7\]]mchu yin no/_/tshes bcu gnyis la gre yin te/_/tshes bcu gsum la dbo yin no/_/tshes bcu bzhi la me bzhi ste/_/tshes bco lnga la nag pa yin/_/dpyid zla 'bring po kho na yi/_/rang bzhin yang ni brjod par bya/_/byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te/_/nyi ma yongs 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]su 'khor bar byed/_/'dir ni phyis kyang yud tsam dag_/yongs su 'khor bar shes par byed/_/yud tsam yang ni re re zhig_/nyin mtshan dag la 'jug par byed/_/nyin par bcu bzhi shes par gyis/_/mtshan mo'ang bcu drug shes par gyis/_/gre dbo mtshan mo 
[\[208b.2\]]'thob par byed/_/nyi ma'i mdun na tha skar yin/_/grib tshod sor brgyad nyi ma 'khor/_/nyi ma'i bu ni mig dmar te/_/gza' rno shin tu mi bzad yin/_/khyim lug la ni yang dag gnas/_/dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]mar gyi ngo /_/dang po tshes gcig sa ri ste/_/tshes 
[\[208b.3\]]gnyis la ni sa ga yin/_/tshes gsum la ni lha mtshams yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni snron yin te/_/tshes lnga la ni snrubs yin no/_/tshes drug la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes bdun la ni chu smad yin/_/tshes brgyad la ni byi bzhin te/_/tshes dgu la ni gro bzhin yin/_/
[\[208b.4\]]tshes bcu la ni mon gru ste/_/tshes bcu gcig la mon gre yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la khrums smad yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la nam gru ste/_/tshes bco lnga la tha skar yin/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin te/_/zla ba yar gyi tshes 
[\[208b.5\]]gcig la/_/bra nye sgrub par byed pa yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni smin drug ste/_/tshes gsum la ni snar ma yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni mgo yin te/_/tshes lnga la ni lag yin no/_/tshes drug la ni nab so ste/_/tshes bdun la ni rgyal yin no/_/tshes brgyad la ni 
[\[208b.6\]]skag yin te/_/tshes dgu la ni mchu yin no/_/tshes bcu la ni gre yin te/_/tshes bcu gcig la dbo yin no/_/tshes bcu gnyis la me bzhi yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la nag pa ste/_/tshes bcu bzhi la sa ri yin/_/zla rangs tshes ni bco lnga la/_/sa ga yin te sa ga 
[\[208b.7\]]yi/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]brjod bya byang phyogs su/_/kha bltas nyi ma yongs su 'khor/_/mtshan mo mnyam mtshungs rnam pa ste/_/bco lnga bco lngar bshad pa yin/_/nag pas mtshan mo 'thob par byed/_/nyin par yang ni smin drug yin/_/grib tshod dag kyang gom pa drug_
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/lha min bla ma pa ba sangs/_/'dir yang zhing zhes gdags pa yin/_/khyim glang yin te mkhas rnams kyis/_/zla ba bdun po bshad pa yin/_/dbyar zla ra ba mar gyi ngo'i/_/dang po tshes gcig lha mtshams 
[\[209a.2\]]sgrub/_/tshes gnyis la ni snron yin te/_/tshes gsum la ni snrubs yin no/_/tshes bzhi la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes lnga la ni chu smad yin/_/tshes drug la ni byi bzhin yin/_/tshes bdun la ni gro bzhin yin/_/tshes brgyad la ni mon gru ste/_/tshes dgu la ni mon gre 
[\[209a.3\]]yin/_/tshes bcu la ni khrums stod yin/_/tshes bcu gcig la khrums smad yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la nam gru ste/_/tshes bcu gsum la tha skar yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la bra nye yin/_/tshes bco lnga la smin drug ste/_/de ni zla phyed zla ba yar/_/tshes gcig
