[\[209a.4\]]la ni snar ma sgrub/_/tshes gnyis la ni mgo yin te/_/tshes gsum la ni lag yin no/_/tshes bzhi la ni nab so ste/_/tshes lnga la ni rgyal yin no/_/tshes drug la ni skag yin te/_/tshes bdun la ni mchu yin no/_/tshes brgyad la ni gre yin te/_/tshes dgu 
[\[209a.5\]]la ni dbo yin no/_/tshes bcu la ni me bzhi ste/_/tshes bcu gcig la nag pa yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la sa ri ste/_/tshes bcu gsum la sa ga yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams te/_/tshes bco lnga la snron yin no/_/dbyar zla ra ba'i rim brjod bya/_/byang phyogs 
[\[209a.6\]]kha bltas nyi ma 'khor/_/'phel byed nyin par bcu drug tu/_/shes bya mtshan mo'ang bcu bzhi yin/_/sa gas mtshan mo 'thob par byed/_/nyi ma'i mdun na mgo yin no/_/grib tshod gom pa bzhi yin te/_/de ni yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/der zhing gza' 
[\[209a.7\]]lhag nyi ma'i bu/_/'jam por byed pa'i gza' yin no/_/sbyor ba'i khyim yin nyin par 'gro/_/brgyad pa yin par brjod pa yin/_/dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes gcig la/_/snrubs ni sgrub par byed pa yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes gsum la ni 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]chu smad yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni byi bzhin te/_/tshes lnga la ni gro bzhin no/_/tshes drug la ni mon gru ste/_/tshes bdun la ni mon gre yin/_/tshes brgyad la ni khrums stod yin/_/tshes dgu la ni khrums smad yin/_/tshes bcu la ni nam gru ste/_/tshes bcu gcig la tha 
[\[209b.2\]]skar yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la bra nye ste/_/tshes bcu gsum la smin drug yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la snar ma ste/_/tshes bco lnga la mgo yin no/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin te/_/zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/_/lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/_/tshes gnyis la ni 
[\[209b.3\]]nab so yin/_/tshes gsum la ni rgyal yin no/_/tshes bzhi la ni skag yin no/_/tshes lnga la ni mchu yin no/_/tshes drug la ni gre yin no/_/tshes bdun la ni dbo yin te/_/tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi yin/_/tshes dgu la ni nag pa ste/_/tshes bcu la ni 
[\[209b.4\]]sa ri yin/_/tshes bcu gcig la sa ga ste/_/tshes bcu gnyis la lha mtshams yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la snron yin te/_/tshes bcu bzhi la snrubs yin no/_/zla nya'i zla bar chu stod yin/_/bdag gis dbyar 'bring rim brjod bya/_/byang phyogs bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[209b.5\]]bltas/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/nyin par yud tsam bcu bdun te/_/mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/_/snron gyis kyang ni mtshan mo 'thob/_/nyin par bcas na nab so yin/_/grib tshod gom pa gnyis yin te/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/
[\[209b.6\]]zla ba zhes bya zhing yin te/_/lag dang yang dag ldan pa yin/_/'di khyim sbal pa zhes bya ba/_/zla ba dgu par bshad pa yin/_/dbyar zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]mar ngo yi/_/tshes gcig la ni chu smad sgrub/_/tshes gnyis byi bzhin gro bzhin te/_/tshes gsum la ni mon gru 
[\[209b.7\]]yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni mon gre ste/_/tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin/_/tshes drug la ni khrums smad yin/_/tshes bdun la ni nam gru ste/_/tshes brgyad la ni tha skar yin/_/tshes dgu la ni bra nye ste/_/tshes bcu la ni smin drug yin/_/tshes bcu gcig la snar ma 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la mgo yin no/_/tshes bcu gsum la lag yin no/_/tshes bcu bzhi la nab so yin/_/tshes bco lnga la rgyal yin te/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin no/_/zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig la/_/skag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/_/
[\[210a.2\]]tshes gnyis la ni mchu yin no/_/tshes gsum la ni gre yin te/_/tshes bzhi la ni dbo yin no/_/tshes lnga la ni me bzhi ste/_/tshes drug la ni nag pa yin/_/tshes bdun la ni sa ri ste/_/tshes brgyad la ni sa ga yin/_/tshes dgu la ni lha mtshams te/_/
[\[210a.3\]]tshes bcu la ni snron yin no/_/tshes bcu gcig la snrubs yin te/_/tshes bcu gnyis la chu stod yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la chu smad yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la byi bzhin te/_/zla ba rangs la gro bzhin no/_/bdag gis dbyar tha'i rim brjod bya/_/
[\[210a.4\]]de bzhin byang gi phyogs su ni/_/nyi ma gdong phyed bltas te 'khor/_/nyin par bco brgyad thob nas kyang /_/mtshan mo yang ni bcu gnyis te/_/chu stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob/_/nyi ma'i mdun na mchu yin no/_/grib tshod gom pa phyed yin te/_/nyi ma 
[\[210a.5\]]yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/'dir zhing nyi ma ldan pa yin/_/sas kyang gzer ni gtong bar byed/_/'dir khyim seng ger shes par gyis/_/zla ba bcu po bshad pa yin/_/ston zla ra ba mar gyi ngo'i/_/dang por tshes gcig mon gru sgrub/_/tshes gnyis la ni 
[\[210a.6\]]mon gre ste/_/tshes gsum la ni khrums stod yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni khrums smad yin/_/tshes lnga la ni nam gru ste/_/tshes drug la ni tha skar yin/_/tshes bdun la ni bra nye ste/_/tshes brgyad la ni smin drug yin/_/tshes dgu la ni snar ma ste/_/tshes 
[\[210a.7\]]bcu la ni mgo yin no/_/tshes bcu gcig la lag yin te/_/tshes bcu gnyis la nab so yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la rgyal yin te/_/tshes bcu bzhi la skag yin no/_/tshes bco lnga la mchu yin te/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin no/_/zla ba yar gyi tshes 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]gcig la/_/gre ni sgrub par byed pa ste/_/tshes gnyis la ni dbo yin no/_/tshes gsum la ni me bzhi ste/_/tshes bzhi la ni nag pa yin/_/tshes lnga la ni sa ri ste/_/tshes drug la ni sa ga yin/_/tshes bdun la ni lha mtshams te/_/tshes brgyad la ni 
[\[210b.2\]]snron yin no/_/tshes dgu la ni snrubs yin te/_/tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes bcu gcig la chu smad yin/_/gro bzhin byi bzhin tshes bcu gnyis/_/tshes bcu gsum la mon gru ste/_/tshes bcu bzhi la mon gre yin/_/zla ba nya ba'i zla rangs la/_/
[\[210b.3\]]khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/_/bdag gis ston zla ra rim brjod/_/lho phyogs nyi ma'i 'khor lo ldog_/nyin par yang ni bcu bdun te/_/mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/_/gro bzhin gyis kyang mtshan mo 'thob/_/nyi ma'i mdun na gre yin te/_/grib 
[\[210b.4\]]tshod dag kyang gom pa gnyis/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/zla bu gza' lhag ces bya ba/_/der ni zhing la yang dag gnas/_/der khyim bu mo bzhag pa ste/_/zla ba bcu gcig bdag gis bshad/_/ston zla 'bring po'i mar gyi ngo'i/_/dang por tshes 
[\[210b.5\]]gcig khrums smad sgrub/_/tshes gnyis la ni nam gru ste/_/tshes gsum la ni tha skar yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni bra nye ste/_/tshes lnga la ni smin drug yin/_/tshes drug la ni snar ma ste/_/tshes bdun la ni mgo yin no/_/tshes brgyad la ni lag yin te/_/tshes 
[\[210b.6\]]dgu la ni nab so yin/_/tshes bcu la ni rgyal yin te/_/tshes bcu gcig la skag yin no/_/tshes bcu gnyis la mchu yin te/_/tshes bcu gsum la gre yin no/_/tshes bcu bzhi la dbo yin te/_/tshes bco lnga la me bzhi yin/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin 
[\[210b.7\]]te/_/zla yar tshes gcig nag pa sgrub/_/tshes gnyis la ni sa ri ste/_/tshes gsum la ni sa ga yin/_/tshes bzhi la ni lha mtshams te/_/tshes lnga la ni snron yin no/_/tshes drug la ni snrubs yin te/_/tshes bdun la ni chu stod yin/_/tshes brgyad 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]la ni chu smad yin/_/tshes dgur byi bzhin gro bzhin te/_/tshes bcu la ni mon gru yin/_/tshes bcu gcig la mon gre yin/_/tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin/_/tshes bcu gsum la khrums smad yin/_/tshes bcu bzhi la nam gru 
[\[211a.2\]]ste/_/zla rangs nya tshe tha skar yin/_/de ni zla ba phyed yin te/_/ston zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni/_/lo skor bdag gis brjod par bya/_/lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/nyin par bcu drug 'gro byed cing /_/mtshan mo yang ni 
[\[211a.3\]]bcu bzhi yin/_/khrums stod kyis ni mtshan mo 'thob/_/nyi ma'i mdun na nag pa yin/_/grib tshod dag ni gom bzhi ste/_/nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/_/lha min bla ma pa ba sangs/_/gza' ni zhing la rnam par gzhag_/'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba 
[\[211a.4\]]bzhag_/zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin/_/yongs su 'khor ba de yis ni/_/lo ni de ltar 'gro bar byed/_/mig stong yang dang yang du ni/_/'dus te chos kyi phyogs la ltos/_/khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na/_/chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis/_/
[\[211a.5\]]chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/_/thos phyug mkhas pa bsam gtan pa/_/de dag khyod kyis chos gos dang /_/bza' btung rnams kyis rjes su srungs/_/yang dag gnas te brgya byin gyis/_/rnga bong la ni thal sbyar nas/_/rab tu smras pa bdag 
[\[211a.6\]]cag gis/_/bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis/_/smras pa/_lha yi bla ma khyod kyis su/_/rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srungs/_/rig sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams/_/thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs/_/las kun drang srong zla ba dang /_/zla ba chung dang zhag 
[\[211a.7\]]dang bzhi/_/bzo yi las kyi mtha' kun la/_/gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin/_/drag po dung gi sna can dang /_/dgon pa dang ni lci ba ste/_/gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni/_/mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkod/_/rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po dang /_/rin chen 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]skyong dang ring du 'gro/_/sa yid tshes dang zla srungs dang /_/gnas thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni/_/gtso bor gzhag ste ma dros dang /_/khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lhas byin/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'khrugs pa klu de bzhi/_/klu rnams kyi ni gtso bor bkod/_/khyod ni dge ba 
[\[211b.2\]]rab skyed pa/_/ne tso yi ni khyab byed pa/_/mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste/_/de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu/_/khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang /_/me yi rtse mo'i gtso bo ste/_/khyod ni rlung dmar 'gul g.yo ba/_/rlung yang ba yi gtso bo yin/_/rdo rje'i mig dang seng ge'i 
[\[211b.3\]]mig_/legs mthong lag na mdung gsum thogs/_/lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/_/grong khyer gtso bor bkod pa yin/_/gong ma'i char skyes rtsibs mu khyud/_/'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi/_/de dag rin chen brtags pa la/_/nyo tshong byed pa'i gtso bor 
[\[211b.4\]]bkod/_/phyogs mtshams su ni bzhi yin te/_/bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/_/yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du/_/bsrung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod/_/drang srong dag ni thams cad dang /_/lha yi tshogs dang klu rnams dang /_/lha ma yin 
[\[211b.5\]]dang mi rnams kyi/_/bar yang rjes su yi rang byed/_/lung bstan rab tu rgyal ba mchog_/thub pa yi ni gtso bo ste/_/khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang /_/zas dang ro dang me tog mchog_/khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste/_/shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog_/khyod 
[\[211b.6\]]ni lam bde skyed pa ste/_/rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso/_/dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis/_/ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod/_/nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing /_/lci mchog mig dmar smugs byed skem/_/khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso/_/khyod ni 
[\[211b.7\]]grub dang yid 'phrog pa/_/zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste/_/bcud kyi len gyi gtso bo yin/_/gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin/_/khyim rnams thams cad rnam par gzhag_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni/_/skal ldan rgyur ni rnam par gzhag_/lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]kyi gtso/_/grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po/_/klu rnams kyi ni mig mi bzang /_/dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor srung /_/thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi/_/gling gzhan brgyad khri thams cad du/_/drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs su skyong ba ma 
[\[212a.2\]]bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci yang med do/_/der lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byas par 
[\[212a.3\]]gyur to/_/drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/_/bya ba de ni mchod pa dang /_rim gro bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to/_/de'i rjes la shin tu yun ring zhig na drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste/_des kyang skar ma'i 
[\[212a.4\]]dpyad rab tu byas so/_/zhag gis mi thub pa dang /_shol yod pa yang bshad do/_/yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten ga la bar klu thams cad 'dus te/_de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te/_
[\[212a.5\]]de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nus su brtson par gyur to/_/'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs te/_rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[212a.6\]]'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_rgya mtshos smras pa/_nam mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs/_/ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni/_/khyod kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran/_/mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi gtso/_/
[\[212a.7\]]khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper/_/shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin/_/kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni/_/lag 'gro thams cad thar bar gyis/_/srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod/_/lag 'gro de kun tshim byed khyod/_/khyod ni drang srong kun gyi bla/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os/_/'gro ba kun dpal khyod la ni/_/lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs/_/rten gyi yul rnams thams cad pa/_/lag 'gro myur du thar bar gyis/_/de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 
[\[212b.2\]]yid dang ba bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/yon tan de 'dra bdag la med/_/drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin/_/khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par/_/bdag gis nus pa 
[\[212b.3\]]ma yin no/_/gang gis bskal pa du mar ni/_/dka' thub dka' ba bzod pa spyad/_/khyod cag thar bar byed pa yi/_/drang srong gzhan de blta bar gyis/_/rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin/_/mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni/_/shing rta bu dang chung ma dang /_/nor 
[\[212b.4\]]gyis sems can phan pa byas/_/rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang /_/mig dang pags pa khrag dang ni/_/bu bran bran mo bza' btung mang /_/mal cha kha zas sngon chad btang /_/snying rje dang ni byams pa yis/_/khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na/_/mtshungs med 
[\[212b.5\]]bsam gtan dga' 'byung ba/_/de ni drang srong rnga bong ste/_/kun tu brtse zhing byang chub sems/_/sngon chad rig byed pha rol phyin/_/sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis/_/nyam thag pa ni thar bar byas/_/sems can gcig gi ched du yang /_/sngon gyi tshe 
[\[212b.6\]]rabs de bskal par/_/dmyal bar 'gro bzod de [{]yi dgas[,]yi dwags[}]/_/de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung /_/sems can sdug bsngal nyam thag kun/_/sdug bsngal mthar mdzad rnga bong yin/_/sems can sman phyir brtson 'grus dang /_/snying rje brtan pos de 
[\[212b.7\]]srid 'khor/_/rnga bong de ni skyes pa na/_/rgyal sras bu ram shing ba yi/_/rigs su zas gtsang gi ni sras/_/des ni btsas ma thag tu khyab/_/srid gsum bde 'byung 'jig rten dpal/_/yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/lha dang klu yi bu rnams dang /_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab/_/der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags/_/de yis gom pa bdun bor te/_/ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/_/sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur/_/'gro ba rga nad sdug bsngal dang /_/'chi bas gzir las 
[\[213a.2\]]ngas bsgral zhing /_/zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med/_/skam la dgod ces shAka sras gsungs/_/me tog dri dang rin chen dag_/lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing /_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis/_/sras po la ni bstod gyur pa/_/bskal pa mang po du mar 
[\[213a.3\]]yang /_/sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang /_/sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la brten/_/sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod/_/'di la skye ba 'di yang ni/_/thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags/_/sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par/_/ring por mi thogs 
[\[213a.4\]]khyod 'tshang rgya/_/des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur/_/mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs/_/drug khri tham pa spangs nas su/_/spyod pa rab bstan lo drug spyad/_/g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i/_/bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang /_/byang chub zhi mchog 
[\[213a.5\]]gzhal med brnyes/_/mya ngan med lam don dam gzigs/_/byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis/_/sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing /_/'byung po dag ni thams cad la/_/de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa/_/sems can gang la'ang mtho mi 'tsham/_/sems 
[\[213a.6\]]can thams cad sdug bsngal las/_/thar bar mdzad cing de yang ni/_/rnam bcings btson ra thar mdzad pa/_/ma ga d+hA na de gnas shing /_/'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston/_/de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob/_/byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos/_/drang srong mchog gi 
[\[213a.7\]]thad du deng /_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las/_/khyed cag yongs su thar bar byed/_/rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bar gyis/_/dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis/_/phyin cad mkha' lding thams cad las/_/'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo /_/rtag bde sdug 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bsngal bral dgar gyis/_/btson ra 'di ni g.yo sgyu can/_/bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'tshe/_/ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin/_/thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis/_/yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang /_klu chen po pho dang /_mo dang /_khye'u dang /_
[\[213b.2\]]bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/_chos thams cad kyi dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad 
[\[213b.3\]]pa/_bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa/_dga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa/_shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/_thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa/_phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/_lam 
[\[213b.4\]]thams cad ston pa/_yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba/_lha dang klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa/_mchod pa thams cad 'os pa/_bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi btson ra 'dir 'phangs lags na 'di nas bdag 
[\[213b.5\]]cag thar bar mdzad par gsol/_klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/_gnas de nas 'gro bar ma nus so/_/de dag thams cad kyis drang srong skar 
[\[213b.6\]]ma la dga' ba la smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bden te/_sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos nyid yin no/_/de la bdag cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so/_/'di nas myur du bzhud cig_/bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag 
[\[213b.7\]]cag thar bar mdzod cig_/skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang /_byang chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir mang por ma 
[\[214a.2\]]byung ba la dmigs pa dang /_nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to/_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams la rgyu las yang dag par byung ba dang /_so sor brtags pa 
[\[214a.3\]]la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to/_/da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[214a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dang /_bdud bzhi gdul ba'i phyir dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do/_/da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i 
[\[214a.5\]]nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa/_kun nas ldang ba med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_gzhi med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_chags pa med pa/_rnam par gzhag pa med pa/_rdul med pa/_mun pa med pa/_snang 
[\[214a.6\]]ba med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_gsal byed med pa/_spyod pa med pa/_tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_'byung ba chen po thams cad dang /_mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i bar nas/_yid kyi 
[\[214a.7\]]rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang /_gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba/_phyad pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/_yang dag par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu 
[\[214b.2\]]phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/_sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/_ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/_lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa 
[\[214b.3\]]dmigs pa med pa ston to/_/kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de 
[\[214b.4\]]dag byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas de dag snang ba dang /_rnam par bsgyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon 
[\[214b.5\]]bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis 'dir bdag cag 
[\[214b.6\]]bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob pa de la bdag cag gi tshig gis gsol ba thob shig_/de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba drang srong gi cha byad 
[\[214b.7\]]kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo /_/'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su nye 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te/_shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rngul nas lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/lag 'gro rnams ni skyabs su dong /_/
[\[215a.2\]]skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing /_/'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa/_/mi zad g.yo sgyu can la ltos/_/de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis/_/dge sbyong la ni skyabs su 
[\[215a.3\]]mchis/_/gang dag de yi tshig thos shing /_/de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal/_/brtson 'grus sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/_/khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs/_/bka' mchid sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad/_/de yi sgyu ni ma bslabs sam/_/bdud kyis slar 
[\[215a.4\]]smras pa/_/dge sbyong gau tam brtan pa yin/_/rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste/_/stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs/_/rgal nas skye dgu sgral bar byed/_/mun bral mas smras pa/_stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa/_/bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyod de/_/byang grol 
[\[215a.5\]]bde ba sbyin bgyid pa/_/de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi/_/de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing /_/ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin/_/de la bdag ni skyabs su mchis/_/sgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[215a.6\]]rnam par dgrol/_/chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/_/bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te/_bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngangs te rmongs nas stobs 
[\[215a.7\]]kyi shugs kyis 'chag sar zhugs te/_bdud kyi stobs kyi shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so/_/gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po ma lon par drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]nas nam mkha' las rdo'i char pa me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te/_klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu bab ste/_klu thams cad rab tu dga' bar 
[\[215b.2\]]gyur to/_/dga' khyab mas smras pa/_kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyed ltos shig_/'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong gau ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'di sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs 
[\[215b.3\]]su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su 'gro ba/_/bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te/_/tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang /_/de ni nges par skye 
[\[215b.4\]]ba'i pha rol 'gro/_/ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing /_/byang chub smon lam brtan po bskyed pas na/_/de ni bdud rnams du mas gsad mi nus/_/nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de yis bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing /_/
[\[215b.5\]]tshig gi don gcig tsam yang nyan byed la/_/byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed pa de/_/sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med/_/yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis/_/der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs/_/sangs rgyas yul gcig 
[\[215b.6\]]gis ni khyod la bsngos/_/der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to/_/gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing /_/bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba/_/ched du lung bstan pa ni der nyan pa'i/_/rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs/_/de nas bdud 
[\[215b.7\]]sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste/_sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]pa'i gtam gyi tha mar mjug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes 
[\[216a.2\]]bya ba'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol/_gzungs sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis ni sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi lha 
[\[216a.3\]]la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug ste btson rar stsal nas/_zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcing ba lngas bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[216a.4\]]man dA ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul kar bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa de lta bus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[216a.5\]]brtson ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par grags so/_/gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams 
[\[216a.6\]]cad dang /_skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes 
[\[216a.7\]]bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /_tshe'i 'du byed bas pa'i sgrib pa dang /_bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i sgrib 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]pa yongs su bas shing /_der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyis mod la mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te/_btson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing /_de nas nam mkha' la chas nas bcom 
[\[216b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man dA ra ba'i bsung gi thad du nye bar phyin to/_/de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas slan chad bskal 
[\[216b.3\]]pa dpag tu ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa 
[\[216b.4\]]dpag tu ma mchis pas khyab ste/_de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zin to zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su 
[\[216b.5\]]ma dag pa dag gis bsgribs te mchis par mi nus pa lags so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o/_/sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_las 
[\[216b.6\]]kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /_sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i 
[\[216b.7\]]las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad dang /_thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos bstan pa des sems can rnams bzod pa dang 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas sems can rnams ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thogs par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[217a.2\]]rtag par rgyun du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang /_log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa 
[\[217a.3\]]dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang /_bsam gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa sgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[217a.4\]]'das pa'i bar du chos de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das da sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags de legs par bshad par gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[217a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[217a.6\]]dad pa can su la la theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa ni myur du theg pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la/_sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/_thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod 
[\[217a.7\]]pa yin/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa yin/_bstan pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yin/_snyan pa 'dod pa dang /_rnyed pa 'dod pa yin/_bza' ba dang btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang /_dbang phyug 'dod pa dang /_
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]gzugs 'dod pa dang /_stobs 'dod pa dang /_'khor 'dod pa dang /_nor dang 'bru 'dod pa dang /_thu bo 'dod pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin/_rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin/_rtag tu lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyis kun 
[\[217b.2\]]tu gnod par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod pa yin no/_/de ltar 
[\[217b.3\]]yang las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phangs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba blangs pa de'i bar gyis myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam 
[\[217b.4\]]pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag sgrub par mi nus te/_las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zag de khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing /_kha zas gtsang ma dang mal gtsang ma der skyil mo krung dam 'chags pas kyang rung ste/_rjes su 'thun 
[\[217b.5\]]pa'i tshes brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas gzhan yid la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin pa'i bar gyis re shig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed 
[\[217b.6\]]na des rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chung ngur rtog par byed na chung ngu kho nar mthong ngo /_/yang na tshad med par rtog par byed na gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/des mtshan 
[\[217b.7\]]thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo /_/mtshan gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do/_/tad+ya thA/_bi dzrim b+hu bi dzri ma b+ha/_ud pA da/_bya ya/_bi dzri ma b+ha/_sna ba 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]ba ra a nu da ta thA tA b+hU ta ko Ti bi dzrim b+ha swA hA/_ji srid du des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par spel nas de dag byung ste/_rang gi mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i yid kyi rjes su bltas nas tshig 'di dag 
[\[218a.2\]]brjod cing mi skrag par bya/_mi dngang bar bya'o/_/rang gi lus la mer rnam par blta bar bya ste/_ji lta zhe na/_des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag thams cad du 'gro ba mthong nas rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo zhes bya 
[\[218a.3\]]ba nas thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs snang ba gang yang mi 'byung ba 'di ni de'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu su la 
[\[218a.4\]]la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu'i bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgoms zhing mchod sbyin legs par byas la shin tu yid la byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya 
[\[218a.5\]]ba nas ma lus pa'i bar du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de 'dod na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams 
[\[218a.6\]]cad dang /_phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos thams cad dang /_rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang /_gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags su byas pa rnams des the tshom med par shin tu kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gong ma rdzu 
[\[218a.7\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom par 'dod na des shin tu bsgoms pa yin no/_/de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/_/de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/_brgya byin gyi bar ram/_tshangs pa'i bar ram/_sred med kyi bu'i 
[\[218b.2\]]bar ram/_dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram/_rgyal chen bzhi'i bar ram/_'khor los sgyur ba'i bar ram/_chu'i bar ram/_me'i bar ram/_sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do/_/de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad me tog gi bar dang /_rin 
[\[218b.3\]]po che'i phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed do/_/sus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran 
[\[218b.4\]]pa de lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing shin tu 'dres par byas la shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar bsod nams dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_
[\[218b.5\]]bzod pa dang /_rnam par rol pa dang /_mngon par shes pa tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/des de ltar gang yang rung ba dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na myur du 'khor ba las rnam par thar bar 'gyur te/_mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_
[\[218b.6\]]'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de lta yin yang mtshams med pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de yang bdun phrag bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[218b.7\]]dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas las kyi sgrib pa sum cha ma zad cing lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa de lta 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bu de ni de ltar don che ba yin no/_/su la la bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du thos na/_de la mi'am mi ma yin pa'i bar de nye bar brtags nas dad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mchog 
[\[219a.2\]]tu dga' ba skye'o/_/de btson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyang sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang /_chad pa dang /_brdeg 
[\[219a.3\]]pa dang /_g.yang sa dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_dgra thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_nad kyi 'jigs pa dang /_gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang /_rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas bran gyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_ngan 
[\[219a.4\]]'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bde 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/su sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam rna lam du grags na de la nye bar brtags nas dad pa skyes te/_de ltar don che zhing phan yon che ba 
[\[219a.5\]]yin na su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dkrigs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur to/_/ji 
[\[219a.6\]]ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[219a.7\]]par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'bras bu dang po la gnas par gyur to/_/kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed do/_/mun bral ma 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]la sogs pa'i bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs su sbyang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thos so/_/thos nas kyang bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te skyes 
[\[219b.2\]]pa nyid thob bo/_gang dag sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur to/_/ji skad bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to/_/de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du bdag nyid 
[\[219b.3\]]mngon par sprul nas tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te/_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[219b.4\]]pa bkod pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du babs te/_bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dag dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag dang /_rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos sna tshogs gtor 
[\[219b.5\]]cing mngon par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[219b.6\]]dran pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal ta byos shig ces bcom ldan 
[\[219b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dus lags kyis gshegs shig_/bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byang ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no/_/yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me 
[\[220a.2\]]tog dang /_spos dang /_rin po che dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan dang /_spud pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa la mi 
[\[220a.3\]]dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so/_/'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad 
[\[220a.4\]]kyis kyang gang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par bzhed par shes so/_/de ltar rig nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[220a.5\]]phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkram pa'i them skas sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/_lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[220a.6\]]byed rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi them skas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas rnams las gshegs par gsol/_lha'i 
[\[220a.7\]]bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi gser gyi them skas tsan dan sa mchog sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/_lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya'i them skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/_lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis 
[\[220b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya'i them skas lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 
[\[220b.3\]]'das kyi phyir mu tig dmar po'i them skas lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[220b.4\]]bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs pa'i them skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor 
[\[220b.5\]]gshegs par gsol/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid du sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[220b.6\]]'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku drug sprul nas sangs rgyas bdun po de dag lha'i dbang po dang /_lha ma 
[\[220b.7\]]yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so/_/sangs rgyas bdun po de dag mchog tu lhan ne 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]lhang nger ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/_dper na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag stong shar ba bzhin no/_/klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis de mthong 
[\[221a.2\]]nas ltad mor gyur te gcig la gcig dris pa/_snang ba chen po'i nang na rten pa ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa bdun po de dag ga las 'ongs/_dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis smras pa/_ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa/_
[\[221a.3\]]kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin/_/bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed/_/'ching ba rnams las thar bar byed kyis kun kyang de la mgo bos phyag 'tshol cig_/ma 
[\[221a.4\]]dros pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can/_/khyed la snying brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos yongs bskor 'di ni gnas pa yis/_/'di ni gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres 
[\[221a.5\]]shing skom pa'i nad kyis 'jig_/sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar byed/_/sa yi dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/de lta ma yin 'dir rgyal lha dbang 'thab bral dga' ldan 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul 
[\[221a.6\]]ba/_/de dag khyed la snying brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing klu yi tshogs la lta/_/bdag cag yongs su skyobs zhes kun gyis gsang mthor de dag la ni 'o dod bos/_/de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan pas khyed cag btson ra dag nas zhi bar byed/_/rgya mtshos smras pa/_
[\[221a.7\]]de dag ma yin 'di ni lha dbang brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba/_/de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su yod brtse ba'i yid kyis blta/_/khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la khro ba myur du dor bar gyis/_/de yis myur du lag 'gro thar 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun nas thar bar byed/_/shin tu brtan gyis smras pa/_de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs brten lha tshogs bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can/_/sems can rnams kyi ched du drang srong 'dir 'dzegs 'khod nas brtse bas phyogs rnams 
[\[221b.2\]]su/_/myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char pa 'bebs/_/lha yi yid kyis thams cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas bdag cag thar bar byed/_/klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ni gzugs na brten pa'i lha 
[\[221b.3\]]min bzhi po 'di kun bdud kyi 'byor pa yin/_/lus ngan skye mchog bdud rtsi'i skom dang rgyu bar btags pa 'di dag gnas pa ni/_/gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi skyong byed sdig pa'i skye bo sgrol/_/de dag gis ni bdag cag sems can gzhan 
[\[221b.4\]]mthong 'di nas myur du thar bar byed/_/klu rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/de dag ma yin de ni mgo bregs ngur smrig gos can 'khod par snang ba yin/_/de dag la ni kun lta thal mo sbyar 'khod skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin/_/bdun po de dag cher bsgrubs brtul 
[\[221b.5\]]zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs dag gis mthong ba yin/_/ngur smrig gos bgos mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os par mthong /_/klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ni bdag nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'dren pa yin te 
[\[221b.6\]]nga la de ltar snang /_/sems can rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sel byed pa/_/gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams kyang ni de yis sprul pa yin/_/bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams 
[\[221b.7\]]las thar bar byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo de la bzhugs ma thag tu ri rab dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas kyi 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thug pa'i bar man chad sna tshogs pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dpag tshad brgya stong du mar spras pa de srid cig sprul te/_de ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i 
[\[222a.2\]]phyir lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan dang /_sbud pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_spos dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprul pa yin no/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[222a.3\]]po brgya byin la bos te bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni nga dang /_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_drang srong rnams dang /_bdud rnams dang /_dbang che 
[\[222a.4\]]bar grags pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to/_/de bzhin du da ltar ri rab 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis shin tu longs spyad zin te/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[222a.5\]]thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to/_/ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i 'byung po khyed la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag 
[\[222a.6\]]la thugs brtse bar mdzad na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_ri rab la longs spyad par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gal te yang gang su dag bdud dam/_brgya 
[\[222a.7\]]byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po'am/_klu'i dbang po'am/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/_dri za'i dbang po'am/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/_mi 'am ci'i dbang po'am/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/_
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]sems can dbang che bar grags pa/_dbang che bar grags pa lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas mi'i drang srong gi bar de dag thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur na 'dir bdag cag la shas cher phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so/_/der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs 
[\[222b.2\]]nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/_de'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo /_/'od zer de dag gshegs nas bdud kyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang /_
[\[222b.3\]]brgya byin gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba nas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas dang /_drang srong gi gnas bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad du 'od zer de dag zhugs so/_/de dang de 
[\[222b.4\]]dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa bdud dam zhes bya ba nas drang srong rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du btags pa de dang de dag thams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas bdud ces bya ba nas drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de dag de nas chas te 
[\[222b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku drug po de dag ga la bar skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa dag rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa/_nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na ri'i rgyal po 
[\[222b.6\]]ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na ri rab 'di ni mchog dang phul yin par ngas bshad de/_ri rab 'di ni 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis longs spyod pa yin zhing ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no/_/de thos nas brgya byin kau shi ka dang zhes bya ba nas mi 
[\[222b.7\]]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i bar mchog tu yid bde ba dang rangs pa skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de nas song ste/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ni 'di nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]mjug mas 'dug nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lta'o zhes bya ba nas klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni byang phyogs kyi 
[\[223a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa ni shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[223a.3\]]phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni de nas 'dong bar ma nus so/_/de dag thams cad kyis gsang bstod de 'di skad ces smras so/_/btson ra 'di nas bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/_yongs su thar bar mdzad par gsol/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang 
[\[223a.4\]]nye dga' gnyis bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'dir gshegs shing gnas rten 'dir bzhugs nas klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de dag gnyi gas gnas rten nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de srid kyi rang gi lus sprul to/_/de nas brgya 
[\[223a.5\]]byin 'di snyam du sems te/_klu de dag ni lus rtsub cing 'dus te reg na gdug pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/_des lag 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongs su g.yogs shing 
[\[223a.6\]]mgo la tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas yongs su g.yogs te lha rdzas kyi me tog dag mngon par gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de rgyar dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi par sprul 
[\[223a.7\]]to/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /_rgyan dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag bting ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas kun shes kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston te/_kau Di n+ya gang mig gi skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_nye bar len pa la 
[\[223b.2\]]mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o/_/'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o/_/'di ni rga shi'i 'byung ba'o/_/kau Di n+ya gang rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_nye 
[\[223b.3\]]bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o/_/'di ni nad dang /_srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o/_/'di ni rga shi'i 'byung ba'o/_/kau Di n+ya gang mig gi 'gog pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_nub pa dang /_nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba 
[\[223b.4\]]'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o/_/'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o/_/kau Di n+ya gang rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'gog pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_nub pa dang /_nye bar len pa 
[\[223b.5\]]rnam par zhi ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o/_/'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o/_/chos gang gis nga lha dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa dang /_lha dang 
[\[223b.6\]]mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na phul yin par grags pa dang /_byams pa chen pos mchog yin par grags pa dang /_snying rje chen pos dam pa yin par grags pa dang /_'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas bla na med par grags pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul 
[\[223b.7\]]ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsgom pa'i rgyu 'thun 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pa'i chos de ni ngas sems can thams cad la rgya cher bstan to/_/gsal bar mdzad do/_/ston pa thugs brtse ba can phan par bzhed pas gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa ni ngas mdzad zin te/_da khyed cag gis bya ba yin no/_/rga shi'i mthar dbyung 
[\[224a.2\]]ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang /_shing drung dang /_dur khrod dang /_ri dang /_ri khrod dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal de dag tu phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur na mi rung gis sgoms shig_/rtsol cig_/nged kyis rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[224a.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gling bzhi pa re rer yang sems can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po de dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed do/_/kha cig 
[\[224a.4\]]ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa rnams la rnam par gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig bskyed do/_/kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams byang ngo zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[224a.5\]]dud 'gro'i bar dang /_kha cig gnod sbyin dbul po nyid kyi bar dang /_kha cig ni mi dbul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su byang ngo /_/nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to/_/sems can rnams btson ra nas yongs su thar bar gyur to/_/
[\[224a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_dge ba sna tshogs dri ma med pa'i gser can spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes phyug_/lha dang shed las skyes dang lag 'gro'i dam pa nyon mongs rnyog pa sel mdzad pa/_/tshul khrims thos 
[\[224a.7\]]rig gsum po phun sum tshogs pa sems can thams cad 'dzud pa'o/_/lag 'gro'i tshogs rab thar mdzad thugs rje brtan po sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs par mdzod/_/gzhan sems sems can slad du sdug bsngal ji ltar gtar ba bzhin/_/lag 'gro'i skad cig 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]mtha' yas 'dir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs/_/dgra yis phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba/_/ye shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad tshim par mdzad du gsol/_/'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying 
[\[224b.2\]]po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang /_rin po che dang /_chos gos dag 
[\[224b.3\]]gi char rab tu 'bebs shing /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin thams cad sdod pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[224b.4\]]gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten gyi dbus su gdan bting ba nyid la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' la lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[224b.5\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan dang /_phye ma sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang me tog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs dang /_rin po che sna 
[\[224b.6\]]tshogs dang /_ras gos dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/de nas 
[\[224b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sug las gang dag gis sems can rnams klu'i skye gnas su skye lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po las kyi sgrib pa bcus sems 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]can 'byung po rnams myur du klu'i skye gnas su skye'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag yin la myur du 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs 
[\[225a.2\]]su lta ba ma yin zhing shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la lag pa brkyang ba dag yod de/_de dag smon lam gyi dbang gis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[225a.3\]]mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/_de dag gis tshul khrims thams cad rdzogs par skyon med par bsrung bar ni ma nus so/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jigs pas skrag nas rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can 
[\[225a.4\]]gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol bar byed cing shin tu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dag yod de/_de dag nga rgyal gyi mthus rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod 
[\[225a.5\]]de/_de dag shin tu khro ba mang zhing sems can gzhan rnams la rab tu sdang ste/_de dag sha khon la rten pas 'chi ba'i dus tha mar klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/_de dag smon lam gyis der skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang yang 
[\[225a.6\]]dag par ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas yongs su btsal ba dang mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag yod de/_de dag rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag ser sna can dang nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag yod de/_de dag las des klu rnams 
[\[225a.7\]]kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing mu cor smra la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dag yod de/_de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yin zhing /_chos dang /_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]dge 'dun dang /_bslab pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i gnas lta bu dang /_pha ma rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yin pa yod do/_/de'i tshe de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid chung ngus 'khrul pas klu rnams 
[\[225b.2\]]kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang /_gti mug gis zil gyis non cing ma dul la skyon med pa ma yin par spyod pa dag yod de/_de dag klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang /_phra ma smra ba dang /_tshig rtsub po smra ba 
[\[225b.3\]]la goms pa dag yod de/_de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas klu rnams kyi nang du skye ste bcu po de dag yin no/_/chos gzhan gsum dang ldan na klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_sems can gang dag lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa 
[\[225b.4\]]shin tu dam po dag gis sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag yod de/_de dag de nas shi 'phos nas nyes par spyod pa'i lhag ma chung ngus klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang /_de bzhin du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams nas zhes bya ba'i bar du 
[\[225b.5\]]ste/_chos gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/rgya mtshos kyang gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na klu gang dag longs spyod pa 
[\[225b.6\]]dang /_nye bar spyod pa'i dpal dang ldan pa lha dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa nas mi smad rims dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang /_gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar nas klu gang dag sems 
[\[225b.7\]]can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba dag gi bar mchis lags te/_de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po'i bu pad ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag su ga las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas gzugs 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]mchog tu lham me zhing lus kyis reg pa gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ci reg kyang kun tu tshig cing 'bar ba lags/_bdag dus thams cad du mchil lham bor nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/_bdag gi pha ma de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa'i ches khyad par du 
[\[226a.2\]]'phags pa myong ste/_dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye lag 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya 
[\[226a.3\]]ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po me tog bral des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[226a.4\]]dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad phul nas rtag tu chos mnyan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig 
[\[226a.5\]]kyang brtsigs so/_/rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga'i ra ba de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan 
[\[226a.6\]]thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang /_de na gang dag bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha la longs spyod par byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nas 
[\[226a.7\]]dong ngo /_/de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyod par mi byed/_gzhan dag la yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de lo khrag khrig brgya 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas btsos so/_/de de nas shi 'phos nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du sdug 
[\[226b.2\]]bsngal myong ngo /_/lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste/_de nas shi 'phos nas de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na/_gzhan yin par blta bar 
[\[226b.3\]]mi bya ste/_de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa yang khyod yin no/_/'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang du skyes so/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod 
[\[226b.4\]]yin te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo /_/gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/_/klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi 
[\[226b.5\]]dga' nas rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang /_rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so/_/
[\[226b.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsam pas sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs pa lags so/_/bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[226b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su zad do/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te/_byams 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]pa'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang /_de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun 
[\[227a.2\]]dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na de gzhan yin par yang mi blta ste/_de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no/_/'di ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror 
[\[227a.3\]]ma skyes so/_/lha'i dpal dang skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo /_/'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_'dir dpal dang skal ba bzang po de lta bu myong ngo /_/de skad ces thos nas klu 
[\[227a.4\]]thams cad skyo zhing mchog tu yid mi bde nas bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtog pas gces par byed par gyur to/_/de'i nang na klu gzhan mig med pa long ba 'bras bu nyam chung ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des gsang bstod nas 'o dod bos te 
[\[227a.5\]]gsol pa/_sems can rnams la thugs brtse bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/_/yun ring bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal tshor ba rab mi bzad/_/srin bu sbal pa skye bo srog chags sna tshogs 'tshal bar bgyid/_/bza' ba btung ba ma mchis 
[\[227a.6\]]chab tshan nang na bdag gnas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor ba 'jig rgyal bstan pa la/_/sngon ni dge sbyong khyod gyur to/_/mkhas shing gtsang sbra spyod lam ldan/_/dben pa dag tu'ang sdig pa byed/_/lhan cig gnas pa dag 
[\[227a.7\]]kyang mang /_/khyod bdag ston pa 'dra bar gyur/_/dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen po yang /_/khyod la slob ma rnams kyis brjod/_/rnyed dang bkur sti byung ba ni/_/khyod gcig bu yis longs spyad cing /_/khyod kyis dge slong des pa mthong /_/de dag la ni mi snyan brjod/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]lhan cig gnas de mi dgar gnas/_/khyod ni tshe rabs stong dag tu/_/nged kyi zas su gyur cig ces/_/de lta bu yi sems bskyed do/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/'dir yang khyod ni lag 'gror skyes/_/khyod rang gi yang lhan cig gnas/_/phyi phyir za 
[\[227b.2\]]bar byed pa yin/_/chu tshan nang na gnas pa dang /_/long bar de yis gyur pa yin/_/kun tu 'bar ba'i lcags dang zangs/_/phyis kyang dmyal bar za bar 'gyur/_/stobs med yid ni mi dga' bas/_/klu dbang kun gyi nang na ngu /_/nyes pa so sor bshags 
[\[227b.3\]]byas na/_/sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su grol/_/de nas bcom ldan gser 'dra ba'i/_/phyag gi mthil gyi dkyil 'khor reg_/spyod par dka' ba dgongs mdzad nas/_/ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nga byung ste/_/sngon tshe 
[\[227b.4\]]bden pa gang gis ngas/_/bram ze long ba'i don du ni/_/mig dag gnyis ka phyung bar gyur/_/bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis/_/khyod kyis dri med mig thob shog_/nga yi legs par spyod pas khyod/_/sngon gyi las de byang bar shog_/tad+ya thA/_tsak+Shu kha ba/_ra 
[\[227b.5\]]sa na kha ba/_karma kha ba/_a nan dza na/_bi ra dza/_ba ra an ta/_dz+nyA ma/_ni sa ra Na tro ya/_a he tsan dra Da ne kri mi shud d+he/_pha la shud d+he/_a dze ta dze/_ta le tan ta le/_ba se d+ha sa ke/_ba sa te/_rU ra ti/_ma hA rU ra bi/_tri rad na bra te swA hA/_bcom ldan 
[\[227b.6\]]'das kyis bden pa'i tshig de bshad pa na klu 'bras bu nyam chung ba'i mig yongs su dag par gyur to/_/klu gzhan stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi mig kyang yongs su dag par gyur to/_/gzhan gnod sbyin dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za 
[\[227b.7\]]dang /_mi khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zad cing mig yongs su dag par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas smras pa/_'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs la ltos/_/rab tu lam med 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]rnams la mig kyang byin/_/gal te ston pa 'jig rten mi 'byung na/_/su yang 'gro bar sha'i mig phyis mi 'thob/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kau Di n+ya khyod kyis gsang sngags chen po'i 
[\[228a.2\]]gzhi'i gzungs sngags mig sgrub pa 'di zung shig_/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi lhag ma dang /_khams kun tu 'khrugs pa dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dang /_dug gi sbyor bas long bar 'gyur ba dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[228a.3\]]mthong bar yang 'gyur ba des mig sgrub pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rang gis bklag par bya'o/_/rang gi las so sor bshags par bya'o/_/des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing las gzhan mi byed par zhag 
[\[228a.4\]]bdun phrag bdun du rang gi mig la byabs na mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/yang sems can gang dag mtshams med pa'i las lhag ma lus pas long bar gyur cing dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lhag ma lus pa dang /_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i lhag ma lus 
[\[228a.5\]]pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang /_glegs bam du bris pa rnam par 'jig pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang /_gzhan gyi mig rnam par 'jig pa'i las kyi lhag mas long bar gyur pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di yi ger 'drir bcug ste/_yang 
[\[228a.6\]]dang yang du klog tu gzhug go/_/las kyi sgrib pa bshags par bya'o/_/gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang /_shing mngar dang /_sman ka tsa dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_rus sbal gyi snying rnying pa sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btag cing btsos la gsang sngags 'di dag lan 
[\[228a.7\]]stong rtsa brgyad mngon par brjod cing mig gi phyi rol du bsku bar bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur zhing de'i mig yongs 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]su dag par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyi gnas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas na yang de'i las kyi sgrib par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor des 'di skad ces 
[\[228b.2\]]gsol to/_/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa nad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de'i tshe klu tshon rtsi sngon pos gsang bstod de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sdig pa thams cad 
[\[228b.3\]]sbyong ba khyod/_/khyod ni dka' mdzad dpal kun ldan/_/khyod kyis las kyang rab tu mkhyen/_/srog chags kun gyi rgyal po khyod/_/bdag ni chu dang rnam bral zhing /_/tsha ba'i klung gis kun gdungs pa'i/_/'brog dgon pa na gnas pa lags/_/dri mi zhim pa'i 
[\[228b.4\]]gnas na gnas/_/lo ni bye ba phrag stong du/_/zhag gcig bdag la bde ma mchis/_/rtag par 'khor dang lhan cig tu/_/bdag ni gzhan gyis bza' ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sems can gang dag sdig byas nas/_/phyis kyang bdag 
[\[228b.5\]]nyid bsod nams sgrub/_/lus kyis gaN+DI brdungs nas su/_/dge slong dge 'dun tshim byed na'ang /_/las kyi lhag ma de yis su/_/gang dang gang du skyes par ni/_/sdug bsngal ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/bza' btung dag dang yang dag ldan/_/yang na klu yi skye 
[\[228b.6\]]gnas su/_/lus kyis skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi mgo yi klad pa der/_/nor bu'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/kun tu chu 'byung zhes bya ba/_/chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyur ro/_/gang na klu ni gnas byed pa/_/de nas chu ni 'bab par 'gyur/_/sa 'am nam 
[\[228b.7\]]mkha' la yang rung /_/gang dang gang du 'gro ba der/_/sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang /_/chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/yang na sems can gang dag gis/_/mi yi dngos po thob nas su/_/sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/_/dge 'dun rim gro mi byed na/_/
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs ni/_/ngan song gsum du myong nas kyang /_/de nyid klu yi skye gnas su/_/skye ba thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/de las kun tu chu mi 'byung /_/mgo la nor bu rin chen med/_/stong pa skom pa'i gnas dag tu/_/chu 
[\[229a.2\]]med par ni gnas par 'gyur/_/sngon 'das dus na khyod kyis ni/_/rgyal ba skar rgyal bstan pa la/_/dge slong dgon pa par gyur te/_/phrag dog ser snas gang ba yin/_/dge slong blo bur 'ongs mthong nas/_/khro gnyer can gyi bzhin byas nas/_/de dag 
[\[229a.3\]]la ni sbyin gtong byed/_/de la yang ni mngon sum gshe/_/der ni gang dag chur yang ni/_/myur du mi gtsang ba yis bkang /_/'chag sa gnas khang dag gi gnas/_/dri nga ba yis bkang bar gyur/_/dge slong des pa 'gro ba na/_/brgyad bkag gis 
[\[229a.4\]]ni gshe bar gyur/_/dge slong des pa gzhan dag kyang /_/rgyang ring bar ni yongs su spangs/_/de phyir phrag dog ser sna'i rgyus/_/ma chod par ni khyod gyur nas/_/dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong /_/myur du khros nas gshe bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pa po la khro 
[\[229a.5\]]bas gshe/_/ngo tsha khrel yod rnam par spangs/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_/sems can dmyal bar so sor skyes/_/lus ni bye bas sems dmyal du/_/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su dus ring por/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[229a.6\]]rab tu mi bzad myong /_/khyod ni klu yi skye gnas su/_/skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal gyur/_/stong pa 'brog dgon rdzong rnams su/_/chu dang bral bar gnas pa yin/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams su khyod/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba phyi phyir myong /_/shin tu 
[\[229a.7\]]yun ring [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/dud 'gror sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/su zhig tha ma'i dus tshe gnod sems byung /_/rtag tu phrag dog ser sna khros pa la/_/bsam gtan mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/_/tshul khrims mi skyob dgon par gnas pa min/_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]yang de'i tshe klu'i 'khor de'i nang na klu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa drug sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_skad po cher rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag 
[\[229b.2\]]yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bdag cag gis 'dra mtshungs par las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu 'phangs lags so/_/de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong lags so/_/da ltar yang klu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu rnams kyi 
[\[229b.3\]]nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir lags te/_dper na klu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu tshon rtsi sngon po bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis chu long la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chag chag thob shig dang /_des ni khyed kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[229b.4\]]thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas klu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu de dag thams cad kyis lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs pa dang /_lag na chu 'dug pa de rab tu 'bar ro/_/de nas me'i phung po shing ta la drug srid du 'phags te/_lan bdun gyi bar du de bzhin 
[\[229b.5\]]no/_/klu'i tshogs de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas mchi ma dag phyung ngo /_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang yid kun tu mi dga' nas de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/_/de 'dra ba yi 'bras bu 'thob/_/
[\[229b.6\]]dge ba yin na bzang po ste/_/sdig pa byed pa'ang sdig to'o/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu'i klu/_/khyed kun 'di skad tshig smros shig_/bden pa gang gis ston pa ni/_/sems can kun la thugs snyoms pa/_/bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis/_/nged kyi chu 
[\[229b.7\]]ni ma 'bar cig_/klu thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/lan brgyad pa la lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtor nas nyes pa la nyes par so sor bshags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdig pa'i 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]las kyi sgrib pa yi/_/lhag ma lus pa yongs su zad/_/byams pa'i tshe na khyed cag ni/_/mi yi srid pa thob par 'gyur/_/byams pa yi ni bstan pa la/_/myur du rab tu 'byung ba thob/_/rnal 'byor la ni mngon brtson dang /_/myur 
[\[230a.2\]]du dgra bcom thob par 'gyur/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i tshogs de ji ltar lhags pa bzhin de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dang /_bdag gi las dang /_'gro ba dang /_skye ba rjes su dran te/_'khor de'i nang nas klu brgya stong phrag 
[\[230a.3\]]mang po rang gis nyes par byas pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis rab tu dus nas kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/_nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang /_chos mnyan 
[\[230a.4\]]pa'i rkyen gyis dge slong rnams dang lhan cig tu dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_khu ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba nas kha cig gis gsol pa/_bdag cag gis phyogs bzhi pa 
[\[230a.5\]]la bsngos pa longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis rang gis bsngos pa longs spyod lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/kha cig gis gsol pa/_bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[230a.6\]]gzigs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bdag cag gtsug tor can gyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bdag cag 'khor ba 'jig gi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bdag cag gser thub kyi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/klu kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[230a.7\]]pa 'od srung gi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/_nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang /_chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis de bzhin du bsngos pa'i dge 'dun gyi me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_khu ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dge slong rnams 
[\[230b\]]
