[\[230b.1\]]la stsal pa de bdag cag gis longs spyad lags so/_/sdig pa'i las des kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu mi bzad pa mang po yang dang yang nyams su myong lags so/_/dud 'gro dang yi 
[\[230b.2\]]dgas rnams kyi nang du dus yun ring por rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir lags so/_/las kyi lhag ma des bdag cag klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes nas chab bskol ba kun tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos lags so/_/bye ma kun tu tsha ba'i nang du bsregs 
[\[230b.3\]]lags so/_/bdag cag gi kha'i sgor kha zas stsal ba yang lcags kyi thu lum du gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du khar btung ba stsal ba yang lcags dang zangs su gyur lags so/_/gang dang gang du mchis pa thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong 
[\[230b.4\]]lags na bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye lag 'gro dag khyed kyis dge 'dun gyi longs spyod pa de ni 'os pa ma yin te/_mtshams med pa dang nye ba yin no/_/rnam par ma smin par gang gis kyang myur 
[\[230b.5\]]du bshags par mi nus so/_/kye lag 'gro dag de lta yin yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la 'khod cig dang /_de lta na khyed la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyu des de bzhin gshegs pas khyed 'dod pa bzhin 'khor bar gzhog par mdzad 
[\[230b.6\]]do/_/de dag thams cad gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la yang bkod par gyur to/_/yang 'khor de'i nang na klu mo long ma zhig yod de/_de'i kha srin bus gang zhing gcin rul pa lta bu'i rnag dri nga ba zag go/_/smad kyi mtshan ma la yang de bzhin no/_/de'i lus 
[\[230b.7\]]thams cad rul cing rnag 'dzag pa phol mig dang srin bus gang ba la sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kyis za bar byed do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos gzigs te/_bka' stsal pa/_sring mo khyod kyis lus 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]la sdig pa'i las ni ci byas/_ji lta bu zhig_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba sdug bsngal lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba tsha ba lags te/_gang nas klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes 
[\[231a.2\]]pa'i dgung lo stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug bdag gis mngon par 'tshal lags so/_/bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu ni gdugs zhag gcig kyang rgyun ma chad lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sngon gyi las ci zhig byas/_des gsol pa/_'di nas 
[\[231a.3\]]bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rgyal ba rnam par gzigs kyi bstan pa la mi'i rgyud kyi bud med du gyur lags te/_bdag der 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang lhan cig tu dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na dge 'dun gyi mal cha'i steng 
[\[231a.4\]]du yang dang yang 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dod pa dag so so yang dag par myong lags te/_nor gyi slad du ma skrag lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de tshun chad bdag rtag tu lha dang mi'i rnyed pa dang bral lags so/_/rtag tu ngan song gsum gyi tshor ba mi bzad pas rab tu gzir 
[\[231a.5\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sring mo gang gi tshe 'dir bskal pa chen po 'jig par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod gang du song /_des gsol pa/_sngon gyi las la rten pa'i rlung chen po de dag gis 'phangs nas/_'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gzhan dag tu 
[\[231a.6\]]'phangs lags so/_/yang gang gi tshe der 'jig par gyur nas de nas yang 'dir 'phangs lags na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[231a.7\]]phyag gnyi gas rma rtsi spos dang sbyar ba'i chu bzhes te bden pa brjod par mdzad do/_/bden pa gang gis sngon thi ba'i phyir nga'i lus chags pa med par yongs su btang ba'i bden pa des khyod kyi nad de dag zhi bar gyur cig_/klu mo de'i khar blugs shing lus la gtor bas 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/_gsum la skyabs su nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/yang de nyid na klu gzhan zhig lus dri nga zhing srin bus gang la srin bu ser skyas gang nas de las rnag khrag tsha zhing gor gor po zag pa/_smra mi nus pa/_mchog tu skyon du bgrang 
[\[231b.2\]]ba zhig yod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro khyod kyis sngon mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/_klu des kha'i sgo phye nas srin bu'i rigs dang /_rnag khrag dang /_mes gang ba'i kha'i sgo sbyang brims te smra ma nus so/_/de 
[\[231b.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyor chu zhig bzhes te bka' stsal pa/_ri bong gyur te drang srong phyir/_/rang gis me yi nang bor ba/_/bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis/_/klu ni smra bar nus par shog_/skyor chu de klu'i khar blugs nas de'i kha'i nang du me rab tu zhi zhing srin 
[\[231b.4\]]bu dang rnag khrag kha'i phyi rol du byung ngo /_/klu de kha yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba 'od srung gi bstan pa la bdag zhing par gyur lags so/_/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gzhan zhig 
[\[231b.5\]]la skyed du stsol cig dang /_ston gyi dus su khyod la dbul lo zhes gser lnga bcu zhig gsol ba btab lags so/_/des bdag la 'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin bcu zhig stsal te/_lnga bcur ma stsal lags so/_/bdag gis dge slong de la khro bas zil gyis non nas 
[\[231b.6\]]'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin bcu blangs te/_de la slar yang ma stsal lags so/_/gzhan yang dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba der bdag mchis nas der dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa a mra'i 'bras bu bcu gsum pa longs spyad lags 
[\[231b.7\]]so/_/sug las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma de kho nas de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa skam po 'dir nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_rtag tu bdag gi lus srin bu dag dang rnag khrag brdus pas gang lags so/_/bkres pa dang skom pas 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]kun tu gzir nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong lags so/_/yang mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes lags so/_/dge slong de yang khro ba dang ser sna'i rgyu des 'chi 
[\[232a.2\]]ba'i dus bgyis nas 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du bdag gi mchan khung du skyes te/_dus rtag tu bdag la g.yo bar bgyid do/_/de rtag tu khro bas zil gyis non nas dbugs tsha bas bdag gi lus la yongs su gang bar bgyid do/_/rgyu des rtag par rgyun tu bdag 
[\[232a.3\]]gi lus srin bu dag dang rnag khrag gis gang lags na de bzhin gshegs pas bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_sbrul dgra dang 'dra ba de las bdag yongs su thar bar mdzad par gsol/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag tu chab bzhes te 'di 
[\[232a.4\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mu ge dag ni byung ba'i tshe/_/nga ni 'dir yang nyar gyur te/_/sha dang khrag gis tshim byas pas/_/khyed cag gnyi ga bde bar shog_/chu des klu la gtor nas de'i mchan khung nas klu'i bu byung ngo /_/gnyi gas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[232a.5\]]to/_/yun ji tsam gyis ngan song dag las bdag cag thar bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye lag 'gro dag gang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun nas dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_
[\[232a.6\]]bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_rtsi dang /_yo byad kyang rung /_dge 'dun las gal te bdag gir longs spyad dam/_gzhan la byin na sdig pa'i las de rnam par smin cing so so yang dag par ma myong bar sus kyang myur du zad par bya bar mi nus te 'di 
[\[232a.7\]]ni mtshams med pa dang nye ba shin tu lci ba yin no/_/lag 'gro dag khyed tshur sheg_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su deng shig dang /_des na khyed cag chu la gnas pa dag tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su rnam par bkod de chu la gnas par 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spu gri rnon po dag gis su/_/rang gi yan lag gtubs pa sla'i/_/bsngos zin pa yi dngos po ni/_/khyim pa rnams la sbyin mi bya/_/me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/_/lcags kyi thu 
[\[232b.2\]]lum zos sla yi/_/dge 'dun dag las gal te ni/_/dge 'dun gyi la longs mi spyad/_/lhun po dang ni 'dra ba'i me/_/blang ba byas te zos pa sla'i/_/khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun gyi/_/longs spyad par ni mi bya'o/_/thams cad dbyung ba byas pa dang /_/
[\[232b.3\]]gsal shing steng du bteg pa sla'i/_/khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun gyi/_/longs spyad par ni mi bya'o/_/me mdag gis ni gang ba yi/_/gnas khang der ni zhugs pa sla'i/_/khyim pas dge 'dun gnas khang du/_/mtshan mo gnas par mi bya'o/_/me 
[\[232b.4\]]lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/_/lcags kyi thu lum blangs pa sla'i/_/rab tu byung dang khyim pa yis/_/dbyig ni blang bar mi bya'o/_/'khor lo rnon pos bdag gi lus/_/kun tu gtub par byas pa sla'i/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams la/_/rgyags 
[\[232b.5\]]dang gshe ba bskyed mi bya/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyi/_/mig ni rang gi phyung ba sla'i/_/sems can du ni bgrang ba la/_/khros pas skye dgu mi mngag go/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyi/_/me yi gos ni gyon pa sla'i/_/tshul 'chos 
[\[232b.6\]]pa dang mthu yis su/_/khyim pa las ni gos mi bslang /_/me 'dra bar ni bskol ba yi/_/rtsub 'gyur chu ni 'thungs pa sla'i/_/rab tu byung bas g.yo sgyu yis/_/bza' btung bslang bar mi bya'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu khri bzhi stong snyed sngon gyi nyes 
[\[232b.7\]]par byas pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu dag las yongs su thar bar mdzad de skyabs gsum la yang rnam par bkod do/_/de'i tshe klu gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni skyabs gsum du 'gro ba dang /_theg pa gsum la nges par rnam par bkod do/_/de'i tshe bcom 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kau Di n+ya sems can rnams rang la slu ba la ltos/_sems can gang dag dbul po nyid kyi 'jigs pas skrag nas rang gis dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i 
[\[233a.2\]]phyir yo byad kyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs bsngos la/_kha cig gis ni rang gis longs spyad do/_/kha cig gis ni gzhan dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir byin/_kha cig gis ni mthus phrogs nas longs spyad pas de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du 
[\[233a.3\]]sdug bsngal brten to/_/yang sems can gang dag dbul po nyid kyis 'jigs pas skrag nas 'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra thams cad las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag rab tu byung nas chos 
[\[233a.4\]]dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang /_tshig 'don pa btang nas nyams par gyur pa de dag kha cig ni dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin du bsngos pa rang gis phrogs te longs spyod par byed do/_/kha cig gis ni khyim pa 
[\[233a.5\]]rnams la sbyin par byed de/_de dag gnyi ga de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal gyis gzir to/_/ngas nyes dmigs de yang dag par gzigs nas nga'i nyan thos rnams la dran par bya ba bca' ba mdzad de/_nga'i nyan thos sus kyang dge slong la bsngos 
[\[233a.6\]]pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo ma dang /_bcud khyim pa rnams la sbyin par mi bya'o/_/gang zag gi 'du shes kyis longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun las phyi rol du yang nyo tshong mi bya'o/_/bskor ba dang /_
[\[233a.7\]]bsgyur ba dang /_dbyig gi gtam mi bya'o/_/sems can rnams zang zing gis yongs su bsdu ba'i rkyen gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal dag la dgod par mi bya'o/_/sems can rnams chos kyis bsdu bas bsdu bar bya'o/_/mi phyed pa'i dad pa bzhi dang /_theg pa 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la dgod par bya'o/_/'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo le'u bcu gcig pa las klu skyabs su 'gro ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i 
[\[233b.2\]]sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan kun shes kau Di n+yas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lag 'gro dag byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las 
[\[233b.3\]]bstan pa'i spyod pa dang 'brel pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yun ring por 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji srid du gling bzhi pa 'dir mchod rten chen po 'di dag rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la mngon par brtson pa thams cad kyis stongs 
[\[233b.4\]]par ma gyur pa de srid du gling bzhi pa 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten chen po gang dag ce na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di na mchod rten drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni sngon chad sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[233b.5\]]rang rgyal ba dang /_nyan thos mang po gnas gnas shing ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gnas par 'gyur ba ste/_rjes su bstan pa chen po yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[233b.6\]]chu lha'i lag tu yongs su gtad pa mdzad do/_/ngas kyang de nyid kyi lag tu yongs su gtad de/_'di yang spro bar 'gyur zhing gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gang 
[\[233b.7\]]zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag kyang yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po chu lhas gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]'jig gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so/_/gang dag gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyang chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so/_/gang dag gang zag mnyam pa 
[\[234a.2\]]nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de dag kyang de bzhin lags te/_ji srid du dam pa'i chos 'bar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du bdag gis gnyi ga bsrungs lags so/_/de bzhin du de 
[\[234a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyi bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bar gyis kyang de'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi ba'i slad du gtad lags so/_/de bzhin du da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten nas gang zag 
[\[234a.4\]]mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang /_gang dag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag gi bar dag dang /_ji srid 
[\[234a.5\]]du nyan thos de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par gnas par de dag thams cad bsrung bar bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro'i bdag po legs so legs so/_/de ltar byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i chos kyi tshul sbyin bdag 
[\[234a.6\]]chen po de lta bu dag gis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/ba lang spyod kyi gling gi ngos na rdul gyi ri de la drang srong thub pa'i gnas bkra ba ni klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i phreng ba can la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i phreng ba 
[\[234a.7\]]can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis der drang srong thub pa'i gnas bkra ba de chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so zhes bya ba nas/_ji srid du nyan thos de dag yongs su 'dzin pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ma mchis par gnas pa de srid du bdag gis thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin bdag rnams kyis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/shar gyi 
[\[234b.2\]]lus 'phags kyi ngos na ni lang ga Na'i ri la drang srong thub pa'i gnas drang srong 'byung ba ni klu'i rgyal po zla srung la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas de srid du bdag gis yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ngos na 
[\[234b.3\]]rgyal dga'i ri la drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs ni klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab la chang khyir yongs su gtad de/_gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyang chang khyir yongs su gtad do/_/de bzhin du gang zag dge 
[\[234b.4\]]slong mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag kyang chang khyir ngas yongs su gtad do/_/klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[234b.5\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/_sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs de yang chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so/_/chos kyis gnas pa yang de bzhin lags so/_/gser thub kyis kyang de 
[\[234b.6\]]bzhin lags so zhes bya ba nas 'od srung gis kyang de bzhin lags so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_bdag gis chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung lags so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas bdag gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos 
[\[234b.7\]]brtsegs thams cad bsrung bar bgyi lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro'i bdag po legs so legs so/_/de ltar byin gyis brlabs pas chos kyi tshul sbyin bdag chen po de lta bu dag gis yun ring por 'bar bar byed 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ba lang spyod kyi gling na drang srong thub pa'i gnas 'od zer byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/
[\[235a.2\]]de bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags gling na drang srong thub pa'i gnas pad ma'i shing n+ya gro d+ha lta bu gang yin pa de ni klu'i rgyal po dbyig gtong la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du byang gi 
[\[235a.3\]]sgra mi snyan gyi gling na drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs 'od zer ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni klu'i rgyal po gnas na rgyu la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu'i 
[\[235a.4\]]rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas na drang srong thub pa'i gnas nor bu'i snying po'i 'od 'phro ba gang yin pa de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du ri rab kyi rtse mo na sum 
[\[235a.5\]]cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na drang srong thub pa'i gnas me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i snying po gang yin pa de ni klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dga' 
[\[235a.6\]]'phel zhes bya ba nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas gnas brtan gyi phug gang yin pa de ni klu'i rgyal po ce spyang la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du yangs pa can na drang srong thub pa'i gnas 
[\[235a.7\]]shin tu brtan pa ni klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du ser skya'i gnas na drang srong thub pa'i gnas gser sgron dri zhim ni klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du yul ma ga d+hA na drang srong thub pa'i gnas rgya chen zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po ri bos byin la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 
[\[235b.2\]]'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du bcom brlag na drang srong thub pa'i gnas stug pa'i sprin ni klu'i rgyal po ce spyang dang rgyu ba la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/
[\[235b.3\]]de bzhin du yul 'khor ko sa la na drang srong thub pa'i gnas rgyal ba dag pa zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po srin bu la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du phug gi pha rol na drang srong thub pa'i gnas 
[\[235b.4\]]btang bzung bden pa'i dri zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du yul 'khor sa 'dzin na drang srong thub pa'i gnas mthong ba'i lam rgyags zhes 
[\[235b.5\]]bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du kha che'i yul na drang srong thub pa'i gnas gur kum gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po hu lu ru la chang khyir 
[\[235b.6\]]yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du yul chu len na drang srong thub pa'i gnas 'od zer byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba la chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring 
[\[235b.7\]]por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du rgya yul na drang srong thub pa'i gnas sred med kyi bu'i 'od ces bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos byin gyi lag tu chang khyir yongs su gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bar du'o/_/de bzhin du kha sha'i yul na sa'i nu ma'i gnas ri glang ru'i drung chu bo go ma ti'i ngogs na drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan d+ha zhes bya ba mchod rten chen po'i gnas ni klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis byin gyi lag tu chang khyir yongs su 
[\[236a.2\]]gtad do zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/mchod rten chen po de dag ni sngon chad drang srong thub pa'i khyu mchog mang po gnas shing sngon chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po yang gnas gnas/_sngon chad rang rgyal 
[\[236a.3\]]ba mang po yang gnas gnas/_sngon chad nyan thos chen po mang po yang gnas gnas/_sngon chad drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa mang po yang gnas gnas pa yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing 
[\[236a.4\]]sems can 'khor bas skrag pa yongs su skyo ba rnams kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir dbang che bar grags pa/_dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyis de dag gi lag tu yongs su gtad pa yin no/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[236a.5\]]grangs med pa dpag tu med pa na gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byung ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag dgongs shing bsams 
[\[236a.6\]]la byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dpag tu med pa de dag tu gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[236a.7\]]kyang mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag dgongs shing bsams par 'gyur la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal ba'i zla ba gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can gyi don du las zad par bya 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ba'i phyir mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang /_rang rgyal ba thams cad dang /_nyan thos chen po thams cad dang /_de bzhin du drang 
[\[236b.2\]]srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don du las zad par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob par yang 'gyur te/_sems can dbang che bar grags pa de dag gi lag tu chang khyir 
[\[236b.3\]]ngas yongs su gtad par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du da ltar yang mchod rten chen po'i gnas nyi shu po de dag khyed kyis ji ltar ming yongs su bzung ba bzhin ngas yongs su gtad kyis/_sems can 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba rnams kyi don du khyed kyis de dag 
[\[236b.4\]]srungs shig_/chos rab tu mi 'jig par yang dag par zung shig_/de nas gang dag gi lag tu mchod rten chen po'i gnas nyi shu po de dag yongs su gtad pa'i klu de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu 
[\[236b.5\]]rnams ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pas shin tu myos pa lags te/_gang bdag cag mtshan gcig gnyid log pa de ni mi'i ltar brtsis na dgung lo nyi shu rtsa gcig 'das par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te bdag cag gnyid kyis log nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas 
[\[236b.6\]]de dag tu lha'i kun tu 'khrug pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur tam/_mi'i kun tu 'khrug pa'am/_zhugs sam/_chab kyis kun tu 'khrug pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur lags na bdag cag gnyid kyis 
[\[236b.7\]]log cing myos pa de dag gis rab tu 'jig pa de bsal bar rngo mi thogs lags te/_dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdag cag nongs pa byung ba lags par 'gyur lags so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rtag par rgyal ba rnams kyis dgongs pa'i mchod rten chen po'i gnas drang srong thub pa'i gnas khyed kyis long shig_/chang khyir yongs su skyongs shig_/yongs su srungs shig_/de'i tshe gnod 
[\[237a.2\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa drug gis ji ltar rjes su 'thun par sngon chad drang srong thub pa'i gnas su ji ltar gnas par gyur pa bzhin du chang khyir yongs su blangs so/_/go ma sA la gan d+ha'i gnas ni ma gtogs te ma blangs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la klu'i 
[\[237a.3\]]rgyal po khyim bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i nu ma'i gnas ri glang ru'i drung chu bo go ma ti'i ngogs gang na drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan d+ha zhes bgyi ba mchod rten chen po'i gnas mchis pa ni yongs su bskyang ba'i slad 
[\[237a.4\]]du bdag gis blangs lags na sa phyogs de na yul dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal ma mchis lags so/_/mi rnams kyi gnas ma mchis lags te/_yul gzhan nam/_gling bzhi pa gzhan nam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi byang 
[\[237a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni ma gtogs te/_de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mchod pa bgyi 
[\[237a.6\]]ba'i slad du drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan d+ha der lhags te/_de nas slar yang mchi bar bgyid do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon su yang de kun tu bsrung ba'i slad du spro bar ma gyur pa la gzigs/_gnas de ngan par rtsi ba 
[\[237a.7\]]zhig ma lags sam zhes bdag ngo mtshar du gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro'i bdag po de skad ma smra shig_/kha sha'i yul na bden pa mthong ba dang /_dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa nyi khri gnas pa gang 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]dag yin pa de dag gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po go ma sA la gan d+ha la nyin mtshan du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang lag 'gro'i bdag po ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas skye dgus lo 
[\[237b.2\]]sum stong lon pa na sa'i nu ma'i gnas su yul 'khor chen po rdo rtsub ces bya ba bde ba dang dga' bar byed pa/_mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de na drang srong sbyin gnas bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba theg pa bla na med pa 'dod pa lnga 
[\[237b.3\]]'bum snyed kyi mang po gnas par gyur to/_/de'i tshe mi rnams zas la 'khren te/_de dag kha zas kyi phyir drang srong de dag la 'khrig pa dang ldan pas mi snyan par rjod par byed do/_/thal ba dang rdul gyis 'thor bar byed do/_/de'i tshe drang srong de dag yul 'khor 
[\[237b.4\]]rdo rtsub de nas dong ngo /_/de nas sems can de dag drang srong dong ba de dag la mchog tu dga' zhing yi rangs par gyur to/_/de'i phyir dang por khyod khros te/_de dag gi chu kun tu chad nas yul 'khor der klung dang /_'bab chu'i ngogs dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u 
[\[237b.5\]]dang /_lu ma'i chu dang /_khron pa dag skams pa khyod kyis dran nam/_yul der me lha khros te sems can de dag gi me kun tu chad nas sems can de dag bkres pa dang skom pas gzir te/_'chi ba'i dus byas nas ring por ma lon par de 'brog dgon par gyur 
[\[237b.6\]]to/_/de ltar yun ring por yang dag par gnas par gyur pa dag kyang de bzhin no/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang /_der ji nas kyang sa'i nu ma'i gnas der grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_ri 
[\[237b.7\]]brags rnams gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa'i gnas dang /_bde ba dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_mi dang /_skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur bar nga der gshegs 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]par mdzad de/_drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan d+ha de zhag bdun longs spyod par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ming can la bka' stsal pa/_ming can khyod kyis dran nam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[238a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sngon ri glang ru de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis skyil mo krung gcig gis rnam par grol ba'i bde bas dgung bdun 'das par mdzad de/_dgung bdun po de 'das nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_drang srong thub pa'i gnas 
[\[238a.3\]]go ma sA la gan d+ha de la bzhugs pa dang /_de'i tshe de'i srung ba 'dzin pa dang /_pyi pyi ling gi shing bsrung ba gang dag lags pa dang /_de'i nyan thos bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa/_ting nge 'dzin la mngon par brtson pa/_chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyis 
[\[238a.4\]]srung ba 'dzin pa dang /_pyi pyi ling gi shing srung ba gang dag lags pa bdag gis dran lags so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yun ji srid du nyan thos de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis 
[\[238a.5\]]par gnas pa de srid du bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi lags so/_/gzhan yang byams pa'i dus kyi bar du mchod rten chen po go ma sA la gan d+ha dus rtag tu chab dang /_zhugs dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_grul bum gyis kun tu 'khrug pa rnams las bdag gis bsrung 
[\[238a.6\]]bar bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro'i bdag po legs so legs so/_/nga'i chos kyi tshul de ltar shin tu byin gyis brlabs pas grogs po dang sbyin bdag de lta bu dag gis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang 
[\[238a.7\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu po gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas lung bstan pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po mnyan par bya ba'i phyir lhags shing 'dus pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]'das bdag cag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'dir gnas par bgyi lags so/_/drang srong thub pa'i gnas me tog nas ba dan gyi bar dang /_gser nas sa le sbram gyi bar gyis yongs su gtams par bgyi lags so/_/las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags nyi ma'i 
[\[238b.2\]]snying po 'di bcang bar bgyi lags so/_/gzhan dag la bstan par bgyi lags so/_/yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs sngags de yang yid kyis rjes su brtags te gnas par bgyi lags so/_/
[\[238b.3\]]byang chub kyi lam dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dang gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar bgyi lags so/_/da ltar bdud bye ba de dag lhags shing lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[238b.4\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po grangs ma mchis pa/_dpag tu ma mchis pa de dag kyang lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag thams cad klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[238b.5\]]kyi sug par chang khyir stsal lags so/_/'on kyang 'di la bdud dang /_lha dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lha ma yin de dag gi sems gzhan du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas de rnams dag pa dag gi sug par chang khyir yongs su gtad 
[\[238b.6\]]lags zhes/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rnams kyi bar gyis mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag la mi phan pa dang /_rab tu 'jig pa dang /_rnam par 'jig par pha rol gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu ma dgongs na mi rung lags 
[\[238b.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/ma 'jigs shig_/ma skrag shig_/'dir sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]po'i gnas de dag thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/_/de bzhin du da ltar ngas kyang drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po'i gnas thams cad klu rnams dang /_gnod 
[\[239a.2\]]sbyin rnams kyi lag tu chang khyir yongs su gtad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi khom pa brgyad thob pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa yang dag par byang bar bya ba dang /_byang grol gyi bde ba'i rgyu yang dag par bskyed par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo 
[\[239a.3\]]byad sa bon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung ba'i tshogs dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal rnams yang dag par rab tu skye bar bya ba dang /_bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas 
[\[239a.4\]]mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu yongs su gtad pa'i phyir ro/_/yang gzhan yang mchod rten chen po'i gnas byung ngo cog dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba gang du de bzhin gshegs pa bltams pa dang /_dka' thub kyi tshal 
[\[239a.5\]]gang du bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang /_gang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'am/_btsas pa'i sku rab tu bzhag pa'i bar dang /_gang dang gang 
[\[239a.6\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa rnams gnas par gyur pa dang /_gnas par 'gyur ba nas nga'i chos kyi tshul gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar gyis gnas de dag thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dag yin no/_/yang mchod 
[\[239a.7\]]rten chen po'i gnas de dag kyang bdud rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi lag tu yongs su bskyang bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad do/_/gzhan yang 'byung po thams cad rab tu dad par byed pa dang /_
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]phyir mi ldog par byed pa gang 'di lung bstan pa chen po ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa/_so sor sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa zhes bya ba ngas khyed cag la sbyin par bya ste/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs la 
[\[239b.2\]]mngon par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/_sdang ba rnams mngon par dad par byed pa/_phyir zlog par byed pa/_dge ba la yang dag par sbyor du 'jug pa yin no/_/de bzhin du ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba nas mngon par dad par byed 
[\[239b.3\]]cing phyir zlog par byed la/_dge ba la yang dag par sbyor du 'jug pa'i bar du yin no/_/lung bstan pa chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rgyu 'thun pa/_mngon par sgrub pa'i bdag po chen po sdang ba thams cad phyir ldog par byed pa 'di ni brtul zhugs chen po yang dag 
[\[239b.4\]]par sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/ye shes chen po la 'jug par byed pa'o/_/thos pa mang po kun tu 'dzin pa'o/_/thabs chen po yang dag par sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/dgra chen po nges par 'dul bar byed pa'o/_/sdang ba chen po rab tu dad par byed pa'o/_/nad chen 
[\[239b.5\]]po las rab tu thar bar byed pa'o/_/nad chen po las rab tu sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/'jigs pa chen po phyir zlog par byed pa'o/_/dgon pa chen po las nges par rgal bar byed pa'o/_/bden pa chen po mthong bar byed pa'o/_/bzod pa chen po la reg par byed 
[\[239b.6\]]pa'o/_/ye shes chen po'i rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/tad+ya thA/_A ma a bA sa/_A ma ba ri ba ra/_sa~M 
[\[239b.7\]]shrI ya/_gam+b+ha pa ri pA sA/_mi tra mi tra/_shwA ya mi tra/_pa ri bA sA/_mi tra sa ma dz+nyA ya/_ni ka tha sa ma dz+nyA ya/_tri sh+yang g+ha ba/_dra ba/_rA dza/_bi na shA ya/_sa ma shA ya/_nir an b+ha dra ma/_bA bA gram/_r-id d+hi bi gra maN/_sa ma dz+nyA na/_
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]a ba brga/_na rA ya na brga/_sa mA gram/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na mA rga swA hA/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[240a.2\]]mngon par sgrub pa/_sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa nas dge ba la yang dag par sbyor du 'jug par byed pa'i bar dang /_brtul zhugs chen po yang dag par sgrol bar byed pa nas byang chub thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i bar yin 
[\[240a.3\]]no/_/gang dang gang du da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su de'i tshe mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag la bdud dam/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci'am/_grul bum nas 
[\[240a.4\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du sus chu'am/_me'am/_pha rol gnon pa gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig gis mi phan pa dang /_rab tu 'jig pa dang /_rnam par 'jig par rtul bar byed na der khyed kyis 'di ltar dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[240a.5\]]pa rnams yid la bya zhing sems can thams cad la yang byams pa'i yid kyis lung bstan pa chen po ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/_sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa 'di dran par byas na de'i tshe de dag gi sems kyi rgyud rab tu dad par 
[\[240a.6\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/phyis kyang rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir rtul bar mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis lung bstan pa chen po ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/_sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa 'di thos nas sdig pa'i sems phyir zlog 
[\[240a.7\]]par mi byed pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las spong bar mi byed pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten nas skye dgu'i bar la ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_sngon gyi sha khon dang 'dres pa ni ma gtogs so/_/kye bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa 'di bshad 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_grul bum dang /_sha za dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' 
[\[240b.2\]]ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_rab tu dad pa skyes so/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bdud sdig can bdag gis rang gi gnas su ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa 'di thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' 
[\[240b.3\]]ba dang /_dad pa dang /_gus pa skyes nas mchi ma dag phyung ste/_'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nga'i tshig nyon cig_/'di ni drang srong thub pa rgyal ba'i mchog bzod pa dang /_yon tan dang /_nges pa'i tshig rab mchog can de srin bus gang 
[\[240b.4\]]ba'i ri'i gnas dam pa la 'bar ba la lag 'gro chen po dang /_lha rnams kyis bzod pa'i dus bstan te/_nga yang der 'gro zhing mnyam pa med pa'i dge sbyong la bzod par gsol lo/_/de nyid la skyabs su 'gro'o/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i snying brtse ba rnam pa 
[\[240b.5\]]sna tshogs dang ldan pa rgyal ba bzod pa can de la skyabs su 'gro ba ni nga dang lhan cig 'dong bar byos shig_/de'i chos bstan du med pa nyon cig_/nyon mongs pa'i dra ba chod cig_/rdul med cing 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byos shig_/de nas 
[\[240b.6\]]bdud sdig can 'khor bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu zhi mdzad pa/_/bzod stobs des mthu can la bzod par gsol/_/
[\[240b.7\]]khyod kyi yon tan bdag gis kun tu 'tshal/_/bdag gis log pa gang bgyis de bzod gsol/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/chos dang dge 'dun la yang bdag skyabs mchi/_/bla ma bdag gi nongs par gzung du gsol/_/slan 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]chad khyod la bdag 'khrug yong mi bgyid/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga la khro med nyon mongs thams cad med/_/rtag tu sems can kun la sems snyoms te/_/bdud khyod la ni 
[\[241a.2\]]sems kyang dga' ba yin/_/rgyal ba bzod pa'i thugs ldan rtag tu bzod/_/de nas bdud sdig can mchog tu dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[241a.3\]]'ba' zhig la blta zhing 'dug go/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu 'od 'phro rtsub ces bya ba bdud kyi yul thams cad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[241a.4\]]ldan 'das mig mig ces bgyi ba lags na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci gzugs rnams kyi rgyu mig lags sam/_'on te mig gi rgyu gzugs rnams lags pa nas ci chos rnams kyi rgyu yid kyi khams lags sam/_'on te yid kyi rgyu chos rnams kyi 
[\[241a.5\]]bar lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gzugs rnams kyi rgyu yang mig ma yin la/_mig gi rgyu yang gzugs rnams ma yin pa nas chos rnams kyi rgyu yang yid ma yin la/_yid kyi rgyu yang chos rnams kyi bar ma 
[\[241a.6\]]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'on kyang mig ni mig gis stong pa'o/_/de lta mod kyi mig la rten cing mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o/_/de'i rkyen gyis gzugs rnams rab tu shes pa nas yid kyi rkyen gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye'o/_/de'i rkyen gyis chos rnams 
[\[241a.7\]]kyi bar rnam par shes pa'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs nas gang nas kyang 'ong ba med do/_/gang du yang 'gro ba med do/_/mig phyi na sdod pa yang med de/_dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad la gang la yang mi dmigs so/_/mig la 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]'bri ba nyid med do/_/gang ba nyid med do/_/brda med do/_/tha snyad med do/_/yang dag par 'du ba med do/_/gzhi med do/_/dper na snga dro'i dus su nyi ma shar ba na skar khung gang dang gang du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag zhugs pa ni ra ba la gnas pa dag tu yang 
[\[241b.2\]]dag par snang ngo /_/ra ba la mun pa dang /_snang ba dang /_rtog pa yang med do/_/ra ba gang yin pa de nyid snang ba yang ma yin no/_/ra ba'i rkyen gyis snang ba yang ma yin te/_'on kyang de la snang ba yang yod do/_/snang ba gang yin pa de nyid nyi ma dang /_nyi ma gang yin 
[\[241b.3\]]pa de nyid snang ba yang ma yin no/_/nyi ma nub pa na snang ba yang med par 'gyur ro/_/gang na yang snang ba'i 'gro ba dang gzhi med de/_'on kyang nyi ma'i rkyen gyis snang bar rab tu shes shing gzugs kyi snang ba la rten par yang snang ngo /_/de bzhin du nang gi skye mched drug 
[\[241b.4\]]po de dag gi rgyu yang nang gi skye mched drug po de dag yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/nang gi skye mched rnams kyi rgyu yang phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams ma yin te/_phan tshun du bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/bsdus pa la ni rnam par rgyu ba med do/_/yang dag par 'du ba 
[\[241b.5\]]med do/_/gzhi med do/_/phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnams la rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /_brda dang /_rnam par rgyu ba med do/_/yang dag par 'du ba med do/_/gzhi yang med pa nyid de/_phan tshun du bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/
[\[241b.6\]]'on kyang rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par byed de/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin pas rnam par shes pa yang 'du byed kyi rgyu lags so/_/'du byed rnams ni gsum ste/_lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed 
[\[241b.7\]]do/_/de la lus kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na/_lus kyi 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dag yin te/_de dag ni lus kyi 'du byed rnams so/_/dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba de dag kyang yan lag rnams len pa ste/_mi mnyam pa 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/_gzhan gang yang rung ba'i skal ba mi mnyam pa nyid dang /_sar pa sar pa dang /_rnying pa med pa nyid dang /_rnam par mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[242a.2\]]dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /_nam mkha' la kun tu rgyu ba dag yin no/_/rlung gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' ma yin no/_/nam mkha' gang yin pa de nyid kyang rlung ma yin te/_phan tshun du 'dres pa yin la phan tshun spyod yul ni ma yin no/_/gnyi 
[\[242a.3\]]ga stong pa dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_mtshan nyid dang bral ba dag yin no/_/'bri ba dang /_gang ba med pa dag yin no/_/pha rol dang tshu rol la gnas pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag par 'phags pa ni lus kyi 'du byed rnams yin te/_de lta bas 
[\[242a.4\]]na rnam par shes pa la lus kyi 'du byed rnams gnas pa ma yin te/_tshogs pa med/_rnam par rgyu ba med/_yang dag par 'du ba med/_gzhi dang yang dag pa'i rjes su 'brel ba med do/_/rnam par shes pa gzhi dang yang dag par rjes su 'brel pa'o zhes 
[\[242a.5\]]bya ba'i bar yang de bzhin no/_/de la ngag gi 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa rnams so/_/rtog pa rnams gang zhe na/_gang dag dbugs rngub pa 'jug par byed pa dang /_'byung bar byed pa rnams te/_sems kyis rjes su 'thun par 
[\[242a.6\]]byas pa dag yin no/_/de la rtog pa rnams kyis rtog par byed pa nas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis rtog par byed/_yongs su dag pa la rtog par byed/_rlung la rten pa'i rtog pa de dag skye bar byed/_dgag pa'i bar du ste/_rtog pa'i rlung rnams ni skad cig la 
[\[242a.7\]]'chel pa yin no/_/rlung rnams kyang rtog pa rnams yin par mi 'gyur te/_gnyi ga yang phan tshun du spyod yul ma yin zhing phan tshun du mtshan nyid dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa dag dang /_nam mkha' ltar med pa dag pa'i bar du'o/_/de la dpyod pa rnams gang zhe na/_dpyod 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa gang dag grang ba'i rnam pa'am/_dro ba'i rnam par lus thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba'i rlung rnams rgyu bar byed pa yin no/_/dpyod pa dag gis 'dus te reg pa rnam par mi shes te/_dpyod pa de dag rlung rnams dang phan tshun du spyod yul ma yin te/_phan 
[\[242b.2\]]tshun du mtshan nyid dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa dag pa'i bar du'o/_/de la yid kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na/_yid kyi 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni 'du shes dang sems pa'o/_/de la 'du shes gang zhe na/_sems gang gis chos de dag de ltar shes pa nas gang gi 
[\[242b.3\]]tshe dbugs rngub pa de'i tshe dbugs 'byung ba med do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de ltar 'du byed rnams la 'du shes rnam par bsgoms pa yin no/_/yang dag par byung nas kyang 'du byed rnams zad pa yin te/_rjes su 'thun par 'du shes pas kyang 'du byed kyi 'du shes 
[\[242b.4\]]rnam par sgom par byed pa 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya ste/_'du shes de ni rlung rnams la rten pa nas gnyi ga brjod du med pa'i bar du'o/_/de la sems pa gang zhe na/_sems pa gang dag gis zhes bya ba nas 'du byed rnams la 'du shes rnam par bsgoms pas yang dag 
[\[242b.5\]]pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs shing so so'i skye bo'i sa las rnam par 'das par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_skye ba dang 'jig pa sgom pa 'du byed rnams las sems sel bar byed pa/_rlung rnams 'phro bar mi byed pa 'di ni sems pa zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba gsum spang 
[\[242b.6\]]ba'i phyir ye shes kyi rten mig ma 'dres pa can zhes bya ba nas/_yid ma 'dres pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_'phags pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar yang gzugs dmigs pa'i rgyu mig ma yin no/_/mig gi rgyu gzugs ma yin pa 
[\[242b.7\]]nas chos rnams kyi rgyu yid ma yin no/_/yid kyi rgyu chos rnams ma yin pa'i bar du ste/_gnyi ga phan tshun du spyod yul ma yin/_phan tshun du brdar btags pa ma yin/_rnam par rgyu ba ma yin/_yang dag par gnas pa ma yin/_yang dag par 'du ba ma yin/_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]brjod du med pa dag yin/_pha rol dang tshu rol la gnas pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag par rten pa dag yin no/_/kye yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na bdud kyi bu 'od 'phro rtsub bdud kyi 'khor sngon gyi rgyal ba 
[\[243a.2\]]la lhag par bya ba byas pa nyi khri dang lhan cig tu rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe lha dang mi sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_sems can dpag yas pa yang bsam gtan dang po la gnas par gyur pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar thob 
[\[243a.3\]]par gyur to/_/kha cig ni 'bras bu dang po la gnas par gyur pa nas 'bras bu gsum pa la gnas par gyur pa'i bar du'o/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la sa bon bskyed pa nas rkyen gyi theg pa la sa bon bskyed pa'i bar du'o/_/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[243a.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/klu'i 'khor de'i nang nas kyang klu dkrigs phrag drug cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul to/_/der phyogs 
[\[243a.5\]]bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lhags pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu phye ba'i rin po che'i char pa dang /_ras bcos bu'i char pa dang /_
[\[243a.6\]]me tog gi char pa sna tshogs rab tu phab ste gsol pa/_sngon ma thos pa'i 'dus pa 'di dang /_ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags shing rmad du byung ba lags so/_/'di ni shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa lags so/_/
[\[243a.7\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde'i mdo'i gzungs sngags 'di bzung nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sems can rnams la rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/_/der bdud dang /_
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za gang dag lhags pa de dag gis kyang mchog tu ngo mtshar thob nas sil snyan rnam 
[\[243b.2\]]pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin par byed cing bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs dang /_ras bcos bu dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[243b.3\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag gi gnas su rgya mtsho chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs par gsol/_der bcom ldan 'das las bdag 'khor dang bcas 
[\[243b.4\]]pas nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di thog ma dang /_bar dang /_tha ma 'di thams cad mnyan par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro'i bdag po da de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por mi gshegs so/_/gsol 
[\[243b.5\]]pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das su zhig sems rtse gcig pas nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di nyan par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bsod nams mang po ji snyed cig skyed par bgyid lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[243b.6\]]lag 'gro'i bdag po sems can su la la zhig byung nas gling bzhi pa 'di thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang /_skyes bu cig shos su zhig sems rtse gcig pas nyi ma'i 
[\[243b.7\]]snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs par nyan par byed na bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni bsod nams kyi phung po cig shos 'di la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_bye ba phrag brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_dpe 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/lag 'gro'i bdag po nyi ma'i snying po 'di thos pa tsam gyi bsod nams kyi phung po yang de ltar zab pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te da rgya mtsho chen por mi gshegs lags na bdag gis 
[\[244a.2\]]kyang nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di mnyan nas yi ger bris te bcang bar bgyi lags na rgya mtsho chen por dge ba'i chos ji snyed cig rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag 'gro'i bdag po gang dang gang du nyi ma'i 
[\[244a.3\]]snying po lung bstan pa chen po thams cad bris nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dang de nyid du phan yon bcu 'byung ngo /_/bcu gang zhe na/_khyim de dang de zhes bya ba nas yul zhes bya ba'i bar der nor dang /_'bru dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang /_longs spyod mang po dang /_rin po 
[\[244a.4\]]che rnam pa sna tshogs ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyim mam yul gang na nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di bris nas mchod par 'gyur ba de dang der mchod rten chen po de dag na gang dag de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[244a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis kyang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir lhags nas der 'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_mi ngas dang /_nad dang /_mu ge dang /_dmag tshogs gnyi 
[\[244a.6\]]ga dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char pa dang /_nad rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[244a.7\]]du bgyi lags so/_/khyim mam zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor gyi bar gang na nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di yi ger bris shing mchod par 'gyur ba der bdag cag gis 'thab pa dang /_thab mo dang /_mi ngas dang /_nad dang /_mu ge dang /_dmag tshogs gnyi ga dang 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /_char pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gzhan yang khyim mam zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar gang na nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di yi ger bris par 'gyur ba'i yul 
[\[244b.2\]]'khor zhes bya ba'i bar der brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /_sman gyi 
[\[244b.3\]]lha mo grub pa 'khor dang bcas pas khyim zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar der rtag par rgyun du nyin mtshan du srung bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa zhes bya ba nas sman gyi lha mo grub pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[244b.4\]]bar 'khor dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi lags so zhes bya ba nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_khyim dang zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar gang na zhes bya ba nas khyim dang zhes 
[\[244b.5\]]bya ba nas/_yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar de dang der sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_dbang che bar grags pa/_dbang che bar grags pa/_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams skye ba len par byed 
[\[244b.6\]]do/_/gzhan yang khyim de dang der sems can rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ma chags pa dang /_rtag tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gzhan yang snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas de dag nyid la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[244b.7\]]gzhan yang der rtag par rgyun du chos kyi ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas khyab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gzhan yang der sems can rnams rtag tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blang ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang der sems can 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]rnams rtag tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang khyim dang zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de dag tu sems can 
[\[245a.2\]]rnams ngan song gsum spangs pa dang /_mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lag 'gro'i bdag po de la khyim dag dang zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar du nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di yi ger bris shing yang dang yang klog 
[\[245a.3\]]pa'i khyim zhes bya ba nas yul 'khor zhes bya ba'i bar der phan yon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/_gang dag 'don par byed pa dang /_chos de dag la yang dag par snang bar byed pa dang /_chos kyi gnas pas gnas par byed pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bsod nams 
[\[245a.4\]]kyi phung po de ni ngas bskal pa brgyar yang bstan par sla ba ma yin te/_lag 'gro'i bdag po nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar zab bo/_/nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar yon tan che ba'o/_/de ltar phan yon che ba'o/_/bcom 
[\[245a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_bdud dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[245a.6\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa de dag yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom 
[\[245a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang /_bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_d+harmA ka ra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de bzang skyong gis bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[245b.2\]{D258}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga ta gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[245b.3\]]gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu bzhes pa dang shin tu tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la rin po che'i gdugs kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/_slob 
[\[245b.4\]]pa dang mi slob pa'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po phal cher dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol 
[\[245b.5\]]ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems can thams cad 
[\[245b.6\]]kyis dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang 
[\[245b.7\]]ldan pa gsus po che dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bak+ku la dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kau Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum 
[\[246a.2\]]du tshang ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa mngon par shes pa chen po dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[246a.3\]]pa thob pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_gang dag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[246a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi blo gros dang /_seng ge'i blo gros dang /_stag gi blo gros dang /_don gyi blo gros dang /_rin po che'i blo gros dang /_rab mchog blo gros 
[\[246a.5\]]dang /_zla 'od dang /_rin chen zla 'od dang /_zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang /_rnam par gnon pa chen po dang /_rnam par gnon pa dpag med dang /_rnam par gnon pa mtha' yas dang /_'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang /_mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon dang /_
[\[246a.6\]]mthu chen thob dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_spos kyi glang po dang /_spos dga' dang /_spos dga'i dpal dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_tog dang /_tog chen po dang /_tog dri ma med pa dang /_rin chen mtha' yas dbyug gu dang /_
[\[246a.7\]]rin chen dbyug gu 'dor dang /_rin chen dri med dbyug gu dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_rtag tu rab dga' dang /_lag na rin po che dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_ri bo dang /_ri rab dang /_ri bo chen po dang /_yon tan rin chen snang dang /_gzungs 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nad sel dang /_rab tu yid dga' dang /_yid skyo dang /_skyo med dang /_'od byed dang /_tsan dan dang /_g.yo bzlog dang /_dpag med mngon bsgrags dbyangs dang /_byang chub 
[\[246b.2\]]kun nas bslang dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[246b.3\]]gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed dang yang thabs cig go/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs cig go/_/
[\[246b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po dang /_grong rdal ba dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_
[\[246b.5\]]rim gro byas shing mchod do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol ba'i 'og tu tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de nyid kyi nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de las pad ma 
[\[246b.6\]]'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum yod pa/_tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa kha ma bye ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum byung bar gyur te/_de dag steng gi nam mkha'i bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[246b.7\]]khebs par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na rin po che'i bla re bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to/_/pad mo'i snying po re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang la/_pad ma de dag thams 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]cad kyang shin tu kha bye bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad ma de dag gi 'dab ma de dag thams cad kyang mog mog po dang /_nog nog po dang /_dri nga ba dang /_smad par 'os pa dang /_mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin par gyur to/_/'on 
[\[247a.2\]]kyang pad ma'i snying po de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs 
[\[247a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par gyur te/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang /_'khor bzhi yang shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul 
[\[247a.4\]]mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mthong nas the tsom du gyur te/_gang pad ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di dag gi 'dab ma rnams 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing chu ba rnams kyang kha dog ngan la smad pa'i 'os su gyur te/_mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /_pad ma'i snying 
[\[247a.5\]]po de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed pas shin tu mdzes par kun tu snang ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/_rkyen ni gang yin snyam mo/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[247a.6\]]tshogs dang /_'khor bzhi po the tshom du gyur pa rnams 'dong bar bya ba'i mtshan ma byas so/_/de'i tshe tsan dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[247a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos can gyi gtam las rtsoms te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongs su zhu bar spobs par gyis shig_/de nas 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_'khor bzhi po dag gi the tshom gyi zug rngu rig 
[\[247b.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad pad ma kha dog ngan cing dri mi bda' ba 'di lta bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 'di dag gis khebs pa dang de dag gi dbus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[247b.3\]]sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs te/_'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu gda' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mthong nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang 
[\[247b.4\]]lags/_de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mi g.yo bar/_/pad ma dag gi dbus na bzhugs par ni/_/khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston mdzad pa/_/bdag gis 
[\[247b.5\]]sngon chad nam yang 'di ma mthong /_/'od zer stong rnams rab tu 'gyed mdzad cing /_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad khengs par mdzad/_/ngo mtshar chos kyi rnams la rol mdzad pa'i/_/'dren pa rnams kyis bar chad ma mchis mdzod/_/'dab ma dag dang 
[\[247b.6\]]chu ba smad 'os la/_/kha dog ngan pa'i pad ma rnams dbus der/_/de dag rin chen rang bzhin 'drar bzhugs pa/_/ci yi slad du rdzu 'phrul 'di dag sprul/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed mthong /_/de yi rdzu 'phrul khyad 'phags bdag mthong ste/_/
[\[247b.7\]]de ring gda' ba'i rnam sprul ci 'dra ba/_/sngon chad nam yang 'di 'dra 'di ma mthong /_/rkang gnyis gtso bo lhas ni bstan du gsol/_/rgyu gang rkyen gang lags pa bshad du gsol/_/'jig rten don mdzad thugs brtse gsung du gsol/_/lus can kun 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]gyi the tshom dgum du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[248a.2\]]pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo shin tu rgyas pa yod de/_de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas snang ba'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di byas so/_/de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[248a.3\]]po rdo rje'i blo gros dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag ji ltar 
[\[248a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i pad ma kha dog ngan pa/_dri nga ba/_smad par 'os pa/_mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa 'di dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa dag pad ma'i snying po 'di 
[\[248a.5\]]dag la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'khod de/_'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed cing 'khod pa de dag kyang rig nas lha dang mi rnams phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i las kyang byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[248a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang gi shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig gis sems can srog chags su gyur pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_sred pa dang /_ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi 
[\[248a.7\]]sbubs su gyur pa thams cad dang /_rigs kyi bu dag sems can nyon mongs pa'i sbubs su gyur pa de dag gi nang na nga 'dra bar ye shes dang ldan pa/_mig dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'khod cing skyil mo krung bcas nas mi g.yo bar 'khod pa 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]mthong ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi g.yo zhing srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa dag mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni nga dang 'dra'o zhes smra'o/_/
[\[248b.2\]]rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig ni de ltar mdzes pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig des sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can du mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu lha'i mig can la la 
[\[248b.3\]]zhig gis lha'i mig gis 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing 'di ltar dri nga ba'i pad ma kha ma bye zhing ma gyes pa dag la bltas te/_de'i dbus na pad ma'i snying po la de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs blta 
[\[248b.4\]]bar 'dod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir pad ma'i 'dab ma kha dog ngan cing dri nga ba smad par 'os pa de dag 'gyed cing sel ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mig gis sems can thams 
[\[248b.5\]]cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por mthong nas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_srid pa dang /_ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs dbye ba'i phyir chos ston te/_de sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 
[\[248b.6\]]yang dag pa nyid du gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung /_sems can 'di dag ni rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin na/_rigs kyi bu dag 
[\[248b.7\]]smad par 'os pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs rnams kyis g.yogs pas de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i sbubs gzhig pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston te/_bya ba 'di la yang mos par byed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de dag la mngon par brtson par gnas pa de dag gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs 
[\[249a.2\]]pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[249a.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar pad ma smad par 'os gyur pa/_/de yi 'dab ma sbubs gyur ma gyes la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma gos de/_/mi 'ga' la las lha yi mig gis mthong /_/de ni de yi 'dab ma 'byed pa na/_/
[\[249a.4\]]dbus na rgyal ba'i lus ni mthong gyur nas/_/rgyal ba nye ba'i nyon mongs phyis mi 'gyur/_/de ni 'jig rten kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin ngas kyang srog chags thams cad kyi/_/dkyil der gnas pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi lus/_/ji ltar smad 'os pad 
[\[249a.5\]]ma'i sbubs 'dra ba'i/_/nyon mongs stong phrag bye bas khebs par mthong /_/nga yang de dag gis ni gsal ba'i phyir/_/mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu chos ston to/_/sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/_/rgyal ba'i phyir ni nyon mongs rnam par 
[\[249a.6\]]sbyong /_/nga yi sangs rgyas mig ni de 'dra ste/_/de yis rgyal ba'i lus su gnas pa yi/_/sems can 'di dag thams cad mthong gyur te/_/de dag rnam par sbyang phyir chos smra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper na sbrang tshang zlum po shing gi 
[\[249a.7\]]yal ga la 'phyang ba/_bung ba 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs shing sbrang rtsis yongs su gang ba zhig yod la/_de nas sbrang rtsi 'dod pa'i mi zhig gis srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba de dag thabs mkhas pas bskrad na sbrang rtsi des sbrang rtsi'i bya ba byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]du sems can thams cad kyang sbrang tshang dang 'dra ste/_de la sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig go/_/rigs kyi bu dag ji ltar sbrang tshang gi nang na sbrang 
[\[249b.2\]]rtsi bung ba bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par skyes bu mkhas pa zhig gis shes par rig pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par de 
[\[249b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig ste/_rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang thabs la mkhas pas bung ba bsal ba de bzhin du sems can de dag gi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_'chab 
[\[249b.4\]]pa dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsal nas ji ltar sems can de dag la yang nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag gis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can 
[\[249b.5\]]du mi 'gyur ba dang /_gnod par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba de rnam par sbyangs nas 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed de/_rigs kyi bu dag nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig yongs su dag pa des 
[\[249b.6\]]ngas sems can thams cad de ltar mthong ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar 'di na sbrang tshang yod pa la/_/bung bas kun tu bsrungs shing sbas gyur pa/_/mi gang sbrang rtsi 'dod pas de mthong nas/_/
[\[249b.7\]]de ni bung ba rab tu skrod par byed/_/de bzhin 'dir yang sbrang tshang lta bu ni/_/srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad do/_/de dag nyon mongs bye ba mang ba ste/_/nyon mongs dbus na de bzhin gshegs 'dug mthong /_/nga yang sangs rgyas rnam par sbyang 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]don du/_/bung ba skrod pa lta bur nyon mongs sel/_/gang gis nyon mongs bye bas gnod 'gyur ba/_/chos rnams 'dir ni thabs kyis rab ston te/_/de dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs gyur la/_/'jig rten kun tu rtag tu bya byed cing /_/spobs 
[\[250a.2\]]ldan ji ltar sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yi/_/snod 'dra'i chos ston 'gyur bar bya phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na 'bras sA lu'am/_nas sam/_ci tse 'am/_'bru rnams ni snying po phub ma nas yongs su bsrungs pa yin te/_rang gi phub ma nas 
[\[250a.3\]]ma phyung gi bar du bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba'i bya ba mi byed kyi/_rigs kyi bu dag skyes pa dang /_bud med gang dag bza' ba dang /_bca' ba la sogs pa zas skom gyi bya ba 'dod pa de dag gis brngas shing brdungs te/_phub ma'i sbubs dang phyi shun sel 
[\[250a.4\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/_sangs rgyas nyid/_rang byung nyid/_nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pas dkris shing gnas par mthong ngo /_/
[\[250a.5\]]rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa bsal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sems can 'di dag ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa thams cad las grol te/_'jig rten du 
[\[250a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar 'bru 
[\[250a.7\]]'am sA lu'i 'bras kyang rung /_/ci tse 'am ni 'on te nas kyang rung /_/ji srid bar du de dag phub bcas pa/_/de srid bar du bya ba mi byed de/_/de dag gis ni brdungs nas phub bsal na/_/bya ba rnam pa mang po dag kyang byed/_/snying po phub ma ldan pa de dag ni/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]sems can rnams la bya ba mi byed do/_/de bzhin sems can kun gyi sangs rgyas sa/_/nyon mongs rnams kyis khebs par ngas mthong nas/_/ngas ni de dag rnam par sbyang ba dang /_/sangs rgyas myur thob bya phyir chos ston to/_/sems can kun la nga 'dra'i 
[\[250b.2\]]chos nyid ni/_/nyon mongs brgya yis dkris nas gang yod pa/_/de ni rnam sbyang thams cad ji lta bur/_/rgyal bar myur 'gyur bya phyir chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/_rul pa dang /_nyal nyil gyi gnas bshang gci dri mi 
[\[250b.3\]]zhim pas kun tu gang ba zhig tu mi gzhan gseb lam nas song ba zhig gi gser gyi gar bu zlum po zhig lhung bar gyur la/_bshang gci dri nga bas kun du gang ba rul pa dang /_nyal nyil gyi gnas der mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis brnan pas bltar mi snang 
[\[250b.4\]]bar gyur cing /_der des lo bcu'am/_nyi shu'am/_sum cu'am/_bzhi bcu 'am/_lo lnga bcu 'am/_lo brgya 'am/_lo stong du mi gtsang bas chud mi za ba'i chos can de sems can gang la yang phan par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de nas lhas lha'i 
[\[250b.5\]]mig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po de la bltas nas mi zhig la kye mi khyod song la 'di ni rin po che'i mchog gser rul pa dang nyal nyil gyi rnam pas non pa de byi dor gyis la/_gser gyis gser gyi bya ba gyis shig ces bsgo na rigs kyi bu dag rul pa dang /_nyal nyil gyi 
[\[250b.6\]]rnam pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba de ni chud mi za ba'i chos can gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/lhas lha'i mig ces bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[250b.7\]]kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid chud mi za ba yod pa'i nyon mongs pa rul pa dang /_'dam rdzab lta bu rnams 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]bsal ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar mi yi gser gyi gar bu ni/_/nyal nyil rnam pa'i nang du lhung gyur la/_/der de lo ni mi nyung 
[\[251a.2\]]ba zhig tu/_/de ltar gnas kyang mi 'jig chos can no/_/lha yis lha yi mig gis de mthong nas/_/rnam par sbyang phyir gzhan la smras pa ni/_/'di ni rin chen mchog gi gser yod pa/_/rnam par sbyongs la des ni bya ba gyis/_/de bzhin ngas ni sems 
[\[251a.3\]]can thams cad kyang /_/nyon mongs rnams kyis yun ring rtag non mthong /_/de dag gis ni blo bur nyon mongs shes/_/rang bzhin sbyang phyir thabs kyis chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper na dbul po zhig gi khyim gyi nang gi 
[\[251a.4\]]mdzod kyi 'og gi sa la gter chen po dbyig dang /_gser gyis rab tu gang ba mdzod kyi tshad tsam zhig mi bdun srid kyi sas g.yogs pa'i 'og na yod la/_gter chen po de mi dbul po de la 'di skad du kye mi nga ni gter chen po ste/_sas g.yogs cing 'dug go 
[\[251a.5\]]zhes mi smra ste 'di lta ste/_gter chen po ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can ma yin pa'o/_/mi dbul po khyim gyi bdag po de ni dbul ba'i sems kyis rjes su sems shing de nyid kyi steng na rnam par rgyu yang sa'i 'og na gter chen po yod pa de ma thos mi shes ma 
[\[251a.6\]]mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa'i yid la byed byed pa khyim lta bur gyur pa'i 'og na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi gter 
[\[251a.7\]]chen po yod kyang sems can de dag gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa la chags pas sdug bsngal bas 'khor ba na 'khor te/_chos kyi gter chen po de ma thos pas thob par ma gyur cing yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir brtson par yang mi byed do/_/rigs 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]kyi bu dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i nang du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter chen po yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de dag kyang chos kyi gter chen po de la mos nas rko ste/_de'i phyir 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[251b.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ste/_/chos kyi gter chen po lta bur gyur nas/_sems can rnams la sngon ma byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rnam pa dang /_dpe dang byed pa'i gtan tshigs dang /_bya ba rnams ston pa gter chen 
[\[251b.3\]]po'i mdzod kyi sbyin bdag chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan zhing stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos mang po'i mdzod du gyur pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 
[\[251b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig shin tu yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad de lta bur mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mdzod yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir byang chub sems
