[\[251b.5\]]dpa' rnams la chos ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar dbul po'i khyim gyi 'og logs na/_/dbyig dang gser gyis gang ba'i gter yod pa/_/de la g.yo ba'am rlom sems yod min te/_/
[\[251b.6\]]nga ni khyod kyi yin zhes de mi smra/_/de yi tshe na sems can khyim bdag de/_/dbul bar gyur la rnam par mi shes shing /_/sus kyang de la bsnyad pa med pas na/_/dbul po de ni de yi steng na 'dug_/de ltar ngas ni sangs rgyas mig gis su/_/sems can de 
[\[251b.7\]]dag thams cad dbul 'dra la/_/de dag rnams la gter chen yod pa dang /_/g.yo ba med cing bde gshegs lus su mthong /_/ngas ni de mthong byang chub sems dpa' la/_/khyod kyis nga yi ye shes mdzod zung la/_/dbul ba med cing 'jig rten mgon gyur dang /_/
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]bla med chos gter 'gyur bar gyis shig bstan/_/gang dag ngas bstan pa la mos gyur la/_/sems can de dag kun la gter yod do/_/gang dag mos nas bdag nyid rtsol byed pa/_/de dag myur du byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[252a.2\]]dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper na shing a mra'i 'bras bu'am/_'dzam bu'i 'bras bu'am/_ta la'i 'bras bu'am/_spa'i 'bras bu yang rung ste/_phyi shun gyi sbubs kyi nang na myu gu'i sa bon chud mi za ba'i chos can yod pa gang gis sa la btab na shing gi rgyal 
[\[252a.3\]]po chen por 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'jig rten na gnas pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_sred pa dang /_ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i phyi shun gyi sbubs kyis kun tu dkris par mthong ngo /_/de la 
[\[252a.4\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_sred pa dang /_ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang na snying por gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de ni sems can zhes bya ba'i ming du chags so/_/de la gang bsal bar gyur pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[252a.5\]]ste/_ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnyed pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[252a.6\]]du smra bar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i 'du shes su byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[252a.7\]]ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don de nye bar ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar spa yi 'bras bu thams cad ni/_/nang na spa yi myu gu yod pa ste/_/ta la dang ni 'dzam bu kun la'ang yod/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]nang na yod pa'i 'bras bu bskyed na skye/_/de bzhin chos kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa yang /_/sems can thams cad spa yi sa bon 'dra/_/de kun nang na bde gshegs lus yod par/_/zag med sangs rgyas mig ni dam pas thob/_/sbubs bshig ma gyur 
[\[252b.2\]]de ni sems can brjod/_/mi shes nang na gnas kyang rlom sems med/_/ting 'dzin thob ste gnas nas rab zhi ste/_/de la g.yo ba ci yang yod ma yin/_/dper na sdong chen sa bon las byung ltar/_/sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'tshang rgya zhing /_/lha 
[\[252b.3\]]dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skyabs 'gyur zhes/_/yongs su spang ba'i don du chos gtam smra/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu dbul po zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_lag mthil tsam zhig yod 
[\[252b.4\]]la/_de nas skyes bu dbul po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te 'brog dgon pa las shin tu 'da' bar 'dong bar gyur nas ji nas kyang de gzhan gyis mi tshor zhing rkun pos mi khyer bar bya ba'i phyir des de ras rul pa/_dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu du mas dkris 
[\[252b.5\]]te de nas skyes bu de 'brog dgon pa de nyid du nyes pa gang gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur la/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa ras rul pa'i dum bus dkris pa yang rdog lam de na 'phyan zhing 'dug pa dang /_'dron po rnams 
[\[252b.6\]]kyis ma shes nas/_'goms shing 'goms shing dong la/_ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu'i thum bu kun tu 'dril ba 'di gang nas rlung gis bdas zhes smad pa'i dngos por yang ston pa dang /_'brog na gnas pa'i lhas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas nas mi gzhan 
[\[252b.7\]]dag gcig la bstan te/_kye skyes bu dag ras kyi dum bu 'di yi thum bu 'di'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yod kyis phye shig ces bsgo'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris te/_smad pa'i 'os su gyur cing yun ring por 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na rtag tu 'khyam par mthong ste/_rigs kyi bu dag tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kyang 
[\[253a.2\]]rung ste/_sems can nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi dkri bas dkris par gyur pa rnams kyi nang na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus nga ci 'dra ba yod pa mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nye ba'i nyon 
[\[253a.3\]]mongs pa dang bral zhing yongs su dag par gyur la/_ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur snyam nas/_nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chos ston to/_/de nas 
[\[253a.4\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar dri nga smad pa'i 'os rnams kyis/_/yongs su dkris pa bde bar gshegs kyi gzugs/_/rin chen byas pa ras dum dkris pa de/_/lam gyi bar na bor te 'khyam gyur pa/_/
[\[253a.5\]]lha yi mig gis de ni mthong nas su/_/lha des gzhan zhig la ni rab smras pa/_/'di na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yod/_/ras dum thum bu 'di ni myur du phye/_/de bzhin nga yi lha mig 'di 'dra ba/_/des ni sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang /_/nyon mongs 
[\[253a.6\]]dkri bas dkris nas rab sdug bsngal/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi rtag gtses mthong /_/ngas ni nyon mongs dkris pa'i nang dag na/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni mnyam par bzhag gyur la/_/de ni g.yo ba med cing mi 'gyur yang /_/de yongs thar byed gang yang med par 
[\[253a.7\]]mthong /_/ngas mthong de nas skul ma btab pa ni/_/byang chub mchog tu gang dag zhugs pa nyon/_/de ltar sems can chos nyid 'di 'drar rtag_/'di na yongs su dkris pa'i rgyal ba bzhugs/_/bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yongs bkrol nas/_/gang tshe 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi ba/_/de tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas ming thob ste/_/lha dang mi rnams sems ni rab tu dga'/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na bud med mgon med par gyur pa/_mdog ngan pa/_dri mi zhim pa/_smad par 'os pa/_'jigs 
[\[253b.2\]]su rung ba/_blta na mi sdug pa/_'dre mo 'dra ba zhig mgon med pa'i khang par zhugs nas gnas so/_/de der gnas pa dang sbrum par gyur te/_gang gis gdon mi za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de 'dra ba zhig de'i mngal du 
[\[253b.3\]]zhugs kyang bud med de'i mngal na 'dug pa'i sems can de la bdag gi mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can 'di ci 'dra ba zhig snyam du yang de yid la mi byed/_bdag gi mngal du zhugs sam/_ma zhugs snyam du yang de de na yid la mi byed kyi/_gzhan du na de dbul ba'i sems 
[\[253b.4\]]dang /_zhum pa dang /_dman pa dang /_kho ru chung ba snyam pa'i sems rjes su sems shing mdog ngan pa dang /_dri mi zhim pa nyid kyis mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas te dus 'da' bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang 
[\[253b.5\]]mgon med par gyur cing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses par gyur la/_srid par skye ba'i gnas mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas so/_/de na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzhugs te/_khong na yod kyang sems can de dag gis khong du 
[\[253b.6\]]ma chud do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can dag bdag nyid la khyad du mi gsad par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu dag khyed bdag nyid sro shi bar ma byed par khyed brtson 'grus brtan par gyis shig dang /_khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs pa 
[\[253b.7\]]yod pa dus shig na 'byung bar 'gyur te/_khyed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi sems can zhes bya bar ni ma yin no/_/der yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'i/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ni ma yin no zhes chos 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar bud med mgon med gyur pa zhig_/kha dog ngan cing gzugs ni mi sdug la/_/byis pa yin te mgon med khang par gnas/_/re zhig 
[\[254a.2\]]des na de ni der sbrum gyur/_/de yi mngal du gang zhig nges par ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che ba nyid/_/rin chen rnams kyi 'phags pa gling bzhi yi/_/bdag po byed par 'gyur ba de 'dra zhugs/_/bud med byis pa de ni 'di lta bur/_/mngal du 
[\[254a.3\]]zhugs sam ma zhugs mi shes la/_/mgon med khang pa na ni gnas byed de/_/dbul ba snyam du sems shing dus 'da' byed/_/de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang /_/mgon med gyur la sdug bsngal chos kyis nyen/_/khams gsum pa yi bde ba chung 
[\[254a.4\]]la gnas/_/nang na chos nyid mngal gnas 'dra yod mthong /_/de 'dra mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la/_/'jig rten phan par byed pa mngal gnas na/_/sems can kun gyis chos nyid ma shes kyis/_/bdag dman 'du shes ma skyed cig ces bstan/_/
[\[254a.5\]]khyed cag brtson 'grus brtsam pa brtan gyis dang /_/rang lus ring por mi thogs rgyal bar 'gyur/_/dus shig byang chub snying po thob gyur nas/_/srog chags stong phrag bye ba grol byed 'gyur/_/rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na spra tshil las rta'i 
[\[254a.6\]]gzugs sam/_glang po che'i gzugs sam/_bud med kyi gzugs sam/_skyes pa'i gzugs dag byas te/_'jim pa'i nang du bcug nas g.yogs la bzhu ste/_zags par byas la gser bzhu ste/_zhu bar gyur pas bkang nas rim gyis grangs par 
[\[254a.7\]]gyur pa na/_mnyam par gnas par gyur pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad phyi rol gyi 'jim pa gnag cing kha dog mi sdug kyang nang gi rnams ni gser las byas pa dag go/_/de nas mgar ba'am/_mgar ba'i slob ma zhig gis de las gzugs gang dang gang dag 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]grangs par gyur pa mthong ba de dang de dag gi phyir rim gyis 'jim pa tho bas bskogs na de nas skad cig de la nang na gser las byas pa'i gzugs yod pa dag yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[254b.2\]]mig gis sems can thams cad 'jim pa'i gzugs lta bu yin la/_phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang gi sbu gu sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gang ste/_zag pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par 'dug 
[\[254b.3\]]pa mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas byang chub sems dpa'i nang du song ste/_'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[254b.4\]]chen po gang dag zhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rdo rje'i tho bas phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gogs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag mgar ba zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin 
[\[254b.5\]]gshegs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mig gis sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas nyon mongs pa de dag las thar bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 
[\[254b.6\]]la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji ltar gzugs ni phyi rol 'jim pas g.yogs/_/nang ni sbu gu yod cing gsog yin pa/_/rin chen bzhus pas rab tu bkang na ni/_/
[\[254b.7\]]brgya stong phrag ni mang por 'gyur ba yin/_/mgar bas shin tu grangs par gyur shes nas/_/'di ltar rin chen las ni byas pa 'di/_/rnam dag gzugs 'gyur las gang bya snyam ste/_/gzugs la g.yogs pa'i 'jim pa 'gogs par byed/_/de bzhin 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang /_/gser gzugs 'jim pas g.yogs pa 'dra ba ste/_/phyi rol shun pa nyon mongs sbubs yin la/_/nang na sangs rgyas ye shes yod par mthong /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni/_/zhi 
[\[255a.2\]]zhing shin tu bsil bar gyur pa dag_/gang gis de dag nyon mongs ma lus 'byin/_/chos kyis lag chas de la 'gogs par byed/_/rin chen gzugs ni blta na sdug pa ltar/_/rgyal sras gang zhig 'dir ni dag gyur pa/_/stobs bcu dag gis 
[\[255a.3\]]lus rnams yongs gang ste/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di na mchod par 'gyur/_/ngas ni srog chags thams cad de ltar mthong /_/byang chub sems dpa'ang ngas ni de ltar mthong /_/de ltar dag pa bde bar gshegs 'gyur te/_/bde gshegs dag ni 
[\[255a.4\]]sangs rgyas tshul ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje'i blo gros rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung ste gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[255a.5\]]'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_glegs bam du byas te 'jog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 'chad pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub 
[\[255a.6\]]sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson par gyur la/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs nas 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ting nge 
[\[255a.7\]]'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang mang ba rnams su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang mang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]dang bcas pa bzhugs shing gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa dus su bde ba/_rgyar dpag tshad tsam la 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa/_rin po che thams cad las byas pa/_lha'i dri zhim po dang ldan pa/_me tog sil ma sna 
[\[255b.2\]]tshogs bkram pa/_longs spyod kha na ma tho ba med pa thams cad dang ldan pa 'bum phrag gang gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed nyin re zhing phul te/_bskal pa 'bum du tshang ba'i bar du 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byed pa bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig byang 
[\[255b.3\]]chub tu sems bskyed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dpe gcig tsam lus la 'chang ngam/_glegs bam du gnas par byed na/_rdo rje'i blo gros de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga 
[\[255b.4\]]mas brgya'i cha dang /_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/rdo rje'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol bas sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[255b.5\]]ldan 'das de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang bskal pa 'bum tshang gi bar du shing man dA ra ba'i me tog khal bzhi pa 'bum 'thor la/_rdo rje'i blo gros dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma zhig gis byang chub tu sems 
[\[255b.6\]]bskyed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thal mo lan cig sbyar te rjes su yi rang ngo zhes tshig gcig smras na/_rdo rje'i blo gros bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba de la me tog dang /_me tog 
[\[255b.7\]]phreng phul ba dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des brgya'i cha dang /_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dper yang nye bar mi 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]'gro ste rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sems can la la gang zhig byang chub la/_/mos pa bskyed nas 'di nyan 'dzin pa'am/_/yi ger 'dri 'am glegs bam bzhag 
[\[256a.2\]]byed cing /_/gus dang bcas pas tshigs bcad gcig bshad dam/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di thos nas/_/gang zhig byang chub mchog 'di tshol byed na/_/bsod nams phung po ji tsam skyed 'gyur ba/_/de yi phan yon 'dir ni mnyan par gyis/_/
[\[256a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog 'di la gnas nas su/_/dpa' bo bskal pa dag ni stong bar du/_/phyogs bcu rnams su mi yi gtso bo dag_/nyan thos bcas pa rnams la bsti stang byed/_/ji ltar gang gA'i stong mang bye ba bas/_/de bas lhag pa bsam gyis 
[\[256a.4\]]mi khyab pa/_/gzhal med khang mchog rin chen las byas pa/_/'jig rten slob dpon re re la yang phul/_/de dag 'phang du dpag tshad bcu yod la/_/chu dang rgyar ni dpag tshad gcig yod pa/_/spos dang bdug pa dag dang rab ldan la/_/de na rin chen 
[\[256a.5\]]las byas khri bshams shing /_/dar dang bcos pu'i ras ni brgya bting ba'i/_/khri dag dang ni khri stan gzhan rnams kyang /_/ji ltar gang gA'i klung bzhin dpag med pa/_/rgyal ba gcig la dbul ba byas gyur la/_/rgyal ba gang dag 'jig rten khams bzhugs 
[\[256a.6\]]pa/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye ma bas mang ba/_/rgyal ba de dag rnams la de ltar phul/_/kun la gus par mchod pa byed pa bas/_/mkhas pa gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/dpe gcig tsam zhig yang dag 'dzin byed dam/_/bzung nas mi 'ga' zhig la 'chad byed 
[\[256a.7\]]na/_/de ni de bas bsod nams phung po mang /_/dpa' bos bzung ba'i bsod nams 'di la ni/_/cha dang dper yang de ni nyer mi 'gro/_/srog chags dag ni kun gyi skyabs 'gyur zhing /_/de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi snying 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]po 'dra yod pa/_/sems can dag ni kun gyi chos nyid 'di/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang sems pa/_/de ni rang byung sangs rgyas myur du 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i gces spras byed par rig par bya'o/_/rdo rje'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu rgyas pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs 
[\[256b.3\]]pa med pa/_brjod du med pa de'i pha rol bas kyang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[256b.4\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rdo rje'i blo gros ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya zhe na/_rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das 
[\[256b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'od zer gtong de byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu de ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du lus las 'od byung ste/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang 
[\[256b.6\]]bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_byang shar dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra 
[\[256b.7\]]rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi 'od dga' bar 'gyur ba sdug pa/_mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/_mgu bar 'gyur bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag de snyed snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to/_/rdo rje'i blo gros 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag tu sems can gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_kha dog dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_blo gros dang 
[\[257a.2\]]ldan pa dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skyes par 
[\[257a.3\]]gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rang gi 'gro ba dag nas shi 'phos te lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/de dag reg pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/yang phyir 
[\[257a.4\]]mi ldog pa gang dag la 'od des reg pa de dag reg ma thag tu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/yon tan lnga brgya pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig 
[\[257a.5\]]rten gyi khams 'bum gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad bai dUr+ya las grub par yongs su gnas par gyur te/_gser gyi skud pas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris par gyur la mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris thams cad kyang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_dri dang /_kha 
[\[257a.6\]]dog dang ldan pa rnams 'thon par gyur to/_/rin po che'i shing de dag rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bsgul na 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs dang /_dbang 
[\[257a.7\]]po dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag thams cad na sems can rnams 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob nas gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris rnams med par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257b.2\]]ma'i mngal na gnas pa de yang sems can de dag thams cad la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang bar gyur to/_/mngal na gnas pa nyid la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du thal mo sbyar ba'i las byas so/_/rdo rje'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de btsas pa 
[\[257b.3\]]dang /_mngon par byung ba dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to/_/tshul 
[\[257b.4\]]de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das de'i lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_ring bsrel mchod rten na gnas pa'i tshe'ang lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur te/_rdo 
[\[257b.5\]]rje'i blo gros de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba zhes bya bar lha dang mi rnams kyis mtshan gsol to/_/rdo rje'i blo gros yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba de dang po mngon par 
[\[257b.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba g.yog stong dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_rdo rje'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[257b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las brtsams te yongs su dris so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rjes su gzung ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba'i phyir stan gcig la 'dug bzhin du bskal pa chen po lnga brgyar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad de/_des de bzhin 
[\[258a.2\]]gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshig rnam par shes par bya bas chos bsgrub pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_dpe 'bum phrag du mas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yang dag par rab tu bshad pas phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i 
[\[258a.3\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su yang tshegs chung ngus go bar gyur to/_/rdo rje'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ming 
[\[258a.4\]]thos pa de dag thams cad mthar gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin nas yon tan bkod pa de 'dra ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi ni ma gtogs so/_/
[\[258a.5\]]rdo rje'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta ste/_rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar 
[\[258a.6\]]gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la gang dag da dung du yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /_mthu chen 
[\[258a.7\]]thob pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid de bzhi po'o/_/rdo rje'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sgrub pas don che ba yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa mtha' yas na/_/bcom ldan 'od zer gtong zhes bya ba byung /_/de yi lus las 'di 'dra'i 'od byung bas/_/zhing 
[\[258b.2\]]rnams bye ba stong dag snang bar gyur/_/rgyal ba dang por mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas rig_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas kyis/_/de tshe bde gshegs rgyal dbang de la zhus/_/mdo 'di rtag tu yang dag rab tu bshad/_/gang gis rgyal de'i bstan 
[\[258b.3\]]las mdo sde 'di/_/'dren pa las ni mngon sum thos gyur pa/_/de kun myur du byang chub dam pa 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzhi ni ma gtogs te/_/mthu chen thob dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gsum 
[\[258b.4\]]pa ste/_/rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi pa yin/_/de tshe de dag gis ni mdo 'di thos/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas pa/_/de tshe gang gis rgyal la zhus byung ste/_/de yi dbang byas bde gshegs sras po ni/_/de tshe rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid yin/_/
[\[258b.5\]]nga yang sngon gyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/bde bar gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan las/_/mdo sde 'di yi ming ni thos par gyur/_/gus par byas te thos nas thal mo sbyar/_/nga ni legs par byas pa'i las de yis/_/byang chub dam pa myur du thob par gyur/_/
[\[258b.6\]]de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis/_/rtag tu mdo mchog 'di ni gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje'i blo gros rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/_
[\[258b.7\]]lung nod dam/_kha ton du byed dam/_ston kyang rung /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_rab tu 'chad pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba de dag las tshegs chung ngus chos de dag kyang mngon sum du 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]de yang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs par mi 'gyur zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 
[\[259a.2\]]brtson par bgyid pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig las mang du thos pas chos bstan pa'i slad du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs 
[\[259a.3\]]rgyas brgya'i chos bstan pa kun tu gzung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba de dag kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas nyis brgya dang /_sum brgya dang /_bzhi brgya dang /_lnga brgya dang /_stong dang /_nyis stong dang /_sum stong dang /_
[\[259a.4\]]bzhi stong dang /_lnga stong dang /_drug stong dang /_bdun stong dang /_brgyad stong dang /_dgu stong dang /_khri dang /_sangs rgyas 'bum nas/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi bar dag gi chos ston pa kun tu gzung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag 
[\[259a.5\]]kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_glegs bam du byas te/_'chang ba des 'di snyam du bdag gis deng nyid bla na med pa 
[\[259a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_de ni ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang /_mchod pa'i 'os yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[259a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/bdag gis byang chub dam pa thob par bsam/_gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/_/de ni da ltar 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os/_/de ni 'jig rten mgon po rnam 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]par 'dren/_/khrid byed rnam par khrid byed bsngags pa'i 'os/_/gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/_/de ni de ltar chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/_/mi yi khyu mchog chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin/_/de ni nyi zla lta bur blta ba'i 
[\[259b.2\]]'os/_/'jig rten mgon po lta bur phyag bya'i gnas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_
[\[259b.3\]]'khor bzhi po dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 
[\[259b.4\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[259b.5\]{D259}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya nA k+Sha ra ka raN+Da ka bai ro tsa na gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[259b.6\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang rgya chen po shes pa/_
[\[259b.7\]]thabs la mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_le lo med pa/_yi ge sgrub pa la mkhas pa/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa khong du chud par byed pa/_rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/_'dul ba'i myu gu dang ldan pa/_ngo tsha shes pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa/_snying rje'i bdag 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]nyid can/_sems can la mnyes gshin pa/_ting nge 'dzin mang po dang ldan pa/_shes rab kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/_bla ma la sri zhu che ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gling dang mtshungs pa/_dge ba dang mi dge 
[\[260a.2\]]ba shes pa/_g.yo khong du chud par byed pa/_nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang /_zung khong du chud par byed pa/_rnam par rgyal ba thob pa/_sems can thams cad la khong du chud par byed pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' las byung zhing brten pa/_shin 
[\[260a.3\]]tu dpa' ba/_gnas pa med pa/_chos bla ma'i rang bzhin la nges pa/_rang bzhin med pa'i khyad par sems pa snying po la dpa' ba/_skye ba la smod pa'i skyes bu/_chos khong du chud par byed pa/_mtshan gyi gzhi shes pa/_yul 'khor srung ba/_yul 'khor skyong ba/_sgra 
[\[260a.4\]]grags pa/_rgyal ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/_rnam par rgyal ba'i mdzod dang ldan pa/_yi ge med pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/_shin tu gnyid kyis ma log pa/_ye shes kyi phung po la gzhol ba/_rang gi las la mngon par dga' ba/_rang gi rigs bsten pa/_kun tu bzang 
[\[260a.5\]]ba/_mnyam pa nyid la dga' ba/_rnam par dag pa/_rang gi rgyud dang /_pha rol gyi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/_rnam par rgyal ba thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[260a.6\]]dpa' chen po chos sgrogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sprul pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gi 'byung gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[260a.7\]]dpa' chen po smon lam brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro ba 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]dpa' chen po sa'i sgra dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i 'dab ma'i mig dang /_
[\[260b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i gdong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na nor bu dang thabs cig go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[260b.3\]]po bgrang ba las 'das pa thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang lhan cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang rgyal tshab tu gyur pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig_/
[\[260b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni brgya byin du ma dang lhan cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi ni 'khor los sgyur ba 
[\[260b.5\]]du ma dag dang lhan cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni tshangs pa du ma dag dang lhan cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ni 
[\[260b.6\]]'khor rnam thos kyi bu du ma dag dang lhan cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po ni 'jig rten skyong ba lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid gnyis 'joms dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[260b.7\]]dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad 'dzin pa du ma dang lhan cig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung chen po la sogs pa dgra bcom pa thams cad dang yang lhan cig_/byang chub 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge mang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub 
[\[261a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman yang dag byung dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na zla ba dang nyi ma rang gi gzi brjid snyems pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 
[\[261a.3\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mdun du snag tsha'i yug bzhag pa de bzhin du/_zla ba dang nyi ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyir zhing mi mdzes/_phyir zhing mi 'bar/_phyir zhing lam me ma yin/_phyir zhing lhan ne ma yin/_phyir 
[\[261a.4\]]zhing lhang nge ma yin no/_/sred med kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /_'jog po dang /_ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_dri za'i bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ba ni dri za bye ba phrag du ma dang lhan 
[\[261a.5\]]cig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dri ma med pa chen po ni nam mkha' lding bye ba phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod pa de dag rang rang gi 
[\[261a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa las gnang ba mnos te/_'khor bzhi dag dang lhan cig dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nas rang rang gi pad ma'i stan la 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[261a.7\]]'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gnyis shig zhu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas gnang 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]gis khyad par sems khyod ci bsams pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gcig gi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ba ma yin gyi nga ni khyed kyi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[261b.2\]]chen po khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang bsrungs na bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung bar 
[\[261b.3\]]'gyur ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems 
[\[261b.4\]]la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_tshangs pa de skad smra ba ni legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis spobs pa 'di lta bu byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma mdzad na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[261b.5\]]pa la su yang zhu ba 'di lta bu zhu bar mi 'gyur ro/_/khyad par sems de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems kyis bcom ldan 
[\[261b.6\]]'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas chos gcig gang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags kyi chos te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni spang bar bya ba'i 
[\[261b.7\]]chos gcig go/_/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/_'di ltar zhe sdang gi chos te/_'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/_'di ltar gti mug gi chos te/_'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/yang spang bar bya ba'i 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]chos gcig ste/_'di ltar bdag tu 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/_'di ltar le lo ste/_'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/_'di ltar 
[\[262a.2\]]rmugs pa dang gnyid de/_'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/_'di ltar sred pa ste/_'di ni spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/_'di ltar ma rig 
[\[262a.3\]]pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig po de gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan 
[\[262a.4\]]dag la mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig chos gcig po de srung na/_des de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi srog phangs par 'dzin pa de srog mi 
[\[262a.5\]]gcod do/_/gang bdag gi nor phangs par 'dzin pa de ma byin par mi len to/_/gang bdag gi chung ma phangs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du mi 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la sogs te/_gang la la zhig 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya'o 
[\[262a.6\]]snyam du sems pa des chos gcig po 'di bsrung bar bya'o zhes bshad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag thams cad ni rang gi bde ba'i rgyur don du gnyer gyi/_/su yang bdag sdug bsngal 
[\[262a.7\]]ba mi 'dod de/_'gro ba ni bde ba 'dod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la ma byed cig ces nga smra'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni gang byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang yin zhes de skad zer ba ni rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu gang la chos 
[\[262b.2\]]gang yang rtogs pa med pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad 'gags pa med par 
[\[262b.3\]]thugs su chud do/_/rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtha' gnyis las grol bar thugs su chud do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byung bar thugs su chud do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas las bdag 
[\[262b.4\]]gir bya bar thugs su chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las rag las par thugs su chud do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen ni glog dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen med pa las 
[\[262b.5\]]skye ba med par thugs su chud do/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid thugs su chud do/_/ci'i phyir yongs su rtog pa dag rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes smra zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das 
[\[262b.6\]]pa'i ye shes la sogs pa gang dag ci 'byung ba'i mngal de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi tshe ye shes de'i rang bzhin la yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mngal du chud pa yin te/_de'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob 
[\[262b.7\]]bo/_/rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i rang gi chos nyid thugs su chud do/_/rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de rnam par snang 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid do/_/rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sgo gcig thugs su chud de/_rigs kyi bu gang la 'gro ba med pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_rgyu med pa dang /_rkyen med pa dang /_'chi 'pho med pa dang /_skye 
[\[263a.2\]]ba med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_'grib pa med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa dang /_rigs kyi bu gang rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin med de/_gang la dper bya bar mi nus pa dang /_gang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa'i 
[\[263a.3\]]chos kyi sgo gcig po de de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do/_/bkod pa'i rgyal po bstan pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mig la rdul phra rab ji snyed snang 
[\[263a.4\]]bar 'gyur ba de snyed kyi sems can rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de snyed gcig gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/_/de bas ches mang ba'i sems can dag sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes 
[\[263a.5\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni sa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon du gyur to/_/mang du ci dgos te gtam 'di ni su la yang don med par ma gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin 
[\[263a.6\]]la bka' stsal pa/_sgra gcan zin khyod nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar spro bar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[263a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bgyi'o/_/slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i snod du 'tshal bar bgyis la/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du yang dag par bshad par 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[263b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag shin tu rgyas pa bsdus pa'i yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[263b.3\]]chung ngu dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga la skyes bu dam pa de dag gis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_btsun par byas pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ni nga'i byang chub phrag pa la thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[263b.4\]]pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas 
[\[263b.5\]]nas mdun na bzhugs par gyur te mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/nga yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos kyi mdzod mi zad par 'gyur ro/_/de dag tshe rabs dran 
[\[263b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu nga ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i tshig 'di smra ste/_rigs kyi bu dag gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed par 'gyur la/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la btags sam/_yi ger 
[\[263b.7\]]'dri 'am/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na de ni ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar ngas ma mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing mig lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i las tshad med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu tshig 'di ni tha mar smra ste/_de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[264a.2\]]par ngas mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_khyad par sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[264a.3\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[264a.4\]]dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_mu ni barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D260}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_
[\[264a.5\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na gnas thub pa'i drang srong rnams 
[\[264a.6\]]kyi gnas na/_nyan thos chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig go/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/_grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 
[\[264a.7\]]chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs na brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bum phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]rin po che snang ste/_yang nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha dang /_mi rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang /_
[\[264b.2\]]gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_gang sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung rnams kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing nor bu rin po che snang ngo /_/lhag ma dag kyang mtha' 
[\[264b.3\]]yas mu med pa brjod du med pa nam mkha' bzhin du snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger gyur to/_/sems can gang dag der 'dus pa de dag kyang bdag kyang mi mthong ngo /_/gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong ngo /_/de dag la 
[\[264b.4\]]'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gags nas yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to/_/bdag bdag gi lus kyi gzugs dang /_mtshan dang /_dbyibs dang /_rig pa yang mi dmigs par gyur te/_gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par 
[\[264b.5\]]mthong ngo /_/nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang mi mthong /_skar ma'i gzugs dang /_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to/_/sgra dag kyang rna lam du grag par ma gyur to/_/dri dag 
[\[264b.6\]]kyang sna la bro bar ma gyur to/_/sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la yang ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dang /_skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung bar gyur to/_/yang 'byung ba chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/_phyogs gang dang gang du brtags 
[\[264b.7\]]pa de dang /_de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs su mthong bar gyur to/_/rgyang ma nas kyang brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches bskor ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las gzhan 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas 'jigs par mi byed/_dngangs par mi 
[\[265a.2\]]byed/_skrag par mi byed de/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed/_dngangs par mi byed/_skrag par mi byed do/_/gang lhag ma byang chub sems 
[\[265a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_nyan thos dag dang /_lha dag dang /_klu dag dang /_gnod sbyin dag dang /_dri za dag dang /_lha ma yin dag dang /_nam mkha' lding dag dang /_mi 'am ci dag dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[265a.4\]]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa 'dus pa de dag ma lus par 'jigs par gyur/_dngangs par gyur/_skyo bar gyur nas/_tshu rol dang pha rol la rmongs shing sems 'khrugs nas de dag gcig gis gcig kyang 
[\[265a.5\]]mi mthong /_de na 'di ci zhig_/'di ji lta bu zhig_/'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes dri ba yang gang yang mi snang ngo /_/yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer bu chen po zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[265a.6\]]sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/_chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la/_/gang zag gang dag ma 'tshal ba/_/gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas/_/dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur/_/phung po gcig ni mi mthong zhing /_/gzugs kyi phung la rtog bgyid de/_/
[\[265a.7\]]'di la gang zag kha cig ni/_/sangs rgyas chos la the tshom 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la/_/chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs/_/de dag tshu rol pha rol la/_/bzod pa'i nam mkha'i mtshan 'tshal to/_/'di ni mnyam bzhag dpa' ba 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]ste/_/brjod du med pa'i gnas lags so/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen che/_/spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'/_/nor bu rin chen brgya byin thogs/_/gang dag la ni rgyang nas gda'/_/sems can de dag skal ba che/_/dpa' 'gro'i pha rol shin tu phyin/_/
[\[265b.2\]]ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad shes rab che/_/de ring 'dir ni zab mo'i gtam/_/mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal/_/bcom ldan gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i/_/sems can dag la dbugs dbyung mdzod/_/sems can yongs 
[\[265b.3\]]smin bgyi slad du/_/'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yul lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_/gang na kun gzhi thos gyur cing /_/shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas/_/de ni ting 'dzin spyod yul lo/_/de ni nam 
[\[265b.4\]]mkha'i snying po yi/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul te/_/snang ba med cing spros med pa'i/_/ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan/_/lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa/_/phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur/_/rtag dang chad la chags pa ni/_/pha rol tshu rol shin 
[\[265b.5\]]tu rmongs/_/lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las/_/rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa/_/brjod du med pa bsgom par gyis/_/de ni myur du sa 'thob 'gyur/_/kye grogs po dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 
[\[265b.6\]]'du shes kyi tshul gyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jig pa shes par byas nas/_de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi skye mi 
[\[265b.7\]]'gag pa/_mi dmigs pa cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste/_ci nas kyang rtag pa dang chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'jigs/_mi dngangs/_mi skrag par 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad la chags par dmigs pa'i sems 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]su ma gyur par byas na de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing /_phyin cad kyang chad pa dang rtag pa la mi gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/_'khor der lhags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang 
[\[266a.2\]]ba ji ltar mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_rtogs pa dang /_shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[266a.3\]]chen po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs pa/_ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/_bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[266a.4\]]kyi ni rgyal mtshan gyi mchog lta bu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni ded dpon lta bu/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni gter lta bu/_sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni bum pa bzang po lta bu/_mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma lta bu/_lam stor ba 
[\[266a.5\]]rnams kyi ni zla ba lta bu/_'jigs pa rnams kyi ni ri rab lta bu/_nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyi ni sman bcud kyis len pa lta bu/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de lhung ba rnams kyi ni 'khar ba lta bu/_phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams kyi ni me tog lta bu/_sdom 
[\[266a.6\]]pa spyod pa rnams kyi ni me long lta bu/_ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnams kyi ni gos lta bu/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni stegs lta bu/_pha rol du 'gro ba rnams kyi ni gru lta bu/_mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni them skas lta bu/_tshig ngan pa dang 
[\[266a.7\]]skur pas gdungs pa rnams kyi ni gdugs lta bu/_pha rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni seng ge lta bu/_char pa rnams kyi ni chu lta bu/_bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni go cha lta bu/_bslab pa 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni mig 'byed pa lta bu/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog thams cad kyi 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ni sa lta bu/_nad pa rnams kyi ni sman pa lta bu/_bkres pa rnams kyi ni 'bru lta bu/_skom pa rnams kyi ni chu shel lta bu/_ngal ba rnams kyi ni mal lta bu/_ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni me shel lta bu/_byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni shing rta lta bu/_skyed 
[\[266b.2\]]mos tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni rdzing bu lta bu/_byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyi ni phreng ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste/_rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu lta bu/_rigs kyi bu de sa bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni nor bu yid bzhin lta bu/_rigs kyi bu de 
[\[266b.3\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni shing yongs 'du dang 'dra ba/_gcod pa'i phyir lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi ni mtshon lta bu/_'joms pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ni rdo rje lta bu/_bdud rnams kyis 
[\[266b.4\]]ni thub par dka' ba/_thabs dang ldan pa rnams la ni tshes grangs/_ye shes kyi ni 'byed pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni gnas/_rang rgyal ba rnams kyi ni phreng ba dang mtshungs pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyi ni gos dang mtshungs pa/_lha rnams kyi ni mig lta bu/_
[\[266b.5\]]mi rnams kyi ni lam lta bu/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi ni skyabs/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi ni rten/_sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni mgon/_sbyin gnas kyi sems can thams cad kyi ni snod du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni shing rta lta bu/_rigs 
[\[266b.6\]]kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni blon po lta bu/_chos kyi grong khyer gyi ni sgo srungs yin te/_rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis ni brgyan 
[\[266b.7\]]pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ni ldan/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyis/_da khyed 'dir lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]shig_/mchod pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyis de la ci nus par rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_lha'i gos dang /_rgyan dang /_snod sna tshogs kyis bkur 
[\[267a.2\]]stir gyis shig_/rim gror gyis shig_/bsti stang gyis shig_/mchod par gyis shig_/lam byi dor gyis shig_/brgyan par gyis shig_/bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig_/khyed thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan thob pa dang /_snod du gyur 
[\[267a.3\]]par ring por mi thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa mtha' dag stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te/_snying 
[\[267a.4\]]ni rab tu dga'/_bzhin ni rab tu 'dzum/_mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang /_'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos chen po dang /_lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_
[\[267a.5\]]dri za'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_bdag cag 
[\[267a.6\]]gis rigs kyi bu 'di la bkod pa'i mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur sti bya snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po che sna bdun las byas shing /_ri 
[\[267a.7\]]dang /_'brog dang /_ri skam dang /_phug dang /_grog po dang /_g.yang sa dang /_rtswa dang /_rtsig pa dang /_bong ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_dri nga ba la sogs pa med la lag mthil lta bur mnyam par sprul to/_/des dpal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu dbyangs 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]dang /_shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/_dri zhim pa dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bur ldan par sprul to/_/shing ljon pa dang /_rtswa dang /_skam shing dang /_'dab ma sa la rten pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas 
[\[267b.2\]]pa sprul to/_/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na yang nad ni rab tu zhi/_sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/_sems can dag gis kyang 
[\[267b.3\]]zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan dag thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe gang dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes 
[\[267b.4\]]pa blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing yan lag thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs/_rdul med pa rab rib dang bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni mdzes par byas/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni bral/_sems ni rab tu zhi/_dge 
[\[267b.5\]]ba thams cad la ni sems mos/_dkon mchog gsum la ni sems rab tu dad par gyur nas 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na yang nor bu rin po che thogs par mthong bar sprul nas nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so dang 'tsham pa'i 'od 
[\[267b.6\]]zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par gyur to/_/nor bu rin po che de dag las kyang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs byung bar gyur to/_/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon par bab 
[\[267b.7\]]par gyur to/_/gos bzang po sna tshogs kyi char dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang /_spos sna tshogs kyi char dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang /_gdugs sna tshogs kyi char dang /_snod sna tshogs kyi char dang /_'bras bu sna 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to/_/lha'i gos dang /_chos gos dang /_gser gyi skud pa dang /_mu tig gi se mo do dang /_me tog pad ma dang /_ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_u ra ga sa la dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying 
[\[268a.2\]]po dang /_shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang /_tsan dan sa mchog pa'i bye mas lam der bkram par mngon par sprul to/_/lam de'i g.yas g.yon gnyi gar rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang pa dang 'dra ba/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khang [{]bzangs kyang [,]bzang yang [}]mngon par sprul te/_khang pa de na 
[\[268a.3\]]'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi chung ma dam pa dang /_slas dang 'dra ba dang /_yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrogs shing rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la lha'i nor bu rin po che las byas 
[\[268a.4\]]pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu'i dpag tshad brgya tsam la rin po che'i dra ba'i skud pa dang /_mu tig gi rgyan phreng gis legs par brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/_rgyan de dag las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra 
[\[268a.5\]]'byung ngo /_/rtswa dang /_shing dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ste sa la rten pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung bar grag ste/_sgra de gang gi 
[\[268a.6\]]rnar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i bkod pa chen po de mthong ste/_shin tu ngo mtshar dang 
[\[268a.7\]]rmad du byung ba'i chos thob nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i stan ji lta bur bsham snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che las byas pa'i me tog pad ma sdong bu ni dngul/_lo ma ni gser/_
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]snying po ni rin po che rdo'i snying po/_ze ba ni nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od zer las byas pa/_rgyar ni rgyang grags gcig tsam yod pa/_me tog pad ma'i ze ba'i stan rnam pa 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i pad ma byung nas pad ma'i steng de 
[\[268b.2\]]la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo /_/de'i spyi bo la yang nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i g.yog byang chub sems 
[\[268b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang rang rang gi pad ma'i ze ba'i stan la 'khod par snang ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[268b.4\]]chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/_/gang dag sngon du 'ongs pa ni/_/gus dang ldan pas phyag byas te/_/phyi nas stan la 'dug byed na/_/skyes bu 
[\[268b.5\]]dam pa 'di 'ongs na/_/bkod chen dag kyang bstan gyur na/_/ston la phyag kyang ma btsal bar/_/stan la 'dug pa lta bur snang /_/sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa 'di nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong /_/rtog pa kun la mi 
[\[268b.6\]]gnas pas/_/sems can du ni mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/_yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'i phyir/_/de ltar sems can mi mthong na/_/bkod pa che 'di ci phyir bstan/_/the tsom gyur pa bshad par mdzod/_/sman 
[\[268b.7\]]gyi rgyal pos smras pa/_kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can/_/byis pas don dam mi shes te/_/sems can yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/_/'di ni dpa' bo'i thabs yin no/_/don dam gyis ni sdug bsngal ba/_/de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir/_/mkhas 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pas kun rdzob bden pa yis/_/'di 'dra ba yi bkod pa bstan/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis 
[\[269a.2\]]ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo sems can thams cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa gcig gi spyod yul dang /_sbyor ba dang /_rnam par grol ba mi shes so/_/yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te sems can 
[\[269a.3\]]thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur na yang de dag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig gi spyod yul dang /_sbyor ba dang /_rnam par grol ba mi shes so/_/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang 
[\[269a.4\]]dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes te/_gal te sems can thams cad bse ru lta bu'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi spyod 
[\[269a.5\]]yul dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_don dam pa la brtag pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyor ba mi shes so/_/yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang de dag gis byang 
[\[269a.6\]]chub sems dpa' so so rig pa thob pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang /_mos pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'i byin gyis brlabs mi shes so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[269a.7\]]nam mkha'i snying po 'di yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/_so sor rig pa thob/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das te/_ji ltar da ltar nga'i 'dus pa chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]la nyal shes nas ji ltar 'di na sems can kha cig bkod pa chen po 'di'i phyir 'ong zhing ting nge 'dzin dang /_bkod pa chen po blta ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar rigs kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas nub phyogs 
[\[269b.2\]]nas 'dir 'ong zhing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa/_mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/_sems can thams cad kyang skyo bar byas nas de'i 'og tu sems can dpag 
[\[269b.3\]]tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pas bsgrub pa'i bkod pa chen po yang bstan/_ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa chen po yang bstan pa bzhin no/_/gal te rigs kyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i bkod pa ston du zin na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[269b.4\]]rten rmongs par 'gyur/_bslad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i bar du yang bslad par 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul dang /_sbyor ba'i mtshan ma ston par mi nus te/_de ltar chos zab mo'i yon tan la gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu de ni thabs 
[\[269b.5\]]shes pa la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad la gnas so/_/the tshom med do/_/ye shes gzhan la rag ma las pa la mkhas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang 'dra'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[269b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de ni sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar par skye bar ston pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongs su thar bar byed pa'o/_/lus kyi dug 'byung ba chen po'i nad gso bar byed 
[\[269b.7\]]pa'o/_/sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog bslad nas mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming rjod par byed/_phyag 'tshal bar byed/_dri 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]'bul/_a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par byed na/_rigs kyi bu de ni de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel pa ci 'dra ba dang /_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[270a.2\]]bskyed pa ci 'dra ba la yang rtog cing sems sbyong ba ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/_chos la bskyed pa'am/_dge 'dun la bskyed pa'am/_bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam/_tshul khrims kyi rang 
[\[270a.3\]]bzhin nam/_bsgom pa'i rang bzhin yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad rmi lam na yang rung /_sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/_de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du lam drang po'i thabs kyis ston te/_thabs des lta ba ngan pa dang /_byed pa dang /_smon lam 
[\[270a.4\]]ngan pa'i bsam pa dang /_skyabs ngan pa dang /_ngan par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar bar byed do/_ci nas kyang de'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang /_smon lam drang po dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang /_bstan 
[\[270a.5\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du dri mi zhim pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdig pa'i lta ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang /_de dag gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i lam thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang /_legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 
[\[270a.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_de dag myur du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang /_zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to/_/gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /_gang yang sems g.yengs pa dang /_gang dag 
[\[270a.7\]]gi mig gi bar chad byas pa dang /_lce bcings pa dang /_gang dag gi yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na/_gal te de dag gi nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_nad med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying thag pa nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas rjod par byed cing a ga ru dang /_rgya spos kyis bdugs nas/_skyes bu dam pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal nas/_rigs kyi bu de ni de dag gi rmi lam na bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug gam/_brgya byin gyi gzugs 
[\[270b.2\]]sam/_dpal gyi gzugs sam/_dbyangs can gyi gzugs sam/_rgyal rigs kyi gzugs sam/_blon po'i gzugs sam/_dpa' bo'i gzugs sam/_sman pa'i gzugs sam/_pha'i gzugs sam/_ma'i gzugs sam/_khye'u'i gzugs 
[\[270b.3\]]sam/_bu mo'i gzugs kyis rmi lam na nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman dang yo byad du gyur pa thams cad de bzhin du ston cing nad pa'i sbyor ba gcig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang zhal ta dang /_longs spyod 'dod pa 
[\[270b.4\]]dang /_gang kha ton dang /_thos par 'dod pa dang /_gang dben par 'dod pa dang /_gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_shes rab 'dod pa dang /_gang yang grags par 'dod pa dang /_gang bzo sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /_gang dbang phyug 'dod pa dang /_
[\[270b.5\]]gang gzugs 'dod pa dang /_gang nor 'dod pa dang /_gang dam pa 'dod pa dang /_gang rigs 'dod pa dang /_gang bu 'dod pa dang /_gang g.yog 'dod pa dang /_gang yon tan 'dod pa dang /_gang sbyin pa 'dod pa dang /_gang tshul khrims 'dod pa nas/_gang 
[\[270b.6\]]shes rab kyi bar du 'dod pa dang /_gang tshig 'jam po 'dod pa dang /_gang sems can rnams dang 'thun par 'dod pa dang /_gang sdig pa las thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang /_gang sbyin pa la gzhog par 'dod pa nas/_shes rab la gzhog pa'i bar du 'dod pa dang /_
[\[270b.7\]]tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang /_longs spyod 'dod pa dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la gzhog par 'dod pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dag tshul khrims la gzhog par 'dod pa dang /_le lo can dag brtson 'grus la gzhog 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]par 'dod na/_de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni thabs ston par byed do/_/gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral zhing bdag la lta zhing sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la/_bdag gis thabs gang gis sems can 'di dag bla na med 
[\[271a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sems bzhag pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa la dgod pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas snying rje chen po'i bar la dgod par bya snyam du sems pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o/_/dgon 
[\[271a.3\]]pa'am/_dbye'am/_bla gab med par a ga ru dang /_rgya spos dang /_dus kyi rjes su 'brang bas bdug par bya'o/_/thal mo sbyar te phyogs mtshams kun tu yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas sngags kyi tshig 'di bzlas par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_su mri sha_/
[\[271a.4\]]su mri sha_/kA ru Ni ka/_tsa ra tsa ra/_bi tsa ra/_sa~M tsa ra/_kA ru Ni ka_/mur mur/_be ga d+ha ri/_ma tsa me/_b+hu dza bA da/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_tsi na ta ma Ni pU rA ya/_kA ru Ni ka_sarba sha mes+tha pA ya/_a dz+nyA d+hA ri/_s+phu gung s+phu gung /_ru ti bi be ka gung driSh+Ti bi 
[\[271a.5\]]be ka gung /_pU ra ya kA ru Ni ka_/pU rA yan tu ma ma/_a sha sarba pan tha tsa/_a sho ka ga ti swA hA/_sngags 'di lan du mar bzlas te nyal bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ni de la mi'i gzugs sam/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gzugs sam/_bya'i gzugs sam/_bdag nyid du ston 
[\[271a.6\]]pa'am/_de'i bsod nams kyi skal pa ji lta bu de 'dra ba'i gzugs sam/_tshig gis de la tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed de/_thabs gcig po des sems can khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag yongs su smin par byed nus so/_/gang theg pa 
[\[271a.7\]]la mi gnas pa dang /_gang nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i sems can dag des thang cig yud tsam dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang /_thabs [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyis kyang bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la phyir mi ldog par gzhog 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]pa nas/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa sna tshogs dang /_sa bcu la gzhog pa'i bar du nus te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni thabs dang /_ye shes dang /_snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[271b.2\]]pa dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i tshad ni la las gzung nus kyi/_rigs kyi bu de'i thabs dang /_ye shes dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshad gzung 
[\[271b.3\]]bar ni mi nus te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang g.yo med pa/_sgyu med pa/_yang dag pa'i nan tan dang ldan pa/_lta ba drang po dang ldan 
[\[271b.4\]]pa/_gzhan mi smod pa/_bdag mi stod pa/_phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni rigs kyi bu 'di snying brtse bar byed de/_thabs dang /_ye shes dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtul ba'i thabs 
[\[271b.5\]]kyang ston cing sems can de thabs dang /_ye shes dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtul ba des de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang byang chub tu 
[\[271b.6\]]sngo bar byed de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/mthu dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtul ba chen po des pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spro ba dang /_rtul ba chen por 'gyur/_myur 
[\[271b.7\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan gyi chos dang rtul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa sems can thams 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i slad du yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'chang 
[\[272a.2\]]zhing de shin tu lham me/_lhang nger gda' la/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la de ltar ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_
[\[272a.3\]]sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa/_sdug bsngal chen po las thar bar byed pa ste/_sems can gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba/_ngan song du 'gro ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par byed pa/_'jig par byed pa'i sems can de dag la rigs kyi bu 
[\[272a.4\]]'di ni sman du gyur pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang /_lta ba ngan pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la ni 'di nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'o/_/ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags su 'jug pa'o/_/de dag gi snying la the tshom yod pa dang 'bral bar byed pa'o/_/gang 
[\[272a.5\]]dag gi snying gi snod chag par gyur pa/_ltung bar gyur pa phas pham pa'i sems can dge ba'i chos thams cad zhig par gyur pa/_ngan song du 'gro ba/_mgon med pa/_rten med pa/_mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams la ni rigs kyi bu 'di khar ba dang 
[\[272a.6\]]mtshungs pa'o/_/lam ston pa'o/_/sdig pa thams cad dang /_dri mi zhim pa thams cad ston par byed pa 'khru bar byed pa'o/_/'gro ba ngan pa'i lam las zlog par byed pa'o/_/shing rta dang mtshungs pa'o/_/mtho ris dang thar pa la 'jog par byed pa'o/_/
[\[272a.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can gang dag sems shin tu 'dod par 'jug pa dang /_gang dag shin tu khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_gnong ba 'chab pa dang /_ser snas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /_gang dag shin tu gti mug gis mun par song ba dang /_
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rgyu med par smra ba dang /_'jig rten pha rol gyis mi 'jigs par lta ba dang /_gang dag nor sogs pas chog mi shes pa dang /_gang dag mi dge ba'i chos bcu'i bar dang rtag tu shin tu ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi ngan song gi sgo gcod par byed pa nas 
[\[272b.2\]]shing rta dang mtshungs pa'i bar du yin te/_sems can rnams mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhog par byed pa'o/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par rigs kyi bu 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[272b.3\]]rten gyis mchod par bya ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan na sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba sprug par bgyid cing ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing lha 
[\[272b.4\]]dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham pa de la rigs kyi bu 'di mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde bas tshim par bgyid pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[272b.5\]]ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga ste/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan na rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par 'gyur/_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/_ngan song du 'gro 
[\[272b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed/_dge 'dun gyi'am/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba 'phrog par byed dam/_'phrog tu 'jug par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i 
[\[272b.7\]]rtsa ba dang po'o/_/gang yang chos spong bar byed de/_nyan thos kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_theg pa chen po'i nges par 'byung ba bshad pa spong bar byed/_'gog par byed/_sbed par byed pa 'di 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang nga'i phyir skra dang kha spu bregs nas/_gos ngur smrig bgos pa bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung /_bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung /_tshul khrims 'chal kyang rung /_tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung ste de'i gos ngur smrig 
[\[273a.2\]]dag 'phrog cing khyim par byed dam/_lus la chad pas gcod par byed dam/_btson rar 'jug par byed/_srog dang 'bral bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o/_/yang rgyal rigs gang gis ched du bsams te ma'i srog gcod/_pha dang bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[273a.3\]]nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i srog gcod par byed/_dge 'dun 'dus pa 'byed par byed/_ched du bsams nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin par byed na/_mtshams med pa'i las lnga po
