[\[273a.4\]]'di dag las las gang yang rung ba zhig 'byung bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o/_/yang rgyal rigs gang rgyu med par smra bar 'gyur/_'jig rten pha rol yal bar 'dor bar byed/_mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu blangs zhing 'jug par byed/_sems 
[\[273a.5\]]can mang po gzhan dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/'dul bar byed/_'jug par byed/_'jog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/_rigs kyi bu gang yang rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la 
[\[273a.6\]]ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'di lnga las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/_rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las 
[\[273a.7\]]phas pham par 'gyur/_ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po kla klo'i yul de lta bu gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/_la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_spyod lam dang /_la lar ni bram ze'i 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_spyod lam ston to/_/gang dang gang gis bdag gi skye ba 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu rgyal rigs de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad par byed de/_sngon ma byung ba/_sngan chad ma byung ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshad pa zab mo zab pa'i 
[\[273b.2\]]mdo sde dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa dag 'chad par byed/_ston par byed de/_de'i phyir rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/_dmod par byed/_'chags par byed/_gtong bar 
[\[273b.3\]]byed/_spong bar byed cing /_de sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom pa dang /_rtul ba'i spro ba chen po la gnas shing mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_gang yang blon po mchod rten gyi rdzas 
[\[273b.4\]]'phrog par byed dam/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o/_/gang yang grong 'joms par byed pa dang /_ljongs 'joms pa dang /_grong khyer 'joms par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o/_/yang blon 
[\[273b.5\]]po gang chos spong bar byed de/_nyan thos kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i nges par 'byung ba bshad pa spong bar byed/_'gog par byed/_sbed par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[273b.6\]]gsum pa'o/_/yang blon po gang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rab tu byung ba la gtse bar byed na/_bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung /_mi 'dzin kyang rung /_tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung /_mi ldan yang rung ste/_de dag gi gos ngur smrig dag 'phrog par byed/_khyim par 
[\[273b.7\]]byed dam/_lus la chad pas gcod dam/_btson rar 'jug par byed dam/_srog gcod par byed pa 'di ni blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o/_/yang blon po gang mtshams med pa lnga las mtshams med pa gang yang rung ba'i las byed cing sogs pa 'di ni ltung 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/_rigs kyi bu blon po gang la ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po 'di dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/_blon po de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i 
[\[274a.2\]]bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi don gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po kla klo'i yul de lta bu gzhan dag tu gnas shing skye ba 'byung ba yang ston te/_la lar ni dge sbyong 
[\[274a.3\]]gi gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_spyod lam gyis sems can rnams la chos 'chad/_la lar ni bu mo'i bar gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/_gang dang gang dag tu skye bar 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu yang blon po de dag la chos 'chad de sngon ma byung ba/_
[\[274a.4\]]sngan chad ma byung ba/_thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa/_zab mo zab pa'i mdo sde dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa dag 'chad par byed/_ston par byed de/_de'i phyir blon po de sngon byas pa'i mi dge ba'i sdig pa'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/_smod par 
[\[274a.5\]]byed/_las kyi sgrib pa de yang 'chags par byed/_gtong bar byed/_spong bar byed do/_/de sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom pa la rtul ba'i nan tan la gnas shing mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga'o/_/
[\[274a.6\]]lnga gang zhe na/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'joms shing khrag 'byin par byed pa ste/_lnga po de dag go/_/gang nga'i nyan thos ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po de dag las ltung ba'i 
[\[274a.7\]]rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/_rtag tu ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du de dag gi don gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston cing la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_spyod lam gyis 'chad 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]de/_snga ma bzhin gyi bar du mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu las dang po pa dag gi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni brgyad de/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis 'khrul par gyur pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa las 
[\[274b.2\]]dang po pa dag ni sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing lha dang /_mi dang theg pa chen po'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur/_ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing 'khor ba na yun ring 
[\[274b.3\]]du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_sems can gang dag sngon ngan par spyad pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes nas de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa las dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/_
[\[274b.4\]]theg pa chen po shin tu zab pa 'di nyan cing rigs kyi bu de dag blo chung ngu zin gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de shin tu zab pa'i stong pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan 
[\[274b.5\]]par byed/_lung sbyin par byed/_klog par byed de/_de dag ji ltar thos pa dang /_de dag ji ltar kun chub par byed pa de bzhin du sems can gzhan sngon gyi blo dang 'dra ba dag gi mdun du don dang bcas/_tshig 'bru dang bcas par rgya cher dran par byed/_ston par byed 
[\[274b.6\]]pa dang /_dka' ba ma byas pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thos nas 'jigs par 'gyur/_dngangs par 'gyur/_skrag par 'gyur te/_skrag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems smon par 'gyur 
[\[274b.7\]]ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po ste/_rigs kyi bu ltung ba'i rtsa ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur/_
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]de'i byang chub kyi sems bslus shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po bags kyis gzhol ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi bsam pa dang /_bag 
[\[275a.2\]]la nyal thog mar shes par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rim gyis chos bshad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po yang de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/_de'i 
[\[275a.3\]]phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de lta bu'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur la ngan song gis 'jigs skrag nas/_de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas ltung ba de dag bshags pa'i phyir mthong bar 'dod na/_des tho rangs 
[\[275a.4\]]kyi thun la a ga ru'am/_rgya spos sam/_bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod par bya'o/_/de'i skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu des sems can de mthong nas de ltar 'di lta bu'i gzugs su ston te/_
[\[275a.5\]]la la'i mdun du ni tha mal par 'dug ste chos 'chad do/_/la la'i mdun du ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis/_la la'i mdun du ni bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar du 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar byung ba de dag 'chags su 'jug 
[\[275a.6\]]go/_/bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i spyod pa zab pa thabs mkhas pa yang de la ston par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang /_gzungs dang /_sa'i bar du yang 'jog par byed do/_/de'i phyir ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar cing bla na med pa yang 
[\[275a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_de pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rdo rje bzhin du mthu che zhing rtul ba brtan par 'gyur/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]des bdag nyid mdun du mngon sum du ma bstan na byang chub sems dpa' des skya rengs 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe langs te/_skya rengs la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_'di skad du brjod par bya'o/_/skya rengs skya rengs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_skya rengs khyod 'dzam bu'i 
[\[275b.2\]]gling 'dir shar ma thag tu bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig_/nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po la bdag gi tshig gis gsungs te/_ci nas kyang de dag gi rmi lam du ston cing de'i slad du bdag ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags par 'gyur ba dang /_'phags 
[\[275b.3\]]pa'i theg pa chen po las thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig chen po thob par 'gyur bar mdzod ces byas te/_des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya'o/_/skya rengs shar ma thag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' las 
[\[275b.4\]]dang po pa ltung ba byung ba de'i rmi lam du ston par byed de/_ye shes kyi thabs chen pos de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang 'chags su 'jug go/_/thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston par byed de/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de de nyid du byang chub kyi sems 
[\[275b.5\]]mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po la yang shin tu gnas par 'gyur/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis 
[\[275b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus/_khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyis/_khyod myur du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyed cig dang /_de'i phyir khyod myur du 'khor 
[\[275b.7\]]ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar du de skad zer na de ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la la zhig la kye khyod kyi so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang /_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]tshul khrims dang /_legs par spyad pas ci zhig bya/_khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_theg pa chen po lhogs shig_/de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis khyod kyi lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid 
[\[276a.2\]]kyis mi dge ba'i las gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bsgrubs pa de dag de'i phyir dag cing rnam par smin par 'gyur ba med do zhes ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin gyi bar du de skad zer na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 
[\[276a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la la zhig la/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spongs shig_/ma nyan cig_/ma klog cig_/gzhan la ma ston cig_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spong bar gyis shig_/khyod ni de'i 
[\[276a.4\]]phyir 'bras bu chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyod ni de'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed mi nus kyis/_khyod theg pa chen po'i gtam la dad par gyis shig_/theg pa chen po nyon cig_/khyod theg pa chen po lhogs shig_/gzhan la ston cig dang 
[\[276a.5\]]de'i phyir khyod ngan 'gro dang /_ngan song gi lam thams cad du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/_gal te de de'i tshig bzhin du byed cing lta ba'i rnam pa de 
[\[276a.6\]]lta bu len par byed na gnyi ga yang ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po ba dag lce gnyis par 'gyur te/_gzhan du sems la gzhan du ston cing theg 
[\[276a.7\]]pa chen po 'di yang sgra grags pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti'i phyir 'don par byed/_kha ton byed/_'dzin par byed/_klog par byed/_'chad par byed/_pha rol la yang thos pa tsam ston par byed cing bdag ni theg pa chen po pa yin gyi/_
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]gzhan ni ma yin no zhes de skad zer zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir gzhan la phrag dog tu byed la/_pha rol gang las nye bar spyod pa dang yongs su spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la de'i rkyen gyis de dag 'khrug par 'gyur/_de dag gi ming brjod par byas te smod par byed/_
[\[276b.2\]]brnyas par byed/_ngan du rjod par byed/_bdag stod par byed cing de dag phrag dog gi rgyus bdag mi'i chos bla ma dang ldan par 'chad par byed de/_de'i phyir dngos po des lhung bar 'gyur/_theg pa chen po'i bde ba las phas pham par gyur nas de'i phyir yang theg 
[\[276b.3\]]pa chen po las lci ba chen po'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na mi la la zhig rin po che'i gling du 'gro 'dod de/_rgya mtsho chen por gru las song ba las rgya mtsho chen por gru nyid zhig par gyur pa de bzhin du/_byang chub 
[\[276b.4\]]sems dpa' las dang po yang theg pa chen po'i rgya mtsho rgal bar 'dod pa las phrag dog gi phyir [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras nas de'i rkyen gyis de dag dad pa'i gru zhig cing shes rab kyi srog dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa phrag 
[\[276b.5\]]dog gi phyir [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras pa'i rkyen gyis ltung ba lci ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'am/_rab tu 
[\[276b.6\]]byung ba dag zab pa nyid la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_sas brgyan pa'i skyes bu rig pa chen po dang ldan pa/_tshegs chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul gyi theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de klog par byed/_
[\[276b.7\]]'don par byed/_kha ton byed/_bklags nas gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed/_de bdag gis chos 'di dag rang gis blos rtogs nas nga snying rje ba'i phyir de ltar khyod la ston gyis/_khyod kyis ci nas kyang chos zab mo 'di la mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]shig dang /_da ltar gyi nga bzhin du khyed kyang ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra zhing /_chos 'di lta bu zab mo zab pa dag mngon par ni ma byas kyi/_bklags pa tsam gyis bstan to zhes ni mi zer bar rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir bdag 'tshong bar byed de/_de'i rkyen gyis dus 
[\[277a.2\]]gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_'phags pa'i gang zag dag gi spyan sngar nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur/_ltung ba lci ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_lha dang mi rnams theg pa 
[\[277a.3\]]chen pos bslus par 'gyur te/_de ni de'i nyan thos kyi theg par yang mi 'gyur na theg pa chen po lta ci smos/_theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par lta ci smos/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos/_'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig 'brog dgon pa 
[\[277a.4\]]chen por song ba las bkres pa dang skom pas nyen cing ngal bar gyur nas de 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du zas kyi phyir 'dug nas/_des shing 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa ro dang ldan pa bor te dug gi shing ro med pa la 'jogs nas dug gi 'bras bu za'o/_/zos nas 'chi 
[\[277a.5\]]ba'i dus byed de/_gang zag de yang dpe de dang 'dra bar brjod do/_/de bas na mir rnyed pa shin tu dkon pa rnyed nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas te theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'dod pa las rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_grags pa'i phyir bdag la bstod/_gzhan la smod par byed pas ltung 
[\[277a.6\]]ba'i lci ba de 'dra ba byung bar gyur nas ltung ba'i rtsa ba de'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyis shin tu smad cing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_gang zag de 'dra ba ni rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs thams cad kyis mi bsten par bya'o/_/gang de sten par byed pa de ni shes pa 
[\[277a.7\]]thams cad kyi 'das pa dang bcas pa yin te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba drug pa'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun na 'don gyi phyag dar ba'am/_blon po'i phyag dar ba'am/_dpa' bo'i phyag dar ba'am/_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]sman pa'i phyag dar ba/_blun pa mkhas pas snyems pa/_nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba dag 'byung ste/_de dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po rnam pa mang po dag byed par snang ste/_de dag gtong bas rgyags shing dregs nas snyems pa dang rgyags pas rgyal rigs dag kyang 'byed par 
[\[277b.2\]]byed/_dge sbyong dag kyang rgyal rigs dang 'byed par byed cing /_de dag rgyal rigs la brten nas dge sbyong dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed de/_nor gyi chad pas 'phrog par byed pas gnod pa de'i phyir dge slong de dag gis gang zag gi yang rung /_dge 'dun gyi yang rung /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 
[\[277b.3\]]'dun gyi yang rung /_mchod rten gyi yang rung ste/_phrogs nas de dag la skyes su 'bul bar byed/_phyag dar ba de dag kyang rgyal rigs la 'bul bar byed de/_de gnyi ga ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bdun pa'o/_/gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar ba de dge sbyong dang bcas 
[\[277b.4\]]te nyes par 'gyur/_chos de lta bu dag kyang chos ma yin par 'dogs/_chos ma yin par ni chos su 'dogs te chos spangs/_mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i bslab pa la mi blta/_nag po bstan pa la mi blta/_chen po bstan pa la mi blta/_byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[277b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa dang /_thabs kyi bslab pa dang /_gang yang mdo sde gzhan dag las bslab pa bshad pa de yang spangs nas dge slong dag gtse ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i bya ba 'cha' bar byed de/_bya ba 'cha' ba de dag gis dge slong dag gtse bar 'gyur/_zhi gnas dang lhag 
[\[277b.6\]]mthong la sbyor ba'i yid la byed pa gtong bar 'gyur/_bsam gtan pa de dag gnod sems mang bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir dge slong dag gi nyon mongs pa ma zhi ba zhi bar mi byed/_srab mor mi 'gyur te/_de'i tshe dge slong dag bsam pa nyams par 'gyur/_tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/_
[\[277b.7\]]spyod pa nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir lhod par 'gyur/_phal cher lhod par 'gyur/_tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/_dge sbyong ma yin na dge sbyong du khas 'che/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin na tshangs par spyod par khas 'che zhing bong bu dang mtshungs pa dang 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]chos shin tu gsal bar 'chad par 'gyur te/_de dag la rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu bkur sti byas pa dang /_rim gro byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas par 'gyur/_de dag gis dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa khyim pa la brjod pa 
[\[278a.2\]]dang /_rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pa de yang dge slong spong ba la brtson pa de dag la zhe sdang zhing 'phya bar 'gyur te/_gang de na dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi phan pa dang longs spyod du bya ba de kha ton la brtson pa'i dge slong la 'bul bar byed pas de gnyi ga ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[278a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong bsam gtan pa ni zhing dam pa yin gyi/_kha ton pa dang zhal ta la gnas pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/_dge slong bsam gtan pa dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa dang /_sa dag la snod du gyur pa/_sbyin gnas dam pa snod dam par gyur pa/_
[\[278a.4\]]'jig rten gyi snang bar byed pa/_lam ston par byed pa/_las kyi zhing dang nyon mongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la gzhog par byed pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ni tshegs ma byung ba/_'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[278a.5\]]dpa' las dang po pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa ste/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/_ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/_ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las 
[\[278a.6\]]phas pham par 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' bslus par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni de lta bu dag gi yul du skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/_la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_spyod lam gyis la lar 
[\[278a.7\]]ni bram ze'i gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang spyod lam nas dud 'gro'i mtshan ma dang /_spyod lam gyi bar du gzugs sna tshogs ston te/_rgya cher ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba bzhin du bklag par bya ste/_de dang de dag tu sems can de dang de dag la ji ltar 'thun pa 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]bzhin du chos 'chad par byed de/_sngon ma byung ba/_sngan chad ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa'i mdo sde dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_bzod pa dang sa 'chad de/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa thabs mi shes pa ltung ba byung ba dag ngo tsha bar byed/_ltung ba des 'jigs 
[\[278b.2\]]par byed/_dngangs par byed/_skrag par byed/_ltung ba de dag 'chags par byed/_gtong bar byed/_spong bar byed do/_/gal te sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas mthong bar 'dod cing ngan song du ltung bas 'jigs te/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[278b.3\]]bshags par 'dod na/_gal te de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing de'i ming nas brjod na rigs kyi bu de dag gi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de'i mdun du tha mal pa'i tshul du 'dug pa'am/_bram ze'i gzugs nas bu mo'i gzugs kyi 
[\[278b.4\]]bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba de ji ltar byung ba de 'chags su 'jug go/_/de'i thabs mkhas pa zab mo dang /_bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la spyod pa yang ston/_sa dang sa dag tu yang ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang bzod pa 
[\[278b.5\]]la gzhog par byed de/_rim gyis lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis gzhog par byed do/_/de nas de dag ngan song gi 'jigs pa chen po las shin tu thar bar byed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'jog par byed do/_/de ltar de glog 
[\[278b.6\]]dang mtshungs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa la mthu che zhing rtul bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te de dag la mngon sum du bdag ston par mi byed na/_gang de la gsol 
[\[278b.7\]]bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa nyes pa dang bcas pa tho rangs kyi thun la langs te kha shar phyogs su bstan te 'dug la/_lha'i bu skya rengs la gsol ba gdab par bya ba 'di skad du brjod do/_/skya rengs skya rengs thugs rje chen po can/_bskal pa chen po can khyod 'dzam 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu bdag la thugs rje dgab par mdzod cig_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po can la bdag gi tshig gis sbron te/_bdag gi rmi lam du yang de ston par 'gyur zhing bdag gis thabs des ltung ba bshags 
[\[279a.2\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_'phags pa'i theg pa chen po la thabs dang ye shes thob par mdzod cig ces smras nas des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya ste/_skya rengs 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir shar ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems 
[\[279a.3\]]dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmi lam na tha mal par mdun du 'dug ste/_ltung ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'chags su 'jug_/ye shes dang thabs chen pos thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[279a.4\]]'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po la shin tu brtan por gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[279a.5\]]lta bu'i thabs dang shes rab kyang de la ston to/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni shin tu dpa' ba las byung ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la 'dug par snang ngo /_/de lta bas na byang chub sems 
[\[279a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos sam/_gzugs 'drir 'jug gam/_de la mchod pa byed dam/_rim gro byed/_bsti 
[\[279a.7\]]stang byed/_bkur sti byed/_mchod pa byed cing /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnam pa du ma dag gis bkur stir byed/_phyag 'tshal bar byed/_bdag gi srog kyang de la 'bul bar byed na sems can de 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dag ni mes 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_chus ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_dug gis 'chi bar mi byed de/_de dag tshe zad pa ma gtogs par mi 'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang de dag gi srog dbrog par mi nus/_dus ma yin par mi 'chi/_nad bu can du mi 'gyur/_bkres 
[\[279b.2\]]pa dang skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_rgyal po'i chad pas chod par mi 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de dag mig gis gzugs mi mthong /_rna bas sgra mi thos/_snas dri mi tshor/_lces ro mi myong /_lus kyis reg 
[\[279b.3\]]bya mi shes shing /_da dung du dbugs phra mo 'byung ba dang 'jug par byed/_da dung du de'i lus la tshe dang /_drod dang /_rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po tha mal par ston par byed de/_sems can gang sngon bram ze 
[\[279b.4\]]la gus par gyur pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa la ni rigs kyi bu de bram ze'i gzugs su ston to/_/gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bar du ston pa nas/_gang sred med kyi bu la gus pa dang /_gang dbang phyug chen po la gus pa dang /_brgya byin 
[\[279b.5\]]la gus pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba la gus pa dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang rnam thos kyi bu la gus pa dang /_gang dag lha dang /_ri dang /_shing dang /_chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_lteng ka sna tshogs la 
[\[279b.6\]]gus pa'i bar du gang dang gang gi skyabs su song ba'i sems can de dag la de lta de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun du bstan nas/_gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba bzhin du de'i gzugs kyis 'di skad ces smra'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag la/_/gang dag shes rab kyis mthong ba/_/
[\[279b.7\]]'khor ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir/_/'khor ba na ni de kun shes/_/sems can de dag gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]kyi gzugs bstan nas 'di skad ces smra'o/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yis/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba/_/ye shes de la myur du reg_/sdug bsngal kun las 'grol bar 'gyur/_/de'i tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'i sgras dga' 
[\[280a.2\]]zhing rangs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa med pa yongs su dag pa/_gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa/_'tsho ba/_gzhes pa/_chos kyang ston pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du chos dang /_dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o/_/de lta bas na byang 
[\[280a.3\]]chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/gang yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs la sems kyis shin tu dbang bya bar 'dod na/_des tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal te mchod pa ci nus kyis 
[\[280a.4\]]bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod do/_/dgongs shig dgongs shig_/nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po brnyes pa/_bdag la dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor stsol cig_/'di lta ste/_u mu ra Na khe/_
[\[280a.5\]]bak+Sha ma ni le/_sa mu dra/_a ba da re na/_na ya na ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_a nu pa ma dzam b+ha smr-i ti/_a kra dzam b+ha smr-i ti/_badzra dzam b+ha smr-i ti/_ko Shasmr-i ti/_a nu pa ma smr-iti/_b+huta ko Ti ti swA hA/_de la dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa sbyin par byed do/_/gang yang sangs 
[\[280a.6\]]rgyas kyi bka' yang rung /_nyan thos kyis bshad pa yang rung ste/_bstan bcos sna tshogs klog par 'dod na/_des khrus byas te skya rengs 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o/_/mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa'i 
[\[280a.7\]]sems su bya'o/_/'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o/_/dgongs shig dgongs shig_/mkhas pa chen po sems can thams cad kyi nang na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i snying po gang zag gi mchog_/dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor bdag la stsol cig_/'di lta 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]ste/_i nI la dza/_bi Shan du Sha dza/_bi ya ba na dza/_bi bak+Shi sa me/_pA sha la dza si/_s+thA na sha ra be/_shas+t+ra kar+N+Ne/_hu ma hu ma/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka swA hA/_gang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug 'dod pa dang /_gang khung du 'jug 'dod pa dang /_gang bcud dam pa spyod par 'dod par gyur pa dang /_
[\[280b.2\]]gang btson rar bcug pa dang /_gang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang /_gang mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang /_gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang /_chu dang /_mtshon dang /_dug dang /_byad stems dang /_stag dang /_seng ge dang /_dug drag po dang /_rkun po dang /_g.yon can gyis 'jigs par 'gyur 
[\[280b.3\]]ba dang /_gang dam du bcings pa dang /_gang chad pas bcad pa dang /_gang gsad pa la thug pa dang /_gang nad kyis btab pa dang /_nad kyis 'jigs pa dang /_gang dag chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyis 
[\[280b.4\]]phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod cing /_mchod pa ci nus kyis byed la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gzhog cing 'di skad du yang smra ste/_dgongs shig dgongs shig_/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grags pa 
[\[280b.5\]]chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'gro ba'i don bzhed pa/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la gzigs shig_/bdag 'di lta bu las rab tu thar par mdzod cig_/skal ba stsol cig_/mthu chen po bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag go/_/shin tu dbul lo/_/bdag ni khyod la 
[\[280b.6\]]brten nas zhi ba dang bde ba/_tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du thob par 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po gzugs tha mal pa nas bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/_dbugs 'byin par byed do/_/gang dag 
[\[280b.7\]]ci las 'jigs pa de dag de las rab tu thar bar byed do/_/gang dag dbul ba gos med pa nas gang dag yo byad kyis brel ba dag gi bar du de dag la de lta de ltar bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i bu la la 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]zhig gnas chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par sems pa de gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la/_mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa la sogs te/_bram ze'i gnas chen po dang /_khyim bdag gi gnas chen po dang /_
[\[281a.2\]]bzo'i gnas chen po dang /_thos pa'i gnas chen po dang /_sgom pa'i gnas chen po dang /_gang mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/_khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas tho 
[\[281a.3\]]rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la skyabs su song nas gsol ba gdab pa 'di skad du rjod par byed de/_nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la skal ba stsol cig_/bsam pa dang /_sems pa thams cad dang /_bsam pa yid bzhin du rab tu rdzogs 
[\[281a.4\]]par mdzod cig_/gang sems shing gang gsol ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis mdzod cig ces brjod na/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa/_mi'i las 'das pas sgra de thos nas sems can de dag la bdag ci rigs par 
[\[281a.5\]]ston te/_de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan no/_/blo rgya mtsho chen po dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i thigs pa ni la la zhig gis tshad bzung bar nus srid 
[\[281a.6\]]kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang /_thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshad ni gzung mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad kyi tshad ni la las gzung 
[\[281a.7\]]bar nus srid kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul par byed pa ni tshad gzung mi nus te/_la lar ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul par 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]byed do/_/la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs su byed cing /_sems can ji lta bus 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed de/_de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi nang du ni dud 'gro'i gzugs su sprul par byed do/_/sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nang du ni sems 
[\[281b.2\]]can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs su sprul par byed pa nas gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed do/_/kha cig la ni mngon sum du sprul pa sprul par byed/_kha cig la ni rmi lam du sprul par byed/_kha cig la ni sdig pa'i las sprug 
[\[281b.3\]]pa'i phyir/_ngan song las bsgral ba'i phyir/_mtho ris la dgod pa'i phyir/_sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_'chi 'pho'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma rgyu ba'i tshe/_gzugs sna tshogs su sprul par byed de/_de dag la thog mar skyabs su song zhing mthong ste/_bde ba thob nas 
[\[281b.4\]]mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnas pa'i bde ba thob pa'i bar du 'gyur bas de'i phyir sus kyang de'i sprul pa thams cad kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni thabs dang ye shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[281b.5\]]dang ldan no/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying 
[\[281b.6\]]po la ngo mtshar thob/_rmad du byung ba thob/_bla ma la bkur sti dang /_bsti stang du bya ba thob par gyur nas thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed/_me tog dang /_spos 
[\[281b.7\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_chos gos dang /_rgyan dang /_gos dang /_bstod pa dang /_glu dang /_sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po des kyang de dag 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rig pa'i mun pa 
[\[282a.2\]]chen pos rmongs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi don bgyi bar ji ltar rngo thogs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu nam mkha' ni ma bcings pa ma grol ba/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa/_ma rmongs pa/_rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o/_/nam mkha' 
[\[282a.3\]]la rlung gi rkyen gyis rdul 'thul zhing rlung gis dkrugs pas yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste/_chus ni zhi bar byed cing dri ma med la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de la skar ma dang /_gza' dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i bye brag mi mngon ni skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam dang /_
[\[282a.4\]]nyin mo dang /_mtshan mo dang /_dus dang /_lo rnams kyi bgrang ba yang mi mngon no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi/_sems can rnams kyi blo bur du byung ba'i nye 
[\[282a.5\]]ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis sems nye bar nyon mongs par byas te/_de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad do/_/sems nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag 
[\[282a.6\]]pa dang /_de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis tshim par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon du 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas 
[\[282a.7\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad snying rje nyid la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag las kyang 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]ro/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha' 
[\[282b.2\]]mig la gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/ci mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas sam/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/ci mig gis kun du reg pa la gnas sam/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/gang yang nang du mig gis kun du reg 
[\[282b.3\]]pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus la yang brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha' yid la gnas pa nas yid kyis kun du 
[\[282b.4\]]reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du 
[\[282b.5\]]sems/_nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gcig la 
[\[282b.6\]]gcig mi rten to/_/gcig la gcig spyod yul ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rtog pa ma mchis pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_sgro ma btags pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po ni 'di lta ste/_rang 
[\[282b.7\]]gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa/_mi rtog pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_mi g.yo ba/_gsob lags te/_myu gu ma mchis pa/_sa bon ma mchis pa/_'bras bu ma mchis pa/_rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa/_yi ge ma mchis pa/_rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das/_bya ba rA dza/_man ta k+ShA ya/_dzi na dza ya/_dza na ni ma mu ni ha ra/_a na ya 
[\[283a.2\]]pha la/_gu Na gar+b+ha/_ni ya ma su ri nA ya/_bu pa sha/_sha ta sha pa/_sha ma sha na/_ta tha ka ma/_sha maM gu/_mA tu shi Sha/_sha ma tse ta nA ya/_kle shAn ta saM sho Sha Ne swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mig las rgyal bar 
[\[283a.3\]]byed pa seng ge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzungs 'dis sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe/_tha ma'i rnam par shes pa la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa yod pa sprug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so/_/khyod ni 'jig rten gyi 
[\[283a.4\]]khams dpag tu med/_grangs med par 'gro ba dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo 
[\[283a.5\]]sde sna tshogs 'chad pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rgyal rigs gdol pa nas dge sbyong gdol pa'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang /_thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i skye 
[\[283a.6\]]dgu dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to/_/gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la ye shes skyes par gyur to/_/srog chags khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/sems can rnams kyi rtsod pa gang /_/ci yang 
[\[283a.7\]]rung ste de dag gi/_/gzhi rtsa spangs nas lta kun gyi/_/gzhi rtsa myur du 'gyur ba yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /_ban de rat+na rak+Shi tas zhus shing 
[\[283b.2\]]bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D261}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya u pA ya kau sha l+ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[283b.3\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/_dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[283b.4\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa/_mngon par shes pa gzungs thob pa spobs pa thogs pa med pa khri drug stong dang yang thabs cig ste/_yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs par gyur te/_'khor brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun 
[\[283b.5\]]du bdar nas chos 'chad do/_/yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'ongs te 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes blas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha 
[\[283b.6\]]nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o 
[\[283b.7\]]zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla la rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/zhes de skad 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba'i thabs mkhas pa de gang 
[\[284a.2\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni zas kham gcig gis kyang sems 
[\[284a.3\]]can thams cad la khyab par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni byol song du gtogs pa la zas kham gcig sbyin par byed pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 
[\[284a.4\]]sems can thams cad la sngo'o/_/de ni rgyu gnyis kyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed do/_/gnyis po gang zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang /_bsngo ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni pha rol 
[\[284a.5\]]gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yi rang bar byed do/_/yi rang bar byas nas sems can thams cad la bsngo ste/_de thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems des sbyin par byed pa dang /_sbyin pa'i bdag po dag zil gyis gnon to/_/gang len par byed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan 
[\[284a.6\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu na shing las byung ba'i me tog gang ci yod pa phra mo yongs su ma blangs pa'i rnams dang /_phyogs bcu na gang spos kyi shing yod pa rlung gis khyer ba yongs su ma blangs pa bdag po med pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul zhing 
[\[284a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de thams cad la bsams te/_rjes su yi rang bar byed do/_/rjes su yi rangs nas thams cad 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed do/_/gang yang phyogs bcu na sems can sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ba de thams cad ni 'chags su 'jug ste/_gang sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal ni bdag la shog shig de dag ni bde bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i go cha gyon zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang byang chub tu 
[\[284b.2\]]sngo bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba de ltar 'dzin te/_de ni 'di ltar slob bo/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig go/_/
[\[284b.3\]]tshul khrims gcig go/_/ting nge 'dzin gcig go/_/shes rab gcig go/_/dgongs pa gcig go/_/rnam par grol ba gcig go/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig go zhes de ltar slob cing de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal na de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[284b.4\]]cad la phyag 'tshal bar 'dzin to/_/de thabs mkhas pa de sangs rgyas gcig la bkur stir byas nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur stir byed de/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod par 'gyur ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su len to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[284b.5\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni nam zhig shes rab rmongs pa can du red na yang de ni bdag la yi mi gsod kyi gzengs stod par byed do/_/chung ngu na rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du 'don na yang rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi don gang 
[\[284b.6\]]yin pa gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yang de yin no zhes de de ltar slob cing des tshigs su bcad pa de kha ton du byas nas sems can gang ji snyed dag gis bdag gi rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thob par shog shig ces de 
[\[284b.7\]]ltar ma zhum pa'i sems kyis smon lam 'debs te/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyi thos pa mtha' med pa dpe med pa zil gyis gnon cing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang len par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni nam zhig gal 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]te brgya la dbul por gyur na/_de'i tshe na de chung ngu na gzhan gyi las kyang byas nas zas gzar bu gang thogs te sems ma zhum pas dge 'dun nam gang zag la sbyin par byed do/_/byin nas kyang 'di ltar slob ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sems che ba'i phyir sbyin pa che bar 
[\[285a.2\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs kyis bdag gi sbyin pa chung ngu zin kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni dpag tu med pa'o snyam nas de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis zas gzar bu gang po sbyin par byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar gyi de 
[\[285a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rin chen bzhin du shog shig ces zas gzar bu gang po de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dang /_tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang /_bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[285a.4\]]thabs mkhas pa ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang de dag la 'dod par mi byed do/_/gal te yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag la bkur sti byas pa mthong na de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag nyid khong du chud par byed do/_/rgyu gnyis po gang zhe na/_byang chub 
[\[285a.5\]]sems dpa' las ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung /_sangs rgyas las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bas de dag la bkur sti byas na bdag nyid la thog ma kho nar bkur stir byas pa yin gyi/_de dag la ni ma yin pa dang /_de dag ni bdag gi pha'i nor la spyod mod 
[\[285a.6\]]kyi/_de la bdag gis 'dod par mi bya/_phrag dog tu mi bya snyam du sems pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[285a.7\]]gang gi tshe slong ba mthong na de ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed/_gtong ba chen po 'phel bar byed de/_de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par byed pa dang /_gang ngang tshul ngan pa can de dag tshul khrims la 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]'jog par byed cing sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang byams par sems pa dang /_sems ma 'khrugs pa dang /_phan par sems pa dang /_sems rtse gcig par gyur nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang 
[\[285b.2\]]bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang bar bya ba de dag la lus dang /_ngag dang sems 'jog cing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sbyin pa byin nas gang rtse gcig pa dang /_dbugs phyin par mi 'dzin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[285b.3\]]gal te sbyin pa de byin nas chos nyid la brten te 'di sus byin/_'di sus zos/_su la rnam par smin par 'gyur zhes des de ltar brtags na/_gang gis sbyin pa dang /_gang la sbyin pa dang /_gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi 
[\[285b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de 'dra bar 
[\[285b.5\]]thabs mkhas te/_sbyin pa gang gis sems can gzhan dag 'khor ba yongs su len par bgyid pa'i sbyin pa de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams len par bgyid pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/rigs 
[\[285b.6\]]kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung ngu yang mang por byed/_sbyin pa mang po yang dpag tu med par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gzhan 
[\[285b.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni ltung ba lci ba yang thabs mkhas pas srab mor byed do/_/ji ltar srab mor byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni nam zhig brgya la la la zhig tu sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis ltung ba byung na de 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'di ltar slob ste/_gal te bdag gis phung po 'di dag gis mya ngan las 'da' bar bya na ni de ltar bdag gi sems yongs su gdung ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur na/_bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na gnas 
[\[286a.2\]]pa'i go cha de lta bu bgos pas bdag gi sems la gdung bar ni mi bya'i/_byang chub ji lta ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya'o/_/ltung ba 'di yang chos bzhin du bya'o/_/ltung ba gzhan yang ma byung bar bya'o snyam du sems so/_/rigs kyi 
[\[286a.3\]]bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'das par gyur kyang thabs mkhas pa 'dis sbyong bar byed na byang chub sems dpa'i ltung bar mi 'gyur bar ngas bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286a.4\]]ye shes blas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[286a.5\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa slob pa na bskal pa brgya stong du yang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar 'gyur la/_sems can thams cad kyis snyan par smra ba dang /_mi snyan par smra ba yang bzod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa yang ldan par gnas pa de ni 
[\[286a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung na phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang ltung ba ma mthol 
[\[286a.7\]]zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa ma btang na sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag bsod snyoms kyi phyir mthar gyis spyod pa 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po khang pa zhig na bud med dang khri gcig la lhan cig mchis par mthong ste/_ltung ba byung ba mthong na ma bcab shig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag la zlos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na/_de bzhin 
[\[286b.2\]]gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la cung zad kyang mi mkhyen pa'am/_ma gzigs pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du bdag bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos de skad kyi tshig smras 
[\[286b.3\]]nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod la sa g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po shing ta la gang tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/_ltung ba 
[\[286b.4\]]byung ba'i chos can gyis bar snang la 'dug par nus sam/_yang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba'i chos ji lta bu grags zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di la zhus shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas bcom 
[\[286b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_ltung ba 'chags pa gang bdag gis skyes bu bal glang chen po lta bu la ltung ba btsal ba bcom ldan 'das nongs te/_nongs pa 'chags so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 
[\[286b.6\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i skyes bu dam pa la nyes par 'du shes ma skyed cig_/dga' bo 'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa gcig pu gnyis su med pa ni zag pa zad par bya ba la bar chad med par 'dod par bya'o/_/
[\[286b.7\]]dga' bo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yang thams cad mkhyen pa la bar chad med par 'dod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang dkon mchog gsum la gzhol bar mi 'gyur ba'i g.yo 'chad par mi 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]byed do/_/dkon mchog gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog go/_/dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma 
[\[287a.2\]]bral bar 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod pa mthong na/_dga' bo de'i tshe khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po lnga dang ldan par shes par gyis shig_/dga' bo khyod yang ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po bud med 
[\[287a.3\]]dang lhan cig tu khri gcig la 'dug pa de nyon cig_/dga' bo sring mo de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs nyis brgyar byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/_de sngon gyi bag la nyal de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po de'i 
[\[287a.4\]]dpal dang gzi brjid dang /_tshul khrims dang /_stobs bskyed pa mthong bas nyon mongs pa skyes nas gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras te/_de gcig pu lkog tu song nas gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig tu khri gcig tu 'dug na bdag 
[\[287a.5\]]gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do snyam du de ltar sems par gyur to/_/dga' bo de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i sems kyis sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa shes nas de nyid kyi nub mo 'das pa dang /_de'i 
[\[287a.6\]]khyim du 'ongs te/_gang nang gi sa'i khams dang /_gang phyi'i sa'i khams su gcig pa'i chos kyi sgo sa 'dra ba'i sems des sring mo de lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/_khri gcig la 'dug go/_/'dug ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags 
[\[287a.7\]]mi mdzad/_/de ni byis pa'i spyod yul te/_/'dod pa'i sred pa spangs na ni/_/sangs rgyas mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/dga' bo de nas sring mo de dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba skyes nas khri de las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni gang smad pa/_/'dod pa slan chad bdag mi 'tshal/_/'dod pa'i sred pa spangs na ni/_/sangs rgyas mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i/_/nongs pa de ni khyed la bshags/_/
[\[287b.2\]]srog chags kun la bde ba'i phyir/_/byang chub tu ni mos bskyed do/_/dga' bo 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa des sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslabs nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/dga' 
[\[287b.3\]]bo lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/_ngas sring mo de lung bstan to/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus brjes te/_bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu na kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[287b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dga' bo khyod rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba'i g.yog mi 'chang bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po bar snang de 
[\[287b.5\]]las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag 'di snyam 
[\[287b.6\]]bgyid do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur na/_ltung ba de 'dra ba 'byung zhing de lta bu'i ltung ba byung bas bskal pa brgya stong du sems can dmyal bar btso bar gyur kyang /_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba 'byung 
[\[287b.7\]]ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro ba nyid du bgyi'o/_/sems can gcig po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba dang /_yongs su 'bri bar ni mi bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po la legs so 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]zhes bya ba byin nas/_legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' dag ni snying rje chen po 'dis ltung ba thams cad spong ste/_rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol gyi yang shin tu pha rol na 
[\[288a.2\]]khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de nags kyi 'dab na lo bzhi khri nyis stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_de lo bzhi khri nyis stong 'das pa na rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa zhes bya bar phyin nas de grong khyer chen po der song ba dang /_chu chun ma zhig gis khye'u bzang po de mthong nas 
[\[288a.3\]]'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems dang ldan pas khye'u de'i mdun du brgyugs te phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas rigs kyi bu khye'u skar mas bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo khyod ci 'dod/_mos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khye'u bdag khyod 'tshal 
[\[288a.4\]]lo/_/khos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa dgos pa ma yin no/_/mos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag khyod dang mjal bar mi 'gyur na bdag 'gum par 'gyur ro/_/de nas khye'u skar mas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/gang bdag 
[\[288a.5\]]gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas brtul zhugs gzhig pa ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam nas nan gyis 'then te bud med des btang nas gom pa bdun 'phags pa dang /_de gom pa bdun pa la gnas nas snying rje skyes te/_bdag gis brtul 
[\[288a.6\]]zhugs 'di bshig nas sems can dmyal bar song bar gyur kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de myong bar bzod kyi/_bud med 'di shir 'ong gis bde bar gyur cig ces/_rigs kyi bu khye'u skar ma de kha slar log ste/_bud med de lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas sring mo 
[\[288a.7\]]khyod ci 'dod pa byas longs shig ces de skad smras so/_/de nas khye'u skar ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du khyim na gnas nas slar yang mngon par byung ste/_tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bskyed nas shi 'phos pa dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du de ltar ma lta zhig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni khye'u skar mar gyur to/_/grags 'dzin ma ni chu chun du gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu nga 'dod pa ngan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas kyang bskal pa stong 
[\[288b.2\]]phrag bcu'i bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis ltas shing spangs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu ltos/_gang sems can gzhan dag sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gal te dge 
[\[288b.3\]]slong maud gal gyi bu dang /_shA ri'i bu thabs mkhas pa dang ldan du zin ni dge slong ko ka li ka de sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel gyi gsung rab la 
[\[288b.4\]]dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de dgon pa'i brag phug gcig na gnas pa nas rgyang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong lnga gnas pa las de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po byung /_dus ma yin pa'i char pa yang cher bab pa dang /_de nas bud med gnyis shig char 
[\[288b.5\]]pa'i skyabs kyi phyir dge slong dri ma med pa'i brag phug tu zhugs te/_slar byung ba dang /_drang srong rnams kyis mthong nas e ma ho dge slong dri ma med pa 'di sdig 'dod pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa'o zhes yid byung bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dri ma med pa'i sems 
[\[288b.6\]]kyis drang srong de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa shes nas/_de'i tshe nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so/_/de nas drang srong de dag gis dge slong dri ma med pa bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'dug pa mthong nas/_bdag cag gi gtsug lag las 'byung ba ltar na tshangs 
[\[288b.7\]]par spyod pa ma yin pa nam mkha' la 'phags mi nus so snyam du sems par gyur nas/_de'i tshe yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri ma med pa nam mkha' la ma 'phags su zin na/_de'i tshe drang srong lnga'i lus sems 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de gzhan du gyur pa snyam du khyod de ltar ma lta zhig_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya bar 
[\[289a.2\]]gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maung gal gyi bu nam mkha' la 'phags su zin na ni dge slong ko ka li ka sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes gang du 
[\[289a.3\]]'jug pa de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_smad 'tshong ma thabs drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu lobs pa nor 'dod pa ni skyes bu de las nor ma grub kyi bar du sems can de dag gi drung na ci nas kyang bdag 
[\[289a.4\]]gis lus gtong ba yang ston pa dang /_yo byad thams cad kyang mi sbed par de lta de ltar gnas so/_/de nas phyis de la mi lta mi sems par 'dor te/_de phyir de la 'gyod par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa 
[\[289a.5\]]yang thabs mkhas pa gang gis sems can 'di dag bdag gis yongs su smin par bya bar shes nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la dga' bas cung zad kyang mi sbed cing bdag gi lus gtong bar byed pa ston pa'i bar du sems can de dag gi drung du de lta de 
[\[289a.6\]]ltar gnas te/_nam zhig e ma'o sems can 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin te/_phyin cad de las lhag par gzhag tu mi nus par shes nas ni de la mi lta zhing dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad kyang btang ste 'gro'o/_/de la rag lus pa'i sems kyang med do/_/
[\[289a.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste byol song du gtogs pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba zhes bya ba de me tog thams cad kyi dri la snom pa yang gang du yang rtag par sred par mi sgom mo/_/dri dang lo ma yang mi 'phrog go/_/de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dpa' yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /_rtse ba thams cad kyang spyod kyang gang du yang rtag par sred pa mi skyed/_bdag dang gzhan nyams par yang mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sa bon yongs su gdungs pa ni kha dog nyams pa med kyang ljang bu 'byung 
[\[289b.2\]]bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa ni dga' ba dang /_rtse ba thams cad la spyod kyang de ltung bar 'gro ba yongs su mi len/_sangs rgyas 
[\[289b.3\]]kyi yon tan las kyang yongs su mi nyams so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nya pa shin tu bslabs pa ni skud pa gcig la gzan ma btags pa'i mchil pa sbyar nas mtsho chen por bcug ste/_de gang dang gang gi tshe na 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe skud pa de mtsho chen po nas 'dren 
[\[289b.4\]]to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan por sbrel nas 'dam rdzab chen por ltung zhing de thams 
[\[289b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de bsrungs pas gang dang gang gi tshe 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sngags kyi rig 'dzin gyi skyes bu rgyal pos bzung ste/_zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings su zin 
[\[289b.6\]]kyang de gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe de sngags kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcig gis bcings pa thams cad gtubs te 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa yang gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dga' ba myong zhing de dag gis 
[\[289b.7\]]rgyas par gyur kyang /_gang gi tshe 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad rab tu bcom ste/_shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/rigs 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mda' dang mtshon gyi slob dpon ral gri rnon po gcig mi mngon par thogs nas 'dron pa mang po'i sel byed na/_de la sems can gang mi shes pa de dag ni mda' dang mtshon gyi slob dpon de la mi 'di ni mda' gzhu yang med/_
[\[290a.2\]]mtshon cha gzhan yang med/_g.yog kyang med de/_'di ni bdag gi skyabs kyang mi nus na/_'dron pa'i lta ci smos/_mi rgod las rgyal bar lta ga la nus te/_'di ni de dag tu mi rigs par sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes snying rje sgom mo/_/de nas mda' dang mtshon gyi 
[\[290a.3\]]slob dpon de 'brog dgon pa'i dbus su phyin te/_mi rgod mang po byung ba dang /_mda' dang mtshon gyi phyir go cha legs par bgos nas mtshon cha de la yongs su brtags te/_mi rgod de dag la 'debs so/_/des mi rgod de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas 
[\[290a.4\]]slar yang mtshon cha de lag par 'jog go/_/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha shin tu thogs nas thabs mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod de/_de 
[\[290a.5\]]la gang dag de'i lus kyi dbang po mthong na de dag ma dad par byed cing 'di ni 'di ltar bag med par gnas te 'di ni bdag thar bar yang mi nus na sems can gzhan lta ci smos/_bdud las rgyal bar lta ga la 'gyur zhes snying rje skyed par byed mod kyi/_byang chub sems 
[\[290a.6\]]dpa' de thabs mkhas pa shin tu yongs su blangs pas nam 'dod pa de'i tshe des shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa'i dra ba dral nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bud med med pa g.yem pa med pa gzhan du 'gro'o/_/yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' dga' 
[\[290a.7\]]bar byed pa zhes bya ba mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ste/_de bsod snyoms spyod pa las khyim bdag gi khyim du phyin pa dang /_de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog ces bya ba khang thog na 'dug pas dge slong gi sgra thos nas zas thogs 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog gis mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa'i skad dang bltas pa las rjes su rtogs pa'i mtshan ma bzung nas 'dod chags kyis yongs 
[\[290b.2\]]su bzung ba'i sems kyi 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs shing 'greng bzhin du lus thams cad kyang brtul nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog mthong ste/_'dod chags kyi sems tshul bzhin ma 
[\[290b.3\]]yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba dang /_de'i tshe de la chags pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin zhes dran pa skyes nas/_ci mig de chags pa'am zhe na/_mig kyang tshor ba med pa/_byed pa med pa 'dus byas pa/_sha'i phung po ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[290b.4\]]pa'i phyir tshor ba med do 'o na rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang lus dang yid chags pa'am zhe na/_des nang yang rung /_phyi yang rung /_'dod chags par 'gyur ba'am/_zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmigs so/_/des ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi 
[\[290b.5\]]sems de bsal te de'i lus pags pa dang shas g.yogs pa'i rkang pa'i mthil yan cad spyi bo'i bar du brtags so/_/des yang dag pa ji lta bar brtags nas chos thams cad mi skye bar rtogs te mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /_de dga' ba dang rab 
[\[290b.6\]]tu mgu ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la shing ta la gang tsam du 'phags nas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po lan bdun du bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa steng gi bar 
[\[290b.7\]]snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bar byed pa bar snang las 'ong ba mthong ngam/_gsol 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa des ni 'dod chags kyi sems las chos thams cad yongs su brtags so/_/bdud kyi sde btul lo/_/chos kyi 'khor 
[\[291a.2\]]lo bskor to/_/de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog shi ma thag tu bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te/_shi 'phos pa dang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de skyes ma thag tu gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun 
[\[291a.3\]]las byas pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa yang byung g.yog bya ba'i phyir lha'i bu mo bzhi khri bzhi stong yang skyes nas/_de'i tshe de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis 'dir skyes par gyur ces shes pa skyes te/_de bsams pa dang /_'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag ni mnyan du yod 
[\[291a.4\]]pa'i grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag gi bu mor gyur pa las/_de na bdag gi 'dod chags kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa mthong nas bdag gi sems 'dod pa'i chags pas kun du gzir te/_'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /_bdag bud med 
[\[291a.5\]]kyi lus las gyur te/_bdag gis skyes pa'i lus thob nas bdag gis rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa 'di dag thob bo snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_'dod chags kyi sems kyis rnam par smin pa yang 'di yin na/_gang bdag gis byang 
[\[291a.6\]]chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa la phyag bya ba'am/_bsnyen bkur bya ba lta ci smos kyis/_gang bdag rtse ba'am/_dga' bar byed pa de rigs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_de ltar bdag ni bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang /_dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der 'gro'o 
[\[291a.7\]]snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu de 'khor dang bcas te me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams thogs nas kha dog tshad med pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang byug pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas/_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub rab mchog 
[\[291b.2\]]gnas rnams bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam mi khyab/_/grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa bsam mi khyab/_/bdag ni mnyan du yod par bu mor gyur/_/tshong dpon bu mo ming ni bsod nams mchog_/bzang mo na tshod dad mo dang 
[\[291b.3\]]yang ldan/_/pha dang ma yang byams shing yid du mchi/_/gang yang sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi sras/_/dga' bar byed ces bgyi ba mthu bo che/_/mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms phyir mchis pa/_/bdag gi pha yi khang par phyin pa dang /_/yid du mchi zhing snyan pa'i 
[\[291b.4\]]sgra thos te/_/bdag ni rab tu dga' bas bshos thogs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po dga' byed pa/_/mthu bo che de gang na bar mchis nas/_/mthong ma thag tu bdag gis sems skyes pa/_/tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod chags ldan par gyur/_/
[\[291b.5\]]gal te bsam pa bzhin du ma grub na/_/bdag ni mi 'tsho 'chi ba'i dus bgyi snyam/_/tshig kyang smra ba nyid du ma nus te/_/bsod snyoms de yang dbul bar ma nus nas/_/tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod chags kyis gdungs te/_/de nyid dag tu brtul nas gum par gyur/_/
[\[291b.6\]]lus kun rdul zhing shi bar shes gyur nas/_/bu mo'i pha dang ma ni ngu bar bgyid/_/ro lags par ni rab tu gnas par sems/_/gang phyir dge sbyong la yang tshig cing ngu /_/bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'phor gyur ma thag_/de tshe bdag ni bud med lus bor te/_/'od 
[\[291b.7\]]gsal skyes pa'i lus 'di thob par gyur/_/gum nas bdag kyang mtho ris 'jig rten skyes/_/bdag gis gzhal med khang 'di mchog grub pa/_/rin chen rgyu ste de 'dra su la'ang med/_/lha yi bu mo stong phrag bcu bzhi 'di/_/bdag gis g.yog du thob bo bcom 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]ldan 'das/_/de tshe bdag kyang 'di 'dra'i sems skyes te/_/'di 'dra rnam smin bzang po las dag gi/_/de ltar bsams nas 'di snyam du gyur te/_/'di ni 'dod chags sems kyi rnam smin to/_/dga' byed mgu byed mkhas pa 'od byed la/_/bdag 
[\[292a.2\]]gis chags pa'i sems kyis brtags pa dang /_/de yi las kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/_/de tshe bdag ni 'bar ba'i mthu can gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes gar 'jug pa/_/de ni nyan thos dag dang rang sangs rgyas/_/de dag sar ni gzhar yang mi 'gyur 
[\[292a.3\]]te/_/'dod chags sems kyi 'bras bu 'di 'dra na/_/bdag gi bkur sti bgyi ba ci smos te/_/bdag gis rgyal ba 'di yi spyan sngar ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub mchog thob smon/_/bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed du spyad/_/bdag gi yi dam gtang bar mi bgyi 
[\[292a.4\]]ste/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' bar byed pa la/_/mchod pa yangs shing rgya chen dag kyang bgyi/_/mngon par byang chub phyir zhugs ma gtogs par/_/gzhan du 'dren pa rnams la mchod mi 'gyur/_/byang chub spyod pa dam pa kun spyod cing /_/'dod 
[\[292a.5\]]chags sems kyis bdag la gang lta ba/_/de dag bud med lus ni spangs gyur nas/_/thams cad mi 'jigs skyes bur 'gyur bar shog_/sangs rgyas mthus ni lha yi bu pho de/_/pha ma'i drung du song ste tshig smras pa/_/dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed/_/yun 
[\[292a.6\]]ring dus su sdug bsngal gyur ta re/_/gang yang bsod nams ldan mchog shi ba de/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang skal ba mnyam/_/'dir ni bud med lus kyang brjes gyur nas/_/'od gsal lha yi bu pho mdzes par gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa de yi gan song ste/_/
[\[292a.7\]]khro sems nyes pa de ni bshags par gyis/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/_/sems can dag gi mgon skyabs gzhan med do/_/'jigs pa med pa des ni bskul ba dang /_/pha dang mas kyang sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/_/thams cad tshogs te 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]lhan cig 'grogs gyur nas/_/shAkya thub pa'i drung du song bar gyur/_/skyes bu dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/khro sems nyes pa dag kyang bshags byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang skyabs song ste/_/bde gshegs rang byung la yang zhu ba 
[\[292b.2\]]zhus/_/ji tsam gyis na 'dren la mchod par 'gyur/_/chos dang dge 'dun la yang ji ltar mchod/_/zhus pa de yang so sor lung bstan gsol/_/thos nas de bzhin lags kyis mchi bar bgyi/_/rgyal bas de dag gis ni sems mkhyen nas/_/'jig rten 
[\[292b.3\]]mgon gyis yang dag tshig gsungs pa/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa/_/byang chub phyir ni brtan pa'i sems bskyed cig_/bu mo'i pha dang ma dang gnyen rnams dang /_/lnga brgya mi nyung tshang ba de dag kyang /_/skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni tshig thos nas/_/
[\[292b.4\]]de'i tshe byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed do/_/de'i tshe dga' bo dag la bka' stsal pa/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin du dga' bo nyon/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsams spyod bsam mi khyab/_/thabs mkhas pa yi shes rab de bzhin no/_/dga' byed smon lam phyi 
[\[292b.5\]]phyir 'debs pa ni/_/bud med gang dag chags sems kyis blta ba/_/de ni bud med lus kyang yongs spangs te/_/skyes bu yangs pa'i sems can 'gyur bar shog_/dga' bo 'di yi yon tan ci 'dra ltos/_/gang gis sems can gzhan dag dmyal 'gro 
[\[292b.6\]]ba/_/de nyid dpa' bo dag la chags bskyed nas/_/mtho ris su ni skyes bur 'gyur bar shog_/lha'i bu de yis nga la bkur sti byas/_/gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog gnas te/_/bskal ba mang por sangs rgyas mchod byas nas/_/shin tu gzigs 
[\[292b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/lnga brgya gang dag byang chub la gnas pa/_/de dag rnams kyang mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/de la dad phyir bde ba bsam yas na/_/mgon po la ni bkur sti su mi byed/_/gang dag dga' bar byed la chags sems pa/_/bud med 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]lus spangs skyes par gyur pa ni/_/gcig dang gnyis dang gsum ni ma yin gyi/_/bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po ste/_/rtsi yi rgyal po grags pa chen po yi/_/byang chub de la zhe sdang su zhig skyed/_/nyon mongs las kyang bde ba sbyin byed na/_/
[\[293a.2\]]de la bkur sti byed pa smos ci dgos/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab lhun po'i drung du gang sems dad kyang rung /_sems 
[\[293a.3\]]zhe sdang yang rung /_sems chags pa yang rung /_chos la bar chad bgyid pa'i sems kyang rung ste/_mchi na de thams cad kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_gser gyi kha dog go/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang su yang rung /_byang chub sems dpa'i drung du sems dad dam/_
[\[293a.4\]]sems zhe sdang ngam/_sems chags pa'am/_chos la bar chad bgyid pa'i sems kyang rung ste/_mchi na de dag thams cad kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog go/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de 
[\[293a.5\]]ring phan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ri rab lhun po dang 'dra bar 'dzin to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na sman gyi rnam pa blta na bzang ba la sems can su yang rung ste/_nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bltas na nad de dag thams 
[\[293a.6\]]cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang su yang rung ste/_sems dad pa'am/_sems zhe sdang ba'am/_sems chags pas byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug gi 
[\[293a.7\]]nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_dga' bo de de bzhin no dga' bo ji skad smras pa de bzhin no zhes gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa rab tu ngo mtshar to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas kyang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 
[\[293b.2\]]slar yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang gda'o/_/stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang ma reg la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la yang 'bab par bgyid do/_/bcom
